1b1(phal chen): bcu po brgyad du ltab// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu
1b2(phal chen): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub 'i 'dug pa
1b3(phal chen): btu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rang
2a1(phal chen): tu skyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chubal 'khod
2a2(phal chen): dro 'jig rten gyi khams thams cud snang bar byed cing / byang chub snyoms dpa' rnams
2a3(phal chen): snying po byang chub la 'khod do// ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed cing / byang chub sem
2a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje'i rang
2b1(phal chen): bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
2b2(phal chen): gdan seng ge'i khri la rnam par lta zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// yid nam
2b3(phal chen): mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod ngo // ji ltar
2b4(phal chen): mthun pa'i lus dang spyod lam yongs su ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do//
2b5(phal chen): rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// /
3a1(phal chen): #/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par len cing / byang chub
3a2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub
3a3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub
3a4(phal chen): la 'dug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub kyi mchog la 'khod nas kyang / ngo mtshar
3a5(phal chen): rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu 'byung ste/ bcu ga ni na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dang /
3a6(phal chen): rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgro bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
3b1(phal chen): rnams kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing / kye ded dpon chen po rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar cig ces gsung rjod de/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos drang po
3b2(phal chen): 'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob pa yang dag par mdzad de
3b3(phal chen): 'din ngomatshar rmang du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'a'od pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig tu spyong spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
3b4(phal chen): rnams 'os byang chub sems dpa' de dag la ku nas bskor cing mchod pa'i las nad par byed ma pa cwa thogs mngon par sgrub pa ste/ 'din ngomathar rjod du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o//
3b5(phal chen): kyi rgyal ba'i sras spyong pa byang chub mchog la 'bod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi chu dang gel ba dang / sdong po dang / nags tshal thams
3b6(phal chen): cad kyang bsam pa yod ko lta ste/ snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'dud cing phyag 'tshal te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad
3b7(phal chen): las yang dag par 'dang ba'i tshe yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin thob ma thag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par
4a1(phal chen): 'ad par 'gyur te/ 'dod do mtsha nga du drung ba cos ldang // me rgyal ba'i rdzas rgyam tsha chog gi das pa khyim med cing kun nas snang la 'od gsal brnas pa
4a2(phal chen): po la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos drug pa'o// kye rgyal
4a3(phal chen): ba'i skus snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gror byang shin tu chen po'i rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi
4a4(phal chen): phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas pa thams cad du 'byung ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam
4a5(phal chen): la ye shes mchog gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying
4a6(phal chen): po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la blo shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa
4a7(phal chen): dang dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang
4b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las dus thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing ye shes chen po chags pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ don ngo mdzang /
4b2(phal chen): rmang du byung ba'i chos bcu 'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmang du byung ba'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' bring po byang chub mchog la gas
4b3(phal chen): parnams la dbyung bar 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras den rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang dag par mthong nas/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
4b4(phal chen): bdud 'dus ba ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa na/ 'thab mo dang g.yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sem
4b5(phal chen): dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to// yid gnyis dang the tshom du gyur pa'i mi dang lnga rnams kyi yid gnyis dang the tshom gcad
4b6(phal chen): pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// bdud kyi sde yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba sten to// 'thab mo dang g.yul la mos pa'i lha dang mi rnams kun nas bsdu ba dang / kun nas 'dus
4b7(phal chen): nga'i lha dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i mthul thub pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba son no// sems can gnan mos
5a1(phal chen): da pa ston to/ mas la nga na chu spyod//
5a2(phal chen): bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyis 'am smad cing stobs med par
5a3(phal chen): byas pa yongs su bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang / byams pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
5a4(phal chen): klas pa dag tu chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag gi dbang mngon pas na/ byang chub sems dpa'
5a5(phal chen): bdud 'dul ba ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
5a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang / las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/
5a7(phal chen): byang chub sred pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtse ba yin/ byang chub sems pa'i bsam gtan 'byam klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad
5b1(phal chen): yang dag par bsags pa yin/ chos snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/ sems
5b2(phal chen): can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang dbyangs su ldan pa yin/ byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog por byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
5b3(phal chen): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yin/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ shin turnam
5b4(phal chen): par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin/
5b5(phal chen): zag pa zang po shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang
5b6(phal chen): chub pa ste/ stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar mngon
5b7(phal chen): par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcur bskor te/ rnam pa bcu gang de na/ 'di ltar
6a1(phal chen): mi 'jigs pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang / bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis
6a2(phal chen): shin tu brtags pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa med cing blta bar dka' la
6a3(phal chen): yo ba med cing sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang / sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par chos
6a4(phal chen): ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
6a5(phal chen): legs par spyad pas bskor ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med par de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// kye rgyal
6a6(phal chen): ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med
6a7(phal chen): pa dang / mngon pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can gyi khams thams
6b1(phal chen): cad mi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du mi 'khrul pa dang / dus gsum
6b2(phal chen): shes par byang rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang / tshig ging ba dmigs par dka' ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang tshig bzhin du khong du chud par byed pa ste/ kyai rgyal ba'i
6b3(phal chen): sras chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la
6b4(phal chen): thogs pa med pa dang / mngon pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
6b5(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dang gzigs nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed mi rtag pa yongs su bstan
6b6(phal chen): pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar brtan pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang 'bral ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /
6b7(phal chen): gzugs kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang mi rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthu phyir mi ldog par
7a1(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa dang / 'du byed rnams cad 'dod dgur mi rang sI rang sgyur du med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sa gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sbru ma rnam/
7a2(phal chen): pa lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / kun 'byung ni na 'jigs pas 'dral bar 'gyur ba yongs
7a3(phal chen): su bstan pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/ dgongs pa thams cad
7a4(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te/ 'dul ba thams cad shin tu dul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ mnyam pa med pa'i
7a5(phal chen): go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
7a6(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to// // kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems
7a7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o// don tshad med pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o//
7b1(phal chen): mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stong pa dang smon lam chen po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o// sems can gang gis 'di thos par gyur te/
7b2(phal chen): zos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par gyur nas kyang nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du rnga na ring pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang
7b3(phal chen): rgya bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir nen/ byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa'i nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi/ nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis me yin no// kye
7b4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang
7b5(phal chen): yon tan gyi 'byung gnas/ don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog/ chos kyi sgo thams la yang dag par gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi lamathams cad las
7b6(phal chen): yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan zos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams
7b7(phal chen): cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di rim gror byas te mnyam par bya'o// blang bar bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// yongs su
8a1(phal chen): bzung nas kyang nges pas rtogs pa'i sgos yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la brtsod par bya'o// kye rtul ba'i skyes de ltar brtsod pa'i byang chub
8a2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dge
8a3(phal chen): par gnol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa rnams
8a4(phal chen): rab tu g.yos par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes
8a5(phal chen): par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa/ kye rgyal ba'i bu legs so legs so// ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
8a6(phal chen): rnams la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas/ don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog/ chos kyi sgo thams
8a7(phal chen): cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro
8b1(phal chen): bams ca dang thu myong ma yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi ma spang bar byed pa/ 'thob thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i dru ma par 'del bar rnyed du'i bstan
8b2(phal chen): pa ni/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byung ba ste/ rtul ba'i bu khyod kyi chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / mthus mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri legs pa
8b3(phal chen): bshad de/ byed kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so// de bzhin du de bzhi na gshegs pa tha rba kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/ kye rgyal ba bu tshong ni chos kyi rnam grus
8b4(phal chen): da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dang rnams kyis mkhris pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyi// ded kyis byin gyis brdabs pa mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
8b5(phal chen): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad lo brdzes te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
8b6(phal chen): cad pa 'di dag smras so// gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig sdong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa// gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khri stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras// gang rnams de
8b7(phal chen): ngag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa// dpe zla med pa de dag rnams kyi stong pa bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byos// gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas chos kyang bdag ni
9a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas mi gnas pa// gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang // gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang /
9a2(phal chen): yon tan mi gnas pa// de dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya// gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang // gang rnams de dag
9a3(phal chen): 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po// gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba// 'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod//
9a4(phal chen): par bya// gang rnams de dag bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las rgal te thams cad dbang byed pa// 'gro ba thams cad dag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston// sems bskyed
9a5(phal chen): gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa// de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya// srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyan
9a6(phal chen): cing skye dang rga bas gzir ba dang // 'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas// de dag thar par bya phyir snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas ye shes mchog 'god pa/
9a7(phal chen): de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byos// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par rtsen// shes rab thabs kyi//
9b1(phal chen): pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang // dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa// de dag spyong ldan yon tan ldan
9b2(phal chen): pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyis de dag 'on// gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir byeb / zag khrig stong gi lus skems pa// gang rnams byang chub ning tshol zhing srog la lnga ba med par gyur
9b3(phal chen): ba dang // gang rnams de dag sems can par phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ma tshol po// byams dang snying rje'i sems ldar thub pa de dag kun gyi snod ma chog brjod par bya// rgya mtsho'i chu thig
9b4(phal chen): bzangs pa re res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi// de dag yon tan bsal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma song du brjod byas kyang // dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan par mi nus 'on
9b5(phal chen): kyang go/ sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos// gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar po 'phel byed kyang // mtho bar mi sems
9b6(phal chen): dma' bar sems med mi dman chos tshol ngoms par yong mi 'gyur// 'gro ba kun gnas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing sdong ste// ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa
9b7(phal chen): ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin// byams pa rlan yin snying rje rtsa ba dga'ang sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste// ze ba ye shes dri ni tshul khrims bzang po lo ma ma tog yon tan can// sangs
10a1(phal chen): rgyas 'od kyis rab sa rgyas byas tho zos ldan pa sems can dgar byed pa// de dang de dag pa zol bur 'dus nas mgos 'gro bra pas la snang // mngor rmongangam
10a2(phal chen): rgan pasams pa rnams dang hrI rtsu sa/ sa rab thabs ni yul gsug mdan na ma kyi / thamamag tu shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhye
10a3(phal chen): shes 'bras bu ste// chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khong de dang nges ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs// rim gyis dkar yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang pa ste/
10a4(phal chen): dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge/ stong pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mig gnyis te// de dag seng ge lta bur bdag med
10a5(phal chen): sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed// 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon nyon mongs mi bzang 'byams gyur te// bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin cing gti mug
10a6(phal chen): mdongs gyur pa// lam ni rab stor mi mkhas sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni// lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god// 'gro ba dag
10a7(phal chen): ni 'dod chags ne sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing // yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba// sems can mthong nas snying rje
10b1(phal chen): bskyed de nyon mongs pa yi nad pa kun gso zhing // nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang spyon// rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dgar byed 'gro la chos ston
10b2(phal chen): pa// sdig pa spongs la dge la bstan cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces// rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba// rgya chen
10b3(phal chen): byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor// tshul khrims lte ba ting nge 'dzin mu lud brtan pa ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon// ye shes rno ba'i gzhunan
10b4(phal chen): nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa chos kyi sgron mche 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yin// 'khor lo'i mchog rnams bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba
10b5(phal chen): ngag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms// ye shes chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan// byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'/
10b6(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge/ de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs med bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten
10b7(phal chen): rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi dgos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa// bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa mi bskul ba// gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes
11a1(phal chen): rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur/ de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis bltos// lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing
11a2(phal chen): 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod las bsam pa mi phyed de// bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mi
11a3(phal chen): bskyod rab bstan pa// de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar ba dag las zlog par byed// byams pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu zhing ldog/ thub pa
11a4(phal chen): rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu klog/ zla dang yang dag shes dang tshul khrims yan lag brgyad ldan chu yi cher 'bebs pa// de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs ni
11a5(phal chen): rnying sems can drin phyir mngon par 'phags// shes rab rab dga' dang khrel yong dag 'ongs chos kyi rgyal mtshan bskyed/ ye shes shing thugs yin te thar pa'i sgo bye dran pa de dag sgo ba snyim/
11a6(phal chen): bden pa rnams ni lam chen ba ni ste shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab stan pa// sred pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis mi thub grong khyer chos 'dadi dag tu sngon// thams cad mkhyen gyi sems mchog shing
11a7(phal chen): lang 'dus rdzu 'phrul nang pa'i ra pa bas/ mi gagi pa thabs kyi stobs kyi la rol gadzin ma byams pang shing rje mig panyis yin// ston pa dag 'gro bkunan thub mngam par lding dang po'i jag
11b1(phal chen): / nga sa nga sa pa sungan 'da' pa mchog pa yod// rgyam ma la 'phrul dang pa thugs ldan ye shes 'od zer phred mdzes
11b2(phal chen): byu na d+ha na mongs 'joms shing srid pa'i rgya tshor ba byams par byeng // slobs dang ba ba dag pa'i spyan 'phel sems can padri yongs su rgyas byed pa/ depa de dag snang ma
11b3(phal chen): kyi ni me'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun tu 'byung // chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis bstan mdzes pa ste// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zab
11b4(phal chen): gyis nor// sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par ston// de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'// chos kyi dbang
11b5(phal chen): po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan// ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni mig ste chos la dbang chen sgyur gnas pa// lus dang mtshams dang dpe byad bzang po sna
11b6(phal chen): tshogs kun gyis blta ba'i dbang po ste// chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin// srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das/
11b7(phal chen): kun dbang ngo po// byams pa sdang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos// srid pa gsum po kun tu tha dad lus ston chos kyi sbas kyang go byed pa// de dang de dag
12a1(phal chen): tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel// 'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang // phyir ldog mi 'gyur/
12a2(phal chen): blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dpa' dang tha dad la// chos kyi dbang po dbang bskurare 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba// thams can mkhyen gyi yon tan dbang phyug grag
12a3(phal chen): chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang // nam mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsam pa// 'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len mkhyug cho ga ci la'adi
12a4(phal chen): gnas pa med pa ste// 'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu mi gnas pa// de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra/
12a5(phal chen): de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos// chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rjes nyon mongs me ni rab tu sel/ de dang de dag ye shes mas ni nyon
12a6(phal chen): mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bsal// ston pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar sred pa gsum na rab tu rgyu// de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro bar/
12a7(phal chen): dbul yang sel// de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta ba kun tu 'joms// de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi 'phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed// ston pa de
12b1(phal chen): dag nor du rin chen mtshungs 'dra sprod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin// de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rje// 'phreng ba la bur de dang de dag smon lam brdzings shing
12b2(phal chen): 'jig rten mgo la gnas// de dang de dag tshul khrims mnyams skyon med rnam dag rngo ni dri rab zhim// de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyis ni bag chags dag/ gdugs 'dra de dang de dag
12b3(phal chen): stobs kyi tha res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed// ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal rgyal mtshan stsol// de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong
12b4(phal chen): ye shes kun tu 'phags// gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed// theg pa dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsul las 'byin// de dang dengag
12b5(phal chen): rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas// de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'// klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul du chos char
12b6(phal chen): 'bebs// de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dupa wa ra mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon// dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi sde rnams 'khrug/ mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu de
12b7(phal chen): dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud// de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can lam yang ston// de dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan ded cing lam rgyun rjes su 'gro/
13a1(phal chen): de dang de dag zam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rnag tu 'gro ba sgrol// gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes gang chen mtshe thob byed// de dang de dag mnyan pa lta
13a2(phal chen): bur 'gro ba ye shes thang tshan mchog la 'god// de dag skyed mos tshal gyi dga' brtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston// de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal med khang
13a3(phal chen): dag pa// mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel// sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so// de dag sangs rgyas lta bur ya
13a4(phal chen): shes kyis ni 'gro ba nyid log mun pa sel// yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan min yid kyis 'do ba yang dag rtogs par byed// de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas//
13a5(phal chen): de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs// zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston// de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang
13a6(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen gyi spyod yul shes// de dang de dag tshad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa med// de dang ye shes mi 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes//
13a7(phal chen): gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa// kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing ming dbyangs rjes su song ba yin// gzugs rnams kun
13b1(phal chen): lus 'das shing ming dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston// de dag mthu ni 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun tu brjod par mi nus so// gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob cing dngos thal dngos
13b2(phal chen): po med pa'i chos gnas shing // yod dang med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can// thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa yin/
13b3(phal chen): de dag spyong la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya// chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang ba nir dngos po dben pa lta bur rab rtogs nas// mkhas pa sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis
13b4(phal chen): smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed// sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bye ba sna'i tshogs rab ston pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam pa med pa legs
13b5(phal chen): par grag/ lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dang rab tu ston// sems med yid med sems kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun tu de dag ston// khyu mchog brjod
13b6(phal chen): pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par rjod byed kyang // 'gro ba dag gis sgra skad rje snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu rjod// nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams
13b7(phal chen): kyi lus la dbang sgyur te// brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston// de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes/
14a1(phal chen): 'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig rten sna tshogs ston// de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed//
14a2(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthu gnas pa ji snyed pa// thams cad kun tu skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med// rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems
14a3(phal chen): can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste// mkhas pa kun la dbang sgyur de dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing // me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil snyan gdugs dang ba dan rgyal
14a4(phal chen): mtshan rnams// thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig cen mchog la mchong byed cing // mkhas pa bsam pa thag pas lus kyi 'dud byed mchod pa dam pa kun tu
14a5(phal chen): smon/ mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi// 'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs med de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed// chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin
14a6(phal chen): re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing // blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldang ba ston pa byed kyang zad pa med// 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin/
14a7(phal chen): sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs spos mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston// sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston// 'gro ba thams cad la
14b1(phal chen): ni 'du shes dra ba 'jug pa son kyang gnas pa med// 'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro ba ston// la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas
14b2(phal chen): rgya chen dag kyang ston// la lar sbyin dang tshul mkhas bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang ni shes rab rnams// la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab
14b3(phal chen): tu sngon// mkhas pa rtog med de dgo la bar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston// la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba// la lar
14b4(phal chen): nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la la dag tu rang rgyal gzugs su 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' bas spyod las ldog pa med// de dag la lar lha dbang brgya
14b5(phal chen): byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs par 'gyur// de dag la lar lha yi bu mo brgyas bskor la lar gcig pu ston pa spyod// la lar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang
14b6(phal chen): phyag 'gyur// la lar chos kyi dra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston// la lar bud med sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur//
14b7(phal chen): li lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gau tan thub pa byed// la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe yis dang la lar rgan dang byis par ston// de dag spyod pa bsams na
15a1(phal chen): skye bo myos par 'gyur te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur// la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'phol lar mngal 'gro gnas pa ston// la lar mngal zhugs la
15a2(phal chen): lar rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor// la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan 'das pa la la bzo yang rab tu slob// la lar bud med tshogs kyi dpung gnas la lar ting 'dzin la lar
15a3(phal chen): mngon par 'byung // la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs// la lar 'khor lo rab tu skor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongs su tshol/
15a4(phal chen): la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang // byang chub don du spyod pa dag gis tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldog ma yin no// bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i
15a5(phal chen): pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag/ rgyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed// 'gro ba thams cad la yang rtog dang mi rtog rtog pa'i
15a6(phal chen): yul rnams thams cad ston// sogs pa med cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston// gang phyir rgyal ba nyes rgyal de dag nyi tshe'i phyogs med kun na bzhugs pas na/
15a7(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji smad pa dag thams cad rdul gcig sung du mthong / sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsrubs dang sems can yul de chos kyi rgya tshul rnams kyang 'thong // de lngar brtson pas/
15b1(phal chen): bskal pa phrag khrig brjon byed 'on kyang chu shas zad mi 'gyur// de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes// sems can gcig la mthar
15b2(phal chen): yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa'i rnams// de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad drag la rnam pa kun tu ston pa byed// bslab pa 'di yi phyogs la pha rol phyin
15b3(phal chen): ma bslabs rnams ni ljon pa byed// dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas// 'gro bar skal ba yod dang skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo skor
15b4(phal chen): ba byed// dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang // dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab tu shes// de la
15b5(phal chen): khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yi sems spyod da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te// sems can
15b6(phal chen): kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yod ma yin// ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed// de ltar sems kyi sems spyod snga
15b7(phal chen): tshigs kun nas nyon mongs med pa dag/ sems gcig la ni khong du chung nas byang chub mchog tu kun mkhyen rnam sangs rgyas// sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnam
16a1(phal chen): phye rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas// sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu gnol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god// rdzu 'phrul mchog tho
16a2(phal chen): ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags// sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyog rnams thams cad du'ang 'gro// de ltar ye shes dbang sgyur
16a3(phal chen): 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zang byed kyang // sgra rgyu shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med// 'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro/
16a4(phal chen): pa kun la ston byed kyang // sgyu ma kun btsal gzugs su mi dmigs gzugs yod ma yin par yang dmigs pa med// de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs
16a5(phal chen): pa rnams// sprul pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas shing rab tu ston// nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams// ma rnyogs chu rnams
16a6(phal chen): ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin// de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams// 'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi yul la
16a7(phal chen): yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin// la la gnyid log rmi lam dag ra bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs za dad byed// lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo dem zang // de ltar chos
16b1(phal chen): nyid dang bzhi mtshungs par rjes tshogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te// skad cig gcig la bas pa dbye bzang byed de dag ye shes pad mi 'gyur// ri yi dbang por sul garnas
16b2(phal chen): 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du zos pa'i sgra// kun nas sme yi sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar rjod kyang rtog cing g.yo ba med// de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa/
16b3(phal chen): dag/ rtog pa med par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang stong pa stor// dpying zla ngag gi smig rtsu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas// dri nas chu rnyed mi 'gyur btung du med cing rje
16b4(phal chen): bas je skos rnam 'phel ba// de ltar ma khas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba'i rnams// shes pas rtogs nas sems can 'du shes bla med phyir ning bya ba rnam par 'phel/
16b5(phal chen): gzugs ni dngu ba lta bur khyu mchog ston te tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra// 'du shes thams cad smig chu lA bur rag las 'dra byas chu skyes shing dang 'dre// sems ni sgra 'dra sgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin
16b6(phal chen): bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston// de ltar phung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang sgyur dag ni de la gnas pa med// skye mched stong pa'i rang bzhin dbang med 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun tu 'byed byed dang // kham/
16b7(phal chen): ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston// dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston// de ltar de dag chos tshul rnam par dgod
17a1(phal chen): paskor ba byed kyang gnas pa med// 'ong ba med cing phyogs su 'gro ba med la rgyud du gnas pa med pa yi// nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las las sdug bsngal
17a2(phal chen): de ltar lam gsum du// rkyen las rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med las rab tu 'das pa yi// yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la gnas pa rab tu ston//
17a3(phal chen): skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang ston// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston pa byed// sdom pa gsum
17a4(phal chen): gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin ston// gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu
17a5(phal chen): dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin// khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun tu 'gro ba thob gyur pa// mig gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa
17a6(phal chen): dag/ sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la dmigs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'gro ba kun tu mngon sum chos bzhed de/
17a7(phal chen): nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mi mnga' byang ba'ang bsnyes par gyur pa med// 'byung ba thugs su chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad// 'di yi gnas la rgyal
17b1(phal chen): sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang ni bar spyod pa med// 'khrul pa mi mnga' lam las g.yo ba'ang mi mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste// mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin zhes
17b2(phal chen): rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang nyams med pa// thams cad mkhyen mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba// 'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa
17b3(phal chen): chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa med parnyed pa// chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa sba ba'i mchog/ de dag yon tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis
17b4(phal chen): brjod par bya// de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par mi nus te// 'on kyang ji ltar sa las rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya// sangs rgyas ye
17b5(phal chen): shes rten ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa'i rnams// spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing // tshul khrim mi g.yo
17b6(phal chen): dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed// lung brtan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed// sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang
17b7(phal chen): sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa byed// bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med// gzugs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams thob
18a1(phal chen): cing yang dag don gyis rgyal// bstan pa mtshungs med sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi pa rnam par 'tshang yang rgya// sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po
18a2(phal chen): yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed// snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog rten byang chub dam pa sbyong bar byed dang ldan// brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing spyo ba'i pha
18a3(phal chen): rol phyir gyur pas// khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thong byang chub dpa pa mngon 'tshang rgya// mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog sngon byed
18a4(phal chen): pa yod tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur// dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa med pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrog/ ye shes
18a5(phal chen): mchog dang de bzhin sprul pa sgrub cing byang chub zhi bar nye bar 'gro// mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byam klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyin rab tu thob// zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro/
18a6(phal chen): na gnas shing nem nur bsal bas mkhas pa'i rnams// ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin// snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas
18a7(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya// ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse// rig pa'i snang ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang
18b1(phal chen): 'dra/ gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gnal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po// 'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du mar rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo ba med/
18b2(phal chen): bsab pa shin tu shes pas bstar pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin 'gyur bas// mangs pa dag ri dag cing sbyangs pa'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis// 'gro ba dag dang
18b3(phal chen): mi mtshungs num med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam par po 'dra// ye shes rgya mtsha'adra dang yon tan mi zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod// de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje
18b4(phal chen): bu'i go cha bags pas gnas// shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro ba kun na thub pa med// byang chubo mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la
18b5(phal chen): gnas// sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o// rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkhas
18b6(phal chen): bsan// zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rgyud la gnas// lus dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te/
18b7(phal chen): 'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse bo bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po sngon// mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par rtse// khyu mchog de dag sa ma
19a1(phal chen): rgyas yul la stobs thob gro bu kun gyis thub pa med// mkhas pa 'jigs pa med dang bag tsha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan// spangs
19a2(phal chen): rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang ldan// de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge/ de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na
19a3(phal chen): rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed// dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston// rgyal ba'i dbang po
19a4(phal chen): thob pas rtag tu dbang po ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu gnas// bsam pa dag cing g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur// mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam
19a5(phal chen): pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston// bag chags thams cad spangs na so spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin// nan tan bya ba 'grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams
19a6(phal chen): cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya// bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon med gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang 'thob// mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming
19a7(phal chen): ni yon tan sgo nas grags// mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa med par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed// ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba
19b1(phal chen): rams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston// spyod pa lag pa lta bu dag dang ldan pa lto yin snying po ye shes mchog/ snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i tshon
19b2(phal chen): cha yin// shes rab mgo sde chos rtog reg yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba yin// tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun pa zhi byed sna yin te// spobs pa lce
19b3(phal chen): yid lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin// spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug sa yin// tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin snga
19b4(phal chen): pa chags med dpa pa spyod yul lo// gang gis de dag snang por 'gyur ba'i sdang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yul// sems cad spyod la rnam par lta ba ye she mchog
19b5(phal chen): sde rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings// sems can dber zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyems pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang // bzod pa mi 'khrug brtson 'grus mi ldog
19b6(phal chen): dbang sgyur ba ni bsam gtan dam pa yin// rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren// skyo mang snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mong
19b7(phal chen): gnas lis btang yang snyoms// don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos// ye shes tshogs ni ral gri rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste/ 'gro
20a1(phal chen): brlabs la thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med// rang tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu/
20a2(phal chen): bcad// rgyal ba rnams kyi 'dzin las gang yin ye shes spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin// nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spang ste rtag tu ye shes kyi yang bya ba byed// bdud
20a3(phal chen): rnams byin gyi rlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis 'phags// chos kyi byin gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dong // lha rnams byas te
20a4(phal chen): 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro// skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor ba byed// mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la bzo dang spyod
20a5(phal chen): dang btsun mo'i 'khor yang ston// chags pa med par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed// stong pa'i stan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa bkye zhing yang dag skul ba byed//
20a6(phal chen): bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par bzhud// gang gis mkhas
20a7(phal chen): pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung 'gyur nas// sems cad bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god kyang // rnam pa kun tu sems can mi gnas
20b1(phal chen): chos lam yir spyod lam yin pa'o// de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dramatha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan to// de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag gis rnam
20b2(phal chen): par rtse// zhing rnams bye ba stong yang sgra rtse gcig la bskal pa zag khrig brgyar 'dzin to// lag tu khyer te ning rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la ngal dub gang yang med// mkhas pas khyer
20b3(phal chen): nas ji lta bu'i gnas su bkod kyang 'grong dag la gnon pa med// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag/ kun kyang ba spu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog
20b4(phal chen): de dag yang dag rab tu ston// mkhas pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab ston kyang // 'phel zhing 'grib med 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur med bya ba de yang ston//
20b5(phal chen): khor yug khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing // zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog ma byed// zhing rnams de dag
20b6(phal chen): rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed de// de 'dra'i rjes su dang ba zad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do// 'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag sto
20b7(phal chen): rnams ji snyed dang // gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang me yi 'od dang gang rnams lha dbang 'od// mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed// 'jig rten kun gyi
21a1(phal chen): ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston// 'gro ba ma lus sgra yi rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ khyu mchog da
21a2(phal chen): dag tshig gcig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod// srog chags bye ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rgyal bas bstan pa'i
21a3(phal chen): chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las zos par 'gyur// gang yang ji snyed 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston// gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung
21a4(phal chen): ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston// khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston pa byed// 'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig la rab tu 'god//
21a5(phal chen): 'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang sgyur rnam par 'phrul pa ston// sprul pa'i byin rgya
21a6(phal chen): rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems// de snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med// lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed
21a7(phal chen): yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing // brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang mi yi rnams// gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs
21b1(phal chen): rgyas sul mos pal/ sangs rgyas byang chung 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mabyed pa'i spyod pa son 'gro ba kun rje 'du shes drab ba dang 'bring dang ba mar 'jug pa rnams/
21b2(phal chen): thams cad shes shing byin rdzob byang chub 'tshang rgya ning rnams kun kyang rab tu ston// 'du shes dra ba rnam bsgoms rdo lngar 'jig rjerje 'du shes rnams la dbang sgyur ba// bya ba dang ni sbyor ba
21b3(phal chen): skyed pa dang kun mchog byang chub spyod pa ston// de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston// de dag gang la 'jig rten sa min pa dang yul min de dag bya ba
21b4(phal chen): skyon ston kyang bya ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed// de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam ji bzhin spyod pa ci bzhin yang dag 'jug/ lus
21b5(phal chen): ni nam mkha' lta bu dag dang yid la chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso// tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs rgyan// chos kyi go
21b6(phal chen): 'phang skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste// bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas// pa
21b7(phal chen): rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog/ ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin// spyod pa btsun mo
22a1(phal chen): bzang po bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o// zabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sgyur// song ba khyim
22a2(phal chen): ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje'i go cha'o// shes rab ral gri yin te drad pa gnu mdzes dbang po rdo ba mda' yang yin// 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi
22a3(phal chen): rlabs ni gdugs te ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng // de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms// gzungs ri sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes
22a4(phal chen): lu ma shes rab shing // me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rgyal mtshan rgyan// stong pa rnam thar brgyan pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang po btsun mo yi ra// zar
22a5(phal chen): pa bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyi rtse// de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ong khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang // gang gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongs
22a6(phal chen): su mi skye bas// ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god// kha na ma tho kun med ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed// zhing
22a7(phal chen): rnams rdul gyi 'brur rlags re re nas kyang bgrang zhing brtsi bar nus 'gyur la// bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar rus srid de// skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams
22b1(phal chen): kye sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi// sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskul pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nus so// gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du
22b2(phal chen): gzhan 'dod dang // gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro bzar byas bde la dgod par 'dod pa dang // gang zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag
22b3(phal chen): nges ro rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i sems su gyis te yon tan bslab par byos// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u sde bani
22b4(phal chen): bcu rtsa bani pa/ bam po brgyad cu drug pa/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshul/ skyabs med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga'
22b5(phal chen): ra ba'i nang / pho brang brtsegs pa bkod pa rgya chen po can na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
22b6(phal chen): po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / bstan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / chags med dam pa'i ye shes dang / me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang / nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdzab dam pa'i mashes
22b7(phal chen): rang dri ma dam pa'i leshes dang / rjerngadam pa'i 'ashes pang / rdus med dam pa'i la shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa
23a1(phal chen): skar pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ri rab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags med rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dri med rgya ma mtshan/
23a2(phal chen): dang nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul med rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen
23a3(phal chen): gzi brjid dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang / dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / bsod nams ri bo'i gzi brjid
23a4(phal chen): dang ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang / kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcur snang bas rgyas par 'gengs
23a5(phal chen): pa'i gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / pad+mo'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying
23a6(phal chen): po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gtsug gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i mig
23a7(phal chen): dang rnam par dag pa'i mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / chags pa med pa'i mig dang / kun nas lta ba'i mig dang / shin tu rnam par lta ba'i mig dang / ut+pa la'i mig dang /
23b1(phal chen): rdo rje'i mig dang / rin po che'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sna'i cod pan dang / chos kyi dbyings sdang ba'i blo gros cod pan dang / byang chub
23b2(phal chen): sems dpa' dam pa'i cod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par byung ba'i snying po'i cod par dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags
23b3(phal chen): pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par sdang ba'i cod pan dang / dril gyis non pa med pa'i cod par dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa'
23b4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug pud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug pung dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul/
23b5(phal chen): pa snang ba'i gtsug pud dang / byang chub dam pa'i gtsug pud dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug pud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od
23b6(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin chen 'brug sgra'i gtsug pud dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad tha mi dad par rnam par dmigs pa'i rin chen rgyal pos brgyan pa'i gtsug pud
23b7(phal chen): dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa sdang ba'i rgyal mtshan rin po che'i rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gtsug pud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
24a1(phal chen): kyi 'thang mo sgrog pa'i gtsug drung dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi ming thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug pung dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen por 'ang
24a2(phal chen): dang / gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / rin po che'i 'od dang rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / chos kyi 'od dang / zhi nga'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / rnam par 'phrul/
24a3(phal chen): pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang /
24a4(phal chen): 'od kyi dpal dang / me tog dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / byang chub kyi dpal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang / byang chub/
24a5(phal chen): sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / sa sgra'i dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / ri dbang rgyal po 'thab pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings
24a6(phal chen): kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin
24a7(phal chen): rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya bas dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'phags
24b1(phal chen): pa dang / khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang / ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang / bsod nams ri bos 'phags pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang / grags pas 'phags
24b2(phal chen): pa dang / kun tu snang bas 'phags pa dang / byams pa chen pos 'phags pa dang / ye shes rgya mtshos 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshesas pa'i rgyud kyi gdung gis
24b3(phal chen): 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang / mchog gi dpal dang / kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba
24b4(phal chen): dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po
24b5(phal chen): dang chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / de bar/
24b6(phal chen): dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa
24b7(phal chen): rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / chags pa med pa'i sgra dang / ma'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / rgya mchi'i 'brug gi sgra dang / sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos snang ba'i sgra dang / nam mkha'i dbyis
25a1(phal chen): kyi spa dang / sems can kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su skul ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
25a2(phal chen): gcom med par byed pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i bro dang / ye shes ri bo'i blo dang / nam mkha'i blo dang / dri ma med pa'i blo dang / chags pa med pa'i bro dang / rnam par sangs rgyas
25a3(phal chen): pa'i blo dang / dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang / kun tu snang ba'i blo dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i blo dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam ste/
25a4(phal chen): kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas chags pa med pa'i spyod yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
25a5(phal chen): kyi drung du 'dong pas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba la bsgribs pa med pa'i mig gi
25a6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/ nye bar 'dong pa rgyan mi gcod pas tshad med par phyin pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba rab tu
25a7(phal chen): thob pas sdang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag par bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa mi zad pa/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs
25b1(phal chen): su ston pas/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa/ sems can gyi khams sems can med pa dang / srog med pa yongs su shes pas/
25b2(phal chen): rang rib med pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi drangs rgyas par 'gengs pas ram mkha' dang mnyam pa ga sug dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// nyan thos rdzu 'phrul
25b3(phal chen): chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la zhugs pa/
25b4(phal chen): srid pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang / ngag la'al ba dang / bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa/ chags pa
25b5(phal chen): med pa'i gnas la brten pa/ nam mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas la the tsom dang / nem rung dang / yid gnyis yongs su chad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
25b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du zhugs pa/ gsol ba ma
25b7(phal chen): btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ sems can gnan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs
26a1(phal chen): pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul las byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan/
26a2(phal chen): pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa/
26a3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan
26a4(phal chen): pa de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / de bzhin gshegs
26a5(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
26a6(phal chen): spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
26a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngor legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang / dad pa'i mig
26b1(phal chen): yongs su dag pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam pa zag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
26b2(phal chen): smon cing / yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa 'am/ khong du chud pa 'am/ yid ches pa 'am/ yongs su shes pa 'am/ rnam par
26b3(phal chen): rtogs pa 'am/ gzung ba 'am/ rnam par dpyad pa'am/ rnam par bsgom pa 'am/ rnam par dbye ba 'am/ rnam par dgrol ba 'am/ rab tu brjod pa 'am/ sems can pha rol
26b4(phal chen): gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar ni mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang
26b5(phal chen): mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig dang brda sna tshogs su gyur pa/ dbang sgyur ba'i sa gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/ bsam pa
26b6(phal chen): dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can/ sems dang bsam pa'i yul gzhan dang gzhan can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ chos bstan pa gzhan
26b7(phal chen): dang gzhan la mos pa dag la/ sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa lta'ang yang dag
27a1(phal chen): par bskrun zang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa kyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan zang / sngon gyi byang chub
27a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lnga'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs
27a3(phal chen): par mdzad pa la'ang yang dag par bskur thang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lnga'ang yang dag par bstan grang sngon byang chub sam/
27a4(phal chen): dpa'i lam gyi bkod pa yongs su dag par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i dbyung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pa lnga'ang yang dag par/
27a5(phal chen): bstan grang sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa phur sum tshogs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan thang / byang chub sems dpa'
27a6(phal chen): sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan zang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
27a7(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu lnga'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par 'phrul
27b1(phal chen): palta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lnga'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa/
27b2(phal chen): nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lnga'ang yang dag par bstan grung / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lnga'ang yang dag par bstan grang
27b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad
27b4(phal chen): kyi yon bdes pa mdzad pa lnga'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang / yon ston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lnga'ang yang
27b5(phal chen): drag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa mdzad pa lnga'ang yang dag par bstan grang
27b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lnga'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yong
27b7(phal chen): su bstar pa dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lnga'ing yang dag par bstan zang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyong
28a1(phal chen): yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lnga'ang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byung /
28a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe med pa/
28a3(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba
28a4(phal chen): thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam par gzhag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang
28a5(phal chen): dbus med par yangs shing / rdo rje thub pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu brgyan pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun tu bkram pa/ rin po che du
28a6(phal chen): ma'i me tog sil mas chal par gang ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa bkram pa dang / bai nuR+Ya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu
28a7(phal chen): rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / pu shu
28b1(phal chen): dang / skur khung byas shing / khri 'phang grangs med brnang par bdag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba
28b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang / sgo dang cha babs thams cad las 'od
28b3(phal chen): rdor chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang / phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi sngags bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang chon kun nas
28b4(phal chen): them skas kyi 'phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing / shin tu rnam par bye bas rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to// 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang chu zheng gab
28b5(phal chen): par shin tu yangs shing rgya che bar kun dus gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi ring brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang / chu dang
28b6(phal chen): kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po
28b7(phal chen): grangs med pa'i rang ba sa la sar ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thala'i 'phreng bas mdzes pas bcan par kun nas gnas par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi ring de dag na thos
29a1(phal chen): chu'i chu klung tshad med pa grong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g.yas phyogs su
29a2(phal chen): 'khyil zhing 'bab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyangs su sgrog pas rab tu rgyan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur te/ rin po che'i me tog pu N+Da ri ka'i 'phreng ba dang / rin po
29a3(phal chen): che'i shing gam yo rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par bkod pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab
29a4(phal chen): pa/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu rin che grangs med pa'i dra ba kun tu snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che thams
29a5(phal chen): cad kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa/ spos thams cad kyi ngad kun nas 'byung ba/ bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs
29a6(phal chen): med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / 'phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
29a7(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i
29b1(phal chen): rgyal po de dun gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi mal pa'i dbyangs rabs skrag pa'i rtsal mtshan dang / nor du rin pa ci'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor 'dzan/
29b2(phal chen): po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu klog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang
29b3(phal chen): rdul mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par bye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur te/ 'dze ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang lha'i gnal med gang
29b4(phal chen): gi spen bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur te/ 'dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brtan pa dang
29b5(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang / rol mo rdung ba dang bkrol ba brjod du med pa'i sprin las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
29b6(phal chen): bsod pa'i dbyangs dang / ngaro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brtan pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo brjod du med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brtan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du
29b7(phal chen): med pa'i spong / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sman bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sngon gyis kun
30a1(phal chen): nas brtan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor burin po che'i 'aspu'i sbyin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu NiH/
30a2(phal chen): dkar po'i dra ba'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur sra
30a3(phal chen): ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i/
30a4(phal chen): rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang byin gyi rlabs
30a5(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro//
30a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi
30a7(phal chen): khyab phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par yongs su ston pa mdzad pa bsam gyis
30b1(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i bug gcig tu sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa yongs su ston pa mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
30b2(phal chen): phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu
30b3(phal chen): rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs
30b4(phal chen): pa rnams ba spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'dze ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
30b5(phal chen): dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su
30b6(phal chen): dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / 'dze ha'i tshal du yang dag par gnol ba dang / byang chub
30b7(phal chen): sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang
31a1(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang / rin po me sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / ning thams cad kyi dkod
31a2(phal chen): pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brtson pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i
31a3(phal chen): lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi dang /
31a4(phal chen): se mo do'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i sprin dang / na bun gyi char
31a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhib bu'i char rgyun
31a6(phal chen): mi 'chad par rab tu 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa
