31a7(phal chen): dang / rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can du chu ba mthon po dang ldan pa'i ze ba la rol mo bkod pa/ kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs
31b1(phal chen): san par ldog pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che seng ge'i drang sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i 'phreng ba dang / so mo ngos brgyan par kun nas
31b2(phal chen): gnas shing snang bar gyur to// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la mnyam par banag ma thag tu/
31b3(phal chen): de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes
31b4(phal chen): bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba zhes
31b5(phal chen): bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags
31b6(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dgye ba dang
31b7(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyi char mngon par gto nga dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi mngon par dbab pa dang /
32a1(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rgyun gyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sbyin gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa
32a2(phal chen): tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dang pa dang / lnga rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sbyin nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyis brlab pa
32a3(phal chen): dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rgyan yid du 'ong bas nam mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom
32a4(phal chen): ldan 'das gang ba ni der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brtar te/ khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan kun dang ldan zhing nor bu rin po che'i
32a5(phal chen): dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis
32a6(phal chen): kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs
32a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas
32b1(phal chen): snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
32b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi
32b3(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lda ldi dang dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang dra ba chen pos
32b4(phal chen): kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad kyi me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang 'phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
32b5(phal chen): zhing gi 'khor thams cad 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi dang / se mo do'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje
32b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'phreng bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
32b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lnga ldim kun nas yongs su blangs shing bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus
33a1(phal chen): kyi 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zhing thams cad nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lnga ldi dang 'phreng ba'i drabs/
33a2(phal chen): kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lnga lnga dang dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
33a3(phal chen): gzhi nor bu rin po che seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i 'phreng ba dang lnga ldi'i dra bas yongs su bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom
33a4(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs su brtan te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng /
33a5(phal chen): ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus
33a6(phal chen): su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol
33a7(phal chen): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes bsgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems
33b1(phal chen): dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzing rjid ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das/
33b2(phal chen): des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang dri sna tshogs su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi
33b3(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
33b4(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri du mar ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul
33b5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spros kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
33b6(phal chen): snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mangs 'byung ba sa thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
33b7(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi bkod pa dang ldan
34a1(phal chen): pa'i ri rab kyi sbyin/ sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad ring po che'i rgyal po/
34a2(phal chen): rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can/ bkod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang
34a3(phal chen): ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
34a4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/
34a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin
34a6(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams
34a7(phal chen): cad kyi rnam ma' rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sdang bar yongs su ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i rim kyi
34b1(phal chen): sbyin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / phyogs bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
34b2(phal chen): kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sas rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing /
34b3(phal chen): mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su
34b4(phal chen): brtan te/ khang pa brtsegs pa spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun po dang ldan pa/ mu tig gi dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snga
34b5(phal chen): ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che gser gyi dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems
34b6(phal chen): dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul
34b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ring po che'i gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs
35a1(phal chen): rgyus kyi ning nas byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya maN+Da/
35a2(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i
35a3(phal chen): snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang / mdog ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis
35a4(phal chen): brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos spos sna tshogs kyis dro zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i
35a5(phal chen): dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che gser gyi mdog shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi
35a6(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyi sprin gyi brgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam
35a7(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs bstan gyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i gos sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings
35b1(phal chen): phyogs bcu kun nas nor du rin po che snam bu khra bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che
35b2(phal chen): rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor
35b3(phal chen): bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal bas phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po
35b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi sngon gyis kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong hUM
35b5(phal chen): 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brtan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i tha
35b6(phal chen): DUR+Sha'i pad+mo'i snying po can dgra mngon par sprul nas// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge mdzes pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thog
35b7(phal chen): po'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byed gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
36a1(phal chen): rgyam mo sangs rgyas kyi yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shis tu zab med kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che'i 'od rjer
36a2(phal chen): gyi drang rab tu 'amed pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pa'i lhun gyis sa rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su shin tu 'phrul pa'i
36a3(phal chen): smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas
36a4(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab
36a5(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam
36a6(phal chen): thams cad bdug spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs
36a7(phal chen): pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin
36b1(phal chen): gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam
36b2(phal chen): thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas
36b3(phal chen): khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad gos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
36b4(phal chen): rab 'byam thams cad pad+mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan
36b5(phal chen): 'das gang ra ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi
36b6(phal chen): dbyings thams cad la mngon par lta ba dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa med pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i me tog gi nga
36b7(phal chen): bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod snga tshogs kyi dra ba'i cod ngan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas
37a1(phal chen): 'khod do// shar dang bla' phyogs thatshams kyi 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin su zla ba med kyi pha rol gyi
37a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan
37a3(phal chen): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu pra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil
37a4(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad
37a5(phal chen): rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyi kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil
37a6(phal chen): 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i
37a7(phal chen): dbyings thams cad pa ng+ge'i seng ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis sum khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyis thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i shing gi yal ga'i dkyil
37b1(phal chen): nga 'od kyang kyil 'khong ba sbyin gyis kun grusgrub par bya ba dang / rnam ma 'a dbyeng sa thams cad de mazhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tog na du'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/
37b2(phal chen): smi gyis kyi khyab par bya ba dang / nar mapa'i dbye sa thams cad mdzam bu'i chu klung gi gsor gyi bdog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed dang
37b3(phal chen): rab mkha'i phyongs thams cad ni ma'i kha dog 'a bru'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyin gyiste kun tu thub par b+ha ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rngu ba dang / sar ma'i chags
37b4(phal chen): kyi kha dog lto bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing / mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
37b5(phal chen): dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te/ rin po che rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun sum
37b6(phal chen): tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che rdo rje'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu
37b7(phal chen): 'bar ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byir gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// lho dang nub kyi phyogs
38a1(phal chen): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i nyi/
38a2(phal chen): mA rab tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud
38a3(phal chen): kyi 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lngar
38a4(phal chen): cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gan nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings
38a5(phal chen): ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha' ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor
38a6(phal chen): bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba spos dang bdug spos sna tshogs
38a7(phal chen): kyis rnam par 'dugs pa'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul pa'i glog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha
38b1(phal chen): dmam par yangs parab tu rtse ba dang / bsku'i bug thams cad nas nor bu rin po chernam par snang ba 'od 'gro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings lngar yangs pa rab sa dge ba dang / brdzun
38b2(phal chen): bug thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gsar rab tu 'bar ba 'ad 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings lar yangs pa rab tu bye ba dang / bo lnga'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po
38b3(phal chen): dngul gyi meng pa 'bar ba 'di 'phro ba'i sngon nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab kya dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che de bzhin gsheg pa'i dgongs pargya
38b4(phal chen): mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig can gyi khams gang na
38b5(phal chen): ba der lkugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der ring ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ ra
38b6(phal chen): bu rin po che chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba'i thig les chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che
38b7(phal chen): spos kyi sgron ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sems
39a1(phal chen): can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas
39a2(phal chen): te 'khod do// nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi
39a3(phal chen): khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par snang
39a4(phal chen): ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang
39a5(phal chen): nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du
39a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang
39a7(phal chen): lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po thams cad dang
39b1(phal chen): dad+ma'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi
39b2(phal chen): sprin kun/ dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
39b3(phal chen): sprul pa'i tshogs kyi gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum
39b4(phal chen): du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba'i gzugs bar na mang po'i sprin kun tu dbye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang // baspu'i mo
39b5(phal chen): mas dang sums cas su gsung gyu 'i na smos bdas sa rgyas thams kyi sus kyi drugs pa rnyan du ba dang mchad ni byad pa yoms ca dang / bsu sgothams ca dang / lus thams sanas dus gsungadug shegs pa'i
39b6(phal chen): 'di gshesas mangs sa kyi nyim kyi ru da t-i ru byug gis kyi gas dus ste bu bu dang / mang da de byas pa thams ca dang / bcu'i sgothams cad dang / lus sus nasas dus gsum dug shegs 'is rgyas
39b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i sgo thams cad de / lus thams
40a1(phal chen): cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
40a2(phal chen): baspu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye bas skad cig skad cig/
40a3(phal chen): tu nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcus
40a4(phal chen): pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri
40a5(phal chen): rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ mu tig 'od thug pa med pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod
40a6(phal chen): pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
40a7(phal chen): mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/
40b1(phal chen): de bzhin gsheg pa ye shes nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsgribs pa thams
40b2(phal chen): cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/
40b3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi ska/ de dang / spa dang / dbyangs dang / nges pa
40b4(phal chen): tshig mngon par bsgrubs pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub
40b5(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
40b6(phal chen): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gad /
40b7(phal chen): pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag
41a1(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub pa'i snying por gshegs pa pang / bdud kyi dkrug ma rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub pa'i snying por
41a2(phal chen): rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul
41a3(phal chen): dang ta ming rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra bsgrag pa dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi spu rab tu
41a4(phal chen): bsgrag pa dang / ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon lam ji ltar btab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang / dus dang / thabs dang / chos kyi tshul
41a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom
41a6(phal chen): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'og gi phyogs su brtan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang gzugs brnyan du rab tu snang ba'i rin po che sna tshogs
41a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can yongs su gzung ba dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin
41b1(phal chen): po che'i snying po byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs panan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi cod par mgo la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/
41b2(phal chen): skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// seng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig
41b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu sdang ba'i dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang
41b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi sngon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
41b5(phal chen): dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo
41b6(phal chen): thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad dang / gos dang spad g.yogs thams cad nas/ byang
41b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang / bdag dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur zug pa'i de bzhin gsheg pa 'das pa thams
42a1(phal chen): cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bur zug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung brtan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa ma byon pa thams cad dang / da ltar byung ba phyogs
42a2(phal chen): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len pa dang / sbyin pa
42a3(phal chen): dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / baspu'i sgo dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / tshig gi lam dang / gos dang /
42a4(phal chen): smad g.yogs thams cad la rab tu sdang bar gyur par rnam par bstan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu
42a5(phal chen): snang bar yongs su bstan pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar
42a6(phal chen): gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang / drag shul dang / rnam par gnon pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar
42a7(phal chen): gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yong
42b1(phal chen): bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams drud kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rdul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yos su
42b2(phal chen): gtong zhing / shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang / ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu sdang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin
42b3(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor brgya
42b4(phal chen): mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang / rnam par mnan pa dang / rnam
42b5(phal chen): par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin
42b6(phal chen): gyis rgyas par bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor po rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed ci
42b7(phal chen): mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das le phyag 'tshal nas steng gi phyogs su
43a1(phal chen): bstan te/ rdo rje'i dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / in+d+ra nI la'i pad+mo'i
43a2(phal chen): snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i kun nas brgyad pa dang / rin po'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
43a3(phal chen): bya'i mtshan dbyings su sgrog pa'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil
43a4(phal chen): mo krung bcas te 'khod do// // bam po brgyad cu bdun pa// / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par/
43a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba/ ye shes yongs su dag pa'i
43a6(phal chen): mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang mdo sde'i tshul gyi gsung rgya mtsho la rnab yongs su gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang
43a7(phal chen): rab tu thob par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ste/ skad cig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas
43b1(phal chen): byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rnam par dgang ba'i yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus mngon par 'byung /
43b2(phal chen): 'o rnam par snang ba/ rdul shing tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rter gyi khams thams cad kyi khams gcig tu sdang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ 'grong thabs
43b3(phal chen): cad yongs su smin par bye ba dang / gdul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba/ de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'jug sba ba spu'i drug thams cad nas rab
43b4(phal chen): sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/
43b5(phal chen): srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes pas byung ba/ las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa/ ye shes mngon
43b6(phal chen): par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mngon par shes pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ye shes
43b7(phal chen): kyi sngar ba rab tu thob pa/ me 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa/ mi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad
44a1(phal chen): sgyus mo dang rlos smras pa jug gi ye shes yong du/ sa sgyus bya sa pa na gas pa med du sa smras pa stod yul dang /
44a2(phal chen): chos thams cad la bsnyengs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa dag pa/ bdud kyi
44a3(phal chen): 'khor thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad la ye shes bsgribs pa med pa
44a4(phal chen): rab tu thob pa/ gnas med pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa med pa/ nam mkha'i lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams
44a5(phal chen): cad mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor
44a6(phal chen): zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu gzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongs su
44a7(phal chen): ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang / yangs pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu rtogs pa shin tu phra bar rgya chen po yang dag par
44b1(phal chen): bzud pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa/ dmigs pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'phrogs pa rab tuthong ba/ de
44b2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ sems kyi skad cig
44b3(phal chen): gis rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang
44b4(phal chen): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur kyang / nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung chen po
44b5(phal chen): dang te nam gru dang / rab 'byor dang / 'gag med dang / mos po dang / ka t+ya'i rwa dang / byams gang gi bu la sogs pas 'dzi ba'i tshal na 'khod bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs par
44b6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul
44b7(phal chen): dang sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par sprul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
45a1(phal chen): su dag pa'ang ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang /
45a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpe' rnam par 'phrul/
45a3(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i
45a4(phal chen): khri dkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems
45a5(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang /
45a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi
45a7(phal chen): lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang / byang chub sem
45b1(phal chen): dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phur sum tshogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas
45b2(phal chen): pa'i bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od rjer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs kyi drub
45b3(phal chen): rgyas par 'grengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa'ang ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi mtshungs pa'i phyir te/
45b4(phal chen): de dag gis ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags so// de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyogs
45b5(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang rgyan yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa ma mdzad do// de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom
45b6(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par brjod pa ma mdzad do// de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par
45b7(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so// de dag gis ni gzhar gyi sems kyi rgud la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma byas so// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs
46a1(phal chen): pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni
46a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so// de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i
46a3(phal chen): ye shes kyi sa la dmigs pa ma byas so// de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa ma byas so// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs
46a4(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma bsgrubs so// de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong
46a5(phal chen): du ma chud do// de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i
46a6(phal chen): rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po las byung ba khong du mchud do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi mig gi lam/
46a7(phal chen): gyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyis grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs
46b1(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa byin gyis rdzobs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khong du ma chud do// de bas mnyan thos chen po mchog gi drung dang /
46b2(phal chen): bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul po de mi mthong ngo // mi zos so// mi shes so// khong du mi chud do// mi rtogs so// mi 'arigag
46b3(phal chen): yid mi ches so// mi sems so// rnam par mi lta'o// rtogs par mi lta'o// nges par mi la'o// nye bar mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul
46b4(phal chen): te/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mi mthong ste/ de dag pa de
46b5(phal chen): dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med do// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong du/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par ma dag go// dmigs pa chung ngul rgya chen por/
46b6(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jug tu ting nge 'dzin de lta bu med do// de dag shes pa dang lta ba 'am/ khong du chud par bya ba 'am/ rtogs par bya ba 'am/ rgyas par dgang bar bya ba 'am/ 'jug
46b7(phal chen): par bya ba 'am/ rnam par blta ba 'am/ rnams su myong bar bya ba 'am/ gnan pa'am/ rnam par gnan pa'am/ gzhan gyis zos par bya ba 'am/ bstan par bya ba'am/ thos par bya
47a1(phal chen): 'am yang dag par bstan par bya bya 'am/ bstabs par bya ba 'am/ sbyin par bya ba 'am/ de la sems can rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba 'am/ sbyar bar bya ba 'am/
47a2(phal chen): rab tu dgrod par bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par bya bar yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa med do// dri lte bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do// de lta bu'i
47a3(phal chen): mchog gi mthu med do// de lta bu'i stobs med de// de lta bu'i dbang med do// de lta bu'i gnas med do// de lta bu'i 'du shes med do// de lta bu'i mig gi mthu med do// de lta bu
47a4(phal chen): ye shes med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas byung ba/ nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongs su grub pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa nyan thos
47a5(phal chen): kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa/ bden pa snang ba shes pas nges par rtogs pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thug pa// snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa/ 'jig rten thams
47a6(phal chen): cad la mi lta mi sdod pa/ rang gi don grub pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te 'khod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sdu dang / g.yas g.yon dang snum na/ bcom ldan
47a7(phal chen): 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas kyang / 'dze ta'i tshal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag
47b1(phal chen): par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma sdud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la
47b2(phal chen): smon lam yang dag par ma btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad murten
47b3(phal chen): pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 'jug cing rtogs par bya ba 'am/ bal zhing khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir
47b4(phal chen): zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ nyan thos kyi mig gis blta ba ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid
47b5(phal chen): na'a'od kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa'ang mthong bar ma gyur te/
47b6(phal chen): de yang 'di lta ste/ dper na gang+gA'i chu klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tshu rol tu yi dwags bkres pa dang skom pas rab tu mnar ba/ gcer pa/ gos med pa lus kyi
47b7(phal chen): mdog dang kha dog tshig cing 'chums pa dang / rlung dang nyi mas bskams pa/ bya rog mang pos gtse ba/ spyang khyi dang was mthong ba tsam pa brgya stong mang po kun nas 'dus kyang ka ga ng+gA'i chu klung
48a1(phal chen): chen po mi mthong ste/ sgrib pa'i las kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir/ la las ni bskams te chu med par mthong ngo // la las ni thul bas yongs su gang
48a2(phal chen): bar mthong ngo // de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas brtan de dag 'dze tA'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyidra dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling tog gis
48a3(phal chen): mig kun nas khebs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ma
48a4(phal chen): shes so// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po'i dbus su mi la la zhig gnyis kyis myos te log par gyur nas/ de gnyis kyis log pa'i rmi lam du
48a5(phal chen): gnas de nyid na lha'i grong rdal brgya byin gyi gnas blta na mdzes pa dang / ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya
48a6(phal chen): sdong gis gang ba/ lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba/ yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang /
48a7(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyan dang / se mo do sna tshogs mang po 'byin pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sel san rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis yongs su bskyod cing / sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong la snyan pa 'byin pa'i
48b1(phal chen): sil sar gyi shing mang po dang / dka' ba'i rjed mo'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur la/ lha'i bu mo mang pos gru zangs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sgra yid du 'ong
48b2(phal chen): zhing snyan pa zos par gyur te/ bdag nyid kyang de na 'dug pa snyam byed li/ lA rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur kyang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po de
48b3(phal chen): ngag gis gnas de nyi de na 'khod bzhin du mi mthong mi shes khong du mi chud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa de nyid kyi rmi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ gnas de nyid
48b4(phal chen): na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis blta ba ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
48b5(phal chen): rlangs rgya chen po dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma nor bar shin tu bsags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
48b6(phal chen): pa'i yon tan thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos
48b7(phal chen): nyi dang / yan la ga rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang ba'i stod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag dag/
49a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su non pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par spyod pa thams cad la
49a2(phal chen): rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa med par rnam par spyod pas/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung
49a3(phal chen): ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud la nyams su myong bar gyur kyang / nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag la
49a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i mig med pas mthong bar ma gyur shes par ma gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po kha ba can sman gyi 'byung gnas kyis gang ba la/ sngags dang / rig
49a5(phal chen): sngags dang / sman gyi tshul dang / blang ba'i rgyus shes shing / rig sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa/ sman gyi cho ga thams cad shes pa/ sman blang ba'i las byed kyang / ri bo'i/
49a6(phal chen): dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang / ba glang dang / ra lug 'tshe ba dang / rngon pa dang / de ma yin pa'i mi sman gyi tshul mi shes pa gzhan dag gis sman de dag gi cho ga dang
49a7(phal chen): sman gyi ro dang / mthu dang / yon tan dang / byin dang / thabs dang / 'phrod pa mi shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la
49b1(phal chen): / na bsems pa su par phrul ma sa dgas/ de bzhin ga sags pa nga 'dzin ma rnam par 'phrul ba'i sa nga byung /
49b2(phal chen): rjes chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung lo sogs pa rang gi dgos pas tshim par gyur pa/ gzhan gyi dgos pa yal bar gzhog pa/ btang snyoms can de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de'i
49b3(phal chen): na gnas kyang / tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pas bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa las/ par de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chud do// 'di lta ste/
49b4(phal chen): dper na sa chen po rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa/ gter brgya stong du mas gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i 'byung
49b5(phal chen): gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shing byang ba'i mi/ rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lag gi blo shin tu byang ba/ gter gyi gtsug lag dang / rgyus dang / ngan rtags gya nom par lebs
49b6(phal chen): pa bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis brtan pa dag/ de las rin po che ci 'dod par blangs shing bdag kyang yongs su tshim par byed/ pha dang me la'ang legs par rim gro byed
49b7(phal chen): bu pho smos kyang legs par gso bar byed cing / de ma yin pa'i sems can rga ba dang / na dang / dbul ba dang / nyam nyes pa dang / kha zas dang / gos kyis mi 'byor pa rnams la btud
50a1(phal chen): cing khyab par bgo bsha' byed pa/ nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar byed kyang / sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus mi shes pa/
50a2(phal chen): bsod nams ma byas pa/ rin po che la shes pa'i mig yongs su ma dag pa/ de dag de nyid na 'khod kyang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas de dag dang / rin po che'i gter de dag khong du mi chud mi shes
50a3(phal chen): pas/ rin po che'ang blang du med do// rin po che'i don kyang byar med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ye shes kyi mig shin tu
50a4(phal chen): rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa de dag 'dze ta'i tshal na 'khod cing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la/ chos kyi
50a5(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug cing / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yongs su sgrub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang rim gro la brtson zhing / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la mngon par brtson te/
50a6(phal chen): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongs su sdud kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas
50a7(phal chen): 'dus pa de lta bu'ang ma mthong ma shes so// 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig mig gnyis po gos kyis bkab ste rin po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na/ des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba
50b1(phal chen): dang / ches dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba byas kyang nam che'i 'byungs nas demi mthong ba/ don pa tsha'i dang / chos kyi ngon po me dang / thos kyi pa'i dang / rin po che thams cad kyang ba/
50b2(phal chen): mthong la/ rin pa dag gi spyod yul lam/ rin thang pa/ yongs su spyad pa'i rgyus kyang mi shes pas/ de ni rin po che de dag len kyang mi len la/ rlon pa pa'i don kya mas su myo
50b3(phal chen): bar mi byed do// gang gi mig la bsgribs pa med pa de dag gis ni de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gis/
50b4(phal chen): blan med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyun du gyur pa mngon du gyur to// 'dze ta'i tshal na bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis me
50b5(phal chen): khyab pa yongs su son pa mthong yang / nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par
50b6(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i tshe 'phrul dag ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po'ang mthong bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshes
50b7(phal chen): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rig pa'i gos kyis ye shes
51a1(phal chen): kyi mig bkab pa de dag la/ byang chub sems drapa'i ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta bu med do// de dag gis chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu/
51a2(phal chen): brgyud pa la 'jug pa de bu khong du ma chud de// 'di lta ste/ dper na mig yongs su dag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rab rib dang / mun pa thams cad
51a3(phal chen): dngo mi 'grogs pa yod de/ de mi la la zhig gis thob par gyur nu/ de rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nas
51a4(phal chen): shin tu gnag par gyur pa'i nang na/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / mun pa'i rab rib kyis
51a5(phal chen): mig yongs su 'khrigs par gyur pa'i mi'i khrod na 'dug cing rnam par rgya la phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod kyang / mi de dag gis skyes bu
51a6(phal chen): spyod lam sna tshogs kyis spyod pa de mi mthong mi shes so// skyes bu des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po spyod lam dang cho ga sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs tha dad du mngon par
51a7(phal chen): bltas pa/ dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa/ kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa/ dmigs pa'i tshul tha dad pa thams cad kyang mi mthong ba med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub
51b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ rnam par dag cing chags pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi
51b2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul
51b3(phal chen): pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag mthong bar ma gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu'ang mthong bar ma gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong la la zhig
51b4(phal chen): skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sam/ chus khyab pa 'am/ mes khyab pa 'am/ rlung gis khyab pa 'am/ sngon pos khyab pa
51b5(phal chen): 'am/ ser pos khyab pa 'am/ dmar pos khyab pa 'am/ dkar pos khyab pa 'am/ lhas khyab pa 'am/ sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa 'am/ sgra dang dbyangs
51b6(phal chen): kun gyis khyab pa 'am/ dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gis chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo // me'i
51b7(phal chen): sdang ba de'ang mi mthong ngo // sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang / dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i bar du'ang mi mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs
52a1(phal chen): shing rnam par spyod pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mA
52a2(phal chen): ba pa de dag yongs su bstan pa mdzad no// nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthong zhing shes por ma gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni de bzhin
52a3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo // khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ dper na slu ba grub pa'i mi ni mig gnyis bskus ma thag tu/ skye bo mang po thams cad kyis lus mi mthong ngo //
52a4(phal chen): des ni 'gro 'am/ 'dug gam/ 'greng yang rung ste/ skye bo mang po thams cad mthong ngo // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las yod
52a5(phal chen): su 'das pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul du zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gis shes par bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang / nyan thos
52a6(phal chen): chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na mi'i tsher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba ni des mi de mthong yang / mis lha de
52a7(phal chen): mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa chen po'i dbus
52b1(phal chen): sus sa rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul na po nga
52b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang ma mthong ma shes so// 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong sems can thams cad la dbang gi pha rol tu
52b3(phal chen): phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ shes pa med la tshor ba med pas dbang po drug gis kyang bya ba gang yang nyams su mi myong ste/
52b4(phal chen): ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin la/ 'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad gnas de na yod kyang / snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang mthu des ni shes mi mthong ngo //
52b5(phal chen): de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag 'dzi'i tshal den 'ang rnam par spyod la/ de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
52b6(phal chen): khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur/ khong du chud par ma gyur/ shes par ma gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag dang / byang chub
52b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang 'ong du ma chud ma mthong ma shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rab cing yangs la tshad med de/ blta bar dka' zhing rtogs
53a1(phal chen): pa da kA ste/ khong du chud pa ka'ajig rten thams cad las yos su 'das pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi yum ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ nyan thos/
53a2(phal chen): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'dus pa'o// de bas mnyan thos chen po de dag 'dze du'i tshal de nyid na 'khod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi rabs kyi drung na spyod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
53a3(phal chen): 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang ma mthong ngo // 'dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa'i yon tan dang /
53a4(phal chen): bkod pa yongs su 'dus pa de'ang ma mthong ma shes te/ de ni snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer
53a5(phal chen): rab tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ltos shig sems can dam pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab// rgyal bas
53a6(phal chen): sa sa rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// 'dze ta'i rgyal mtshal 'dir bstan to// rang byung rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs// bgrang du med par 'byung ba la// sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i//
53a7(phal chen): 'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so// chos kyi rgyal po'i tshe 'phrul dag/ tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab cing // shin tu zab pa 'byung ba ni// de la 'jig rten 'bab mi nus//
53b1(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ 'dog mdog// mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par grubs// yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi// chos rab de dag mtshan nyid med// rnam 'phrul mtha'
53b2(phal chen): drang dbus med pa// tshig gi lam gyis brjod dka' ba'i// rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa dag/ rgyal bas 'dze ta'i tshal du bstan// rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba'i rnams/
53b3(phal chen): zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba nas// rgyal bu'i zhal ltar mos dga' ste// kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos// smon lam yongs su phun sum tshogs// spyod lam
53b4(phal chen): spyod pa chags med pa// de dag bsam pa shes par ni// 'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so// de dag sems dang spyod yul dang // spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang // rang rgyal thams
53b5(phal chen): cad yongs kyis kyang // rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus// rgyal sras shes rab chen po'i rnams// gzhan gyis thub dka' pham med la// dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing //
53b6(phal chen): ye shes sa la gnol gyur pa// ting 'dzin dpag tu tshad med la// grags chen mnyam par bzhag pa rnams// chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang
53b7(phal chen): ston/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'athub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/
54a1(phal chen): de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bsod nams snying po shes rab che// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing // 'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'i/
54a2(phal chen): bde gshegs sku las skyes pa ltos// yid gzhungs blo gros mtha' yas shing // shin tu mnyam gnag sems ldan pa// mtha' dang dbus med zab pa yi// ye shes rgya chen spyod
54a3(phal chen): yul can// rgyan rab mang pos mdzes byas pa'i// 'dze ta'i nagras tshal rgya che ba// byang chub sems dpa' kun rgyas shing // bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur par// gnas
54a4(phal chen): med mi gnas gyur pa'i rnams// phyogs rnams bcu na kun 'dus te// pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa dag/ rgya mtsho ming la lta ba gyis// gnas med len pa med pa'i rnams// spros
54a5(phal chen): pa med cing mi rten la// rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa// chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang // ye shes rgyal mtshan rab dpa' ba// rdo rje'i sems ni mi g.yo zhing // grub pa
54a6(phal chen): med pa'i chos rnams la// mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa// phyogs bcu'i zhing mang bye ba'i rnams// grangs kyis mi chod kun nas 'dus// yang dag sangs rgyas drung du lhags/
54a7(phal chen): gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs// rang byung shAkya seng ge yi// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong // de yi byin rlabs dam pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags/
54b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos la 'byed pa med// chos dbyings ga'i la'ang de bzhin te// spyod pa tsam du yongs 'byed pa'i// pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras// chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med pa'i/
54b2(phal chen): mtha' la thug pa de dag gnas// tshig rnams yongs su zad med pas// chos la dbye ba'ang rab tu khyed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal
54b3(phal chen): pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bsdus te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ltos shig sems can dam pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor
54b4(phal chen): shin tu yangs// dus drang dus min mkhyen mdzad cing // sems can rnams la chos kyang ston// mu stegs ldan pa'i tshogs 'dus pa'i// rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'jom/
54b5(phal chen): sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du// rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston// phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams// sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes mi bzhud// tshad med pa
54b6(phal chen): dang tshad yod las// thub pa chen po 'das pa min// nyi ma mkha' las 'gro ba ni// nyin par bgrangs pa spros pa byed// de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston pa//
54b7(phal chen): gsum chags pa med pas brjod// tha ba zla ba'i mtshan mo la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags par snang // de bzhin chos dkar yongs rdzogs pa'i// mgon po rnams kyang
55a1(phal chen): mthong ba yin// bar snang nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ni// gar yang thogs pa med par 'gro// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul/
55a2(phal chen): de bzhin no// ji ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams kyi// zhing rnams kun la mi gnas pa// de bzhin 'jig rten spyan mu yi// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya// ji ltar sa ni/
55a3(phal chen): 'jig rten na// lus can kun gyi gnas yin pas// 'jig rten sgron ma'i 'jig rten na// chos kyi 'khor lo de ltar gnas// ji ltar rlung ni chags med par// mkha'
55a4(phal chen): la mgyogs par rab rgyu ba// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang // 'jig rten khams su rab tu rgyu// ji ltar chu yi phung po la// zhing rnams bgrangs pa kun gnas pa// de
55a5(phal chen): bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang // ye shes tshogs la rab tu gnas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas
55a6(phal chen): kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji ltar rdo rje'i ri rab brag/ zang yag shin tu mtho yod pa// de ltar 'jig rten
55a7(phal chen): kun skyob pa'i// sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pas mtho// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu chen dag/ tshad med rnyog pa med pa ltar// sangs rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten
55b1(phal chen): kun gyi skom pa gcod// rgya mtsho'i chu las 'phags pA yi// ri bo'i ri rab ci 'dra bar// de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yang // chos kyi mtsho las mngon par 'phags/
55b2(phal chen): rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis// rgya mtsho rgyas pa ji bzhin du// rang byung ye shes de bzhin te// mi rang skad cig rab tu mkhyen// mgon po'i ye shes shin tu zab// tshad med de/
55b3(phal chen): bzhin bgrang du med// de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med ston// sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ston pa yi// sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ci 'dra ba// de ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen
55b4(phal chen): dbang yang // rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu sngon// yid bzhin nor bu rnam dag pa// bsam don rdzogs byed ji lta ba// de bzhin bsam pa dag pa la// rgyal ba smon lam rdzogs pa mdzad//
55b5(phal chen): 'od sdang gsal ba byed pa yi// rin chen rnam snang ji lta ba// de ltar thams cad mkhyen dag pa// 'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad// ji ltar phyogs la mngon lnga ba'i// rin
55b6(phal chen): chen zur brgyad rab gnas pa// de bzhin chags med sgron ma yang // chos dbyings rab tu snang ba mdzad// chu 'dang rin chen 'od gsal ba// ji ltar dri med chu 'dang byed// de bzhi
55b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas mthong bas kyang // 'gro ba'i dbang po dag par 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su smon lam rab tu 'phrul pa'i zla nga'i rgyal pos//
56a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// phyogs 'di in+d+ra nI la yis/
56a2(phal chen): dog mdag gcig byas pa ltar// sangs rgyas mthong bas skye dgu rnams// de bzhin byang chub mdog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la// rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs
56a3(phal chen): rnams// tshad kyis gzhal du med pa ston// byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag mdzad// de ni rmad byung shin tu zab// mtha' yas bsgrub pa dka' ba ste// blo ldan ye shes yul
56a4(phal chen): med la// 'jig rten rnams ni 'bab mi nus// byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub don du// bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // sangs rgyas tshul gyis rnam sbyangs pa'i// chos kyi
56a5(phal chen): dbyings la 'jug pa ston// sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam yas pa// bre ldan bskor ba'i sangs rgyas kyis// kun nas gang bar gyur pa yang // rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzad// chos
56a6(phal chen): kun mnga' sgyur ston pa ste// shAkya'i khyu mchog skyes par gyur// de yi cho 'phrul tshad med pa// 'di dag rab tu byung ba yin// brtan pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad med rnam
56a7(phal chen): par gzigs gyur nas// rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa// tshad medag can stod nga mdzad// 'jig rten mngon po rgyal sras rnams// chos kyi dbyings la slob pa mdzad// chos rnams thams cad yongs la yang /
56b1(phal chen): chags me ye shes spyong yul 'gyur// skyes bu'i dbang po'i byin rlabs kyis// cho 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhing // 'jig rten thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rang /
56b2(phal chen): tu bskor// sems can tso bo'i yul lo yang // ye shes dkyil 'khor yongs spangs shing // shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams// 'jig rten thams cad 'grel par 'gyur/
56b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi don gyi blo gros gzi brjid rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
56b4(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so// drang srong dam pa'i mchog rnams kyi// dus gsum nyan thos gang byung ba// de dag kun gyis bde gshegs kyi// gshegs thabs 'jog 'degs mi shes
56b5(phal chen): so// dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi// ma nor rang rgyal gang byung ba// de dag gis kyang mgon po yi// gshegs thabs 'jog 'degs mi rig go// ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa
56b6(phal chen): rnams// khyi ltar ljong la brgyus pa yi// sems can de 'dra kun gyis ni// mgon po mi shes smos mi dgos// rgyal ba tshad mas gzhal ba min// de ni shes par mi nus te//
56b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas chags med ye shes can// tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das// zla ba ra rgyas 'od mnga' ba// brtan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bris// de ni bskal pa dpag yas par/
57a1(phal chen): rnam 'phrul thogs med spyod pa mdzad// tshul sgo re re sangs rgyas la// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsams byas kyang // bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa// brjod
57a2(phal chen): du med pa zad 'gyur gyi// rang byung rnams kyi yon tan las// phyogs gcig cha yi mthar mi phyin// sangs rgyas de yi zhal bltas kyang // sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig
57a3(phal chen): de la smon byed cing // gang zhig yid kyis dga' mos pa// de dag kun kyang de 'dra ba'i// spyod yul blta dka' 'thob par 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes mtha' yas shing // tshogs chen
57a4(phal chen): yangs pas rnam gnon la// dri med blo ldan sems gnas pa// de dag 'di yi tshul la 'jug/ de dag smon lam rgya che bas// sems dang sdom pa rgya che ste// rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob
57a5(phal chen): gyur cing // byang chub rgya chen gnon par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos/ sangs
57a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chags med ye shes sku mnga' bas// bsam yas ye shes yul
57a7(phal chen): mngar bas// de dag bsam par mi nus so// 'phrin las dkar po bsam yas pas// sangs rgyas su rab bsgrubs pa'i phyir// de la 'jig rten gsum mi 'gro/ mtshan
57b1(phal chen): dang dpe byang bzang pos mdzes// chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam sbyangs pas// 'jig rten kun tu snang ba mdzad// sangs rgyas byang chub sgo yin te// ye shes kun gyi gnas/
57b2(phal chen): chen ro// chags pa thams cad rnam sbyangs pas// rdul med sngos pa mi mngara'o// ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas// 'jig rten kun tu nyi ma 'dra// khams gsum thams cad
57b3(phal chen): rnam sbyong bas// srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par gcod// byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa mdzad// byang chub 'byung gnas de bzhin no// kha dog mtha' yas ston mdzad kyang //
57b4(phal chen): kha dog kun la gnas pa med// sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'i// kha dge tshad med yongs su ston// skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyis// byang chub bsam
57b5(phal chen): yas sbyangs pas na// de yi ye shes mthar phyin par// brtags par sus kyang mi nus so// ye shes brtan pa zad mi shes// rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med// de la
57b6(phal chen): dus gsum rgyal ba kun// skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod// rtag par las gzhan yongs btang ste// shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas// sems la sems shes bya bar yang //
57b7(phal chen): de la sems skye med par bsam// gang gis sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi// sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab// de dag brjod pa'i yul ma yin// shin tu zab pas tshig
58a1(phal chen): lab thAng/ dedas byung chub semam dpa rnas pa sgyu mdza kyi yon las dal kyi ts+tshaswA/
58a2(phal chen): byam rdzogs bgyur rnam par smras te// de'i tshi tshogs su ca dpa 'didag smras so// drun pa rmongs myed dag pa'i rnams// chos 'dzin shes ngas rtogs shong// rnam
58a3(phal chen): bsam gyis ma kyang ste// byang chub rgya mtsho mi zad gA/ de dag yi ni 'di la ngas// de dag spyod pa'i stong yum yin// de dag shes pa 'dir mi g.yo// de dgu 'di pab rlom
58a4(phal chen): 'chad// de dag gro bar mi 'gyur te// de dag yid kyang zlum mi 'gyur// pa sa rgyas chos la dab ma par// de dag sems kya ba tu 'byung // de sa dang pang
58a5(phal chen): tshugs shing // yang dag 'phags pa rab tu skye// dmigs med gnas pa med pa yi// ye she 'di la de dag dga'// bskal pa bye bar bsngags pa yi// yos su
58a6(phal chen): rdzogs pa dge ba'i chos// ye shes 'di 'dod mtshungs med pa// de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo// 'khor ba'i nang na rnam rgyu yang // 'khor ba dag la gnas pa min//
58a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas// sangs rgyas yul la rab tu rtse// sems can khams na ji snyed du// 'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyu ba// de dag thams cad brtan
58b1(phal chen): pas spangs// sangs rgyas phun sum tshogs la gnas// sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung gyur kyang // 'jig rten don med rab tu gnas// chags med spyod pa de dag ni// rtag tu sems
58b2(phal chen): can dor la gnas// de dag spyod pa mtshungs med de// lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten bde ba kun sems pas// de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog/ 'jig rten
58b3(phal chen): kun la sring brtse zhing // byang chub ye shes rnam dag pas// de dag 'jig rten snang bar gyur// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'grel/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
58b4(phal chen): thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bskul pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang /
58b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas sma ni rab dkon na// the tsom thams cad gcod pa yi// dam pa mthong ba ci zhig smos// chos kun thugs su chud rtog pa// 'jig rten gsum po'i bsod nams stegs// sems
58b6(phal chen): can thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i// 'jig rten sgron ma mthong gis dga'// sems can gtso bo ma smad pa'i// gzugs kyi sku ni mthong gyur na// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu// ngoms/
58b7(phal chen): shing tshim pa skyer mi btub// mi yi dbang po'i sku gzugs la// rgyal ba'i sras rnams lta lta zhing // rang gi dge ba chags med pa// gzhan dor brtson pa byang chub bsngo/
59a1(phal chen): rngu pa chen po'i gzugs na su// de las pa da nga ga shes/ chags med ye shes 'byung 'gyur byas/ n+na b+hu rgyub /
59a2(phal chen): rtswa bas pa yas tshad med pa// snang ba mdzad de theg chen la// btsud nas thub pa chen po'i ma/ byang chu dam para'i lung yang ston// bsod nams den pa'i rang ba rji da
59a3(phal chen): ye shes dkyil 'khor shar ci byung // 'jig rten tshad med kun tu snang // bsod nams phung po rnam 'phel mdzad// sdug bsngal drab rab tu gcod// ye shes phung po rnam par
59a4(phal chen): sbyong / gang gis rgyal ba bsnyen bkur ba// de dag ngan song 'jig pa med// rkang gnyis dam pa mthong gyur na// shin tu yangs pa'i sems skye ste// 'od snang gsal ba'i
59a5(phal chen): shes rab mthu// grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas skyes bu'i mchog mthong zhing // byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bya zhes//
59a6(phal chen): de dag kun kyang nges par sems/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs
59a7(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa// shAkya'i khyu mchog thub mthong nas// yongs su sngo ba byed pa'i sems// theg pa che la rnam par dag
59b1(phal chen): mas / rgya sa ma / sbyi gas pacu / na
59b2(phal chen): yang/ sems can don la 'atson mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams la lus can rnams// kun gyis lan than cis kyang nus// ngan song gsum po myi brgyad par// bskal pa
59b3(phal chen): bar bcos dra yi// chags pa thams cad rdzob mdzad pa'i// ljon pa mi mthong ma yin no// sems can kun gyi rgyud rnams na// sdug bsngal phung po ci yod pa// ma lus nyams
59b4(phal chen): su bzod nus kyi// sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no// 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na// za dang ngan song rgyud yod pa// de dag yun ring gnas bla yi// sangs rgyas mi thos pa
59b5(phal chen): yin no// sems can dmyal ba re re yang // bskal pa tshad med gnas bu yi// mtha' las rgyal bas rnyes sa yi// byang chubar chog las ring gnas yin// ce dpyi ningan song du// yun ring gnas pas 'dod cen//
59b6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong ba ni// ye shes 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur phyir// rgyal ba 'jig rten mchog mthong na// sdug bsngal thams cad 'chad par 'gyur// rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul
59b7(phal chen): gyi/ ye shes khong du chud pa 'byung // sangs rgyas mi yi mchog mthong zhing // sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur// byang chub gang gis 'thob pa yi// bsod nams tshad
60a1(phal chen): med 'phel bar 'gyur// sas rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams// the tsom yid gnyis chad par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi// bsam pa'ang
60a2(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de bzhin
60a3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbye ba dang / rgya cher brjod pa dang / gsal bar bya ba dang / rab tu brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang /
60a4(phal chen): shin tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu gsal bar bya ba dang / man ngag bstan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi
60a5(phal chen): dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / las kyi rgyud thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi bsam pa
60a6(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gro ba thams cad
60a7(phal chen): kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par rab tu ston te/
60b1(phal chen): bcug rer/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ming gi rdul shin sa phra ba rnams la/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa dang / 'di
60b2(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang / 'di ltas
60b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su skye ba dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongs su brjod cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta
60b4(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun snying po byang chub mngon du gyur pa'i gnas bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste
60b5(phal chen): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems skad cig la rab tu dgye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste
60b6(phal chen): phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sa sa rgyas kyi zhing rgya mchog ni mnyam par byin gyis brlab cing / lus gcig gis rgyas par dkang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta de/ dmigs pa'i gni thams
60b7(phal chen): cad la sangs rgyas kyis rnam par sprul pa dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ni/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul
61a1(phal chen): shin tum pa rnamasas dus gsam kyi ga nas ny+dzu rgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa myal pa dang / bskas pa tshams su shu
