61a2(phal chen): dang 'di sa ste/ dus gsub kyi sa sa rgyas kyi semasas rgya mtshathams cad bcu na rjems das ras 'arjed pa phyi ma'i mabar bye gyis sgrubs byas/ nga chub sems
61a3(phal chen): yang dag par 'byung ba bsnyen pa dang / 'di sa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub bu'i
61a4(phal chen): rgyan pa mi dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor ba phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin
61a5(phal chen): 'di la bstan pa bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa shin tu bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de// rje rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
61a6(phal chen): shes kyi spyod yul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid kyi don
61a7(phal chen): phyogs bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta zhing / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas
61b1(phal chen): sas rgyas kyi yul bsas kyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams bsam
61b2(phal chen): gyis mi khyab par gzhol ba la rnam par bltas nas/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid la rnam par bltas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas many+dzum pa nyid bsam gyis
61b3(phal chen): mi khyab pa la rnam par bltas nas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ngag gi lam dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / chos kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
61b4(phal chen): 'di dag smras so// ba spu gcig la rgya mtsho rgyal ba'i zhing // zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang panyam// de na sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor// kun gyis yongs
61b5(phal chen): bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs// spu gcig rtsel zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rnams// snying po byang chub pad+mo'i gdan gnas pas// chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bkang
61b6(phal chen): zhing / shing drung dam pa kun na mgon po snang // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran rab mang skad// rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs bzhugs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
61b7(phal chen): gyis yongs su bskor// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa mdzod// zhing mchog gcig na rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang mi zad pa// de
62a1(phal chen): dag phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad nas// rab 'byal zhing kun bka' snying kun kyang 'ong // shing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa yi// byang chub/
62a2(phal chen): sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho 'od// phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas par kun bkang zhing // ston pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldang // zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan rab
62a3(phal chen): tu ston// chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtsho// de dag kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong // rab 'byam zhing rnams kun na
62a4(phal chen): 'khod spyod cing // byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te// chos kyi sprin mnyan dpa' bo de dag ni// zhing gcig tu'ang bskul pa bye bar spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i
62a5(phal chen): spyad pa spyod pa byed// chos kyi gang chen mtsho spyod rnam par sdang // smon lam rgya mtsho kun la rab tu 'jug/ de dag sangs rgyas sa yi spyod yul gnas// rgyal ba'i chos rnams
62a6(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan byung ba'i// de dag kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes// sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang // rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen yangs la 'jug/ bde/
62a7(phal chen): gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyal bka shing // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran ji snyed pa'i// sku yi sprin rnams rtag tu 'gyed mdzad cing // chos kyi char gyis byang chub
62b1(phal chen): rabal 'god/ bas po brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dgas sa rgyas kyi ti
62b2(phal chen): seng ge rnam par bstings pa 'di nyid la de bas kyang brtan ci dgod par mdzad pa'i don du sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i nang nas/ chos kyi dbyings so kun nas rnam par dmigs pas dus gsum snang ba
62b3(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po// 'od zer gyi 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed dang ldan pa bkye ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas/
62b4(phal chen): kyi zhing 'bram klas pa thams cad sdang bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dze ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gis/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
62b5(phal chen): zhing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ sangs
62b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi ming du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa dang / gzhi sna tshogs dang dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying
62b7(phal chen): po byang chub tu byin te seng ge'i khri la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
63a1(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/ la la na ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ chos kyi dbyings
63a2(phal chen): rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mthong ngo // lA la na ni lha'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'jug/ la la na ni banod
63a3(phal chen): sbyin gyis gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug/ la la nA ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi 'am ci'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni lto 'phye chen
63a4(phal chen): bo'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / zong rdul dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho
63a5(phal chen): brang 'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs dang / lus sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par
63a6(phal chen): shes pa sna tshogs dang / rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su byung ba dang / kha dog rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye ba
63a7(phal chen): tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / gtam gyi skyes bu'i gni sna tshogs dang / bstan pa'i gni sna tshogs dang / tshig dang / yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs
63b1(phal chen): byas pa'i kyang kyi la bar rnamags rna chos son pa 'ong ba gyur to// byang chub sems dnga' ji snyed kyis 'jig rten nas chos kyi gyis kyis gas pa/ rnams
63b2(phal chen): gtugs pa/ phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yam pas 'dus pa/ phyogs rgya mtshe thams cad du gtogs pa/ chos sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa/ phyogs
63b3(phal chen): kyi ming du bya ba snga tshogs su gtogs pa/ phyogs sna chags kun tu gsol ba/ phyogs pa rnam pa pa dad par gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshobs kyi rjes su song ba/ phyogs rgya
63b4(phal chen): tshogs su gtigs pa/ 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs dang / lce phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byung dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar dang lho'i phyogs mtsham
63b5(phal chen): drang lce dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi zhing gi lhun gyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang /
63b6(phal chen): sems can gyi ming du bya ba'i phyogs dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur zug pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs bcu da ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang / nam mkha'i khongs thams cad du skra'i rtse mo shin
63b7(phal chen): tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs dang
64a1(phal chen): las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang / skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam mkha'i dbyings kyi ming du bya bar gtogs pa'i
64a2(phal chen): phyogs kyi khong du chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas/ kun tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam
64a3(phal chen): pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu
64a4(phal chen): snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus la mngon par lta ba dmigs par bya bas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro
64a5(phal chen): ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha mi dad pa zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms pas/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa/ rnam par
64a6(phal chen): dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa
64a7(phal chen): de dag thams cad ni/ sngon bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba'i spyod pa skal ba mnyam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang / mnyan pa dang
64b1(phal chen): rnamasadad pa dang / bsnyen bgyur bas yongs su smin par byas pa dag go// sngon pa med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du rung ba dag go
64b2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdus pa dag ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba sal ba mnyam pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin
64b3(phal chen): par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis shin dutu brdung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas
64b4(phal chen): gtugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur pa yin te/ la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go// la la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go// la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'
64b5(phal chen): yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug go// la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jug go// la la ni spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i rgyan la 'jug go// la la ni byang chub sems
64b6(phal chen): dpa'i sa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i rnam par
64b7(phal chen): 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa la 'jug go// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go/
65a1(phal chen): dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jug ste/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / lam
65a2(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / 'bab pa sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang / rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang / phyogs sna tshogs dang / snod sna tshogs
65a3(phal chen): dang yul sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten sna tshogs dang / khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang / tshogs sna tshogs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna
65a4(phal chen): tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug go/ ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings
65a5(phal chen): kun nas brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs pa med par yul snang bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha mi dad pa'i//
65a6(phal chen): ye shes snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang / byang
65a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par
65b1(phal chen): gdod ci dam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi ngag snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa tid nge 'dzir chos kyi dbyangs bas
65b2(phal chen): cang du thobs pa med par sgra ldog pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis can pa'i 'od kyis/ byang chub sems dpa
65b3(phal chen): de dag som ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mcho ga las tu 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i babs chags pa med pa'i rgyas
65b4(phal chen): mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lwa ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyung thams cad du za mi dad pa'i lus snang
65b5(phal chen): ba'i rgyal mtshar dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgud
65b6(phal chen): kyi rjes su 'jug pa snying rje'i snying po can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byir gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu zhi la rab tu
65b7(phal chen): zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmigs su med pas kun tu 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
66a1(phal chen): 'dzin zhing thams cad yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rtsa ba'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
66a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po'i kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil
66a3(phal chen): 'khor chags pa med pas rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
66a4(phal chen): 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrubs pas phyi ma'i mthar
66a5(phal chen): byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin
66a6(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho ltar byung ba thams cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i
66a7(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad dang rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
66b1(phal chen): dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi 'ams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snying gcig tu byed kyis bajob pa dang / zas
66b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'i nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sur 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzini dbang po rje mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang /
66b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad su gcig pa ma pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi chal/ chos kyi dbyings
66b4(phal chen): kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khom par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhing 'byam klas pa bsgrub pa yongs su ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang
66b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skye'u tshugs gzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha mi dad par byin
66b6(phal chen): gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi grong thams cad la mngon sum du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan
66b7(phal chen): nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems kyi skad cig la tha mi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi
67a1(phal chen): skad cig thams can chos kyi dbyis kyi tshul gyi rang bzhi dang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su
67a2(phal chen): 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang
67a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i
67a4(phal chen): mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kha dog thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro ba shin tu mdzes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
67a5(phal chen): 'dzin glong mi g.yo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig
67a6(phal chen): gi lam la nges pa'i ngag gis tshig rab tu 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag
67a7(phal chen): la rab tu 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum
67b1(phal chen): gyi sul babar dag pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bstsal pa thams cad 'ong du chud pas bu mi dad pa'i ye shes dang / byang chu sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu/
67b2(phal chen): thalas spongs brgya yong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems
67b3(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun tu shugs kyis mngon du 'char ba'i sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa'o ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang rtse ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par bsgrub pa dang /
67b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du ram mkha'i rgyan mngon por bsgrub
67b5(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzir skad cig mad cig la 'gro ba snyed kyi sprul pa'i gzugs par na gyi sprin mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'o ting nge 'dzin de bzhin nis
67b6(phal chen): pa'i zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' lngar rdul dang 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkhar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
67b7(phal chen): chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzir chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sngon ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i
68a1(phal chen): #/ dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs
68a2(phal chen): rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
68a3(phal chen): bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo
68a4(phal chen): rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongs su bstan pas kun tu rnam par dmigs pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub
68a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
68a6(phal chen): 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu spogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i mtshams 'dzin pa dang / byang chub
68a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad+mo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la rnam
68b1(phal chen): par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs gcig tu phyogs bcu rgya mtsho yongs su sdud pa'i grong dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyingos kyi gni thams/
68b2(phal chen): cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas
68b3(phal chen): rab tuzhi pa'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon par shes pa dang / sngon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang
68b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs drang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyun
68b5(phal chen): gcig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba
68b6(phal chen): thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi
68b7(phal chen): lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig pas chos thams cad tshul gcig par rnam par 'god pa'i 'od dang / byang chub
69a1(phal chen): #sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi brjid byid gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can gyi khams mi
69a2(phal chen): 'phrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam dang spyod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi bzhi thams cad tha mi dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad+mo'i byi
69a3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
69a4(phal chen): 'dzin lus sems can thams cad la mngon du byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su 'byed pa'i
69a5(phal chen): tshul mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i ga'i tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod tha mi
69a6(phal chen): dad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
69a7(phal chen): kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas seng ge rnam par bskyed pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
69b1(phal chen): rba ba med kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de de ni gshegs pa rnam par dang mdzad kyisangasargyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnamatsho de dag la rab tu 'dun go// sems kyi skang cishi rIl chos b+ha d+d+haH/
69b2(phal chen): thams cad du rgyas par 'dengs par 'jug pa ston sam pa mnyam par spyad pa'ang rjes su dran no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di ta'i tshal du phyin cing / bcom
69b3(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi spyan ldan 'khod pa/ seng ge'i blon po che sna tshogs kyi brjen stong po can/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu zlab snyed dang mArnam par yangs pa la 'khod pa/
69b4(phal chen): shes dang mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pa'i sa rjes su thob pa/ ye shes kyi kun tu rnam par spyod pa/ shes rab kyi 'byung
69b5(phal chen): gnas kyi rigs su byung ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes pa mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/ sangs rgyas
69b6(phal chen): thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa/ chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar
69b7(phal chen): dmigs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/ gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba/
70a1(phal chen): chos kyi gnas thams cad la rten pa med par chos thams cad thang du med pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa/
70a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/
70a3(phal chen): srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ ting nge 'dzin gang chen mtsho dang
70a4(phal chen): ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa/ chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu rab tu rtogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa
70a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ sgra skad dang dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa/ chos thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes sprul
70a6(phal chen): pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bsags pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu
70a7(phal chen): zhi ba dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis dogs pa med par kun nas rab tu gnon pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i
70b1(phal chen): mig dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab rgya cho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba/
70b2(phal chen): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs
70b3(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga lnga mkhas pa/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa/ spobs pa'i stongs dang
70b4(phal chen): chos kyi sprin zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/ gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa/ chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i
70b5(phal chen): mig gis lbu ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa'i shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par stod pa'i 'od zer can
70b6(phal chen): ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa/ dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ chos thams cad la dbang po dang ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa/ dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan
70b7(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu stsol ba la dpa' ba/ ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid can/ 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus
71a1(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa med pa/ zad pa dang mi zad pa'i mu ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rnas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' kun
71a2(phal chen): gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi mig mngon sum can/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa/
71a3(phal chen): mi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam par lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyu gnas med pa thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa/
71a4(phal chen): chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mun pa med pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod
71a5(phal chen): nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa/ thos pa dang / mthong ba dang / smon lam de ni yod pa'i zla ba/ bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ phas kyi rgol
71a6(phal chen): ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcad pa la shin tu dpa' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas mi ngoms pa/
71a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dbang sgyur ba dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba gdul ba dang mthun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa/
71b1(phal chen): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdza 'phrul gying kyil 'khor yongs su dag pa/ thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i mu drung ldan pa/ ye shes kying kyil 'khor gyis chos kyi phyim salda/
71b2(phal chen): cad du lus rab tu snang du/ ye shes kyi rim gro ba thams cad du shar gA/ 'gro ba thams cad bsamra pa ri lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang
71b3(phal chen): ngo ba tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul du khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa/ za ba dang yangs pa phan tshun du
71b4(phal chen): yongs su bsdu ba la dbang sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyis zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/ don zab mo'i tshig dang yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/ tshig dang / yi ge dang / don mi zad pa rab tu brjod pa/
71b5(phal chen): mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa/ gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa/ bskal pa mtha' yas par yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin
71b6(phal chen): gyi rlabs can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du med par gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis dus gsum shes pas 'jig rten thams cad ma
71b7(phal chen): par shes pa/ chos kyi gzungs kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spobs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir
72a1(phal chen): mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos
72a2(phal chen): thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa/ chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba/ dmigs pa thams
72a3(phal chen): cad la rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos kyi dbyings phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings las yang dag par gzhol
72a4(phal chen): pa shin tu phra ste yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/ rang bzhin kha dog med pa las kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa/ phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol
72a5(phal chen): pa de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/ bsngags pa/
72a6(phal chen): bkur ba/ tshig dang yi ge mi zad pas yon tan dang legs pa brjod du yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' badza ta'i tshal du 'dus te 'khod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/
72a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa de dag gi lus thams cad dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
72b1(phal chen): sma de dag dang / 'jo ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang dga' bachen po'i shugs rab tu thong pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rung 'thob pas/ da
72b2(phal chen): pa'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig re re la
72b3(phal chen): 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// rin po sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i sprin mngon par
72b4(phal chen): 'thon te/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin gyi rdo rjes su bsgrags pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dmigs pa thams
72b5(phal chen): cad las 'gro ba thams cad kyi rol mo'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa rol mo'i sgra snyan par blang bas rjes su sgrog cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par
72b6(phal chen): gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sem
72b7(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par bzon nas/
73a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su brjod cig/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
73a2(phal chen): pos rnam par brgyan pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ shing thams cad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dus
73a3(phal chen): gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongs su
73a4(phal chen): ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dmigs pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs shing / phyogs
73a5(phal chen): bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing / phyogs
73a6(phal chen): bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi
73a7(phal chen): 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi
73b1(phal chen): khyab pa rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyi rgyun chen po rnam par sprul pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed zung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
73b2(phal chen): 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed cing phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// /
73b3(phal chen): 'dze ta'i tshal du sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs// mtha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung la ltos// dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams// mngon par 'thon cing phyogs rnams kun tu
73b4(phal chen): khyab/ bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan// kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam dag pa// stan dang dmigs pa yongs su bcas pa la// de dag thams cad gzugs brnyan byung
73b5(phal chen): bsnang // rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin// bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las// sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing // zhing rnams kun gyi
73b6(phal chen): dbyings su khyab par 'phro// tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang // spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzugs// ning gi me tog kun las mngon 'thon te// bsam
73b7(phal chen): gtan yan lag brjod cing kun tu 'dong // kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras// mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus// grangs med bsam yas bde gshegs pa spu las/
74a1(phal chen): sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa med par 'byung // bde gshegs sras po dus gsum byung ba'i rnams// yon tan rgya mtsho'i legs pa brjod pa dag/ rgya mtsho cha
74a2(phal chen): mnyam rgyun sprin de dag kun// 'dze ta'i tshal na gnas shing rab tu brjod// phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi las// rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus par// 'dze ta'i tshal
74a3(phal chen): gyi shing gi gzugs rnams kyi// gseb nas byung bar gyur pa kun tu grag/ dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi// zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam 'phrul pa// zhing rnams rgya
74a4(phal chen): mtsho'i rdul skad de dag kyang // so so dmigs kyis dmigs par gyur pa snang // sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin// spu rtse re rer sna tshogs rnam phye ba'i// sangs rgyas
74a5(phal chen): gnas rnams skad cig re rer snang // de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs// 'gro dang mnyam par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // sems can thabs kyis yongs su smin par byed//
74a6(phal chen): de dag 'od las spos kyi 'od 'phro dang // me tog phal chen rgya mtsho sprin kyang 'byung // mkha' ltar tshad med rin chen gzhal med khang // ma lus rgyan rab kun gyis rnam mdzes pa//
74a7(phal chen): dag thams cad phyogs rnams kun khyab byed// zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin no// dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i rnam tshul du/
74b1(phal chen): zhing rnams kyu mdze rnam par dag byas pa'i// rgyan rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad med pa// phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tugang byung rnams// bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam smrangs pa//
74b2(phal chen): de dag kun kyang 'dze ta'i nags tshal gyi// bar snang mkha' la gzugs brnyan tshul du snang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyud shin tu snang
74b3(phal chen): bar byas pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang snying rje chen po'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhugs par gyur nas/ de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams
74b4(phal chen): cad la phan pa dang yongs su bsdu ba'i don du zhugs par gyur te/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer sangs rgyas kyis kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon
74b5(phal chen): par 'thon par gyur te/ 'od zer de dag gi sgo re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'dra ba'i lus dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon par lta ba'i lus
74b6(phal chen): dang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang 'phrod pa'i lus dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te/ mngon par 'thon nas kyang phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas
74b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul zhing yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba byed do// lha'i gnas nas shi 'phos pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba
75a1(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa'i skyo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / zi lam yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sas rgyas kyi zhing brjod/
75a2(phal chen): du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can yongs su skul ba byed do// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su bskyod pa'i sgo dang /
75a3(phal chen): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang nan tan du bya ba dang rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha
75a4(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang //
75a5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs
75a6(phal chen): su btsal ba'i phyir/ chos kyi tshig dang yi ge re re'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad
75a7(phal chen): yongs su dri ba'i sgo dang / dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya
75b1(phal chen): mtsho snang ba rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang pas kyi rgol bas mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal ba na yongs su
75b2(phal chen): bstan pa'i sgo dang / bzo thams cad shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes pa'i sa yong su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye
75b3(phal chen): shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad
75b4(phal chen): kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mongs pa dang bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de dag la sobs
75b5(phal chen): pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i thabs dang / bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad
75b6(phal chen): kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/ la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
75b7(phal chen): la la ni dri za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni mi 'am ci'i gnas su phyin par
76a1(phal chen): snang ngo // la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni mi'i gnas su phyin pa
76a2(phal chen): snang ngo // la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad du phyin par snang ngo // la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo //
76a3(phal chen): la la ni yi dgas kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang ste/ mthong bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang / zos pas 'dul ba dang / rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil
76a4(phal chen): 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / ming gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye bas 'dul ba dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul
76a5(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha mi dad pa dang / smon lam tha mi dad pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa dang / sems can yongs su bsdu ba za yi dad
76a6(phal chen): pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams 'byas/
76a7(phal chen): klas pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo ste/ la la ni rang gi gnas dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang stan dang / 'khor du bcas
76b1(phal chen): pas phyogs bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo'o// la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'byed par snang / la la ni sems can yongs su smin par bya
76b2(phal chen): ba'i don du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'gro bar snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas mi g.yo'o// la la ni dge sbyong gi gzugs/ la la ni tshungs pa'i gzugs/ la/
76b3(phal chen): la ni dartul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang / cho ga dang / chu zheng gi gzugs/ la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ la la ni tshong pa'i gzugs/ la la ni snyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs
76b4(phal chen): la la ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs/ la lnga ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/ la la ni bzo thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang
76b5(phal chen): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes su 'brang zhing / ming dang / gzugs dang / lus mngon par bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang / lus kyi kha dog dang dbyibs
76b6(phal chen): tshul dang 'dra ba dang / dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / spyod lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gnas rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'gro ba thams cad mig 'phrul/
76b7(phal chen): lta bur shes pa dang / bzo'i 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang / bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / las
77a1(phal chen): thams cad sdang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang / phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab
77a2(phal chen): tu snang ba la spyod cing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul nga'i dron du grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag tu phyin par
77a3(phal chen): snang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las/ skal ba mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / rtag tu phyi
77a4(phal chen): bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyam brtab la brtson zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi rigs su gtogs
77a5(phal chen): pa'i lha dag dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang gis 'gro ba'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang / chos mnyan pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag dang / snying rje chen po la brtson
77a6(phal chen): pa'i lu ma dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang / chu klung gi lba dag dang / shes rab kyi 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dag dang / rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha
77a7(phal chen): dag dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dge dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub
77b1(phal chen): pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i nam mkha'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral par brtsod pa'i
77b2(phal chen): gang chen mtsho'i lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang drag par bsags pa la brtson zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dag dang
77b3(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang byin gyi rlabs la smon cing brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su
77b4(phal chen): bskyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha drag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer du smon cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i
77b5(phal chen): gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang po dag dang / yi dgas kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson
77b6(phal chen): pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad las
77b7(phal chen): 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing
78a1(phal chen): lus rab tu bdud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing ngor lta ba'i lha'i dbang po dag dang / rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'du
78a2(phal chen): pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de mchod cing de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par rang rang gi
78a3(phal chen): gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma zhig tu byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung nas/ lho
78a4(phal chen): phyogs logs su yul rgyu zhing song ngo // / bam po brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus
78a5(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas 'dze ta'i tshal nas byung ste/ lho phyogs logs su 'gro ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du gyur te/
78a6(phal chen): bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing 'gre'o snyam nas/ de dge slong drug cu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/
78a7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
78b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyi stan snga nas phyir byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der/ dge slong ldan cig tu spyod pa rabs byung nas ring po ma lon pa gsar du zhugs pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar dge
78b2(phal chen): slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang / legs par byin pa chen po dang / bsod nams kyi 'od dang / bu chen po dang / kun khyab sbyin pa dang / rnam dag stod pa dang / lha'i dpal dang / dbang po'i blo gros dang /
78b3(phal chen): tshangs pa'i dam pa dang / dge slong ni ba'i blo gros dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong drug cu tsam kun kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'iri rtsa ba bskyed pa/ mos pa zab mor gyur pa/ dang
78b4(phal chen): pa'i rig yongs su dag pa/ sems rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par lta ba la mthu yod pa/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin nges par rtog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gnan
78b5(phal chen): la phan par gyur pa'i tho ca/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pas 'dul ba sha stag dang 'grogs shing mdun du byas te mngon du
78b6(phal chen): bdar ras/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de ltar lam du zhugs te 'dong ba'i tshe/ dge slong de dag kun la bltas nas
78b7(phal chen): dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo la spras pa/ rgya mtsho'i blo byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan cing yongs su dag pa/ lha dang mir bcas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
79a1(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag cing sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan sems can dngag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa
79a2(phal chen): dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rgyan 'gron lam mig mangs ris su gnas pa dang / lam rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la/
79a3(phal chen): mngon par lta bar gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun sum tshog pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nas gter chen po mngon par thon pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pas shing gi
79a4(phal chen): gseb thams cad nas rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad mchod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
79a5(phal chen): 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po bkye ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing spyi bor 'char ba la ltos shig ces/ de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
79a6(phal chen): lam du zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag dge slong de dag la yongs su bstan to// brjod do// bshad do// smos so// bkrol lo// rab tu brjod do// rnam par phye'o//
79a7(phal chen): gsal bar byas so// de ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yon tan ji tsam ji tsam du brjod pa de tsam de tsam du dge slong de dag gi sems rnam par dag
79b1(phal chen): par gyur to// rab tu dang bar gyur to// dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// mos pa skyed par gyur to// de dag gi sems kyi rgyud las su rung bar gyur to// dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur to//
79b2(phal chen): yid bde ba rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// yid mi bde ba rab tu byang bar gyur to// sems kyi skyon dang dral bar gyur to// sgrib pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to// sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos/
79b3(phal chen): par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems rab tu gzhol bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su dag par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skye bar gyur to// snying rje chen
79b4(phal chen): po 'byung bar gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to// snying rje chen po yongs su skye bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su snang bar gyur to// de ltar de dag
79b5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzer te/ mkhan po bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan
79b6(phal chen): pa shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag dang 'grogs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag go// de nas 'jam
79b7(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas par/ glang po'i lta stangs kyis gzi dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang / de'i rjes la dge slong de dag
80a1(phal chen): gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang
80a2(phal chen): khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang / mkhan pos thugs su chud pa dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/
80a3(phal chen): shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyod ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur te/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog cig/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan
80a4(phal chen): dang 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin du thob par shog cig ces/ dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad
80a5(phal chen): ces smras so// dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta smos kyang
80a6(phal chen): ci smos kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'ang gnon par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang
80a7(phal chen): rim gro bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la
80b1(phal chen): yos su ma sloba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chubu sems dnga'i pha rol tu na pa thams cad sbyor bal yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad
80b2(phal chen): yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sa ma
80b3(phal chen): rjes kyi sring tu mtsho rgyas par dgang ni yongs su dag par bya ba la yongs su mi pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bye ba dang / gdul ba la yongs su
80b4(phal chen): mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su mi spro ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
80b5(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snod kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas/ sems can gcig yongs su srin por bya ba'i tshul du/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs
80b6(phal chen): pa'i stobs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o// dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
80b7(phal chen): kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir rig par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las
81a1(phal chen): chen du 'phags par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad las yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs/
81a2(phal chen): dang rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par
81a3(phal chen): dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bdud dang
81a4(phal chen): pas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro// de nas dge/
81a5(phal chen): slong dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di zos nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha'
81a6(phal chen): yas mu med pa'i 'jigs rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag
81a7(phal chen): kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs su mthong
81b1(phal chen): bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na rdul shin su pra la ji sad yod pa de dag kyang blang ba'i tshul gyis ras tu shes par gyur to// sems cad de dag na po che'i gnas dang longs spyod de dag kyang brjod/
81b2(phal chen): bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'ang bos par gyur to// chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang / yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming dang / brdas so/
81b3(phal chen): su shes par gyur to// sems can de dag gi sems dang / dbang po dang / bsam pa la'ang rnam par lta bar gyur to// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu'ang rjes su dran par gyur to//
81b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur/
81b5(phal chen): to// bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tha dad
81b6(phal chen): pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems kyi yan lag stong drag bcu'ang yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// ting
81b7(phal chen): nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu'ang yongs su non par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag du'ang rnam par dag par gyur te/ snang ba chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'khor gyis snang bar
82a1(phal chen): gyur pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to// de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thob ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
82a2(phal chen): brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la
82a3(phal chen): rab tu gnas pas de dag smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par bsgrub par gyur to// de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab tu thob par
82a4(phal chen): gyur to// lus rnam par dag pas lus yang ba rab tu thob par gyur to// de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang / lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas/ mi nyams shing rjes su 'brang
82a5(phal chen): pa'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to// mngon par shes pa de thob pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs
82a6(phal chen): bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
82a7(phal chen): byang chub tu bkod nas/ mthar gyis yul rgyu ning lho phyogs logs skyid pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin nas/ grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi
82b1(phal chen): shar pogs logs na nags tshal chen po sA la sna tshogs kyi rdul mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyis sa rgyas bzhugs dazhugs pa'i mchod de// sems can smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin
82b2(phal chen): gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ zhing mtha' yas par ming gi snga rjes su grags pa/ sngan chad bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ yongs su gtang bar dka' bdum
82b3(phal chen): yongs su gtang ste/ sa'i phyogs de na lba dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa
82b4(phal chen): rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod pa la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa dor 'khor dang bcas te phyin nas/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba mdo sde
82b5(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu 'byung ba bstan to// de bstan pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po nas klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nye bar lhags te/ de dag gis chos kyi tshul de zos nas/ klu'i rgyud
82b6(phal chen): la rnam par spyod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par gyur nas klu'i rgyud rnam par bzlog ste/ lnga dang mir skye ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med pa yang dag par
82b7(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// chos de bstan pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par dul bar gyur to//
83a1(phal chen): de nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal du phyin te/ sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyad kyi mchod rten gyi gzhi 'di
83a2(phal chen): nyid na rnam par spyod do zhes thos nas/ dge bstan tshong dpon shes rab chen po la sogs pa dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po dag so so nas 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang bcas /
83a3(phal chen): skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de la dge bsnyen shes rab chen po ni/ dge bsnyen bzang pos byin dang / lhas byin dang
83a4(phal chen): bsod nams 'od dang / grags pa'i lha dang / grags pa'i byin dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / zla ba dga' bo dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / sgra gcan bzang po dang / dag
83a5(phal chen): bsnyen bzang po'i dpal dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la
83a6(phal chen): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// de la dge bsnyen ma shes rab chen mo ni/ dge bsnyen ma 'od bzang mo dang
83a7(phal chen): lus bzang mo dang / dge ba yod pa dang / dge ba'i dpal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / dpal bzang mo dang / dge bsnyen ma mig bzang mo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgyas
83b1(phal chen): bsor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gangan ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
83b2(phal chen): lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu'i khrid do// de la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ni/ tshong dpon gyi bu brtul zhugs bzang po dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / nga tshul bzang po dang
83b3(phal chen): rnam par gdon pa bzang po dang / bsam pa bzang po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / dro bzang po dang / mig bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'od bzang po dang / de dag la sogs
83b4(phal chen): pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal
83b5(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de la khyim bdag shes rangab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang mo ni/ bu mo bzang mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang / brtan
83b6(phal chen): pa'i blo gros dang / dpal bzang po dang 8/ tshangs pas byin pa dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang
83b7(phal chen): na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
84a1(phal chen): / de nas 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag 'dus te 'khod par shes nas/ bsapa pa/
84a2(phal chen): jilta ba bzhin du bstan pa'i byin gyis zil gyis mnan te/ byams pa chen po'i byin gyis sem par byas nasa~M/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyis chos bstan pa mngon par sgrub ste/ ye shes kyi byin gyis
84a3(phal chen): sems dang bsam pa rnam par phye nas tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen pos chos bstan par dga' ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la bltas so// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs zhes bya ba/ ci'i phyir
84a4(phal chen): nor bzangs zhes bya zhe na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs zhes bya ba de thog ma ma'i mngal du zhugs ma zag tu/ khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po 'thon
84a5(phal chen): par gyur to// rin po che'i sdong po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / asma gar ba dang
84a6(phal chen): mu sa ra gal ba dang / rin po che de bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang / gter de dag nas skyes te sa'i gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'thon par gyur to// de yan lag dang nying lag thams
84a7(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs te/ zla ba bcu lon nas btsas pa dang / de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang / rngams su khru bdun tsam du sa'i steng nas mngon par 'phags te/ snang bar
84b1(phal chen): bya nas sa byar ma dang 'angs par gyu to// khyim na po che mchogs kya dadu sgyu 'dubyung ba gyu te/ 'di ltar mar myi spyod dang / til ra spyod dang / smra ba'i spyod
84b2(phal chen): mir gsar gyi snod dang / gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gang bdag te/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / spos kyi snod
84b3(phal chen): gos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / man shel gyi snod kha zas dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs ro mchog tu zhim pas yongs su gang ba dang / nor ru'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba
84b4(phal chen): dang gser gyi snod dngul sil mas yongs su gang ba dang / dngul gyi snod gser phyes yongs su gang ba dang / phra men gyi snod nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya sa yongs su gang ba dang / shel gyi snod
84b5(phal chen): bu sa ra gal bas yongs su gang ba dang / mu sa ra gal ba'i snod rin po che shel gyis yongs su gang ba dang / asma gar ba'i snod mu tig dmar pos yongs su gang ba dang / mu tig dang
84b6(phal chen): po'i snod asma gar bas yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snod nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gis yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi snod nor bu rin po che
84b7(phal chen): skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su gang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i snod lnga brgya 'dzin par gyur to// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de btsas ma thag tu khyim dang / bang ba dang
85a1(phal chen): marjod thams cad du nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi char man par ba par gyur to// de la bram rje'i smras pa dang / phywa dwang /
85a2(phal chen): pa dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyi 'dri btsas mu theg tu nor mang po phun snam tshogs pa byung bar gyur pas nu/ nor bgrang ma nor bzungs zhes de ltar ming du btags te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de ni sngon gyi la
85a3(phal chen): ba la bya ba byas pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam pa can no// lus dang / dgu dang / yid kyi
85a4(phal chen): spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyang ba la rab tu brtson pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du gyur
85a5(phal chen): bya'o// bsam pa'i nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'o// byang chub kyi sems chags pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
85a6(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la bltas te dga' ba'i gtam byas nas/ de la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag
85a7(phal chen): par bsdu zhing 'thob par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad shes par bya ba las
85b1(phal chen): mas sangs rgyas thams kyi gabor byed kyil 'khor rnam pa dag pa las kyang brtsams sangs rgyas thams can kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i can las kyang rtsams
85b2(phal chen): ma mnas thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad babang po rnam par dag pa las byung brtsams sras rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub pa las kyang brtsams sangs rgyas
85b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi gsung rnam par byab las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyun rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las
85b4(phal chen): kyang brnams/ chos kyang bstad par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu dor bzangs dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos dang mthun pa'i
85b5(phal chen): gtam gyis bstan te/ yang dag par bskul nas spro ba bskyed de dga' bar byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
85b6(phal chen): su dran par byas nas/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pas byin gyis brlabs te/ bde bar byas nas de nas song ngo //
85b7(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gnor dur gyur pa las rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / che ba nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par
86a1(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod do// zo gros chen po mtha'
86a2(phal chen): yas spyod yul can// khyod kyi mthus ni sems can slar slad du// bdag kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur// de la nges pa gang mchis bdag la gson// dga' ba'i rgyus bkang 'obs
86a3(phal chen): kyis kun nas bskor// nga rgyal dregs pa'i rab mtho bar brtsegs// sems can lam brgyud sgo rnams btsud cing gdangs// de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum ming ldan che// de ni gti mug ma rig
86a4(phal chen): gzings pas khebs// 'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu gdungs// rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang du gyur// de la byis pa ma rig rten kyang 'cha'// sred pa'i sgrog dang nags pas shin
86a5(phal chen): tu grags// g.yo dang sgyu yi skyon gyis mtho btsams shing // the tsom yid gnyis dag gis mig mdongs po// log pa byin phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs// phrag dog ser sna'i zag pas
86a6(phal chen): btags shing bcings// yi dgras byol song sems dmyal mi khom rgyu// rga shi nad dang skye bas rab tu mnar// mgo rmongs lam chud 'khor lo kun tu 'khor// de la khyod ni thug rje rnam
86a7(phal chen): dag pa'i// dkyil 'bar ye shes 'od zer snang ba mdzod// nyon mongs rgya mtshoskam par shar te 'phags// nyim 'dra bas bdag la snang ba mdzod// byams pa bsgoms pas la
86b1(phal chen): 'khor rdzogs shing na// bsod nams 'od bde ba'i zer 'byed pa// semasas na kun ci gnas su shar gyur cis// rdzabartsapa lba bus padag snang mdzod// dkar mabu thabs tha mo mya banan
86b2(phal chen): dkor ba dad // cho sa byings mda' lachags pa mim pab/ chos kyi 'khor po rin chen po 'dred pas// rnal por thar pas bdag la bstan du gsol// byang dri batheg par smon las
86b3(phal chen): mthu mngar ste// bsod nams ye shes shin tu yang bsags shing // sems can kun la phan pa'i don bzhugs pa'i// ded dpon chen pos bdag kyang bsrung du gsol// bzod pa brtan rnying
86b4(phal chen): sra ba'i go mnabs te// ye shes pashan mnga' thugs rje'i phyag ring bas// bdud kyi dmag dpung tshogs rnams mngon 'gyur bar// dpa' bo chen pos bdag gi sel yang mdzod// chos kyi ri
86b5(phal chen): rab sngol bstan bzhugs shing // ting 'dzin mchog gi lha mos kun nas bsod// nyon mongs sgra gcan lha min 'dul mdzad pa// brgya byir gyur pas bdag kyang gzigs su gsol// byis pa'i gnas
86b6(phal chen): byug 'ams gsum khang pa nas// nyon mongs las rnams rnam par bsal ba mkhyen// rgyu yi sa dang lam rgyud 'khor rmongs par// me mar 'dra bas bdag kyang shul bstan gsol// ngan 'gro'i lam
86b7(phal chen): rnams rnam par zlog mdzad cing // bde bar 'gro ba'i lam rnams rnam sbyong ba// 'jig rten kun gyi la mo gyi rgyud las 'das// bdag la'ang thar pa'i sgo ni bstan du gsol// rtag dang bdag dang bde
87a1(phal chen): par 'du shes ldan// 'og 'dzin sgo ri'i skabs kyis bcad gyur gyis// bde pa'i ye shes spyan rdomachog sang rabs// bar sgo bdagal 'dugyur du dbye bar gsol/
87a2(phal chen): yang dag log pa'i lam la mkhas gyur cing // lam gyi rgyus dang tshul le bsnyengs mi mangs// lam rnabs kun gyis 'dul ba zugs chud pa// bdag la byang chub shul ni bzhin du gsol// ya/
87a3(phal chen): dag lta ba'i sa yi zang la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan cab kyis bskrun// sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa// byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsol/
87a4(phal chen): rgyal ba gang 'das pa byod gang rnams dang // da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba snang mdzad pa// sems can gtso bo legs par gshegs pa'i phyogs// de yang lam ston mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol/
87a5(phal chen): lam gyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi bsnyengs pa// chos theg shing rta'i 'khrul 'khor mkhyen gyur cing // ye shes theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa// byang chub theg pa bdag la bshad du gsol/
87a6(phal chen): mos shing spen pa'i 'khor lo'i mu khyud can// bzod pa rdo rje snying rje srog shing rten// dad pa'i gnya' shing rin chen legs spras pa'i// byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/
87a7(phal chen): gzungs rnams kun gyis rnam dag dkyil 'khor can// byams pa brtsegs pa'i dgab pas rab brgyan pa// tha dad yang dag shes pa'i dril 'phrong can// theg mchog bzang pos bdag la bskud
87b1(phal chen): dugasol// tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par brgyan// ting 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun nas rgyu// chos kyi rnga yi dbyangs chen rab bsngags pa// theg pa'i dab pas bdag
87b2(phal chen): li bstabs su gsol// bsdu ba bzhi yi mi zad mdzod ldan pa// ye shes rin chen yon tan 'phreng gis brgyan// khrel yod dul ba'i 'breng bas mchog bsdams pa'i// theg pa'i dam pa bdag
87b3(phal chen): la bsdad du gsol// skyid pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can// tshul khrims can dang snying rje'i byug ldan zhing // bzod pa'i zer gyis mtshams rnams dam sbyar ba'i// theg pa'i mchog la
87b4(phal chen): myung du ba dge gzhag gsol// sems cad thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa// bsam gtan ting 'dzin kha khyer mthor sbron cing // shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor mthun 'gro chu ba'i// chos kyi
87b5(phal chen): thig pa mchog la bdag gnag gsol// smon lam 'khor los lam gyi 'khor sbyong ba// chos kyi gzungs dam mthu brtan che ldan zhing // ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs byas
87b6(phal chen): par/ chos kyi theg pa de la bdag bskyod gsol// kun tu bang po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing // sems can ltabs rgyal thogs med pa// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas gdon 'gyur ba'i//
87b7(phal chen): ye shes reg pas bdag la bskur du gsol// de ni brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa// ye shes sgyums legs sbyangs legs byas shing // sprib dang chags pa thams cad gcod pa yi
88a1(phal chen): bzang po'i theg la bdag kyang bskyon par gsol// 'gro mnyam dri med shin tu yangs gyur pa// sems can thams cad skyob pas bde sgrub cing // chos dbyings shin tu rgya chen
88a2(phal chen): rnam snang ba'i// byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// sdug bsngal phung po rab 'gyur gcod byed pa// nyon mongs las kyi rdul mang skyong sa la ci'o// bdud dang pus kyi rgol ba kun dza
88a3(phal chen): pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// phyogs rnams kun tu ye shes rang snang ba// chos dbyings nam mkha' rnam par grub byed cing // sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed
88a4(phal chen): pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// rnam dag mkha' ldar tshad med mi zad pa// sred dang ma rig lta ba'i skyon med cing // sems can kun la phan par rab gnas pa'i// chos
88a5(phal chen): kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// rlung chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan pas// smon lam mthu yis 'jig rte kun 'dzin cing // ni dra'i gnasung ba kun sar snrel byed pa'o// chos kyi theg
88a6(phal chen): la ngas kyang bstor du gsol// mchen rgan mo stobs kyi stobs ldan pa// snying rje'i mthu dang shugs kyis khu khyer zhing // ye shes lo tog 'gro ba nyer 'tsho ba'o// theg pa'i mchog la bdag rgya
88a7(phal chen): bskyon du gso'o// nyim lta bur 'gro ba nyer mtsho zhing // bsdu yangs 'tshor gyi kyil la dze can// gsus kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od babang // ye shes nyim dag la bsad du gsol/
88b1(phal chen): bskal pa mang po du bar rab bslabs pas// rgyu yi tshul dngas kun mkhas gyur pa// gang gis 'dus byas grong khyer gzhom 'gyur ba'i// shes brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la stsal du gsol// sa
88b2(phal chen): rgyas legs kun bslab pa phun sum gyis// ye shes rgya mtshe yangs pa gang zhig la// tshad med rgya mtsho'i blo mangs pa slabs gyur pa// de legs ci 'dra 'phags pas bka' stsal gsol// gang na yang dag
88b3(phal chen): spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs shing // ye shes rgyal po'i cod pan legs brgyan te// chos kyi mthu zong dam pas dbu bcings pa'i// chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang bdag kyang ston/ de nas
88b4(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas glang po'i lta stangs kyis bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
88b5(phal chen): sems bskyed de/ dpe ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri bar bsam pa legs so//
