88b6(phal chen): legs so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes grenyen rnams la bsten cing bsten pa dang / rim gror bya ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te/ 'di ni mthun pa'i
88b7(phal chen): rgyu yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur bas yongs su ma skyo bar gyis shig/ nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod
89a1(phal chen): pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar na tan tu / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la/
89a2(phal chen): spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub
89a3(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
89a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la lhag par dmigs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
89a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyas par bgyi ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzung po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba rgya cher bstan du gsol/
89a6(phal chen): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams gang chen tsho// de ltar khyod ni nga'i drung nyer
89a7(phal chen): phyin te// snying rje snying brtse rgya chen gyi// yid ldan byang chub dam pa tshol ba legs// 'gro ba thams cad dgrol don du// spyod pa mtshungs med don du smon lam
89b1(phal chen): rang 'debs shing // 'tho bdun gyi skabs 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul 'di yin// byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i rnams// 'jor
89b2(phal chen): ba'i nang na skyo mad yid kyis spyod byed pa// de dge kun tu bzang po yi// spyod pa thub med chags med 'thob par 'gyur// bsod nams 'od can bsod nams dpal/
89b3(phal chen): de ltar khyod na kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la// 'gro la phan phyir sngon byed pa// bsod nams rgya mcho dge gzhi dag pa'i mtshan// mtha' dang dbus med tshad med pa'i//
89b4(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kun kyang 'thong bar 'gyur// dran pa'i mthu dang stobs kyis kyang // de dag chos kyi sprin kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur// de
89b5(phal chen): ltar khyod kyis phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba mthong nas kyang // byang chub spyod pa'i don gyi phyir// de dag kun la smon lam rgya mtsho dag
89b6(phal chen): byed 'gyur// 'jig rten gtso la slob byed cing // gang rnams sangs rgyas sa la gnas ni bca' byas shing // 'di tshul rgya mtshor zhugs gyur pa// de dag kun kyang
89b7(phal chen): thams cad gzigs par 'gyur// khyod ni 'byam klas zhing kun tu// bskal mang zhing rdul snyed du kun tu bzang po yi// spyod pa'i dam pa spyad byas shing // byang chub
90a1(phal chen): dam pa zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur// shing rnams mtha' dang dbus med pa// ma lus kun tu bskul pa rgya mtshor snad par gyis// kun tu dazang po'i spyod marjo/
90a2(phal chen): phyir/ smon lam rgya chen yongs su rdzogs par byos// khyod kyi smon lam zos gyur nas// sems can khrag khrig dga' ba yongs su skyes gyur cing // kun tu bzang po'i ye
90a3(phal chen): shes kyis// byang chub mchog tu smon pa byed la ltos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di
90a4(phal chen): skad ces sgo'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal bar sems pa legs so legs
90a5(phal chen): so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i sems can yang rab tu dkon te/ de bas kyang gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par
90a6(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba de lta bu'i sems can ni ches dkon no// rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' thams
90a7(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen las gdon mi za bar rtogs pa thob par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba
90b1(phal chen): la yongs su sngo ba'i yid med par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen palta ba la ngoms pa med par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin par gyis shig/
90b2(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi babs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la long khro ba med par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu lde phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya bu yod de
90b3(phal chen): de na mgul legs pa zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod pa de la dge slong sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i kun du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
90b4(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
90b5(phal chen): spyod pa la spyad par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bya ba
90b6(phal chen): dang ji ltar mngon pa khasgrub par bya ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang /
90b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dris shig dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyod la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor
91a1(phal chen): ston to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'jam dpal/
91a2(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyi sa la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ lan brgya stong du mar
91a3(phal chen): phyir bltas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba'i sems dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba mi bzod de gdong mchi mas gang bar ngu zhing / 'jam
91a4(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung nas song ngo // / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyis yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba der song ste phyin nas/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog
91a5(phal chen): nas rnam par brgyus te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rna bas byung zhi las rgya chen pos byin gyis bsrabs pa'i long spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongs su spyod cing ri mgul legs pa gang na ba der byin
91a6(phal chen): nas mgul legs pa'i ri la 'dzegs te/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol zhing shar phyogs logs su byung ngo // de bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang dang
91a7(phal chen): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su'ang byung ste/ bla 'og tu'ang lta
91b1(phal chen): zhing dge slong sbyin kyi dpal tshol tshol ba las des zhag bdun lon pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal ri rtse gcig da de sngun ljongs na 'chag cing 'dug pa
91b2(phal chen): mthong nas dge slong sprin gyi dpal gang na ba der song ste/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la g.yas phyogs
91b3(phal chen): su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces sbas so// 'phags pas thugs su chud par mdzad du gsol/ bdag gis bla ra med pa yang dag par
91b4(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
91b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi bo dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /
91b6(phal chen): ji ltar yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
91b7(phal chen): lhag par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba
92a1(phal chen): ma 'tshul te/ 'phags pa khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su ston pa mdzad ces thos / 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems/
92a2(phal chen): dpa' ldan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad nas smras pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dbul gyisatsho
92a3(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
92a4(phal chen): yongs su dri ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su btsal ba
92a5(phal chen): dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems
92a6(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa sgrub pa rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub
92a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgyud yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i bsam pa
92b1(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku yongs su bstan pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus byas dang
92b2(phal chen): 'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang / 'jigs pas mi gos pa'i rgyud yongs su btsal ba 'di ni draka'a'o// shin tu dka' 'o// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis
92b3(phal chen): mig gi blo gros dang / dad pa'i mig rnam par dag pas kun tu mngon par lta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba byin phyogs med pa dang / yul kun la thogs pa med cing
92b4(phal chen): bsgribs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / mig gi yul kun nas yongs su dag pa'i lus rnam par dag pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa
92b5(phal chen): thams cad du mngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyi 'dud pa la mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi stobs kyis phyogs
92b6(phal chen): kyi rgyud thams cad kun nas mngon du gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ngo // sangs
92b7(phal chen): rgyas gnyis dang / bcu dang / sangs rgyas brgya dang / sangs rgyas stong dang / sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs
93a1(phal chen): rgyas bye ba brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/ de bzhin gshegs
93a2(phal chen): pa tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ sa mtshams med pa
93a3(phal chen): gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin
93a4(phal chen): gshegs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong dang / stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
93a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa sangs
93a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
93a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ning bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
93b1(phal chen): sas rgyas kyi zhing bye ba rgya drug song gi rdus shin tu grub skyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi dang bye ba zub TIg pan sod kyi rnal shin sa za bskyed nas/ sas rgyas kyi shing brjod de dang/
93b2(phal chen): yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ shar phyogs logs su dzi lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs da / nub phyogs dang / byung phyogs dang / byang
93b3(phal chen): shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lce nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bra'i phyogs kyi rje
93b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ba'i bor du ste
93b5(phal chen): phyogs ririr rnam par bltas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / dbyibs sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /
93b6(phal chen): khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba kha dog du ma can dang / kha dog
93b7(phal chen): mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / pho brang dang rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sku tshe'i tshad rnam par dag pa rnam pa
94a1(phal chen): sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'dzung rgya gA rnam par dag pa'i sgos
94a2(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro rnam par ldog pa mang po mthong ngo // de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sgo kun nas
94a3(phal chen): dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thob par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag
94a4(phal chen): pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / pho brang rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mngon par mthong bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran
94a5(phal chen): pa'i sgo kun nas snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par de bzhin gsheg pa mthong ba rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas rjes
94a6(phal chen): su dran pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bas/ sangs rgyas rjes
94a7(phal chen): su dran pa'i sgo stobs kyis slob tegs pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin la blta bas/ sangs
94b1(phal chen): rgyus rjes su dran pa'i sgo chos kyis spro ba byas pa rab thob pa dang / gang gis phyogs rgyam tsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ba mi dad pa la 'jug pas/ spas rgyas rjes su dran pa'i/
94b2(phal chen): sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu bo pa dang / gang gis de bzhir gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu drung ba la rab tu zla bar dmigs shing 'jug pa so
94b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rjes su drad pa'i blo phyogs thams cad du 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang / brgal pa thams cad de de bzhin ga shegs pa mthong zhing rnam par dmigs dang mi 'bral bas sam
94b4(phal chen): rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bskal par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gris dus thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba sra/ sangs
94b5(phal chen): rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus su sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas mngon par 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku
94b6(phal chen): yongs su mthong zhing rnam par rig pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhing du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rang gi
94b7(phal chen): sems dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus gsum du spro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dmigs pa thams cad la de bzhin
95a1(phal chen): gshegs pa gtsugan sdu gcig tu rgyu pa yang dag par tshogs pa mtho zhing dmigs pas sas rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dmigs par gro btags pa/
95a2(phal chen): rab thob pa dang / glang gis skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnam par dmigs pas sangs
95a3(phal chen): rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhi bas spro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis nyin gcig tu gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas
95a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'bral bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa re re skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad
95a5(phal chen): du rgyas par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dmigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu yangs pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sku'i
95a6(phal chen): rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa byung ba mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu phra bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / skad cig
95a7(phal chen): gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam par dmigs pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rgyan du sgro btags pa rab
95b1(phal chen): thob pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas/ gang gis sas
95b2(phal chen): nas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dgos par sna btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / rang gi sems dang bsam pa la bltas na de bzhin gshegs thams cad rab tu snang ba thob pas sangs rgyas
95b3(phal chen): rjes su drad pa'i sgo sems kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyis las rnam pa ji lta bur bsags pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pas/ gang gis
95b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo las kyi spro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad+mo'i tshal gyis rgyas par sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen
95b5(phal chen): po ston pa/ phyogs kun tu mngon sum du dmigs pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
95b6(phal chen): pa'i sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin dbyangs sgrogs pas chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun tu snang bas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo nam mkhas sgro btags pa rab tu
95b7(phal chen): thob pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo zhes bya ba
96a1(phal chen): yod pa de na dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsgrub par bya
96a2(phal chen): ba dang ji ltar nan du bya ba dris shig dang / rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang rgyu yongs su ston par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyis rgya chen
96a3(phal chen): po'ang khong du chud par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs rgya chen po'ang yongs su skyed par byed do// byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang rgyu rgya chen po'ang yongs su rjod par 'gyur ro//
96a4(phal chen): theg pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang snang bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu rgya chen po'ang skyed par byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs rgya chen po'ang rab tu rton par byed do// spyod pa rgya
96a5(phal chen): mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya chen po'ang rab tu rjod par 'gyur ro// smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po'ang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// sgo kun nas 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya chen po'ang
96a6(phal chen): rnam par spyong bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po'i stobs rgya chen po'ang yongs su 'phel bar byed do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong sprin gyi dpal
96a7(phal chen): gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar phyir bltas nas
96b1(phal chen): smra
96b2(phal chen): rjes su sum pa dang / legs snang ba rjes su dran par bya bdang / drang rgyas sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de rnam par byud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ti
96b3(phal chen): 'dzin gyi tshul de rjes su snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i tshul de blta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor de lha mngon par mos par bya ba dang / sa
96b4(phal chen): rgyas blta ba'i phyogs de la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de la rjes su bsam pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de rjes su dran par bya ba dang
96b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya de khong du chud par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi nam mkha' de la rjes su blta bar bya ba byed cing mthar gyis phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo gang na ba dang
96b6(phal chen): dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su
96b7(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyor nas 'di skad ces sbas so// 'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
97a1(phal chen): byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'tshal na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud
97a2(phal chen): las phyir ldog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
97a3(phal chen): byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud las ldog par 'gyur zhing byang
97a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las phyir ldog cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi 'khor gyi 'khor
97a5(phal chen): lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jom zhing / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu ston pa dang / sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs
97a6(phal chen): su skems shing snying rje chen po'i mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba thams cad kyi sgo gcod cing mthe
97a7(phal chen): ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo 'byed pa dang / khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi sgo rnam par gcod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang gi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang / ye byad
97b1(phal chen): mas cad kyi med pa rnam par sngong zhing 'gro ba thams cang bsdu pa'i smon lam yongs su skyed par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to// de skad ces smras pa dang / dge sbyong mdzug/
97b2(phal chen): sbyin ces tsheng dpon gyi nu nor ba ma la 'di skad ces smram mo// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa leg sa sa mig pa so//
97b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu dge pa'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams ni byang chub tu sems kyang mi sbyar dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo kun tu snang b.rab tu thob pa dang / thabs kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i sam gyi
97b4(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang bas rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho'i tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa dang / dkar po'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dag
97b5(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bkur bas yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / lus dang srog la 'phangs par mi rtsi ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mtho dman med
97b6(phal chen): pa'i sa ltar sems mnyam pa dang / rang bzhin gyis snying rje zhing byams par sems pa dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dun pa dang / de bzhin
97b7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams byang chub sems skye ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bslab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang
98a1(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i/
98a2(phal chen): sems dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par zlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang
98a3(phal chen): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rgya chen po'i sems dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kun
98a4(phal chen): tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sems dang /
98a5(phal chen): dus gsum gyi dmigs pa ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ye
98a6(phal chen): shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyis su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te/ mngon du byas
98a7(phal chen): nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rtsi che zhing tshad med pa la rjes su bsam pa dang / dri ma med cing dang ba dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang / pags kyis gnol zhing legs
98b1(phal chen): par gnas pa dang / ri po che'i 'byung gnas dums rnam par brgyan pa dang / chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang / kha dog rnam pa pa dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'byung po//
98b2(phal chen): bza' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang / sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gang shing 'dri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes
98b3(phal chen): su sems pa byed cing gnas gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsams so// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la/ sa 'di bas
98b4(phal chen): kyang yangs shing / 'di bas kyang tshad mad la/ 'di bas kyang ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste/ de de ltar khe bo tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa la brtson par gnas
98b5(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og gi gni las pad+ma chen po nor bu rin po che in+d+ra nI la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i chu ba can/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Sha dam pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/
98b6(phal chen): 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar dri ma med pa'i lo ma rgya chen po can/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che a sbya gar ba'i re ba can/ rgya mtsho tsam du yangs
98b7(phal chen): shing rgya che ba lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus sdong po'i ldan nas bzung ba/ rin po che sna tshogs dpya phrag slong gi dra bas kun nas yongs pa/ klu'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus
99a1(phal chen): thos rgya cher mngon par bab pa/ rnams par lding gi dbang po ma spong dras su sa d+ma da / rin po rgyubyin dang / sen mo drong po margyas gdung na rab tu
99a2(phal chen): sbyas pa/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong drag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis btsun mA sa lce'i phyi chen po'i dbyung po ngacu spyong theg bcu 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa sri
99a3(phal chen): po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus btud cing mngon par mchod pa/ dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang klu sna tshogs snyan pasu bstod cing mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po
99a4(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcus lnga rdzas kyi matog dang / spros dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phyi ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang rgyal
99a5(phal chen): mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris
99a6(phal chen): kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba/ mi'i dbang po 'khor los sgyur ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che bdun gyis bsu zhing mngon par mchod pa rgya mtsho'i lnga brgya sto
99a7(phal chen): phrag bcus mngon par 'thon cing phyag bya ba/ nor bu rin po che skar ma'i ngad brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'od zer gyi rgyan gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag
99b1(phal chen): pa cu stong drug bcus 'a'os su khebs par 'phel bas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor du na po chernam par snang bab ma skyong dag banas snying ngo btugs pa par byas pa/ do du
99b2(phal chen): dang rgya gang po brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa nor bu rin po che mdzod pa tshogs dran stong drag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas pa nor bu dadu
99b3(phal chen): 'dzam du'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor du rin po che rdo rje'i seng gi dargya song phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa nor bu rin po
99b4(phal chen): ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal bar bsgrubs pa/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal
99b5(phal chen): po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang 'od 'bar bar byas pa byung ste/ pod+mo chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'o// byang
99b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su brtan pa'o// phyogs thams cad du mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o// sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos kyis byung ba'o// rjen pa'i dri med pa'i las
99b7(phal chen): kyis byung ba'o// nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan pa'o// rmi lam sa bu'i chos nyid kyis yongs su myong ba'o// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis
100a1(phal chen): rgyas btab pa'o// chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o// phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi yul
100a2(phal chen): brjod pa dang mthun pa ste/ de'i rnam pa dang / yon tan dang / dbyings dang / kha dog dang / rgyun gyi mthar phyin par ni bskal pa bcwa stong grangs med par yang khong du chud par nus te/ bad+mo chen po de'ang
100a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas khyab cing / yongs su rgyas par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'ang 'di nas bzung ba nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi
100a4(phal chen): mthas klas par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil
100a5(phal chen): 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
100a6(phal chen): mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / spyi gtsug
100a7(phal chen): ltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ljags yangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil
100b1(phal chen): 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang bas so// stobam tshad med pa'asam gyis khyab pa dang / mi bsangs par rnam par dag pa bsam kyis mi khyab pa dang / bdangang yang dag par
100b2(phal chen): bakhyen pa thobs ngon par bsgrubs pa'amam byas mi khyad pa du rjes su shes so// ldan byang chub sams dpa'i spyad pa yang dag par 'asgrub pa pas mdzes mi rtab padang rjes su /
100b3(phal chen): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'ang bzong ngo // chos kyi sprin gyi 'brub sgo mngon par bsgrags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yongs su bstan
100b4(phal chen): pa rnam par dmigs pa'i gnas dang / rgyad bsam gyis me khyab pa'ang rjes so// g.yas ga yar bye skra'i rnam par tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don
100b5(phal chen): dang dgos pa ngas pa gyis mi khyab pa yongs su grub par gyur pa'ang mthong ngo // de bzhin ga/ sa pa des kyang phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing kho bo'i mgo la byugs nas chos kyi rnam grangs
100b6(phal chen): kun nas mig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul byang chub sems dpa'i sdud pa rab tu brjod pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad rab tu snang ba
100b7(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'a'ar la yang dag par gnol rang snang bar byed pa/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang rnam pa thams cad rnam par dag pas yongs su snang ba/ pas kyi rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams
101a1(phal chen): ma rnam par 'khor ba/ bdud gyi dkrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jomasapa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad shing tu tshom par byed pa/ sems/
101a2(phal chen): can thams cad kyi sems cings por mang snang bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lon
101a3(phal chen): rgyud dang mthu snang bar byed pa yang dag par bstan te/ kho bos kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de blangs so// bzung ngo // spel to// bsams so// de ltar bzung ba de
101a4(phal chen): la'ang brin ni snag tsha rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po tsam dang / spyi gu'i phung po ri rab ri'i rgyal ba tsam zad par gyur kyang chos kyi rnam grangs de las le'u re re dang / sgo re re dang / chos kyi tshul
101a5(phal chen): re re dang / chos kyi tshig rnam par phye ba ro ra las kyang zad pa 'am/ 'grib pa 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ mthar thug pa 'am/ mtha' zad par 'gyur ba dmigs par mi rung ngo //
101a6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar bdag gis lo bcu gnyis tshang bar chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas rig ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma gcig cing yang zos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa
101a7(phal chen): zhig khong du chud do// zhi ba'i sgo'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la zhugs so// slong mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la yang dag par 'jug go/
101b1(phal chen): sa la rnam par pyod cing rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i gdus kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa nig rnam par bsgoms te rnam par dbye ba byas so// gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snangabs
101b2(phal chen): le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su blangs so// pad+mo'i rgyan gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u zangs med pa zhig mngon par bsrubs so// dbyangs kyi tshul gyi gzus kyi 'od snang bas le'u zangs red pa
101b3(phal chen): zhig yang dag par bshad do// nam mkha'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rab tu phye'o// skar mi brtsegs pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig shin du rgyas
101b4(phal chen): par byas so// rgya mtsho'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su bkod do// kho bo'i drung du shwar phyogs logs nas lha dang lha'i dbang po 'am// klu dang klu'i dbyung
101b5(phal chen): po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ dri za dang dri za'i dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ nam mkha' lding dang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po
101b6(phal chen): 'am/ mi 'am ci dang mi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ mi dang mi'i dbang po 'am/ tshangs pa dang tshangs pa'i dbang po 'am/ sems
101b7(phal chen): can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di nyid la rab tu bkod cing btsud do//
102a1(phal chen): de dag kun kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la mos par byas so// rtog tu btsud do// yongs su bstan to// yang dag par brjod do//
102a2(phal chen): yongs su gsal bar byas so// rnam par phye'o// rgyas par byas so// mngon par bskur to// rnam par bkrol lo// rab tu phye'o// shin tu snang bar byas so// de ltar
102a3(phal chen): shar phyogs kyi la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lce phyogs dang / nub phyog dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs
102a4(phal chen): mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'o gau dang bla'i phyogs nas sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ kun la'ang snga ma bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni
102a5(phal chen): chos kyi rnam grangs gcig cig shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
102a6(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rgya mtsho thams cad
102a7(phal chen): la zhugs pa dang / spobs bcu'i ye shes chags pa med pa'i snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
102b1(phal chen): gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtshol zhugs pa dang / zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pas ning rgya mtsho
102b2(phal chen): thams cad la zhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i stobs kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / ye shes rnam par rig pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad
102b3(phal chen): la zhugs pa dang / nan tan dang ldan pas yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / brjod pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba'i skad rgya mtsho
102b4(phal chen): thams cad la zhugs pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re sa/ song rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad drug cu 'das pa'i lce phyogs kyi gnas 'di nyid na/ lang ka'i gnas
102b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i kun du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bya ba
102b6(phal chen): dris shig/ de nas tsheng dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar
102b7(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi drung nas song ngo // / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes garten gyi gdapas
103a1(phal chen): ngag de dang / kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de 'ang rjes su dran par byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de'ang rjes su bsam pa dang / chos
103a2(phal chen): kyi tshig dang yi ge'i sprin de dag kyang yongs su bzung ba dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag la'ang 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul de la'ang rjes su rnam par blta ba dang / chos kyi
103a3(phal chen): le'u dang grong gi tshul de dag la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi nam mkha' de la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dkyil 'khor de'ang rjes su sbyang bar bya ba dang / chos
103a4(phal chen): rin po che'i gling de'ang rjes su sems shing mthar gyis lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba gang na ba der byin nas dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' zhing shar phyogs
103a5(phal chen): su bltas so// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs
103a6(phal chen): mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / bla dang 'og tu'ang dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' ste kun tu bltas pa dang / des dge slong shin tu brtan pa nam mkha'
103a7(phal chen): dbyings la lha brgya stong grangs med pas yongs su bskor cing phan tshun 'chags pa mthong ngo // nam mkha'i dbyings de'ang lha'i dbang po rnams kyis dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las
103b1(phal chen): su bya ba'i phyir/ lga rdzas kyi me tog sil pa'i sprin gyis yog pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sprin gyi sgra dang / dar gyi ba dan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyad par mthong ngo // klu'i dbang
103b2(phal chen): pa rnams kyis nam mkha' de la a ka ru nag po'i spos mngon par 'phrul ba'i sprin shin tu mtho ba las 'jug ska bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong ngo // mi 'am ci'i dbang po rnams
103b3(phal chen): kyis nam mkha' de la lha rdzas kyi ngag ldan pa'i rgyud kyis bstod pa'i rol mo brdung ba dang / bkrol ba dang / grur blang ba'i dbyangs thams cad sbyar cing blangs pa zos par gyur to// lto 'phye
103b4(phal chen): chen po'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la gos shin tu phra zhing mdog bzang po'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yid dga' bas bkye ste/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la dad cing mos pa'i
103b5(phal chen): gzugs su ltung ba mthong ngo // lAm yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' de la/ nor bu rin po che'i sbyin bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis brlabs te/ yon tan bas pa gyis mi khyab
103b6(phal chen): pa'i rgyun snang ba dang ldan par byas pa mthong ngo // nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mang po'ang mi'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs su 'khod cing / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i bu mos kun
103b7(phal chen): nas bskor te/ gsod pa med pa la dga' zhing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo // gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang
104a1(phal chen): nam mkha' de la shin tu mi sdug pa'i gzugs su dge slong shin tu brtan pa la byams pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'khod pa mthong ngo // srin po'i dbang po brgya stong/
104a2(phal chen): 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang / nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa yongs su srung ba byed cing kun tu chu ba mthong ngo // tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong bsam gyis mi
104a3(phal chen): khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la thal mo sbyar cing dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gi rgyud kyis bstod pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo // gnas gtsang ma'i lha brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang
104a4(phal chen): nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir/ thal mo sbyar cing gzhal med khang nas gnas pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis//
104a5(phal chen): dge slong shin tu brtan pa de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings la 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la thal mo
104a6(phal chen): sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas
104a7(phal chen): kyi chos btsal bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu bar
104b1(phal chen): dgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems sangs rgyas kyi chos bsten par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
104b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su brtul bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs
104b3(phal chen): su bsgom par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba dang /
104b4(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis zos na/
104b5(phal chen): 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos la nan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dang sgrol bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi
104b6(phal chen): 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i
104b7(phal chen): slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yongs su thob par bgyi ba'i srad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad dang mi 'bral/
105a1(phal chen): pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas yongs su mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams/
105a2(phal chen): cad yongs su dag par dgyi ba'i srad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam par
105a3(phal chen): dmigs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sprul lta bus srid pa'i rgyud thams cad du skye zhing shi 'pho ba'i
105a4(phal chen): skye mched rang gi lus kyis nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'dus byas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i slad du
105a5(phal chen): chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dus gsum gyi ye shes khong du chud cing rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ ye shes snang ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de bdag la bstan du gsol/
105a6(phal chen): de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong shin tu bstan pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces sbas so// de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag
105a7(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos dang / rang byung gi chos 'dri ba legs so legs so//
105b1(phal chen): nas kyi nul por byung chu ba sems dpa'i rnam par bar ba 'ogs pa med pa smrathob pa de/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bar bathogs pa med papa na don pos rdzas te/
105b2(phal chen): yongs su brdung nas rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dbyung pa dang / rnam par brtag pa dang / snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu snang bar byas pas thogs pa med par
105b3(phal chen): mthu nas bya ba'i ye shes snang bathob bo// de thob pas kho bos ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa khong du chud por bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad
105b4(phal chen): kyi skye ba dang shi 'pho yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// ston gyi gnas rjes su drad par bya ba'i sgor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do// phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba thams
105b5(phal chen): cad dang 'grogs par bya ba la thogs pa med do// da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'gro ba thams cad rnam par rig par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad dang kun rdzob
105b6(phal chen): yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tha dad pa khong du chud par bya ba la
105b7(phal chen): thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i dus su 'gro bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// nyir mtshar dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang
106a1(phal chen): zang cig dang / dus kyi ming du bya ba khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// dus gsum rgya mtsho'i rgyud du 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
106a2(phal chen): kyi zhing rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// de ni de ltar dngos po med pa la gnas shing ma ngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu
106a3(phal chen): dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul de'i byin gyis/ kho bo nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las phan tshun du 'gro zhing 'dug pa dang / skyes pa dang / spyod lam sna tshogs su
106a4(phal chen): spyod do// mi snang ba byed do// snang bar 'byung ngo // du ba 'thul bar byed do// me lce 'brar bar byed do// gcig tu byas shing mang por bsgyur ro// mang por byas shing gcig tu bsgyur
106a5(phal chen): ro// snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do// rtsig pa la'ang zags thogs med pa dang / ra ba la zags thogs med par 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin
106a6(phal chen): no// nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// sa la'ang byi'u zul dang steng du 'byung ba byed de/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no// chu la'
106a7(phal chen): 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no// du ba 'thul ba dang me lce 'bar bar byed de/ dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no// sa'ang yongs su g.yo bar byed do//
106b1(phal chen): nyim dang tha 'di gnyis de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar mthu che la/ de ltar gzi brjid che'ang lag pas kun nas yongs su byug go// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu'ang lus kyis dang skur ro//
106b2(phal chen): 'jig rten na spos kyi dud pa na phun du chags pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byas shing rab tu 'bar bar byed do// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyi dra bas 'jig rten kun nas khengs
106b3(phal chen): par byas shing 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed do// kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dra ba'i sprin rab tu bkye zhing phyogs kun tu 'ang 'gro ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs su'ang
106b4(phal chen): 'gre'o// lce phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang
106b5(phal chen): gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bra'i phyogs su'ang 'gre'o// sems kyi skad cig re re zhing yang shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams
106b6(phal chen): gnyis dang bcu'ang 'da' 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag spyod dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang 'jig rten
106b7(phal chen): gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang
107a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa
107a2(phal chen): dang 'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa dang /
107a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams mtshams med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang 'da' bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji
107a4(phal chen): snyed cig gzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes la/ 'dzi rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs de dang de dag
107a5(phal chen): drang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'du ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba de dang
107a6(phal chen): de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sgo de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal par bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
107a7(phal chen): kyi snying po byang chub rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig chos ston pa'i de bzhin
107b1(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sna tshogs dang / lus re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas
107b2(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs shing spyan sngar 'gro'o// de dag tu phyin nas kyang me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad
107b3(phal chen): dang phye ma thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / na bza' thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang lnga'i ba dan thams cad dang / bre re thams cad dang /
107b4(phal chen): dra ba thams cad dang / gzugs thams cad kyi mchod pa rgyun ma chad par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa dang / bstan pa dang / brjod
107b5(phal chen): pa dang / yang dag par bshad pa dang / yang dag par smos pa dang / yongs su brjod pa dang / man ngag tu gsungs pa dang / shin tu bstan pa dang / rab tu brjod pa
107b6(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang shes shing 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no// shar phyogs su ji lta
107b7(phal chen): ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
108a1(phal chen): nub byung gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu' 'da' 'o/
108a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams brgya nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang 'da' 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas
108a3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig gzugs shing 'tsho skyong la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa de dang de dag nas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
108a4(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag ni chos ston pa de dag kun kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la'ang me tog thams cad nas/ gzugs thams cad kyi bar gyis mchod pa byed do//
108a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa nas/ rab tu brjod pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang yongs su shes shing 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
108a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no// sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang / gang dang 'grogs par gyur pa de dag kun kyang bla na mang
108a7(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// sems can phra mo 'am/ rags pa 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ bde ba 'am/ mi bde ba gang ji snyed cig/
108b1(phal chen): lo las mthong bar gyur pa de dag kun la'ang yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'du ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ khong te de dag gi lus kyi tshad dang mnyam par lus byin
108b2(phal chen): gyis rlob bo// sems can ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu 'gro ba 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
108b3(phal chen): par thar pa rnam par gnon pa don yod pa la rab tu gzhog go// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba/ de bzhin gshegs
108b4(phal chen): pa'i mchod pa dang rim gro rab tu sbyor ba/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang 'thun pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i ngang
108b5(phal chen): tshul can theg pa chen po'i ngang tshul can byang chub sems dpa' lam dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ thogs pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i
108b6(phal chen): bsam pa'i snying po chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i ngang tshul can/ thams
108b7(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i nga tshul can/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can 'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/ chud mi gson
109a1(phal chen): pa'i nga tshul can/ ma nyams pa'i pha tshul can/ mgod pa'i ngang tshul can/ grags med pa'i ngang tshul can/ mu 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can
109a2(phal chen): rnyog pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'arjod pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnam par dag pa'i nga tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon
109a3(phal chen): tan brjod par rus raM skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer ces bya ba yo de/ de nu dra byi la sbyin ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan
109a4(phal chen): du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dag
109a5(phal chen): slong shin tu brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te yang dang yang du bltas nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i drung nas
109a6(phal chen): song ngo // // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs chos kyi dad pa'i shugs dang byin gyis non pa/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi
109a7(phal chen): gdung ma gcad pa la rab tu brtson pa/ dus gsum snang bas sems snang bar gyur pa/ smon lam chen po yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su
109b1(phal chen): bsla pa'i thabs la zhugs pa/ 'dus byas kyi dga' ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhi nges par rtogs par bya ba la brtson pa//
109b2(phal chen): 'jog rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su snang ba'i smon lam las mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa med par gnas pa/ chos kyi snang /
109b3(phal chen): brjes su dran par bya ba dang / dge ba'i ngo shes gnyen rjes su dran par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yongs su rjod pa byed cing / mthar gyis dra byi la'i grong rdal
109b4(phal chen): rdo rje'i grong khyer du byin nas/ dra byi la sprin yongs su tshul tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi khyams shig na chos bstan pa'i don du seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing / srog chags
109b5(phal chen): stong phrag bcu tsa mo zhig la/ chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba yongs su ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
109b6(phal chen): kyis/ dra bI la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dri byi la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar grayas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar
109b7(phal chen): nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa dog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
110a1(phal chen): par rtsi ba dang / sem ma na rgya dang / de ltar chu ma pa chud kyis sa med pa'i las rgyu bas pa dang mi 'tshal dang / ngi lar yos su spyo
110a2(phal chen): mchis shing bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar thub pa ma mchis shing lhag pa'i bsam pa 'os su dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yongs su skyob ma mchis shing spyod chen
110a3(phal chen): gro'i sobs yang dag par skye bar 'gyu ba dang / ji ltar sgo klan nas rnam par dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i rangab 'i ba nga sding pa rnam par 'thor zhing
110a4(phal chen): shes rab kyi 'od chos thams cad la rab rib ma mchis pa'i snang ba ste bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa la mkhas pa'i dbyas kyi dkyil
110a5(phal chen): 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing bdad pa yang dag par shes pa'i spobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sa su rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo po medad pa yang dag par 'dzin mi dran pa'i spobs
110a6(phal chen): ljongs su par gyur bdang / dI sgyu chos thams cad kyi phyogs rig pa'i snang bya rjes su rtogs shing ga pa'i spobs rnam pa dag par 'gyur bdang/ rjes byang chub sems
110a7(phal chen): kyi ma tsham khams cad bye rnam pa na ma sa tu ma tsun pas ba par
110b1(phal chen): dpa' la rim gror bya ba'i phyir seng gele khri de las langs te dbas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor b.rangs la lus thams cad kyis phyag byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gser kyi me tog gi
110b2(phal chen): phung pos mngon par gtor to// nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa mang po dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dam pas kyang mngon par gtor to// gos tshon sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas kha dog bskur ba bcu stong
110b3(phal chen): phrag du mas kyang mngon par bkab bo// spos kyi me tog kha dog rnam pa tha dad cing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug pa mang pos kyang mngon par gtor nas/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gis
110b4(phal chen): kyang mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang cher byas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces sbas so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
110b5(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
110b6(phal chen): gdung mi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba la brtson pa yin/ zhing gi rgyud thams cad yongs su dag par
110b7(phal chen): bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ sems can gyi rigs thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la sta gon du gnas pa yin/ chos kyi rigs thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du brtag
111a1(phal chen): pa la brtson pa yin/ las kyi rigs thams cad dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rigs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba
111a2(phal chen): la rab tu brtson pa yin/ smon lam gyi rigs thams cad rgyud mi gcad pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ dus gsum gyi rgyud thams cad ye shes kyis khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/
111a3(phal chen): mos pa'i rigs shin tu brtan par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gsheg pa dang po thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pa
111a4(phal chen): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa yin/ 'phags pa thams cad kyis rjes su dgyes par bya ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par dga' bar
111a5(phal chen): bya ba yin/ lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yongs su bsrung ba yin/ srin po'i dbang po thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa yin/
111a6(phal chen): klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsu ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa yin/ des ni sems
111a7(phal chen): can gyi khams thams cad kyang ngan song gi lam rgyud gsum po yongs su gcad pa dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad bzlog pa dang / dbul ba'i lam thams cad
111b1(phal chen): las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po mnyar
111b2(phal chen): pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems kyi yan lag yongs su dag par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
111b3(phal chen): lam snang ba thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par bya bas dbugs phyin par bya ba yin/ rigs
111b4(phal chen): kyi bu de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dka' ba byed pa de/ 'byung bar dka' zhing mthong bar dka' ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems
111b5(phal chen): can rnams la bag dro bar byed pas pa dang ma lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyun du gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis
111b6(phal chen): mnar ba rnams la sbubs su gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gnas su gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs
111b7(phal chen): pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la dpung gnyen du gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad ngan song gsum du lung ba las yongs su ston pa'i phyir rlung gi 'khor lo
112a1(phal chen): lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed ngas sa la du'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsod nams
112a2(phal chen): rin po che'i mdzod mi zad pa'i gtos dang ldan pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma lta bu'o// byang chub sems/
112a3(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho bas ri ra ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying po byang chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba 'char bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems
112a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pas dpa' bor gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang byung gi chos kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas rdul phod pa lta bu'o// byang chub
112a5(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag la byams pa'i rlan yongs su skems pas me lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi sprin rgya chen po'i char mngon par 'bebs pas
112a6(phal chen): sprin lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi dbang po dad pa la sogs pa'i myu gu rnam par 'phel bar byed pas char pa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos
112a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i 'gram yongs su ston pas mnyan pa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par sgrol ba'i phyir zam pa lta bu'o//
112b1(phal chen): byung chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bgrod par bya ba'i phyir mu stegs lta bu'o// de ltar na drabyil sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor b.rangs kyi bdun du 'dug ste
112b2(phal chen): rtsig gi rgyud de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngags pa byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la legs so zhes bsngags so// de wAr dris byang chub
112b3(phal chen): sems dpa' yang dag par dgara' bar bya ba'i tshig brjod pa'i tshe/ kha'i sgo nas 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam pa 'di la bu byung ste/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
112b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ lha dang / lha rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ klu dang / klu rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/
112b5(phal chen): dri za dang / drin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ lha ma yin dang / lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ nam mkha' lding dang / nam mkha' lding rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi 'am
112b6(phal chen): ci dang / mi 'am tsirdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang / lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi dang / mi rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi ma yin pa dang / mi ma
112b7(phal chen): yin pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ sems can gang sus mthong yang rung ste/ snang ba des yongs su snang bar byas pa de dag dra byi la spen
113a1(phal chen): kyi drung du 'ongs so// de nas de ltar dbyi la sprin gyis bsam pa byin gyis brlabs shing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa/ lus dang sems sim par gyur pa/ dga' ba
113a2(phal chen): rgyu chen po skyes pa/ sri zhu chen po la gnas pa// dargyal gyi rtsal mtshan bcom pa/ g.yo sgyu dang bral ba/ dbang po rnam par dang bar gyur pa de dag la dra b+hi la sprin gyis chos kyi rnam thas
113a3(phal chen): yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba de nyid rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/ khong du chud pa dang / rtogs pa dang / shes pa dang / rig par byas so// de zos nas kyang de dag thams cad bla
113a4(phal chen): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas de'i phyir chos kyi stan la 'dug nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras
113a5(phal chen): so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes so//
113a6(phal chen): de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i
113a7(phal chen): skad kyang shes so// lha rnams kyi lha'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
113b1(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po dang / mI dang / mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so// lnga rnams kyi lha'i skad gcig pa' shes so//
113b2(phal chen): de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / driH dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / me 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams
113b3(phal chen): kyi tshangs pa'i skad gcig pa'ang shes so// lha rnams kyi lha'i skad tha dad pa'ang shes so// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
113b4(phal chen): dang / mI 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i snyid tha dad pa'ang shes so// byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can
113b5(phal chen): rnams kyi badz+ra dang / skad dang / ming tha dad dra'ang shes so// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so// gshin rje'i 'jog rten pa'i sems
113b6(phal chen): can rnams kyi spyad dang ming rnams kyang shes so// 'phags pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so// 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so// byang chub sems
113b7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi tshib dang / brda dang / nges pa'i ngag sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba'ang shes so// sems kyi skad cig re pe la'ang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
114a1(phal chen): dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung rgya mtsho sems can thams cad kyi ming dang gtam gyi sgra dang tshig tu ldan pa'ang rtogs shing khong du chud do// ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen
114a2(phal chen): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can rnams kyi brda dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming rgya mtsho la 'jug cing shes pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
114a3(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/
114a4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / de bzhin du lce phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang
114a5(phal chen): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig bcwa stong tshad med pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang
114a6(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi brda dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug cing shes te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes
114a7(phal chen): so// tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyi bar du'ang shes so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ khe bos
114b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brda'i rnam pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi skad dang ming rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi ming shin tu
114b2(phal chen): bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brjod pa rab tu dkod pa dang / rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig thams cad kyi mtshams sbyar ba rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de
114b3(phal chen): dag dang / tshig lhur blangs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa thams cad dmigs pa gcig tu rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang
114b4(phal chen): tshig gis brtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gnyis nas brtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig rab tu phye ste bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang
114b5(phal chen): chos thams cad rab tu dbye bas 'dul ba'i tshul bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag
114b6(phal chen): pa'i rgyan thams cad la zhugs pa de ga dang / yi ga'i 'khor lo'i mthar phyin par bya bas rab tu dbye ba la byung ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song
114b7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu lnga phyogs kyi chung 'di' na/ yul nags tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ deran tshong dpon btang brjod ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji lar byang chub/
115a1(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'byung bar bya ba dang / ji ltar sems nges par gzhag par bya ba dris shig
115a2(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ drabyil sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi rim gro byas nas/ dad pa'i mtshan nyid rtsa ba tshugs pa la rab tu brtag pa dang /
115a3(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gtan las 'ongs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa 'di la yang dag par lta zhing gdong mchi mas gang bar ngus te/ drabyi la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang
115a4(phal chen): yang du bltas te phyag 'tshal zhing / dbyil sprin gyi drung nas song ngo // / bam po dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la
115a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i gzum snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa'i rgyan de 'di la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skad kyi tshul rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
115a6(phal chen): tshul phra mo la 'jug pa de nyid rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par byang bas rnam par dgu pa de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge
115a7(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags bsdu zhing bsgrub pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgo de nyid rnam par ltung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
115b1(phal chen): can bsdu ba'i ye shes de nyid shin tu byang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i stobs rnam par dag par bya ba de nyid brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag
115b2(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa'i stobs de nyid nye bar brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i rgyud de'ang yongs su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdon mi za bar dge bar
115b3(phal chen): bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam chen po de nyid mthar phyin par byed cing / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs yi dam la brtan cing smon lam gyi sems kyis yongs su skyo ba med pa'i
115b4(phal chen): rgyud kyi rgyan dang ldan pa phyir mi ldog pas rnam par gnon pa'i brtson 'grus can/ yid kyis brtul ba las mi zlogs pa/ dad pa mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i mthu
115b5(phal chen): bo ches mi byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag 'thun par len pa/ shes rab kha ma bab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sgo kun nas rnam par
115b6(phal chen): dag pa la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul thogs pa med pa/ kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba dang ldan pa/ sa'i gzungs kun nas snang ba rab tu thob pa/
115b7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyis kyi gzhi'i bye brag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhi kun la rten pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dmigs pa gnas med pa dang / bdag gi
116a1(phal chen): med pa dang gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul la rab tu brtson pa/ 'du shes thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi sgo rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi phyogs dang
116a2(phal chen): gzhi tha dad pa'i phyogs la so sor rtog pa med pa/ 'jig rten gyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos kyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs
116a3(phal chen): dang gzhi tha dad pa mthong ba dang rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba/ dus kyi phyogs dang gzhi'i bye brag khong du chud pa'i ye shes can/ chos kyi 'khor lo yid du 'ong bas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i blo
116a4(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ ye shes kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa snang bas sems gsal bar byas pa/ yid kyi lus yul kun dang ldan pa'i sa la zhugs pa/ de bzhin
116a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bas rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dad pa'i dba' rlabs kyi shugs kyis rab tu slob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i shugs
116a6(phal chen): dradang 'bral ba med pa/ de bzhin gshegs po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabyas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi sems kyi rgyud du khong du chud pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'jig
116a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i smon lam dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi lus su yang dag par bsdu ba dang / mngon par bsgrub pa
116b1(phal chen): la brtson pa de mthar gyis song song ste/ lo bcu gnyis kyis yul nags tshal na gnas par phyin nas/ des tshong dpon btang brjod de btsal btsal te mthong ngo // mthong
116b2(phal chen): nas kyang lus thams cad kyis phab ste/ phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag de ring dag pa'i bshes gnyen dang mjal
116b3(phal chen): bar gyur pa nI/ bdag gis 'thob par bgyi ba legs par thob bo// de co'i slad du zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni mthor bar dka' ba'o// 'byung bar dka' ba'o// 'jal bar dag
116b4(phal chen): ba'o/ 'grod par dka' ba'o// bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dka' ba'o// mnyes par bgyi ba dka' bu'o// 'grogs par dka' 'o// rim gror gyi ba dka' ba'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen
116b5(phal chen): rnams ni rjes su 'brang bar dka' ba lags no// de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes garten dang 'grogs pa de ring bdag gis thob par 'gyur to// 'phags pa bdag gis 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
116b6(phal chen): thams cad la bstan bkur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la rim blor bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs
116b7(phal chen): par bgyi dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon lam khong du chud par brtsi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam
117a1(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par dgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ye shes snang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi lus su
117a2(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrubs par gi spyod par mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon sum
117a3(phal chen): du rtogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos bstan pa mnyan pas mi ngoms par
117a4(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos bstan pa mnyan cing blang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas
117a5(phal chen): thams cad kyis chos bstan pa rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur
117a6(phal chen): bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang skal ba mnyam par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems
117a7(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems
117b1(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi gter dang mdzod mi zad pa'i ye shes snang ba 'thong/
117b2(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi gter dang mdzod khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod tshad med pa mngon par
117b3(phal chen): bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gtar dang mdzod sems na 'dul ba'i mthar phyin par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul
117b4(phal chen): pa'i gter dang mdzod rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang gi gter dang mdzod rang gi sems kyi dbang du bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
117b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gter dang mdzod rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'phags pa de lta
117b6(phal chen): bu'i sems kyis bdag 'dir mchis so// bsam pa de lta bu dang / yid la smon pa de lta bu dang / mngon par dga' ba de lta bu dang / sems pa de lta bu dang / gdon mi 'tshal bar
