117b7(phal chen): bsgrub par bsams pa de lta bu dang / spyod yul mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu dang / tshul khong du chud par bgyi ba la mos pa de lta bu dang / rnam par dag pa la gzhol ba de lta bu dang / rnam
118a1(phal chen): par dpyad pa'i bsam pa de lbu bu dang / rab tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang / dge ba'i sbyor ba de lta bu dang / mngon du gyur pa'i dbang po de lta bus
118a2(phal chen): bdag 'dir mchis te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su ston pa mdzad cing tshul ni nye bar ston pa mdzad/ rtogs par bgyi ba ni snang bar
118a3(phal chen): mdzad/ lam ni bstan par mdzad/ mu stegs la ni 'jog par mdzad/ chos kyi sgo ni rnam par 'byed par mdzad/ the tsom ni yongs su gcod par mdzad/ nem nur ni sel bar mdzad/
118a4(phal chen): yid gnyis kyi zug rngu ni 'byin par mdzad/ dogs pa'i dri ma ni sbyong bar mdzad/ sems kyi thibs po ni snang bar mdzad/ sems kyi dri mu ni yongs su sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi rgyud
118a5(phal chen): ni rab tu dang bar mdzad/ sems kyi g.yo sgyu ni yongs su sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi gdung ba ni yongs su sim par mdzad/ 'khor ba las ni sems rnam par bzlog par mdzad/ mi dge ba
118a6(phal chen): las ni phyir bzlog par mdzad/ sems can dmyal ba las ni ldog par mdzad/ gnas dang ni dbral bar mdzad/ mngon pa zhen pa las ni gyen du bskyod pa mdzad/ chags pa thams cad las ni yongs su 'grel pa mdzad/
118a7(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ni bsgrub pa mdzad/ chos kyi grong khyer du 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du ni mngon du gyur pa mdzad/ snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad/ byams
118b1(phal chen): pa chen po la ni rab tu gnog pa mdzad/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyor ba mdzad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgom pa la ni 'dzud pa mdzad/ rtogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo la/
118b2(phal chen): ni gnas par mdzad/ rang bzhin nges par rdzogs pa la ni gzhog pa mdzadzod/ sobs dang ldan pas ni khyab par mdzad/ 'gro ba thams cad mangs pa nyid du ni sems rnam par dbye ba man
118b3(phal chen): zhes zos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ ji ltar brjon par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa'i
118b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dge la bstan du gsol/ de nas tshong dpon btang brjod kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi ning thams
118b5(phal chen): cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya gsungs kyi so grong mtha' yas pa sngon du 'gro ba la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dang / de bzhi gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / 'jab dpal gnon dur
118b6(phal chen): zlarabs yang dag par bsams shing / ye shes snang nye bar bsgrubs pas snyoms par zhugs so// tshong dpon btang brjod de lar snyoms par thugs ma bag tu gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag
118b7(phal chen): pa rnam pa 'di la bu gnas par gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i tshul shin tu phra ba srid sa sa rgyas kyi ming yongs su
119a1(phal chen): dag pa dang bcas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/ 'od rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ sngon gyi spyod pa la bzhugs pa dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul
119a2(phal chen): pa dang bcas smon lam gyi tshogs dang bcas/ spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa dang bcas/ chos kyi 'khor lo
119a3(phal chen): shin tu ston pa dang bcas/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang bcas/ chos kyi mu'i mthar thugs pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khong su chud cing 'dus par snang ste/ de dag kyang phan
119a4(phal chen): tshun ma 'dres pa dang / phan tshun ma chod pa dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / tshul sna tshogs su bzhugs pa dang / yang dag
119a5(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dang /
119a6(phal chen): spangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs su yongs su ston par snang ngo // theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang / smon lam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang /
119a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang du skyes shing / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo // la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba
119b1(phal chen): dang / lA la n+ya ni sum gyi sun bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongs su ston pa dang / la la na ni skye ba dang / la lan ni byis pa'i rtsed mo son pa mdzad pa dang / la lan /
119b2(phal chen): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / la la nA ni mngon par 'byung ba dang / la lA na ni snying po byang chub tu gshegs te rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan chen pos bdud kyi sde pham par/
119b3(phal chen): mdzad pa dang / la la na ni lce dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zas yongs su bskor cing / tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa dang la
119b4(phal chen): la na ri chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa dang / la la na ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang / la lA nA ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams
119b5(phal chen): la la na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring bsrel rnam par 'god par snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la nA ni lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan
119b6(phal chen): gyis grub pa byed par snang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi ris rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam rnam
119b7(phal chen): pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi skye gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi
120a1(phal chen): rlung rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi mos pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i
120a2(phal chen): rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dus kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las kyi bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las mi mthun pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can
120a3(phal chen): gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa thu dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshul lam dang spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par spyod pa dang / sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha
120a4(phal chen): dad pa dang / dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bag chags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'byam klas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
120a5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa dang / yul sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrub pa dang / mdo sde sna
120a6(phal chen): tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi gzhung sna tshogs dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud
120a7(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrag pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa dang / dran pa sgo sna tshogs
120b1(phal chen): can shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i seng ge'i nga ro sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i mthu phyung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
120b2(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa mtha' yas par rnam pa tha dad pa phan tshun mchod pa dang / rnam par dgra pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs yangs pa dang / 'khor gyi
120b3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang / dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad brgya'i tshad tsam nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten
120b4(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi tshad tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /
120b5(phal chen): sgra skad thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas/ chos rdzi snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis zos so// blangs so// yang dag par bzung ngo // bsams so// sangs/
120b6(phal chen): rjes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon btang brjod dran zhing
120b7(phal chen): shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan
121a1(phal chen): ces bya ba yongs su blangs shing 'dzin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod pa'i tshe/ shar
121a2(phal chen): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang
121a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // lho phyogs
121a4(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba byang chub
121a5(phal chen): sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten khams
121a6(phal chen): spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar me'i rgyal po zhes bya ba / byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems
121a7(phal chen): la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig rgyal mtshan na/
121b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems/
121b2(phal chen): dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // byang shur gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khayas rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba na
121b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs spangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med par shin tu sprul pa la sogs pa/
121b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mag lam du snang ngo // shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba na
121b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi mar me zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la sogs pa/ byung
121b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang babs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i zer sngar snang ba na/ de bzhin
121b7(phal chen): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od kun nas 'phro bar gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba
122a1(phal chen): la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bangs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // nub byung gi yongs marnams kyi 'jig rten gyi hra/
122a2(phal chen): thos kyi rgyun yid du 'ong ba dge ba'i snying po nA/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi
122a3(phal chen): 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // 'og gi phyogs
122a4(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge snang zhing 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems
122a5(phal chen): dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'od 'phro zhing rnam par snang bar 'byung ba'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du
122a6(phal chen): snang ngo // steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyi 'od rnam par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan grags pa thogs
122a7(phal chen): pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
122b1(phal chen): la por mas da babs cis rnakhas pa'ang mag las snang // rigs kyi du pa de zhi ga shegs pa das la sogs pa/ rdzogs pa'i kyi pa
122b2(phal chen): som pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong yang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byod/ kho bo'ang der 'gro ba med de
122b3(phal chen): nam 'dod pa de bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtha' yas bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // tsan dan yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin
122b4(phal chen): gshegs pa 'od snang rdo rje bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin cher bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // pad+mo yod pa'i 'jig rten
122b5(phal chen): gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od sdang rin chen pacwo bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // gser yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo //
122b6(phal chen): mngon par dga' ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskul ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // shin tu brtan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bzhug
122b7(phal chen): pa'ang mthong ngo // me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // rin chen dpal gyi ngang pas brgyan pa'i 'jog
123a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar khe bos ni phyogs gang dang gang du/ 'jig rten gyi khams
123a2(phal chen): gang dang gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ngo // dus gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyod pa gang dang
123a3(phal chen): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi don dang / sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar
123a4(phal chen): 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gsheg pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin/ bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa
123a5(phal chen): rnams ga las kyang byon pa med par shes la/ rang gi lus kyang gar yang 'gro ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa'ang rmi lam lta bur shes la
123a6(phal chen): rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa'ang rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu bar shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa'ang gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par
123a7(phal chen): dmigs pa'ang chu'i snod gsal ba lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa'ang sgyu mas byas pa'i gzugs lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs
123b1(phal chen): pa'ang sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sla bstan ri'i zag cha lta bur brjod par shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa'ang snga bstan lta bur shes pas
123b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ngo zhes bya bar rjes su rtogs shing khong du chud do// sa sa rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
123b3(phal chen): thams cad kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pab ba rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi
123b4(phal chen): rlabs so// byang chub sems dpa'i sngon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so//
123b5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par rtse ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// chos
123b6(phal chen): kyi dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthu 'byung shing rnam par 'phrul pa'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// bskal pa thams cad shin tu phra bar bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang rang gi sems kyi sbyin
123b7(phal chen): byirlabs so zhes bye ba pa nga du chud cing rjem su rtogs so// rigs kyi bu de la lo bos 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mas cad kyis ni rang gi sems nyidadi ni par brtan par bya'o/
124a1(phal chen): chos kyi sprin gyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su brlan par bya'o// sgrib pa'i chos rnams las ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// brtson 'grus kyis ni rang gi sems
124a2(phal chen): nyid brtan par bya'o// bzod pas ni rang gi sems nyid mnyam par bya'o// ye shes khong du chud par bya ba la ni rang gi sems nyid gzhol bar bya'o// shes rab kyis ni rang gi sems nyid
124a3(phal chen): yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// dbang rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid la ni rang gi sems nyid rgyad par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs
124a4(phal chen): pa'i stobs bcus ni rang gi sems nyid snang bar bya'o snyam mo// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan 'di shes te/ blangs shing yongs su 'dzin
124a5(phal chen): par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chags pa med par rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du
124a6(phal chen): bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ gzhi
124a7(phal chen): kun nas phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par bkram pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul tha mi dad pa la rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad
124b1(phal chen): du mngon par phyogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ sprin phyogs med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig cing 'du bar snang yang
124b2(phal chen): de dag la bdag dang 'jig rten gyi khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skana?/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'dzam bu gling gi
124b3(phal chen): mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltam byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
124b4(phal chen): bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ tshong dpon btung brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la gyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon
124b5(phal chen): btang brjod la lan brgya stong du mar galus phyogs su bsor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dngon btang brjod kyi yon tan grangs med pa la snyan par rjod de brtag pa dang / mos par
124b6(phal chen): bya bra dang / mi btang bar bya ba sems shing dza ste/ smre sngags bton nas/ dge ba'i shes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / dge ba'i
124b7(phal chen): ba shes brten bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang / dge pa'i bshes gnyen gyis bgo ba dang mi 'gal bar byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadi dag pa'i bshes gnyen la rag lus par rjes sus
125a1(phal chen): ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rjes su bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes brten la g.yo sgyu med par spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya ba dang /
125a2(phal chen): ldan pas dge pa'i bshes garten rnams gnod pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed pas na ma du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su sdud pas btsam du sems shing tshong dpon patang brjod kyi
125a3(phal chen): drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi du ner bzlas/ tshong po ni btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjes su sems shing/ tshong dpon btang brjod kyi gdams ngag la nan tan
125a4(phal chen): byabye ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su dran par bya
125a5(phal chen): ba dang / chos kyi dbyis la 'jug cing 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab
125a6(phal chen): pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su blta bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
125a7(phal chen): mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan rjes su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa'i rnam par dgod pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam/
125b1(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa la yongs su brtag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pa dad pa la bsgribs pa med pa bsam gyis mi 'dra pa la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsam pa
125b2(phal chen): shin tu brtan pa de la nan tan du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las dang smon lam gyi rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su spyod cing / mthar gyis 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas
125b3(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol ba las 'chag pa'i gnas shig gi 'chags su'i mthar 'dug ste/ ting nge 'dzin la
125b4(phal chen): snyoms par gzhag nas/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med cing mi g.yo la/ byed pa med cing lus drang por bsrangs te dran pa mngon du byas nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab
125b5(phal chen): pas rnam par 'phrul zhing / g.yas g.yon dang steng logs su mtha' yas la/ tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/ kha dog du ma'i lus dang ldan pa/ sems
125b6(phal chen): kyi spyad cig re re la 'a dog rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa yongs su ston pa de/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab la zhi ste/ g.yo ba med cing dmigs pa med la/ dga' bas lus
125b7(phal chen): mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed pa byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // rnam
126a1(phal chen): par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi mdzod/
126a2(phal chen): pa sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan song gi lam thams cad yongs su
126a3(phal chen): gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i lam gyi sgo dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i
126a4(phal chen): sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyis thams cad rgyas par
126a5(phal chen): 'gengs shing / de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis nas tshong dpon gyi tshogs bkur sti dang rim gro sna tshogs byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/
126a6(phal chen): lhag pa'i yul la spyod pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu klubs pa/ thor tsugs dang / gtsug gi rin po che dang / cod pan sna tshogs thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra
126a7(phal chen): ba snyad byis pa bye ba 'phyes pa'i 'khor dang ldan par 'byung ba mthong ngo // bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang / ro'i yan lag sna tshogs su sbyar ba thams cad dang
126b1(phal chen): rgyun thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang
126b2(phal chen): rin po cha thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dngul po rnams yongs su sdud cing / 'gro
126b3(phal chen): ba sdug bsngal ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can gyi sems tshim par bya ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub tu yongs su
126b4(phal chen): smin par byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // pus me'i lhung gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bram ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten
126b5(phal chen): mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bcwo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig cen las 'das pa'i las kyi tshul dang /
126b6(phal chen): rgyus la gsal zhing mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten gyi slob dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs cha byad rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ dbyibs dang rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ yid du
126b7(phal chen): 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas yid mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing / chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can
127a1(phal chen): rnams bde bar bya ba dang / log par ltung ba'i sems can rnams mngon par gdon pa dang / theg pa'i gru la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs
127a2(phal chen): dbyung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun tu grag par bya ba dang / sdig pa las bzlog pa'i sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang / dge ba'i
127a3(phal chen): chos yang dag par blang ba la sems can gzud pa dang / don spyod pa la sems can dgod pa dang / dga' ba'i shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang / snyan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang //
127a4(phal chen): 'jig rten la don mthun par bsgrub pa ston par byed cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus dbyibs su
127a5(phal chen): 'khod pa/ pags pa dang / shun pa'i gos gyon pa/ ril pa thogs pa/ gzugs dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs sna tshogs can/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byung nas/ steng gi bar
127a6(phal chen): snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjod pa byed cing / chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su bstan pa dang
127a7(phal chen): tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / dbang po dben pa la sems can dgod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang / ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgod pa dang /
127b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang / mthar gyis bya ba'i las la sems can
127b2(phal chen): rab tu dgod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // rtsig logs gnyis nas klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa/ lus kyi dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa
127b3(phal chen): du dang ldan pa byung ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrul bra bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang / spos kyi sprin gyi rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog gi
127b4(phal chen): sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang / 'phreng ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rnam par grub pa dang / rin po
127b5(phal chen): che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su khebs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po
127b6(phal chen): che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i phyung phrul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che dam pa'i sprin gyi cha
127b7(phal chen): 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i se mo do sde tshogs dang me tog gi sprin gyi char bsas kyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i khri la skyil mo krung ngu 'khod pa'i byang chub sems
128a1(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lnga'i bu mo mang po chos kyi gru snyan
128a2(phal chen): pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char 'beb pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo ze ba mtho ba mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char rnam par 'thor ba
128a3(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
128a4(phal chen): lha'i lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i bu mo mang po'i lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te
128a5(phal chen): gsar gyi me tog snyoms pas 'thor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
128a6(phal chen): rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis rlob cing / spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / bdug spos kyi na bun dang / sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin
128a7(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad
128b1(phal chen): rab tu dgru' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas skad cig skad cig tu chos kyi dbyis thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bangs kyis mthong ngo // bong gA'i/
128b2(phal chen): dpal gyi be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phru ba snyed byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab parab tu ston cing // chu 'dzin
128b3(phal chen): chen po yongs su bskyam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod pa dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thob par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su bskyod pa dang /
128b4(phal chen): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon pa dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang / nga rgyal dang / rlob pa dang / dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod par sems
128b5(phal chen): pa'i sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang / mtho 'tsham pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtor
128b6(phal chen): bu dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'azab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dang / sdig pa las
128b7(phal chen): rkyen du bskyon pa dang / 'khor bas 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pa'i lam ci rgyud thams cad nas khyer du bsrong de gnas med pa la rab tu gnas par bya dang / byang chub kyi sems la sems
129a1(phal chen): can rnams rab tu 'god pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa
129a2(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang
129a3(phal chen): chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyis sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyan
129a4(phal chen): zothos drang rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la
129a5(phal chen): bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa yongs su rjod pa byed cing / rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can
129a6(phal chen): rnams la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la byams pa dang / gti mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rkyen las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rjod pa dang / cha mnyam pa'i
129a7(phal chen): spyod pa can rnams la ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang / yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang / zhi ba la gnas
129b1(phal chen): su sems pa rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang sgo thams cad sems can tham cad kyi don du rjod pa
129b2(phal chen): byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // phrag pa'i lhun gnyis las gnod sbyin dang srin po'i dbang po dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing
129b3(phal chen): lus mi sdug pa dang / khwa dog dang chu zheng sna tshogs can/ spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ gzhon pa sna tshogs la zhon pa/ 'khor sna tshogs kyis yongs su
129b4(phal chen): bskor ba/ sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa/ dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
129b5(phal chen): grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs shing / dge ba'i
129b6(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / lag na rdo rje'i las kyis
129b7(phal chen): yong dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba dang / sems can log par lhung ba rnams kyi ngan
130a1(phal chen): song gi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i don du brtson pa dang /
130a2(phal chen): sems can gyi don bya bas 'jig rten yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa rnams bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang
130a3(phal chen): phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor tshar gcod pa byed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'grengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // mdun gyi lto nas mi 'am ci'i dbang
130a4(phal chen): po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang / dri za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin
130a5(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dag byung nas lha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i sgra snun pa dang / klu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i
130a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi bstod brjod pa byed cing / byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i
130a7(phal chen): sgo thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las
130b1(phal chen): 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs nas kyi bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
130b2(phal chen): kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang / sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sna
130b3(phal chen): thams cad yongs su skyed pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // kha'i sgo nus 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing /
130b4(phal chen): stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas/ sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su btang ba dang / nor bu rin
130b5(phal chen): po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang / dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / byams pa'i sems la sems can rab tu
130b6(phal chen): dgod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang rab tu dbral ba dang / rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su btang ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam
130b7(phal chen): par bzlog pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / brdzun du sba ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / bslu ba med pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog
131a1(phal chen): pa dang / gzhan 'dum par brtson pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu/
131a2(phal chen): brjod pa dang / gnod pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / don zab mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba la yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngag gi
131a3(phal chen): nyes thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi snying gi dri mo yongs su sel cing 'dod pa chung ba dang / cho ga shes pa la
131a4(phal chen): brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / lta ba'i dra ba thams cad
131a5(phal chen): las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang / yid gnyis kyi ra ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang / the tsom gyi spo thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / nem nur dang som nyi'i rab rib yongs su bsal ba
131a6(phal chen): chos rnam par dbye ba 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang / rkyen las byung ba rab tu rjod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
131a7(phal chen): bzlog pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshog rjod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon
131b1(phal chen): dra nor ba surgyas mthong ngo // mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stongs ngas rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung / sems can dmyal ba chen po
131b2(phal chen): thams cad yongs su snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang / sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi rab rib sel ba dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i/
131b3(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi grang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ong kha dog dkar po can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od
131b4(phal chen): pred+hAR+Ya'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can
131b5(phal chen): rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tigagra dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed
131b6(phal chen): pa dang / asma glar ba'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od asma gar ba'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
131b7(phal chen): in+da nI la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i stong po'i rog can rab tu 'byed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal ponyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi ning rnams su 'od rin po che
132a1(phal chen): in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po rna ba'i 'od zer gyi drang dang dkyil 'khor gyi snying pogi bdog
132a2(phal chen): can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig
132a3(phal chen): gri rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
132a4(phal chen): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'grengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo //
132a5(phal chen): smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i
132a6(phal chen): dga' pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags par byed cing / sems can tshad med pa gdul ba la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs
132a7(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // dpral ba nas tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su brjod de sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol
132b1(phal chen): bad bapa pa dang / byang du ba sems dpa' thams cad rab tudaga' bar bya ba byed cing sems can gyi don tshud med pa la brtson par phyogs panA chos kyi dbyings rgyas dang shes pa/ dong por rgya du
132b2(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // mgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed byung nas/ kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs kyis brtan pa'i sus yongs su ston
132b3(phal chen): cing dpe byad dang pos rnam par bres pa'i lus rab tu bstan pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mtha' dang dbus med parab tu dbye ba dang / ba spu'i bu gzims cad nas sa sa rgyas thams cad kyi sngon
132b4(phal chen): kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste gtong ba dang / len pa dang / dngos po yongs su gtang ba'i rnam pa'o sprin mang po rab tu dgye ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i
132b5(phal chen): sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du yongs su brjod pa dang / ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang / chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems
132b6(phal chen): can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
132b7(phal chen): mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yongs su yang dag par brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan pa byung ba'i rgyu ston pa byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
133a1(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu thu ba skyed byung nas/ tshul khrims kyi rol 'dzin payos su brjod cing / dA kru'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams da kyi tshul
133a2(phal chen): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya ma yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can thams can lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te de bzhin gshegs
133a3(phal chen): pa'i yul la mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par spad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling dag rnam par gsal ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu ni
133a4(phal chen): bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu thob par
133a5(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmi lam lta bur sems can rnams la rab tu brjod cing / rmi lam gyi
133a6(phal chen): tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa la dbang sgyur ba sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
133a7(phal chen): kyi ning grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ 'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi khe dog lta bu mngon par ston cing khro ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / shar gnyer ba med pa dang /
133b1(phal chen): ge mang babyed pa dang / chud gsod pa myed pa dang / long khro ba med du'i sems la sems can ba spyod pa dang / byol srong shrI smye gargyas kyi rgya khams cad yongs su bcod pa'i myi
133b2(phal chen): baspu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i sprin rab tu 'byed cing bzod du'i stobs la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chos la dadang /
133b3(phal chen): gyur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi spongs
133b4(phal chen): mtha' yas pa shin tu ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su btsal bas mi skyo bar bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhind gsheg
133b5(phal chen): pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba la sems can rab tu gzung pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus chen po lo sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / brtson 'grus
133b6(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab tu 'gyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa
133b7(phal chen): dang sems can rnams kyi le lo'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu byin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / las la dbang sgyur ba la 'jig rten rab tu gzung pa
134a1(phal chen): dang rgyun mi 'chad pa brtson par byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sa sa rgyas kyi zhing zangs med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'/
134a2(phal chen): rnams kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la sems can thams cad rab tu dpod cing sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang rab rib thams cad rnam par gsam pa dang / rlom pa dang dgra med pa thams cad las
134a3(phal chen): sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang / khengs pa 'gying ba dang nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu gzhom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyi yan
134a4(phal chen): lag rgya mtsho brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
134a5(phal chen): ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / sems can la dbang sgyur ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo //
134a6(phal chen): yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snying byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba
134a7(phal chen): mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang / yang dag par lta ba'i glog rab tu 'gyed/
134b1(phal chen): pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi snga dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i ri'i lhan rab tu gzhig pa dang / lta ba bsus cu drug rngu rdubyung ba dang /
134b2(phal chen): tsom dang / yid gnyis dang / nam nur gyi rab rib rnam par bsal ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
134b3(phal chen): 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad byung nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor
134b4(phal chen): rab tu rjod pa byed cing / baspu'i bu ga thams cad nas zangs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la thabs ma ngas pa'i spyod du 'ab
134b5(phal chen): tu brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa tha mi dad pa'i
134b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sem pas rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la byang chub
134b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
135a1(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'jug sgra sgrog cing / bsru'i bug
135a2(phal chen): thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dbye ba dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
135a3(phal chen): yang dag par bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i shing cu'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha'i mu thug par 'dril ba/ chos
135a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa/ mi shes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba 'jig rten du rab tu rjod pa byed cing smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas/
135a5(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
135a6(phal chen): stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu byung ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon
135a7(phal chen): gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdib kyang
135b1(phal chen): minyam pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / bskal pas 'tshig pa thams cad kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
135b2(phal chen): khams 'byam klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mtha'i dbyings su ston pa'i stobs yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings 'ge rgyun mi gcod pa
135b3(phal chen): mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing / nga spu'i bu ga thams cad nas
135b4(phal chen): ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu 'gyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dang ye shes mngon par shes
135b5(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bstan pa dang / sngon lam thams cad mngon par
135b6(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yongs su brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes
135b7(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bdag med pa'i rang bzhin la gzud pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang /
136a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par blta ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par
136a2(phal chen): dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rab tu dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa dang mos pa rnam par blta'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
136a3(phal chen): kyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dgrol ba dang sems can thams
136a4(phal chen): cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa
136a5(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu ror bzangs kyis mthong ngo // spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gse ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mtshan dam pa dang
136a6(phal chen): dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur sba zhing tshad med par 'bar ba dang / chos kyi dbyings
136a7(phal chen): tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la tha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par
136b1(phal chen): 'bebs pa ste/ 'di ltar snying po byangaduchub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag mngon sub tu shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mdzod/
136b2(phal chen): par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la gzhi kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos
136b3(phal chen): chen po'i rdul tshab tu dbang bskur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa
136b4(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbadang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byung
136b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon
136b6(phal chen): gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yongs su sdud pas kun nus brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus gsum gyi de bzhin
136b7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sngon ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang
137a1(phal chen): bzhin dang gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang thabs kyi snying
137a2(phal chen): po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu bsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos
137a3(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyi dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi
137a4(phal chen): sprin gyi char mngon par dbang pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i ris
137a5(phal chen): kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i
137a6(phal chen): mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs shes bya
137a7(phal chen): ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes kyi rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha
137b1(phal chen): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smod lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos ni sprin mi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
137b2(phal chen): rjes su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya bya'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbang pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga'i shugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
137b3(phal chen): cha min par da pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon
137b4(phal chen): par dbang pa dang / dri za'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes
137b5(phal chen): kyi tshul rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i thabs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi
137b6(phal chen): sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbang pa dang / klu'i dbang po'i
137b7(phal chen): gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba skyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i gnas su
138a1(phal chen): dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa'i/
138a2(phal chen): ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang 'phags pa'i lam
138a3(phal chen): gyi tshig rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba med pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
138a4(phal chen): rjes su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/
138a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can log par lhung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas dbugs
138a6(phal chen): dbyung ba'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab par mdzad cing / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams
138a7(phal chen): cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor kha dog dang gzugs kyi glong dang rgyan grangs med pa can/ dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med pa la sta gon du gnas pa/ sangs
138b1(phal chen): rnas kyi zhing byangs med du'i rnal shin sum pa snyed byung nas phyogasu bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste / 'di lhur bsgyu'i sgo'i 'od zer bying ba dang kyil 'khor la la las ni
138b2(phal chen): sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i drangab dang dkyil 'khyor la la las ni/ dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa'
138b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / yi dam dang / tshul gyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la lnga las ni/ byang chub
138b4(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam pa dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rkang lag dang yan lag gi dam pa bcad kyang / nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul
138b5(phal chen): ba dang / khu tshur dang dbyigs pas bsdun je mtshon gyis lus la btab kyang / rnams su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad gshegs sam snying dang mig byung yang / nyams su
138b6(phal chen): bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du byung ba rnam par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid yongs su btsal ba'i
138b7(phal chen): ched du lus dang sems la gnod pa thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyams su bzod par byas pa dang / bag la zha bar byas pa dang
139a1(phal chen): / btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo // baspu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang
139a2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa rnam pa bdud pa rnam par bya ba'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdas pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang
139a3(phal chen): da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang / rgya mtsho yongs su bskyam pa dang / sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang / mu sngags can thams
139a4(phal chen): cad yongs su tshar gcad pa dang / bdud thams cad spa bkong ba dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer
139a5(phal chen): gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang / lus nye bar len pa ji snyed pa dang / rigs su skye ba
139a6(phal chen): yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bstan pa yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
139a7(phal chen): gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba gnas ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang mthun pa'i gtsug lag dang / gnas dang / gzhal
139b1(phal chen): meda'ang dang / yul dang / ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs su bsgrubs pa'i drang srong gi lus ji skad pa dang / rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed pa dang
139b2(phal chen): 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / yi ma dang / tshul dang / spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis ma'o
139b3(phal chen): rab spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la lA las nr-i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing / chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus
139b4(phal chen): yongs su bzung ba mthong ste/ lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig gi don du'ang bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang / rim gro dang bku
139b5(phal chen): sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang / dad pa dang sri zhus lus rab tu btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongs su btsal ba dang / chos kyi
139b6(phal chen): tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/ 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyis yongs su
139b7(phal chen): btsal ba de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi ba spu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni
140a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byam klas pas sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i
140a2(phal chen): sbyor ba mthong ngo // sems can re re la'ang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo sngon gyi lus nye bar blangs pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su sdud
140a3(phal chen): pa'ang ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa thams cad du smon lam
140a4(phal chen): mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lar mngon par bsgrub
140a5(phal chen): pa mdzad pa ji snyed pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji skad cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad las 'khor ba'i skyon so se re
140a6(phal chen): gnyen por mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu ror bzangs kyis ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor
140a7(phal chen): la la las ni/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam
140b1(phal chen): bcu bams cad dang ldan pa mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngor gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar bya'o// de nas tshong dpon tri banor pangs
140b2(phal chen): dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de lar mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par bar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su drar par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dnga'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
140b3(phal chen): thu mchog ses bu phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par ngasas pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / mngon par 'dubya ba'i sgo cung kun la mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su
140b4(phal chen): 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnon pa'i ye shes de la 'ang tu
140b5(phal chen): brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi stobs de yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon lam gyi stobs de brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs/
140b6(phal chen): de shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig kyang len no// nyin zhag gnyis dang bdun yang lon no// zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig dang
140b7(phal chen): zla ba gnyis dang / zla ba drug gi bar dang / nyin zhag kyang drug tu/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du lon te/ de ltar tha ba drug dang nyin zhag drug 'das nas dge slong
141a1(phal chen): mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las langs so// denas nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ daphags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar drang la de lar rgya che ning
141a2(phal chen): de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i lus dang ldan pa dang / de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyun dang ldan
141a3(phal chen): pa dang / de ltar mi 'phrogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can
141a4(phal chen): gyi don tshad ma mchis pa rab tu sgrub par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar te/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar
141a5(phal chen): dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so// sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun gcad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su bskyab pa dang
141a6(phal chen): mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad gcad pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam gyi rgyud du phyin par bgyi ba dang / lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi yul
141a7(phal chen): gyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba dang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yongs su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su bstan pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o//
141b1(phal chen): byang chub kyi sems 'ang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa la spya gon du gnas pa'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rnarnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / snying rje/
141b2(phal chen): chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / smon lam chen po'i stobs yongs su bskyed par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu thob par bgyi ba
141b3(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing sdang bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub
141b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / thams
141b5(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnon pa la thogs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa'o// 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu shes
141b6(phal chen): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yongs su thob pa zhes bya ba yod du/ ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang ba ste/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'o// rigs kyi
141b7(phal chen): bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu bsgoms na/ sgo kun nas
142a1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya skyong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// spras pa/ 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i
142a2(phal chen): yul der bas sam pa bas/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams su
142a3(phal chen): 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnon pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams
142a4(phal chen): yongs su sbyang ba la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas blta zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs
142a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brtag pa la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la
142a6(phal chen): thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor
142a7(phal chen): lo 'khor ba ma 'dres pa shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// phyogs bcur
142b1(phal chen): 'jug cing rjes smra grang bar bya ba la logs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjes su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su dag par bya byal sogs pa med do//
142b2(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang ba la thogs pa med do// byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya bya la thogs
142b3(phal chen): pa med do// sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do//
142b4(phal chen): sems can gyi dbang po tha dad pa thams cad shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes
142b5(phal chen): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la blo gros rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la rig pa rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes can/ blo shin tu
142b6(phal chen): yangs pas tshad med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzungs chen po'i snang ba la dbang sgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par
142b7(phal chen): 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu 'byung ba/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ ngag snyan pa sa'i snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi
143a1(phal chen): rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ spyod yul bstan pa 'am/ yul rab tu brjod pa 'am/ smon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par
143a2(phal chen): bsngags pa 'am/ 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su sdang bar bya ba 'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa mngon par brjod pa 'am/ lam yongs su bstan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang bar/
143a3(phal chen): bya ba 'am/ sems kyi yul shes par bya ba 'am/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya bar nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par
143a4(phal chen): rlob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bzang shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig/ grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i shar phyogs logs na yid de/ de na shed las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'od bzangs kyi
143a5(phal chen): chung ma dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig
143a6(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan las snying po yongs su grangs te/ chos kyi nye bar
143a7(phal chen): 'tsho bar byas nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/ snang ba thob pa/ ye shes snang bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mos pa rnam par dag pas khong du chud pa
143b1(phal chen): sems can chos kyi tshul gyi snang ba'i rjes su song ba/ rnam par dag pa'i spos snang dang ldan par gyur pa/ phyogs su ye shes kyi snang b.rab tu 'dal ba des/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshad kyi
143b2(phal chen): nang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la badzud de phyag 'tshal nas yang dang yang la zhing / yang dang yang
143b3(phal chen): mngon par lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / rab tu gdud pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / rim gror d+ha ba dang / yid la bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom
143b4(phal chen): pa dang / legs par brjod pa dang / ngo mtshar du bya ba dang / yon tan mngon du bya ba dang / rjes su bsngags pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su dran par bya ba dang
143b5(phal chen): brtan par bya ba dang / mi gtang ba dang / yid la bsams pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / sngon lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / mthong bar dga' ba dang / dbyangs kyi mtshan
143b6(phal chen): ma gzung ba dang / gzungs kyi rjes su bsum pa dang / ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ye shes
143b7(phal chen): kyi yul rjes su bsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rje su 'jug par bya ba dang / smon lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul rnam par dpyad par bya ba dang /
144a1(phal chen): ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su gzung ba byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung nus song ngo // dam po dgu bcu nyis pa/
144a2(phal chen): 6/ de nas tshod pon ci nor drangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan gyis nim nu/ dge ba'i bshes pa nyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btung dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du brdas
144a3(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la ni nan tan du byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba ni rjes su sems dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas can du lta
144a4(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la rjes su lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni
144a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas nam mkha' blta ba la mig tsam du lta zhing mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa'i bza' shing gi rang kun nas rnam par brgyan pa ga na ba der phyin nas des mthong ba
144a6(phal chen): bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa rin po che thams cad kyi ra bas kun nas bskor ba rin po che'i shing gi 'phreng ba spel legs pas yongs su brgyan pa rin po che thams
144a7(phal chen): cad kyi shing gi 'phreng ba'i me tog srang bu yid du 'ong ba'i sprin rab tu 'phrul pas gzhi rgyas pa rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis yang dag par brgyan pa/ shing thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa
144b1(phal chen): sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba/ spyos sna tshogs kyi shing gi 'greng ba las phyogs kun tu spros kyi dang rnas pa/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i shing sna tshogs kyi spun las rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba
144b2(phal chen): 'byung ba rab tu 'byung zhing char ltar mngon par 'dab pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing bahral rgya cher brgyan pa'i gzhi can yid
144b3(phal chen): bzhin gyis gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gram yo khebus shing mdzes par brgyan pa/ sil snyan gyi shing thams cad las lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil
144b4(phal chen): snyan rlung gis bskyod cing sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba/ sa'i gzhi mtho dman med par gnas pa/ rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas rgyan du 'byung zhing 'phyang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan
144b5(phal chen): dang ldan pa mthong ste/ bza' shing gau ra ba chen po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na/ khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun kyang nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /
144b6(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gri gser las brtsegs pa'i pad+ma dang ldan pa dang / gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcu ka gdung rin po che rnam par snang ba las bres pa dang
144b7(phal chen): rdzing bu rgya stong phrag bcu rin po ma thams cad las gozhi grangs te rin po che sna tshogs kyi pa gus mu zhud byas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi them skas btags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi sngags rus
145a1(phal chen): bskor ba lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ gser gyi bye ma kun tu gram pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che chu 'dang kun tu bkram pa phyogs bzhi
145a2(phal chen): nas them smras rnam par bris pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ ngang ngur dang / rmA byA dang / khu byug dang / khrung khrung dang / kA la bing ka dang / kun la'i sgra skad
145a3(phal chen): snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gsar gyi dril bu'i dru bas kun nas yog pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ stang
145a4(phal chen): nas rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ra bas yongs su bskor ba/ rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan lags par bsgreng ba/ lu ma brgya stong phrag
