145a5(phal chen): bcu dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dran gyi 'dam gyis mtha' 'khor ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa'i pad+mos yongs su khyab pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo'i 'od chen pos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri
145a6(phal chen): ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba sa'i gzhi rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las blangs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i ka pra
145a7(phal chen): bkye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phags pa/ nor bu rin po che 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas brgyan pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar bzangs med pa'i drabs bris
145b1(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po mi 'byung ba'i spos kyi ngos gam yo kun nas bdugs pa/ rin po che'i rnas po smra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri'i kun tu ltung ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam par/
145b2(phal chen): gsal bar byed pas dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing / gzhal med 'ang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs der spyan grangs med cing tshad med pa btong bar gyur pa 'di lnga
145b3(phal chen): sde pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar phyed pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po chu rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'gro ba yid
145b4(phal chen): du 'ong ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i shing thags kyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i pad+mo'i
145b5(phal chen): snying po can dang / nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'od kyi rgyan gyi pad+ma'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin
145b6(phal chen): po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag/
145b7(phal chen): bshams shing bting ba sti/ gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i bgom mang po'ang rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa
146a1(phal chen): kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzes shing gzugs yid du 'ong ba dgra go// bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa de steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas
146a2(phal chen): khebs pa ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang / 'khri shing gi bla re dang / me tog gi bla re dang / 'phreng ba'i blu re dang / spos kyi bu re dang / nor bu rin po che'i tha re dang / gsar gyi
146a3(phal chen): bla re dang / rgyan gyi bla re dang / rin po che'i rdo rje snang ba'i bla ra dang / glang po shugs dang ldan pas sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang /
146a4(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa bu re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par byas pa'o// rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun+da nAs yog pa ste/ 'di ltar rin po che dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang
146a5(phal chen): rin po che'i gdugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba dang / mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra bya dang / nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya sngon po'i dra ba dang / seng ge'i khri shing gi dra ba dang / nor bu rin
146a6(phal chen): po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po tsha'i cod pan+da dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i dra dr-ing / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas
146a7(phal chen): yog pa'o// sdang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor
146b1(phal chen): bu rin po che rtsu ba'i rnal mdzan gyi snang ba dang / nor burin po che spos kyi drung pa 'od 'gro ba'i snang ba dang / nor du rin po che pal myi snying po'i snang ba dang / nor du rin po che bad+mo'i snying po'i sngang
146b2(phal chen): bu dang / nor bu rin po chu skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i sdang ba dang / nor bu ran
146b3(phal chen): po che spos kyi sprin chen po'i snang ba dang / grog gi 'bring ba 'byung ba'i snang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtag tu snang bar byas pa'o//
146b4(phal chen): bza' shing gi ra ba dri ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshor 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba/ lha rdzas
146b5(phal chen): las 'das pa'i 'phreng ba dang lnga ldi'i sprin chen po kun tu mched pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos tshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i stong phrag stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pa/
146b6(phal chen): lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klubs pa/ lnga'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu mthong bar dga' ste 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa
146b7(phal chen): mo'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pas rang rang gi lus 'dul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu chos mnyan pas skom
147a1(phal chen): 'ang dong ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa ste / de ni dge bsnyen pa yi bzhin gser gyi snying po khri chen po la bdug rnying mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i rlabs brgyan pa'i
147a2(phal chen): rjod pan thogs pa dag pa la b+ha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rtun dang gdu bu bogs pa lag pa nor dun po che dngal gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par mdzes par gyur pa/ rna Na
147a3(phal chen): rin po che mthor mthing dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba mgo nor bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzes par brgyan pa / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa nor bu rin po che yid
147a4(phal chen): bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal po'i mgul 'khor thogs pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar ba/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tu btud de phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste
147a5(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de'i drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan nam tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am dbang byed dam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris
147a6(phal chen): su gtogs pa 'am/ rab 'phrul dga' ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab dga' ldan nam dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am rab mtshe ma 'am/
147a7(phal chen): mtshe ma'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i
147b1(phal chen): phung po yA/ rnaM d+ha dam/ thul bram ni dbang po 'am/ thul bum mas/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ klu bas/ la ma yin gyi dbang po 'ang/ lha ma yin nas
147b2(phal chen): rnam papa' lding gi dbang po 'am nam ma' rdzing ma/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am 'argya chen po'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gshin
147b3(phal chen): rjernam gshin+da rje'i bu mo 'am/ yi dgras rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ mi'i dbang po 'am/ mi'ang rung ste/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dgra
147b4(phal chen): 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lce nub kyi
147b5(phal chen): phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang / tshangs pa chen po bam/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su
147b6(phal chen): gtogs pa 'am dbang byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas/ me'i dbang po 'am/ mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong ba de dag nad sna tshogs shig gis btab
147b7(phal chen): bam nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen tam/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang / de dag gis
148a1(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de mthong ma thag tu nad thams cad kyang rab tu ni bar 'gyur/ sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur/ lta ba'i gsal shing yang /
148a2(phal chen): phyin par 'gyur/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par shigs par 'gyur/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ba sgribs pa med pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyis
148a3(phal chen): 'khor de yod pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab tu byung bar 'gyur/ dbang po'i myu gu thams cad kyang rnams par 'phel bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la'ang
148a4(phal chen): yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon sum du 'gyur/ smon lam
148a5(phal chen): gyi sgo thams cad kyang yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ spyod pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ yon tan mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/
148a6(phal chen): sems rgya chen po'ang mngon par shes po thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad du rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas
148a7(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na
148b1(phal chen): ba der song sa phyin nas dge bsten ma yid bzhin gyi nang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen pa yid bzhin la lan brgya sdong du mar g.yas phyogs su bkor babyas nas 'di skad ces/
148b2(phal chen): smras so// raphags ma bdag gis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskrad na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la sgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji lam
148b3(phal chen): nan tan du bgyi ba 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
148b4(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan
148b5(phal chen): med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o// mnyan na don yod pa'o// rim gror byas pa don yod pa'o// gnas gcig na 'grogs bdon
148b6(phal chen): yod pa'o// rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa yang dag par rdzogs
148b7(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho mo mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ sems can rnams kyang tha na med pa
149a1(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu le mo'i drung du shar phyogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra byon cing gangan
149a2(phal chen): rin po che'i khri 'di la bzhugs nas chos ston to// shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du/ phyogs bcu nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngo
149a3(phal chen): ba dang mi 'bral ba'o// chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa mi 'bral ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo dang spyod pa'i skul ba mnyam pa'i srog chags
149a4(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
149a5(phal chen): phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go// rig kyi bu sems can gzhan gang 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du
149a6(phal chen): gtogs pa sha stag ste/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dag go// smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid cig nas thugs
149a7(phal chen): bskyed/ spras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar med mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs
149b1(phal chen): badrod drung du ngo mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa smad do// de bzhin gshegs pa de kho sro mchod do// de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin
149b2(phal chen): gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la'ang kho mo rab tu byung ngo // chos kyi 'khor lo'ang kho mos bzung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa dngal zhes byang byung sa
149b3(phal chen): de'ang kho mos bsnyen bkur to// de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs
149b4(phal chen): pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i
149b5(phal chen): snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu gzhung de ltar tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang
149b6(phal chen): bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dab chags su bsams te dran par byas nas/ gang kho mos rim gror byas te
149b7(phal chen): bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / gang gi spyan sngar kho mos chos thos par gyur pa dang / gang gi bstan pa la kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa
150a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ba snyeng rjes su dran te/ rigs kyi bu de phan cad du kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba
150a2(phal chen): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o//
150a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khongs su 'gro ba thams cad chud pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu spon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings
150a4(phal chen): kyi gzhi zad zad du 'gro bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu khyams pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
150a5(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing thams cad du bskul pa thams cad yongs su sdud pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad
150a6(phal chen): med pa'o// rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs
150a7(phal chen): kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khong du chud par byed pos/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu ye shes snang ba'i stobs
150b1(phal chen): kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul khong du chud par byed cing yang dag par 'dzin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis
150b2(phal chen): zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi
150b3(phal chen): bu tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs kyi tshig gcig brjod kyang / 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu lus
150b4(phal chen): rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod
150b5(phal chen): ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ r-ig kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sems can gcig cig la dmigs shing gdul bar
150b6(phal chen): bya ba dang smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/ sems can brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems
150b7(phal chen): can brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems cad bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi
151a1(phal chen): phyir ma yin te/ sems cad bye ba zhag khrig bcu phrag stong gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tuskye bu ma yin no// sems can
151a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can gang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can pan bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byur phyar gyi phyir ma
151a3(phal chen): yin/ sems can byang bying gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyal byol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
151a4(phal chen): ldang lhod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod zim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyad phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ltar ldem gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ya gangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sem
151a5(phal chen): can cho ma'i phyir ma yin/ sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nab nub kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgyud yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yin//
151a6(phal chen): sems can bkra yar gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsdu yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gzhal brtag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtshungs mud kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam
151a7(phal chen): lum gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rab rib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zab thib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'grib yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zin 'phyo'i phyir ma
151b1(phal chen): yin sems can bsam phyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'du mnyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can drang breng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrod yas kyi phyir mA lir
151b2(phal chen): sems can rgyal 'dul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems n+dan bsngo yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can+da rbang yag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phro bkye'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
151b3(phal chen): rtse 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yod zan gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can drug g.yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can srang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thing yug gi
151b4(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nan pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yid 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dadren ba kyi phyir ma yin/
151b5(phal chen): sems can khrig thams kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi drir mu yin/ sems can zug yal gyi phyir ma yin// sems can yang
151b6(phal chen): yud kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyo ldog gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhub pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can zag zug gi phyir ma yin/ sems
151b7(phal chen): can khrig ge'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rig yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snod med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mchog 'phreng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir ma
152a1(phal chen): yin sems can spu 'phyes kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod bros kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhong yas kyi phyir
152a2(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can brjod phul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zhi snyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dag thim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems
152a3(phal chen): can nyar nyer gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can zal zul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sa la sal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can g.yo ldeg gi
152a4(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can phran phun gyi phyir mo yin/ sems can brnang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rem 'drel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi dad kyi phyir ma yin/
152a5(phal chen): sems can rdzi rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phul yon gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol rol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dang dad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang
152a6(phal chen): rtsi'i phyir ma yin/ sems can zab bgrang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dga' rgyang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can grangs mtha'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phyed yul gyi phyir
152a7(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can 'ol phyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gdab yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gcal yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrangs yas kyi phyir mi
152b1(phal chen): yin/ sems can khyim 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yum me'i phyir ma yin/ sems can sA la yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldab ldeb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
152b2(phal chen): can 'ban chad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can pang phung gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyud lding gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yun 'gyangs
152b3(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bun lob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lAm lom gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can baspyad yas kyi phyir ma
152b4(phal chen): yin sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/ sems can lngapa ljib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi brtsal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'byam yas kyi phyir ma yin/
152b5(phal chen): sems can nga bgrang gi phyir ma yin// sems can smos yal gyi phyi re ma yin/ sems can bkra tshal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lo rgyas kyi phyir ma yin// sems can 'bus
152b6(phal chen): rdib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can la le'i phyir mu yin/ sems can phyam phyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can baglang 'phyos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang 'phyos las bsgres/
152b7(phal chen): pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong gi phyir ma yin/ sems
153a1(phal chen): can yal 'phyong las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
153a2(phal chen): bgrang yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mo 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin
153a3(phal chen): sems can bsam phyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam las
153a4(phal chen): bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin// sems can dpag thag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir
153a5(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjed du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems n+dan 'jig rten
153a6(phal chen): gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/
153a7(phal chen): gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
153b1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
153b2(phal chen): khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs
153b3(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten
153b4(phal chen): gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma
153b5(phal chen): yin gyi/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa/ lhag ma med pa mtha' dgra thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang
153b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
153b7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcu bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i
154a1(phal chen): yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang
154a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya
154a3(phal chen): ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud bsnyen
154a4(phal chen): dkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par bya/
154a5(phal chen): ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong/
154a6(phal chen): su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
154a7(phal chen): kyi sem byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir
154b1(phal chen): bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
154b2(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/
154b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyun la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
154b4(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir
154b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
154b6(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
154b7(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas
155a1(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyirabyang chub sems dpa' rnams
155a2(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gyi sems rgya ma tsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi/
155a3(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i yong brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/
155a4(phal chen): sems can gcig gi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
155a5(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can
155a6(phal chen): gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
155a7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi bskal pa gcig nas gcig
155b1(phal chen): tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa ras/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig
155b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi bskul pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems
155b3(phal chen): can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang /
155b4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams/
155b5(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
155b6(phal chen): sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
155b7(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
156a1(phal chen): las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
156a2(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
156a3(phal chen): sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
156a4(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
156a5(phal chen): spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams
156a6(phal chen): cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang
156a7(phal chen): mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur
156b1(phal chen): zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam la mngon par mos pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad yongs su dag
156b2(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
156b3(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
156b4(phal chen): sems kyi shugs drag po skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yi dam brtan
156b5(phal chen): pa skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par mos pa 'byung ba yin
156b6(phal chen): 'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo ma lus pa thams
156b7(phal chen): cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir
157a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi bskal pa gcig nus gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir
157a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
157a3(phal chen): rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyirabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi
157a4(phal chen): ma 'char ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin/ sems can ma lus
157a5(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sprin chen po kun nas 'du ba yin/ rigs kyi bu mdor na de dag la sogs pa
157a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i tshul dang / sgo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste
157a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni yongs su dag
157b1(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ zhing thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khe mos ni bdag gi smon lam nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du drug pa de'i mthas/
157b2(phal chen): klas par shog cig/ dag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog N+Dig/ bdag gi smon lam sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
157b3(phal chen): pa dang / bras chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog cig ces de lar smon lam btab bo// spras pa/ 'phags ma rnam par thar pa
157b4(phal chen): 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mos kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de
157b5(phal chen): gcig pu shes par zang na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir sems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i phyir ri rab dang 'dra ba
157b6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sos par byed pa'i phyir sran gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa
157b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i gnas su gyur pas sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed pa'i phyir rlung du gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang
158a1(phal chen): bu 'byin pa'i phyir mar mer gyur pa/ zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi char yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du 'bebs pa'i phyir sprin du gyur pa/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer/
158a2(phal chen): gyi dru ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir brgya byin lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ byang chub sem/
158a3(phal chen): dpa'i bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rnam pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su bstan par nus re skan// song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi
158a4(phal chen): rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa 'di na/ yul rgyu ba gtsang ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la dris shig/ des
158a5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
158a6(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te phyag 'tshal nas ngo mchi mas gang bar ngus te/ byang chub mchog tu dkon
158a7(phal chen): pa rjes su sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro bya ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thob par bya ba'i rjes
158b1(phal chen): subs ma pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsum pa yongs su dag pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / skal ba mnyam pa'i 'ashes gnyen dang 'phrad pa ston par rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub tu
158b2(phal chen): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mos shing sems nges par gnog pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor bdukon par rjes su bsam pa da
158b3(phal chen): sems dri ma med cing mi 'phrog pa'i sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dka' bar rjes su bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par skyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon par rjes su
158b4(phal chen): bsam pa byed cing / dge bsnyen ma yod bzhin gyi drung nas song ngo // / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag gi rjes su spong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
158b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i rjes su spong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa
158b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag pos rab tu snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi gter 'thob par bya bra la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ smon lam chen po mngon par
158b7(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i sems dang
159a1(phal chen): ldan pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par rnam par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje rin po che
159a2(phal chen): mthu bo che sa mi tshogs pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' zhing thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de mthar gyis yul chu ba gtsang ma ga la ba der
159a3(phal chen): phyin nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/ de'i tshe drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs dge ba sbyangs pa'i gnas shing dang shing phran sna tshogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba/
159a4(phal chen): lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gris kun nas 'grigs pa rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can rtag tu shing thog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing thog gi shing dang ldan pa/ nor bu
159a5(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing drung nor bu rin po che'i spang leb kyis rtag tu gshibs pa dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam par bres pa/ a ka ru yid du bong ba'i shing las
159a6(phal chen): spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas shing pa ta la rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongs su brgyan pa/ n+ya gro d+ha'i shing dbyangs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ 'dzam
159a7(phal chen): bu'i shing las tshig tu shing thog smin pa 'phrul ba/ me tog gi tshal pad+mo dang ut+pal gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ drang
159b1(phal chen): sbyong 'jigs mchog dbyangs drang srong stong phrag cus bsor cing / tsan dan gyi yal ga shin tu 'brel ba'i bya sgribs shig na/ zor tsugs kyi cod pan can/ pags pa dang rtsa'i gros gyon pa/
159b2(phal chen): shing shun gyi slad g.yogs can gcu'i sman la 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes
159b3(phal chen): garen dang phrad pa'i bsam pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgro yin par yang dag par lta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la
159b4(phal chen): gzhog pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la rag lusu par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che'i gling du sbrel bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa
159b5(phal chen): cid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyam pa la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang dag par skyed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sngon
159b6(phal chen): mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag par lta/ nya ma nyes med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag
159b7(phal chen): par lde/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongs su ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar mer ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams/
160a1(phal chen): cad med par byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stegs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang drug par ltu/ byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis sim pa
160a2(phal chen): yongs su skyed pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ snying rje chen po yongs su skyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs
160a3(phal chen): drag po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsal bar mthong ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen
160a4(phal chen): la rag las par mthong nas/ lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas nas langs te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste
160a5(phal chen): thal mo sbyar nas yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/
160a6(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes
160a7(phal chen): su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/
160b1(phal chen): de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa'i dag rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag pa/
160b2(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa la mgron du gnyer to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sa gon
160b3(phal chen): du gnas pa ste/ ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon du gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char btung bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par
160b4(phal chen): 'dod pa'o// ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o// snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi char chen po mngon par dbab par 'dod pa'o// ye shes chen po'i
160b5(phal chen): zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu gzhil bar 'dod pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel bar 'dod pa'o// de
160b6(phal chen): nas bram ze'i byis pa stong drag bcu po de dag gis me tog dri zhim la yid du 'ong zhing kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu
160b7(phal chen): gtor to// mngon par phyag 'tshal to// de ltar btud de phyag 'tshal nas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'di ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro//
161a1(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu ni bar byed par 'gyur ro// byol song gi ste gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro// gshin
161a2(phal chen): rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par rtog par 'gyur ro// mi 'om pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skems par 'gyur ro// sred pa'i 'ching ba
161a3(phal chen): gcod par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro// ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi khor yug gis 'jig rten yongs su skor bar 'gyur ro//
161a4(phal chen): ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongs su ston par 'gyur ro// ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// chos kyi mig rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rnams la mnyam/
161a5(phal chen): pa dang mi mnyam pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa bdag gang gis bla na med
161a6(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rab tu skyed de/ rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob
161a7(phal chen): par 'gyur ro// byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur/
161b1(phal chen): de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon kyi bu nor babangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gan
161b2(phal chen): gyis mi grub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o// nor bzangs kyis spras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas drang srong 'jig
161b3(phal chen): mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzungs kyi mgo la byugs nas lag pa g.yas pas gzung ngo // tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la drang srong 'jigs mchog
161b4(phal chen): dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pas bzung ma thag tu/ de'i mod la tshong dpon gyi bu rer bzangs kyis phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi snying brgya stong zag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong
161b5(phal chen): bar gyur te/ de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung na bdag nyid 'dug pa shes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang
161b6(phal chen): rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan par mthong ngo // de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'a'od
161b7(phal chen): par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar bas brgyan pa dag bzhugs pa mthong ngo // de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig las
162a1(phal chen): byung phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan pa nyan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor mo de dag byung pan+d+ha dz+nyAn ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to// chos kyi
162a2(phal chen): sprin gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la 'bab pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam mos pa sna tshogs kyi stobs kyis rnam
162a3(phal chen): par sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la 'dra zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la'ang zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems
162a4(phal chen): can gyi bsam po ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur bar rnam par dmigs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'dod chags dang bral ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi
162a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes snang ba bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pas zhugs so// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan
162a6(phal chen): gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes mi zad pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan
162a7(phal chen): pa gzungs kyi sgo snang ba/ phyogs kun gyi dra ba rab tu thob pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam
162b1(phal chen): par bye ba rab tu thod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bra la rnam par stod pa/ gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po'i yul du gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas nam mkha'i
162b2(phal chen): snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mu zhud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang du dus
162b3(phal chen): gsum gyi ye shes rin po che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni nyin zhag gcig lon par shes so// la lar ni nyin zhag
162b4(phal chen): bdun lon pa snyam la lar ni zla ba phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni zla ba gcig lon pa snyam/ la lngar ni lo gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya lon pa snyam la lar ni le stong lon pa
162b5(phal chen): snyam la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong lon pa sAm/ la lar ni lo bye ba lon pa snga ma/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo
162b6(phal chen): bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa sngam/ la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig len pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal
162b7(phal chen): pa brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa d+ya/
163a1(phal chen): ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskul ba bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bsgral pa bye ba khrag
163a2(phal chen): khrig brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed lon par gyur pa snyam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
163a3(phal chen): la lo'i zhabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
163a4(phal chen): lon pa snyam byed par gyur to// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs btang ba dang / des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi
163a5(phal chen): mdun na 'dug par shes par gyur to// de la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dran mod/ smras pa/ 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
163a6(phal chen): dran no// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad las khyad
163a7(phal chen): par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa dus thams cad du 'khor lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa
163b1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i nyi ma la rnam par dmigs pa'i can rab tu 'god pa/ dus gsum gyi yul skad cig gcig gi ye shes su yang dag par sdud pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
163b2(phal chen): du lus shin tu rnam par bkram pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la ye shes snang ba'i rang bzhin drang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par
163b3(phal chen): longs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pas rnam par dpyod pa dang 'thun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa bzhin du kun tu snang zhing dri ma med pa 'od dang ldan pa'i ye shes
163b4(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa 'am/ zhing gi mngon par 'du bya ba shes pa 'am
163b5(phal chen): ye shes kyi yul la 'jug par bya ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'brang bar bye ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba 'am/ rnam par
163b6(phal chen): thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am/ lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba 'am/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod
163b7(phal chen): pa 'am ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bram ze rgyal ba'i
164a1(phal chen): drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sdod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar
164a2(phal chen): nan tan du bya ba dris shigade nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog
164a3(phal chen): dbyangs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ drang srong 'jigs
164a4(phal chen): mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas song ngo // / bam po dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
164a5(phal chen): thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa/
164a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon sum gyi ye shes kyis mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
164a7(phal chen): ye shes kyis sems snang bar gyur pa/ dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag
164b1(phal chen): par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa 'gro ba thams cad las 'ang par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod yul/
164b2(phal chen): la rnam par spyod pa mngon du gyur pa/ gnyis su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i ye shes lhur len pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal ba'i ye shes snang ba dang /
164b3(phal chen): ldan pa mnyan pa thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag pa la mos pa'i mdzod la mkhas pa/ rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang
164b4(phal chen): ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin bsgom pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
164b5(phal chen): stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings brjod pa la mngon par mos pa/ ngoms pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa'i spyod
164b6(phal chen): yul la 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi
164b7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba mi zad pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dpung med pa mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa
165a1(phal chen): sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i yul mtha'
165a2(phal chen): yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byes sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par brtang dang /
165a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dmi gra zab dang yangs pa'i 'ong su chud par bya ba la yang dag par bslang dang / 'jig rten gyi kham kyi ga'i mthar yas pa'i ming gi d+hab sna tshogs yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su rnam par spyad
165a4(phal chen): pa rnam par gdags pa mtha' yas pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa tha dad pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can
165a5(phal chen): rnam par 'phye ba'i tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang
165a6(phal chen): sems can dang / phyogs dang / dus mtha' yas pa'i ming gi rnam pa sna tshogs la yang dag par blta bu dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mngon du bya ba byed cing mthar gyis yul tshol ba
165a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa gang na ba dang bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ga la bder phyin to// de'i tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa'i gzhir byas
165b1(phal chen): gang thub dru ba byo la spyod de/ de thogs pa'i nas me'i phung po rgyam du che babus pa dang / ri shin tu mtho 'i galangasa'i las kyi drud spu bri'i mos gzhibs pas 'khor bar
165b2(phal chen): snang ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so//
165b3(phal chen): 'phags pa bdag gis dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du/
165b4(phal chen): dartsi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dngas
165b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du dgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu song la spu gri'i so
165b6(phal chen): dngar ba'i ri 'di la 'dzegs te/ me'i 'obs 'dir mchongs shig/ des khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhe na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs 'di
165b7(phal chen): snyam du sems par gyur te/ mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par ldog pa'ang shin tu dkon/ mir gyur te kham pa phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa'ang shin tu dkon
166a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang shin tu dkon+da/ dbang po nyams pa med pa'ang shin tu dkon sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa'ang shin tu dkon skyes bu dam
166a2(phal chen): pa dang phrad pa'ang shin tu dkon yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang shin tu dkon yang dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan pas legs par sdud pa'ang shin tu dkon/ yang
166a3(phal chen): drag par 'tsho bar bya ba'ang shin tu dkon mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan byed pa'ang shin tu dkon na/ de skad zer zhing bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad la zhugs la/
166a4(phal chen): de ltar bdag gi srog gcad par brtson pa 'di/ bdud dam/ cig ma yin nam/ bdud kyis byin gyis brlabasra pa 'am/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ dge ba'i bshes
166a5(phal chen): gnyen ltar du rdzus pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi gcags pa byed pa zhig ma yin grung bdag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bgegs byed par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang /
166a6(phal chen): bdag lam gol ba ngan par gzhug par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la bgegs byed pa zhig ma yin grang snyam nas/
166a7(phal chen): de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcu steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems brtan
166b1(phal chen): par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'dri ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od 'gro ba'i snang ba rab tu tho pa ste/ brtson 'grus ldog pa med pa'o// brtsams pa chen po mapar byung
166b2(phal chen): bal zhugs pa'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i chan bskam pa la mngon par brtson pa'o// blta ba'i rnam pa dang drab thams cad gtub pa la brtson pa'o// nyon mongs
166b3(phal chen): pa'i lcag lcig thams cad zad par bsreg pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o// mi gom mi shes pa'i bas mtha'i dgon pa thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o// sems can thams
166b4(phal chen): cad kyi rga shi'i g.yang sa dang 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa la yi dam brtan pa'o// dus sum gyi mun pa bsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'o// chos thams cad kyi 'od zer brtse
166b5(phal chen): ba la zhugs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' zlab lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa ji snyed cig mkhan po dang / dbang sgyur ba dang / 'jig rten
166b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhing / sems pa blta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa 'di'i dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyi thugs dam
166b7(phal chen): gyi mthus rang rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba med cing / de dag bsam gtan gyi ro dga' ba myong ba med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // de dag phyin pa dang 'phags pa
167a1(phal chen): 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin dang / drug shul gyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyis zil gyis mnan te/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang
167a2(phal chen): nga rgyal dang rlom sems thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i phyir chos ston to// 'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi bsam pa
167a3(phal chen): brtan par bya ba dang byang chub tu sem bskyed pa shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par blta ba la mngon par brtson par bya ba dang / srungs rgyas kyi gsung gi
167a4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad du grag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la thogs pa med cing bsgribs pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// bdud
167a5(phal chen): stong phrag bcu'ang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin ches mngon par gtor te 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba
167a6(phal chen): mdzad pa'i tshe/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po byung zhing / kho bo cag gi khyim dang / lus dang / rgyan gyi longs spyod thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang
167a7(phal chen): so so'i gnas gnas na ngag dga' ba med pas 'khor dang bcas te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // kho bo cag 'di'i drung du phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni khro bo cag la ci nas kyang rang rang gi
167b1(phal chen): sems sor chud nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to// dbang ltar gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag
167b2(phal chen): bcus kyang lA rjes kyi mi tog gis mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'byor to// rigs kyi bu 'jigs pa 'di dka' bub lngas yongs su gdung bar byed pa tshi/ kho bo cag kya rang rang gi
167b3(phal chen): gnas na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag cag drung du phyin pa dang / 'di ni bdag cag la rang rang gi sems
167b4(phal chen): la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang skur ba thob par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba dang
167b5(phal chen): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / yo byed la dbang ba'i rgyan yongs
167b6(phal chen): su dag par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshe la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'ang steng gi bar snang la 'khod
167b7(phal chen): delha rdzas kyi glu yang dag par sbyar ba'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs bsgrags te/ mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung
168a1(phal chen): sa mo 'dal sa khyod rgyu da/ gag su smra sadu
168a2(phal chen): du gyur ro// rgyun 'dri gra dang rtswa'i bu mo 'di das kya rnam par dag cingags pa la 'di shin kya bar 'gyu'o// de bsan pa ga byung ma'i du da ma ma'i rtags kyi 'do dang nas pas
168a3(phal chen): 'dod pa la dga' bar tshor ba med de/ 'dod pa'i bde ba la mngon par dga' ba med pas lus dang sems sim par gyur nasa'aphags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ba yin te/ 'phags pa 'di ni bdag
168a4(phal chen): cag de ltar phyin pa rnams la sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// sems kyi 'od dang bar bya ba dang / sems shin tu dag par bya ba dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang /
168a5(phal chen): sems kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes 'thob pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med
168a6(phal chen): pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par la bya ba'i phyir ngag rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu
168a7(phal chen): thob par bya bar sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i tshigs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang steng gi bar
168b1(phal chen): snang la 'khod nas spos sna tshogs kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab pas mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka'/
168b2(phal chen): zub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin pa rnams la
168b3(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// chog shes pa'i sems su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyod pa dang
168b4(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag
168b5(phal chen): bcu lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis kyang / lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba'i char mngon par phrab te 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags
168b6(phal chen): pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan pa la dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas 'phag pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/
168b7(phal chen): bdag cag phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// lha'i dbang po
169a1(phal chen): brgya byin stong phrag bcu so so nas nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas lha rdzas kyi gos dang /
169a2(phal chen): rin po che'i can dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab ste 'di gad ces 'dzid to// rigs kyi bu ba lags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzud pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang brgya byin
169a3(phal chen): gyi khang pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / rtse ba'i nags tshal dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang / gam yo na glu len pa'i longs spyod la dga' bri med de/ de ltar bdag/
169a4(phal chen): cag dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag cag der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'di
169a5(phal chen): dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te/ mi brtan zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do// dregs pa dang bag med pa thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / blan med/
169a6(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dris bltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad kyang g.yo bar 'gyur te/ des bdag cag gshegs pas sems
169a7(phal chen): skyo bar gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems brtan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su smon lam mngon par sgrub bo// klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang / dga' bo dang
169b1(phal chen): bsnyen dga' bo la sogs pa krub cu stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la gnas shing dus dang 'thun pa'i lha rdzas kI tsan dan gyi sprin dang ku'i bu mos klu drangs pa'i/
169b2(phal chen): ngo ro sar pa'i dbangs dang / lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rkyen rab tu 'bab pa'i char mngon par phab ste 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' dzub rjes yongs su gdung
169b3(phal chen): mdzad pa'i tshe me'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po 'byung ste/ des klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas bye ma'i char dang nab mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongs su sel to//
169b4(phal chen): khro ba 'byung ba'ang zhi bar byas te/ lus sim par byas shing yid shin tu mos par byed do// de ltar sems shin tu mos par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la chos ston te/ 'di ltar/
169b5(phal chen): klu'i lam gyi rgyud ngan pa rnam par smad pa dang / sgrib pa'i las thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir nyes pa 'chags su btsud cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
169b6(phal chen): du btsud de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god do// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu'ang nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod de/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bram ze rgyal
169b7(phal chen): ba'i drod kyi skye mched dang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/
170a1(phal chen): kho bo cag gi 'khor kun kyang mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum thams cad kyang byams pa'i
170a2(phal chen): sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'tshe ba med pa la zhugs pa'i rnams kho bo cag gi drung du 'ong ngo // kho bo cag kyang de ltar byams pa'i dbang gis zil gyis
170a3(phal chen): non pas rang rang gi gnas de dang de dag na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag cag de ltar 'ongs pa rnams la
170a4(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di'i sku las byung ba'i 'od kyi lus thams cad snang bar byas shing bde bas khyab par mdzad de/ de ltar bdag cag lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas
170a5(phal chen): kyang bdag cag la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / lus srul po mang po byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// dri za'i dbang po stong phrag
170a6(phal chen): bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba
170a7(phal chen): mdzad pa'i me'i phung po 'di las 'od byung ste/ bdag cag gi gnas snang bar 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag cag 'od des phog ste/ bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur bas 'phags pa
170b1(phal chen): 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag drung du byin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar ros
170b2(phal chen): ston te// lha ma yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'thon te/ nam mkha' la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing /
170b3(phal chen): 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rgya mtsho dang rir bcas pa'i sa chen po'i
170b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur te/ bdag cag kun gyi nga rgyal dang / rlom sems dang / dregs pa thams cad brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyis zil gyis non te/ 'phags pa
170b5(phal chen): 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la g.yo sgyu thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / chos zab mo'i bzod pa la gzud pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid la rab
170b6(phal chen): tu dgod pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la sogs pa nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po stong phrag
170b7(phal chen): bcus kyang / bram ze'i bu shin tu sdug gu'i gzugs su mngon par sprul te 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i
171a1(phal chen): na k+sha sa sas+ho/ smya tu smra
171a2(phal chen): pa sugs rnas pa 'i du // gas pa di sa sa 'i nga mas pa lal yang dag par spyo ba pa rjen sa sangs par 'od
171a3(phal chen): dema'or ba'i rgya mtsho 'dug pa la'ang yang dag par spong pa mdzad do// 'dod pa'i 'das du byed ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par bya ba la'ang yongs su spong bar mdzadado// zag pa mi
171a4(phal chen): pa'i po rnam par dag par bya ba pa'ang ras tu sbyor ba mdzad do// shes pa dang thabs shin tu gsal ba la'ang yang dag par spong ba mdzad do// rnam pa ji ga/ bur yongs su min pa'i sems cad rnams bdu
171a5(phal chen): ngar byu ba labang rab tu spor ba mdzad do// mi'ang ci'i dang po song dag bcu nga se gi bar sngang la 'khod de zhe sad ces 'dzir to// rigs kyi bu 'bags pa 'di dka dru lngas yongs su gdu mdzod
171a6(phal chen): ma chel po cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i shing tA la'i 'bring ba las dril bu'i dra ba rin po che'i sad+ma dus lnga ldir banus pa'i sil bA dang / rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyun dang / d+him d+hi dz+dza/
171a7(phal chen): spyod thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sra 'byung ngo // chos kyi sgra dang / phyir po ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam ci sgra
171b1(phal chen): 'byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig drung chub tu smon lam 'debs so// 'jig rten gyi 'ams
171b2(phal chen): kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhin dka' ba yongs su gtong ba byed do// 'jig rten gyi 'ams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge so zhig na ni byang
171b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig thams cad mkhyen pa nyis kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su stong pa byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni
171b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig snying po byang chub tu 'gro'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung
171b5(phal chen): dang gzhon par bcas pa'i bdud rab tu pham par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni
171b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang ni cheg mo
171b7(phal chen): zhig sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin la ma lus par mdzad nas phung po ma lus pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad do zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling gi
172a1(phal chen): rdza dang shing dang / yal gdang lo mu dang / 'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba'i char rlabs pa'i mur zug par ni rung yang srid kyi
172a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyo ba la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gnas na yod pa'i
172a3(phal chen): shing ta la'i 'phreng ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim gyi longs spyod rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing nga ro 'byin pa dang / rna lam du grag pa'i mtha' ni
172a4(phal chen): zug par mi rung ngo // de ltar bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa dang
172a5(phal chen): mtshan gyi chu klung gi sgras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos nyams bde ba skyes te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // de ltar bdag cag phyin par gyur nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di
172a6(phal chen): ni bdag cag la ci nas kyang kho bo cag gi 'khor gyi sems can du ma zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa mdzad do// 'dod pa
172a7(phal chen): la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa kha dog shin tu mdzes pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'khod cing / yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pas mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// 'phags
172b1(phal chen): 'di lus thas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i / me'i phung po 'di dag las rngub pa 'di 'a du'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des ma naman med pa yan chad du sems na dmyal bar dus
172b2(phal chen): snang bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rtse zil bar byas te/ 'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag cag gi mig lam du snang bar bstan pas/ de'i
172b3(phal chen): phyir lo bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems mos par gyur nas 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i ris nyams su bde bar smras so// de ltar bdag cag kyang 'phags pa 'dis mdzad pa la drin du gzo zhing mthong
172b4(phal chen): bas mi ngoms pas 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // der bdag cag phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang sems can tshad med pa'i rnams
172b5(phal chen): byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston pa mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu thos nas dga' rungs te
172b6(phal chen): mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba bskyed te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed de/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi
172b7(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal de 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' dang 'gal bar bgyis pa'i nongs pa la nongs par bshagaso//
173a1(phal chen): de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad 'di dag smras so// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rjes su
173a2(phal chen): bstan dang 'thun byed cing // dran pa nye bar gzhag ste bla ma'i ngag gcog mi byed na/ de phyir de yi don rnams thams cad 'thun par 'grub par 'gyur// 'thun pa'i sangs
173a3(phal chen): rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'tshang yang rgyu// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis ri g.yang sa'i lam spu gri'i so gshibs pa la 'dzegs te/ me'i phung po chen po der
173a4(phal chen): mchongs so// de de ltar mchongs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur ro// me des reg nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
173a5(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas des 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa'i me'i phung po la de ltar reg na bde ba dang
173a6(phal chen): ri'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di'ang de ltar reg na bde ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o// des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khro bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor mi zad pa
173a7(phal chen): thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa 'di she par zad pa/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po lta bu
173b1(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / blta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su zad par bya ba'i smon lam can du mngon phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ sems la thub pa med cing
173b2(phal chen): sems dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa yid zhum pa med pa can rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i mthu bo che lta bu/ brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba la sgyid lug pa med pa
173b3(phal chen): sbyor ba lhod pa med pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'agro ba thams cad kyi don du brtson pa brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi
173b4(phal chen): spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba yod de
173b5(phal chen): de ni rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byams ma zhes bya ba bu mo lnga brgya'i 'khor dang 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/
