173b6(phal chen): la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la
173b7(phal chen): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched
174a1(phal chen): kyi drung nas song ngo / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bas ma gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ myos pa
174a2(phal chen): na po ma / theg rkyen du na phyogs pa/ sa rgyas shes ma na pa ma sa pa mas
174a3(phal chen): gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang bar spro ba/ chos kyi rim grol rnam par spyod pa/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa/ ye shes kyi mtha'
174a4(phal chen): la mi gnas pa'i yul dang ldan pa dus gsum skad cig gi cha shas la khong du chud par byed pa nam mkha'i mtha' gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam
174a5(phal chen): par gdon mi za ba thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ bsgribs pa med pa'i mthas gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa chos kyi
174a6(phal chen): mtha' dang mi 'gal bar bya ba la gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' la mtha' med par khong du chud pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa
174a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes la gzhol ba zhing la mngon par chags pa thams cad dang bral ba sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
174b1(phal chen): zad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi shing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas pa med par spyod pa/ sems can thams cad la bdag med pa dang sems
174b2(phal chen): can med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ sgra thams cad tshig gi lam lta bur long du chud pa/ gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par rnam par rig par bya ba
174b3(phal chen): la gzhol ba de mthar gyis seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer gang na ba der byin te/ bu mo byams ma tshol zhing yongs su rmed rmed pa las rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo
174b4(phal chen): byams ma 'khor bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pa de khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nang na khri tsan dang sbrul gyi snying po'i rkang pa can gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par
174b5(phal chen): zlas pa lha rdzas kyi spyan bting ba la 'dug cing chos ston to zhes thos nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings po'i grong khyer du song ste/ rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi gnas gang na ba der
174b6(phal chen): phyin nas/ rgyal po'i phyi sgo'i sgo khang na bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba'i phyir sdud cing 'dug 'dug pa dang / des der srog chags brgya phrag du ma dang / srog chags stong phrag du
174b7(phal chen): ma dang srog chags bcu stong phrag du ma 'dong ba mthong nas/ khyed gang nas 'ongs da gang du 'dong zhes dris pa dang / de dag na re ngeng ni bu mo byams ma'i drung du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dod
175a1(phal chen): ngo zhes nas des bsams pa/ 'dir ni su 'gro'ang dgag pa med pa lta zhig snyam ste/ de'ang nang du byin to// de ltar phyin te bltas na/ khang pa
175a2(phal chen): rnam par snang ba'i snying po can de'ang gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa lus blangs te/ bai DUR+Ya'i ka ba bkye ba/ rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun dang ldan pa'i bgam
175a3(phal chen): brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa/ nor bu rin mo che grangs med pas rnam par bres pa rin po che stong gi snying po'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu sba bar byas pa/ nor bu
175a4(phal chen): rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing tugs grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba gser gyi dril bu brgya stong shin tu 'khrol ba'i sgra snyan pa bsam
175a5(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyun dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong ngo // bu mo byams ma de'ang migu dkar nag 'dres pa/ skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ mdog gsar gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa mthong nas
175a6(phal chen): des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
175a7(phal chen): ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du
175b1(phal chen): bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byung /
175b2(phal chen): rlub sengs dbu'i stod pa la 'thab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi phu ma'i gnas kyi can la ltos shog/
175b3(phal chen): nas ga/ des kun tu byung sa bzlas pa dang rtsig pa de dang ka ba re re dang / me long gi dkyil ba'od dang / rnam pa'i bye brag 'i'i dang / dbyibs re re dang / nor bu rin pa
175b4(phal chen): che rje dang gser gyi dril bur dang / rin po che'i shing re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga ri re dang / rin po che'i sde mo do re re las kyang chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
175b5(phal chen): gshegs pa thog ma thugs bskyed pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang smon lam gyi yul dang bcas pa/ 'byung ba'i rgyan dang bcas pa/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas
175b6(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar gyur to// dmigs pa de dag re re las ji lta ba de
175b7(phal chen): bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na chus yongs su gang ba'i mtsho dang shing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal ba la ni/ nam mkha'i
176a1(phal chen): dang skar ma'i tshogs kyis btsun pa gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang ngo // de bzhin du 'du ba rnam par snang bu'i snying po'i dmigs pa'i las kyang
176a2(phal chen): chos kyi byings nan bzugs pa'i di ba'ig shegs pa mas ga zugs parnyan gyi rgyu la du yongs su snang bar chu to/ deni bu mo rnam+b+ha pa'i skyon dbye ba'i rtsa ba d+ha kyi
176a3(phal chen): des de ltar rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyan gyi mtshan ma de yongs su bzung ste thal mo sbyar nas/ bu mo byams me'i gdong du bltas pa dang / des
176a4(phal chen): spras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud 'di ni khom/
176a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed las yongs su brtsal ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par
176a6(phal chen): brgyan pa 'di sgo sna tshogs kyi khong du chud par bya bas rtogs par mdzad de/ gcig gis gang gsung pa de'ang gnyis kyis ma gsungs so// smras pa/ 'phags ma shes rab
176a7(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis spros pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par/
176b1(phal chen): btur pa 'di la lom mngon du byed cing sems pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / rjes su sems pa dang / dran par byang dang / yongs su zung ba/
176b2(phal chen): dang rnam par brtags pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yang dag par brgyan par bya ba dang / rab tu rnam par dbye ba byed pa'i tshe/ gzungs kun nas sgo zhes bya ba yongs su
176b3(phal chen): skye ste gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor der ni chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu yongs su 'du'o// khongs su chud do// mngon du 'gyur ro// mngon par 'du'o// khongs na 'dod/
176b4(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo dang / sangs rgya kyi sa dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sems can gyi sgo dang / 'das pa'i sgo dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang / da ltar
176b5(phal chen): byung ba'i sgo dang / gnas pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / bsod nams kyi mo dang / bsod dmas kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi sgo dang / sngon
176b6(phal chen): lom gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su 'byung ba'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang
176b7(phal chen): las kyi sgo dang / las dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo dang / las kyi rgyun gyi sgo dang / lam mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / mi mnyam pa'i las yongs su spang ba'i sgo dang / yang dag pa'i las
177a1(phal chen): la nan tan du bya ba'i sgo dang / las la dbang sgyur ba'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa'i sgo dang legs par spyad pa yang dag par blang ba'i sgo dang
177a2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa'i sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i
177a3(phal chen): sgo dang mngon par shes pa'i sgo dang sems rgya mtsho'i sgo dang / sems kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo dang / sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi thibs po
177a4(phal chen): snang bar bya ba'i sgo dang sems kyi mtsho dang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems rnam par rgyu ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba'i
177a5(phal chen): sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo dang / mos pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha
177a6(phal chen): dad pa'i sgo dang 'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / phyogs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi phyogs
177a7(phal chen): kyi sgo dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo dang / byams pa chen po'i sgo dang / zhi ba'i sgo dang / ngag gi lam gyi sgo dang tshul gyi sgo dang khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang
177b1(phal chen): rnam bya sde ba'i spyo smra 'du ba snod du / ba sa med pa sbyim bu'i rgyu / kun gyi spyod / smras nas nas blo dang / rlung du sa rgyas
177b2(phal chen): spyo/ ma thos kyi chos kyi spyong/ dngas sa rgyas su rdzas kyi spyod / 'dzin rten gyi sa / jig rten byung ba'i tshus kyi blo dang / rig rte ga
177b3(phal chen): kyi dang 'jig rten kun nas gnas pa'i sgo dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'dzag rten gyi khams su
177b4(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgra la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon mos pa'i sgo dang
177b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhi'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi
177b6(phal chen): khams kyi sti'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i sgo dang / mig 'phrul du 'jug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo dang / gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par gyur pa'i sgo dang / phra ba rgya chen por
177b7(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rgya chen po phra bar khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi
178a1(phal chen): 'od zer gyi dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo
178a2(phal chen): dang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas
178a3(phal chen): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam
178a4(phal chen): par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas
178a5(phal chen): kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgo dang / sangs
178a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi sems can pha rol gyi sems thugs su chud pa'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa'i sgo nas yongs
178a7(phal chen): su mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pa'i bar gyi sgo dang / sems can gyi don tshad med pa mdzad pa'i sgo dang / chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo dang / chos sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi sgo dang /
178b1(phal chen): byang chub kyi sems kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi skyo dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /
178b2(phal chen): spyod pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / gzungs rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag
178b3(phal chen): pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / shes rab yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / dran pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dag ste/ rigs kyi bu de lhur ze
178b4(phal chen): mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rlung dran pas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' sems ram mu kha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ blo gros
178b5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa rgyud bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su mi rgyu ba/ ye shes
178b6(phal chen): snang ba'i mig rab rib med pa rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad mun pa med par khong du chud pa/ blo nam mkha' ltar tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes
178b7(phal chen): su song ba'i mig can chags pa med pa'i sa snang ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi don rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa zil gyis gnon la/ 'jig rten kun gyis zil
179a1(phal chen): gyis mi non pa 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i tshul rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad na kha na ma tho ba med pa 'jig rten gyi don byed pa la brtson pa//
179a2(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngag gi tshul dang rnam pa la mkhas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du gnas pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa ston pa dus kyi 'khor lo thams
179a3(phal chen): cad la dbang sgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul mig gsum pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong
179a4(phal chen): blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig
179a5(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bu mo byams ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bu mo byams ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang
179a6(phal chen): dang yang bltas te/ bu mo byams ma'i drung nas song ngo // / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyod pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang /
179a7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi gni zab mo khong du chud par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / sems can gyi ye shes shin tu phra ning zab pa rjes su bsam pa dang 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa zab mo
179b1(phal chen): rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rkyen cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dbyis
179b2(phal chen): zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa'i bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa
179b3(phal chen): dang chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / lus kyi 'phrul 'khor shugs kyis 'khor ba'i dbyings zab mo'i rjes su bsam pa dang las
179b4(phal chen): kyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam par byed cing / mthar gyis yul mig gsum pa gang na ba der phyin te/ yul gyi 'khor dang grong khyer gyi 'khor dang tshong dus
179b5(phal chen): kyi 'khor dang / grong rdal gyi 'khor dang / yul gru'i 'khor dang lngas kyi 'khor dang / drang srong dge ba sbyong ba'i gnas kyi 'khor dang yul dang phyogs kyi 'khor dang
179b6(phal chen): chu'i rgyud kyi 'khor dang / ri'i sal sul gyi 'khor dang nags tshal chen po'i 'khor dag tu dge sbyong blta na sdug pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ des dge slong blta
179b7(phal chen): na sdug pa nags tshal stug po zhig na gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/ gzugs mdzes shing sdug la blta na yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon mthing g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang ldan pa/ mgo
180a1(phal chen): gdugs kar 'dagu pa gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can dbul ba yangs pa mig dkar gdag 'byes bying ring la rdzim pa'i rdzim sar 'dug pa
180a2(phal chen): sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing zags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu
180a3(phal chen): chung ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lhang seng ge ltar 'dug pa/ mkhur ba shas gang zhing rgyas pa/ smin tshugs ga'u ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa mdzod spu zla ba'i la
180a4(phal chen): dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa
180a5(phal chen): snying ka dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i stod ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa lag pa ring ba dra bar 'brel ba'i
180a6(phal chen): sor mo can rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa lus che zhing drang ba
180a7(phal chen): brla zlum pa pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa 'od 'dom gang ba dang
180b1(phal chen): ldan pa/ mdogs gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa ba sU re re nas g.yas phyogs su gyen du 'khyil ba shing n+ya kro d+ha'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa lus mdzad dang dpe/
180b2(phal chen): bya bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ mig mi 'gebs shing mi rgod pa dran pa nye bar gnas pa/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar rtswa dang / nags tshal dang / smar dang
180b3(phal chen): shing phran sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ tho shin tu yangs pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul dang yul la thub pa med pa/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyad sprir gyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/
180b4(phal chen): g.yo ba dang / rlob sems dang / g.yeng ba dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa ye shes kyi spyod yul ma 'dres pa sangs rgyas kyi
180b5(phal chen): yul rgya chen po'i snang ba thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i bsam pa'i rgyun mi 'chad pa/ snying rjes chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs
180b6(phal chen): pa skyes pa / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir
180b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rjes su drar zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du 'chag pa la zhugs te/ drag dal med cing pad ral med la/ shin tu mdzes par 'chag
181a1(phal chen): pa gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gos dang ldan pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod byin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha'
181a2(phal chen): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / me dang / mi ma yin pas bskyor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
181a3(phal chen): dge slong bldan mdzes pa de 'chag pa'i tshe/ phyogs mngon du gyur pa'i phyogs kyi lha rnams phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sgrub pa byed do// rkang gis 'gro'i lha
181a4(phal chen): rnams rin po che'i pad+mos gom pa 'dor ba'i tshe yongs su blang ba byed do// me'i lha snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zad mi shes pa rnams kyang mun pa dang rab rib rnam par sel to// 'dzam du
181a5(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi nags tshal gyi lha rnams kyang me tog mang po'i char mngon par 'bebs so// sa'i lha mi g.yo ba'i snying po can rnams kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mang po ston to//
181a6(phal chen): nam mkha'i lga kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyang nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su rgyan pa byed do// rgya mtsho'i lha dpa la kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyang rin po che dam pa mang pos mngon
181a7(phal chen): par 'thor ro// ri rab kyi lha drim med pa'i snying po can rnams kyang thal mo gyur cing phyag 'tshal lo// rlung gi lnga thogs pa med pa'i stobs can rnams kyang spos dang 'dug sos
181b1(phal chen): dang me tog 'byor bu'i rlung rab tu 'byed do// mtshan mo'i lha gnas par byed pa lus shin tu brdzun pa rnams kyang lus shin tu btud cing phyag 'tshal lo// nyin mo'i wa rtag tu
181b2(phal chen): sad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor can rnams kyang nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs shing snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do// de nas
181b3(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong blta na sdug pa gang na ba der phyir nas/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong blta/
181b4(phal chen): sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la bzhin sbyar te/ legs par phyis nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang
181b5(phal chen): dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba zhig lags te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
181b6(phal chen): gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis zos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang
181b7(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ri tshes btab na dar la bab pa/ rab tu byung bas btab na gsar du zhugs pa ste/
182a1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bos ni tshe de 'dra ba gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi drung du tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bdag gis de
182a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni nyin zhag gcig tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do// la lar ni nyin zhag bdun du/ la lar ni zla ba byed du/ la lar ni zla ba gcig tu
182a3(phal chen): pa lar ni lo gcig tu/ la lar ni lo brgyar/ la lar ni lo stong du/ la lar ni brgya phrag stong du/ la lar ni le bye bar la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig tu la yar nI lo
182a4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par/ la lar ni bskal pa bar mar/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed du/ la lar ni bskul par/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du/
182a5(phal chen): ni bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ bskal pa bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs thams cad las chos bstan pa thos te/ gdams
182a6(phal chen): ngag dang rjes su bstan pa yang dag par blangs so// smon lam gyi can yongs su ldangs so// yang dag par bsgrub pa'i yul la zhugs so// spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su
182a7(phal chen): sbyangs so// pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par byas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par byas so// de dag gi chos kyi
182b1(phal chen): 'khor lo 'khor ba phan tshun ma 'dres pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ngo // de dag gi stobs mnyam pa nyid kyang khong du chud par byas so// de dag gi bstan pa'ang dam pa'i chos zad pa'i
182b2(phal chen): mthar thug gi bar du yongs su bzung ngo // khro bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyang / smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par
182b3(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so// kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems
182b4(phal chen): dpe'i spyod pa rnams kyang spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so// kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de
182b5(phal chen): dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'ang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs so// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho bo 'chag sa 'di na 'chag
182b6(phal chen): pa'i tshaphyogs kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang / shin tu rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi sgros mngon du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang smon lam
182b7(phal chen): chen po mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med po'i yang brjod du med pa 'da' zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir rnam par 'grub par/
183a1(phal chen): 'gyur ro// sems kyi skad cig gcig la sems can gyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi mo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i/
183a2(phal chen): spyod pa dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/ stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas
183a3(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa dag kyang / snga phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs
183a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la de
183a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char rnams kyang chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stob
183a6(phal chen): kyis chos kyi tshul grangs med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa la mngon par 'bab bo// sems bskyed pa gcig la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho brjod
183a7(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'a'i spyod pa mig 'phrul la bu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor
183b1(phal chen): thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
183b2(phal chen): gcig tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yang dag par 'du bar bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya
183b3(phal chen): ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la dbang po rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / dran pa'i mthar phyin pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba'i
183b4(phal chen): smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dbang po'i 'khor lo dang / dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig
183b5(phal chen): la dus kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / sems can zad mi shes pa zad par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dus thams cad du
183b6(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la dus rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad kyang dus gcig tu rnam par dgod pa'i tshul khong
183b7(phal chen): du chud pa'i ye shes snang ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum rnam par dgod pa'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur te/ rigs
184a1(phal chen): / kyi bu kho bos de byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa shin tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' bsam
184a2(phal chen): pa rdo rje lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba srog gi dbang po la rdzun 'chad pa med pa/ ye shes kyi smon pa zhi bar 'gyur ba med pa
184a3(phal chen): mi shigs mi phyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i gzugs shin tu grub pa chu'i chos dang mnyam pa'i yan lag dang nying lag tu ldan pa'i lus can/ 'gro ba rnams
184a4(phal chen): kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang / lus dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang
184a5(phal chen): chu zheng yongs su ston pa/ me mdag dang / me lce dang / dug dang / mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing khor yug ltar thub pa med pa'i lus
184a6(phal chen): bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi stobs kyi stobs med par byed pa 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/
184a7(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par dmigs pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ sgo thams cad du rnam par dmigs shing thos par gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis ngor bal ba chos thams
184b1(phal chen): cad kyi sprin gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor bas blta na mdzes pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu
184b2(phal chen): 'jom pas shin tu dpa' bar snang ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa las byung bas bal na dga' ba/ 'byung bar shin tu dka' zhing dkon pas me tog u dum wa ra lta bu de dag gi/
184b3(phal chen): spyod pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lce phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba na grong khyer sgo bzang po zhes bya ba yod de
184b4(phal chen): den khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan
184b5(phal chen): du b+ha ba dris shig de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / nan tan rnam par dag par bya ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems
184b6(phal chen): dpa'i stobs snang bas sems shin tu snang bar gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub cing brgal thag chad pa'i snying dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i
184b7(phal chen): smon lam gyi go cha bzang pos sems zhum pa med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa brtan pas kun tu gnas shing yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ba la brtson pa byang chub sem
185a1(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa'i sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char gyis yongs su mi ngoms pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/
185a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam mngon du gyur pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi kha lo gyur bas yongs su sdud bar bdag nyid yongs su gtong bar 'dod pa/
185a3(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mtha' dgon pa chen po las bzla bar 'dod pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba dang mnyan pa dang bsnyen bkun pas yongs su mi ngoms
185a4(phal chen): pas chos kyi rim gro tshad med pa skyed pa dang ldan pa des dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong bltan sdug pa la lan brgya stong du
185a5(phal chen): mar ka las phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas dge slong bltan sdug pa'i drung nas song ngo // / 'phags pa sangs rgyas
185a6(phal chen): phal po che zhes bya ba bam po dgu pucu rtsa ba'i pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong blta na sdug pa de'i gdams ngag rjes su zos shing sral
185a7(phal chen): ba dang / bsud pa rab tu bye ba dang / bshad pa dang / so sor rnam par bsgom pa dang brjod pa dang yang dag
185b1(phal chen): masungams pa dang / mngon par 'dug par byab dang / ba dang nga chun par byu dang / pa gso
185b2(phal chen): sa byur / mas / ngab gyu mam pas
185b3(phal chen): klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'khor dang bcas pa de mthar gyis yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor gyi grong khyer sgo bzang po gang na ba der phyin te/ khyeru dbang po'i dbang phyug yongs
185b4(phal chen): suM tshol tshol ba las/ de'i steng gi bar snang las lnga dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis bos pa rigs kyi bu khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ni
185b5(phal chen): chu klung gi chu 'dus dang nye ba zhig na byis pa song phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor ti/ byem la rtse bas rtse zhing 'dug go zhes nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzengs grong khyer sgo bzang po dang /
185b6(phal chen): ba'i chu klung gi chu 'dus gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / des khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor cing / bye ma la rtse bas rtse ba
185b7(phal chen): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas khye'u
186a1(phal chen): dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas
186a2(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
186a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams la gdam sra dge dang
186a4(phal chen): rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang ji ltar nan
186a5(phal chen): tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yi ge dang grangs dang / brda dang
186a6(phal chen): rtsis kyi tshul bslabs te/ bzo thams cad mngon par shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgor bcug go// de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni 'jig rten na yi ge dang ming
186a7(phal chen): gi rnam pa dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / brda dang / shod zabs shes par bya ba dang / bzo sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / khams kyi cho ga dang /
186b1(phal chen): dug gso pa'i thabs dang skem pa dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po'i gdon gyis btab pa gso ba dang zong dang / grong khyer dang / tshong dus dang @
186b2(phal chen): shing sri ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / granas rnam par dgod pa shes par bya ba dang / rab dang / khang pa dang / skar khung dang khang pa brtsegs pa'i
186b3(phal chen): tshad shes par bya ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / shing rta sbyar ba'i tshul sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / dge mi dge dang / 'jigs mi 'jigs kyi ltas dang mtshan ma
186b4(phal chen): shes par bya ba dang / rmos dang / tsheng dang / rnam par spyad par sbyar ba'i cho ga shes par bya ba dang / sems can gyi yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshan gyi
186b5(phal chen): rgyud dang / rgyas dang / rnam par spyad pa shes par bya ba dang / byed 'gro drung dran skyong gi las kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i tshul shes par bya ba dang / dge
186b6(phal chen): dri dang mi dge ba'i chos dang tshogs mchod pa shes par bya ba dang / bde 'gro dang ngan song gi tshogs shes par bya ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshigs
186b7(phal chen): shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang / rgyu dang / byed pa dang / sbyor ba'i rgyud shes par bya ba ji snyed po de dag thams cad
187a1(phal chen): shes te/ de dag la sems can yongs su gzud par byed do// rab tu dgod pa byed do// yongs su gzhog par byed do// slob tu 'dzud do//
187a2(phal chen): skyong du 'jug do// brtun par byed do// lhur len par byed do// rdzogs par byed do// yongs su sgrub par byed do// yongs su spyod par byed do// gsal bar bstan pa byed do//
187a3(phal chen): rnam par 'phel bar byed do// mtshan mar byed do// mthar phyin par byed do// rnam par sbyong bar byed do// dri ma med par byed do// shin tu dag par byed do// 'od gsal
187a4(phal chen): zhing dang bar byed do// shin tu yangs par byed do// de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsis kyi tshul shes pa de gang zhe na/ brgya stong phrag brgyan bye ba'o//
187a5(phal chen): bye ba bye ba na khod khod do// khod khod khod khod na zad dgu'o// zad dgu thad dgu na khrig khrig go// khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams so// thams thams thams thams
187a6(phal chen): na myad myed do// myad myid myad myid na gang ya'o// gang yu gang ya na ban bun no// dan bun ban bun na phyar phyur ro// phyar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go// lcag

187b1(phal chen): rgyung spudun zad ded ro// zung zer zar zer na khrib grib bo// thib khrib khrib khrib na ya gangs so// la gangs la gangs na rtso ma'o// chomachom na dzum tshim mo//

187b5(phal chen): phyod bsam pyod na brang breng ngo // zang breng brang breng na bgrod yas so// bgrod yas bgrod yas na bsto yas so// bsngo yas bsnga yas na zang yag go// zang yag zang

188a3(phal chen): bskal na gzhal 'phyos so// gzhal phyos gzhal phyos na gzhal yal lo// gzhal yal gzhal yal na gzhal med do// gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to//

188b1(phal chen): sman rdzi rngus to// ji rdus d+hI rdus na phan sol lo// phun yol phun yol na dadad do// da nga dang dngan bzang brtsi'o// bgrang brtsi bzang basbyi nA nub baglang ngo //

188b4(phal chen): khyim 'phyo byam 'pho nu ya me'o// ya me ya me na bskal yas so// bskal yas bskal yas na ldeb ldab bo// ldab ldeng ldang lteb na 'ban chud do// 'ban chad
188b5(phal chen): 'ban tshad ni pang phung ngo // bang phung par phung na khye'u tsang ngo // khye'u tsang khye'u tsang na zhung rdung ngo // zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yul lo// mchog yul mchog yal/

189a3(phal chen): gum na la lo'o// la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos so// bgrang 'phyos bgrang 'phyos na bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa'o// bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa bgrang 'phyos la bslus

189b1(phal chen): bsgres pa bsam pyod la bsgres na mtha' byam mo// mtha' blam mtha' byam na dpag thug go// dpag thag dpag thag na dpag zug la bsres pa'o// dpag zag pa/

189b3(phal chen): bsres pa na// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bskyes pa shin tu bstan pa'o// de'i mdun na bye ma'i phung po chen po dpag tshad du ma'i tshad dang ldan pa zhig 'dug
189b4(phal chen): 'dug pa las 'di la bye ma'i 'bru 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya ba nas/ bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa 'di snyed cig yod do zhes

189b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa kun na'ang yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis
189b7(phal chen): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing rtsi'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs

190a3(phal chen): ba'i tshul 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa thams cad na'ang yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i

190b2(phal chen): de ltar rigs kyi du kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba chos thams cad shes par bya ba'i bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems
190b3(phal chen): dpa' 'grong thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ dus gsum gyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi

191a1(phal chen): snang ba khong du chud par nus re skrun song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ zong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen
191a2(phal chen): ma phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gos de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan
191a3(phal chen): du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas sku g.yos te/ dga' ba chen po'i shugs skyes nas rab
191a4(phal chen): tu dgu' ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur pa/ ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa rin po che rab tu dkon pa thob pa/ 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i sems dang bsam pas byung ba/ sangs
191a5(phal chen): rgyas skyes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par 'gro ba la dbang sgyur ba/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la rten pa thams cad du rjes su song ba'i
191a6(phal chen): rig po rnam par phye bas 'byung ba bstan pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi dbyings su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang ldan pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho

191b1(phal chen): gi rlung pa gnyis la spyibos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbyung phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang blta swA te/ lce'u dang /

191b3(phal chen): gang cher mtsho lngar sbyin chen po'i char gyis ngoms mi shes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis dge ba yongs su sbyin par byas pa'i sa gzhi las
191b4(phal chen): dbang po'i myu gu 'thon cing skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i gdams ngag gi 'od zer gyi dra bas lus dang sems shin tu tshim par byas pa dpyid kyi
191b5(phal chen): nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdungs pa'i ri dgas kyi tshogs gsal zhing gsil ba'i grangs chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa
191b6(phal chen): bung ba mang po 'khor zhing lding bas rgyas par gyur pa'i pad+mo dang ldan pa'i pad+mo'i mtsho ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gris sems kyi me tog puN+Da ri ka kha bye ba/ rin
191b7(phal chen): po che sna tshogs kyi yongs su rgyas pa'i rin po che'i gling ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag rin po che 'phel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byas pa/ 'dzam bu'i
192a1(phal chen): shing chen po me tog dang 'bras bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa phun sum
192a2(phal chen): tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ klu'i dbang po chen po rtsed mo dam pas rtse ba las byung ba'i nam mkha'i sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag thos pa'i tshogs su gyur pa'i rnang
192a3(phal chen): shin tu che ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyis brgyan pa'i sna tshogs kyi spo ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyer gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i chos dri ma med pa sna tshogs brtsegs
192a4(phal chen): pa'i spror gyur pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba'i brgya byin lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las
192a5(phal chen): byung ba'i yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing zil gyis mi non la gzhan la zil gyis gnon pa de mthar gyis grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa gang na ba der phyin te/ dge
192a6(phal chen): bsnyen ma phul du byung ba yongs su tshol tshol ba las de la skye bo mang pos bstan te/ rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba de grong khyer gyi dbus kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug go zhes nas/
192a7(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu ni ri bzangs dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i gnas gang na ba der song ste thal mo sbyar nas sgo 'ang na sdod sdod pa dang / des dge bsnyen ma phul du
192b1(phal chen): zung ba'i rnam do shi tu rgya che la yangs shing rin po che'i rab sa yongs su bskor ba/ phyogs pa'i nas sgo shin tu mdzes pa rnam par bye ba/ rin po che tshad med grangs med
192b2(phal chen): pi'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsod nams kyi rnam par ldan pas mngon par grub pa mthong nas/ de khyim der song ste kun tu bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba phyugs cung
192b3(phal chen): shin tu gzhon lo/ thog ma dang la bab pa/ gzugs mngon zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog dam pa phri ya pa/ shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ sgra phye mar

192b5(phal chen): dpa' ma gtogs par dri'i lus sam/ sems kyi dbang ngam/ gzi brjid dam/ kha dog gis zil gyis ma non pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang med

192b7(phal chen): ston pa'i 'du shes su bsam pa zhig rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ngo // gzhan yang khyim de na stan lha rdzas dang / mi'i rdzas las shin tu

193a3(phal chen): ma rnan sa du

193a5(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi lhabo lhub kyis shin tu klubs pa/ lha'i bu mo'i skad lta bu'i dbyangs snyan pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de'i
193a6(phal chen): 'khor gyi bud med kyang des ci bsgo ba bzhin byed cing mdun na 'khod do// rim gro byed do// bkur sti byed do// gdong du lta'o// ci bsgo ba nyan cing gnas so//

193b1(phal chen): grong cher de'i 'khor thams cad du duzhim pos rtsub par 'dug ste/ sems can gang gis dring tshor bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ra
193b2(phal chen): gnyer ba med pa'i sems dang / tshe ba med pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang 'jungs pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / sgyu dang g.yo med pa'i sems dang / chags pa dang khong zong
193b3(phal chen): med pa'i sems dang / zhub pa dang gzeng mtho ba med pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / sdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang /
193b4(phal chen): gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba le re ba med pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ gang gis de dag gi skad thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / dul ba'i sa
193b5(phal chen): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang gis de dag mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam du rang rang gis shes par 'gyur ro// de ltar mthong nas
193b6(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar
193b7(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
194a1(phal chen): byung du sa sas na mas spyang du rnam pa / ng+yan pa
194a2(phal chen): nga chub ya rnams la ga ma sa su na/ 'dugasu mdzes nasas dpes rgyang chub
194a3(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa'i byerab par da byad de ltar na na du cing bdag la bu gang drugasol/ smras pa/ rnams kyi bu man kyang chu ba mas dpa'i
194a4(phal chen): rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyun ces bya ba thob pa rigs kyi bu lo mo ni zla ba gcig pu 'di las mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kha rdzas ci la dga'
194a5(phal chen): du/ dzod pa sna tshogasu dang / sna tshogs da / yangs sna tshogs dang / ji sna tshogs kyisatshim par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de la bral mon gru bra gcig sa
194a6(phal chen): las cil dga' ba'i kha zas kyis sems can brgya'ang yongs su tshim par byed do// sems can stong dang / sems can brgya phrug stong dang / sems can bye ba dang
194a7(phal chen): sems can bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can bye ba phrag stong dang sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas sems can brjod du
194b1(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// yongs su stobs pa byed do// yongs su dga' bar byed do//
194b2(phal chen): yongs su mgu bar byed do// yongs su spro bar byed do// shin tu tshim par byed do// yid bde bar byed do// 'on kyang phrub 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med do// 'grib pa med do// dpa'
194b3(phal chen): bar mi 'gyur ro// zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro// sa mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro// mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// mur thug par mi 'gyur ro// rigs
194b4(phal chen): kyi bu gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
194b5(phal chen): kye rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas sems
194b6(phal chen): can mos pa sna tshogs can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad cig 'ongs kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang /
194b7(phal chen): ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / ji sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// yongs su dga' bar byed do// nyams bde bar byed do// shin tu tshim
195a1(phal chen): paskyed do// yid shin tu 'de bar byed do// don kyang rngub 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med do// 'jib pa med do// dbang bar mi 'gyur/
195a2(phal chen): duzad par mi 'gyur ro// sa mtshams yid par mi 'gyur ro// mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// mur thug par me 'gyur ro// rigs kyi shugal te phyogs ba
195a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thos pa sna tshogs can dang / bsam pa sna tshogs can thams cad 'ongs par gyur na'ang / de dag thams cad ci
195a4(phal chen): la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas/ yid bde bar bya ba'i bar du byed do// kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
195a5(phal chen): ro dmya pa sna tshogs dang / sman sna tshogs dang mal cha sna tshogs dang bzhon po sna tshogs dang gos sna tshogs dang me tog sna tshogs dang / 'phreng ba
195a6(phal chen): sna tshogs dang spos sna tshogs dang bdug spos sna tshogs dang byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang rin po che sna tshogs dang rgyan sna tshogs
195a7(phal chen): dang rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang gdugs sna tshogs dang rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
195b1(phal chen): yongs su tshim par byed pa nas yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na nyan
195b2(phal chen): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i za ma 'dzin pa gang ji snyed gcig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha rdzas las gsol cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byung
195b3(phal chen): chub kyi 'bras bu brnyes par mdzad do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang
195b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang
195b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
195b6(phal chen): gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba skyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu
195b7(phal chen): phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
196a1(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nA/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag
196a2(phal chen): thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu brnyes par mdzad do// sher phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho
196a3(phal chen): phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang
196a4(phal chen): gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs na ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
196a5(phal chen): gcig na sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha bas las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu bzhugs
196a6(phal chen): nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na
196a7(phal chen): bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang /
196b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba zag khrig bcu phrag to
196b2(phal chen): dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul
196b3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/
196b4(phal chen): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bA snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed gcig
196b5(phal chen): bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub la bzhugs nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzod de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
196b6(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
196b7(phal chen): dang shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho rub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
197a1(phal chen): gcig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji skad cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing /
197a2(phal chen): snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te bdud sde dang bcas pa rab tu pham par mdzad nas/ tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi
197a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang
197a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag
197a5(phal chen): khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig
197a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin
197a7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed nas/ rigs kyi bu seng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku ra/
197b1(phal chen): gnag gis thogs pa ji snang cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang lo mog bzas las gsol cing snying po byung chub tu banubyas nas bdud pa dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/
197b2(phal chen): than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byeng nub tu mngon par 'dzang ba'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis lo mo'i ladir bya mang snying brag bcu po 'di dag mthong ba/ smras pa
197b3(phal chen): 'phags ma bdag gis mthong ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bud med 'di dag la sogs pa brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'o mo dang skal ba mnyam par spyod pa/ smon lam gcig pa/
197b4(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa 'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa/ mos pa'i las rnam par dag pa gcig pa/ kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo
197b5(phal chen): rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo tshad med par gyur pa/ skal ba mnyam par dbang po rab tu thob pa/ skal ba mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ skal ba mnyam par spyod
197b6(phal chen): yul gyi yul dang ldan pa skal ba mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ skal ba mnyam par don nges par rtogs pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi don ston pa/ skal ba mnyam par
197b7(phal chen): gzugs rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par stobs tshad med par/ skal ba mnyam par brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi sgra sngogs pa/ skal ba mnyam par dbyangs
198a1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa/ tshad med pa'i yon tan brjod du yod pas rnam par spyod pa thams cad la skal ba mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa las kyi rnam par smin pa/
198a2(phal chen): la kha na ma tho ba med cing / rnam par dag pas skal ba mnyam par las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa skal ba mnyam par byams pa chen pos rgyas par
198a3(phal chen): 'gengs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas mi skyo ba'i phyir/ skal ba mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad
198a4(phal chen): tshim par byed pa'i lus yongs su ston pas skal ba mnyam par lus kyi lus rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig tha snyad la skal ba mnyam par ngag gi las rnam par dag pa
198a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skal ba mnyam par 'dong ba sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skal ba mnyam par
198a6(phal chen): rgyu ba chos thams cad kyi tshul 'khong du chud par bya ba la skal ba mnyam par mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya
198a7(phal chen): ba la skal ba mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa sha stag gcig kyang yod de/ rigs kyi bu bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig gcig tu 'di lta ste byang chub sems
198b1(phal chen): dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la zhal zas yongs su dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rdzus par 'dong ngo // bru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing srid pa'i tha ma pa dang /
198b2(phal chen): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la bsod skams dngul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo // zla ba 'di cid nus kha zas grangs shing
198b3(phal chen): phyogs bcu rgyas par dkang ste/ yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis yongs sgro tshimo par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar 'o mo ni bru ba 'di nyid nus lha rnams ni wa
198b4(phal chen): kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// klu rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis gnod sbyin rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi kha zas kyis dri za rnams ni dri za'i kha zas kyis
198b5(phal chen): lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi kha zas kyis/ nam mkha' lding rnams ni nam mkha' lding gi kha zas kyis/ mri 'am ci rnams ni mi 'am ci'i kha zas kyis/ lto 'phya
198b6(phal chen): chen po rnams ni lto 'phye chen po'i kha zas kyis me rnams ni me'i khagrus kyis/ mi ma yin pa rnams ni mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// rigs
198b7(phal chen): kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang de'u re mngon du 'gyur ro// dge bsnyen pa phul du byung ba des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du
199a1(phal chen): byung bas skyon gyi smon lam gyis byos pas/ sems can grangs med pa nig shar phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to// de bzhin du 'di
199a2(phal chen): ste dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis nges pasasems can grangs med pa zhig sde phyogs dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas
199a3(phal chen): nang du 'ongs par gyur te/ de ltar 'ongs pa de dag dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas stan de dag la bkod de/ so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang
199a4(phal chen): ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang ldan pas yongs su tshim par byas so// yongs su bstabs pa byas so// yongs su dga' bar
199a5(phal chen): byas so// yongs su mgu bar byas so// yongs su spro bar byas so// shin tu tshim par byas so// yid bde bar byas so// kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de
199a6(phal chen): bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro dam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang /
199a7(phal chen): me tog sna tshogs dang / 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang gang byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang
199b1(phal chen): N+yar+ya sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rnga sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i bdan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa lnga tshogs kyis yo/
199b2(phal chen): su tshim par byas nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so// lnga rnams ni lha'i 'bras kyis yongs su tshim par byas so// klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
199b3(phal chen): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyang mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas yid
199b4(phal chen): bde bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so// 'on kyang phrub de las god par gyur pa med/ 'gribs pa myed/ dpyas pa med/ zas par gyur pa med/ sa mtshams su gyur pa ma
199b5(phal chen): mthar thug pa med/ mur thug pa med do// des nas dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho mos
199b6(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyun ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtsho mi
199b7(phal chen): zad pas mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu bsags pas nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs/
200a1(phal chen): par byed pas nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su srung bas bsod nams chen po'i khyor yug dang ldan
200a2(phal chen): pa 'gro ba thams cad du rin po che snyim pa nas char ltar 'thor bas bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur pa/ chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo'i byed pas bsod nams chen po'i mdzod la
200a3(phal chen): mngon sum du lta ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'phongs pa'i mun pa sel bas bsod nams chen po'i sgron mar gyur pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re skan
200a4(phal chen): song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
200a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis
200a6(phal chen): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i
200a7(phal chen): drung nas blta bas mngoms bzhin du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/
200b1(phal chen): bsod rnams tu mchod la ni rjes su sems bsod nams kyi nam ma'a' de la ni kun da la/ bsod nams kyi phung por ni yongs su 'dzid bsod nams kyi re bo des ni mngon par
200b2(phal chen): 'dzeg/ bsod nams kyi tshogs de ni yang dag par srud/ bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yongs su 'bog/ bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni rab tu 'dra ba/ bsod nams kyi dkyil
200b3(phal chen): 'khor de'i yongs su sbyong / bsod nams kyi gter de la ni yang dag par lta/ bsod nams kyi tshul de la ni rjes su dran par byed/ bsod nams kyi chos de ni yongs su 'dzin bsod
200b4(phal chen): nams kyi rgyud de ni yongs su sbyong ba byed cing mthar gyis gong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na ba der phyin nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la blta bas bsgos
200b5(phal chen): pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
200b6(phal chen): la rim gro bya bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par gyur pa'i bsod
200b7(phal chen): rnams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro bya ba
201a1(phal chen): la mkhas pa dang / rnam par 'phel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang
201a2(phal chen): yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang / yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par
201a3(phal chen): bsgrub pa dang / shin tu yengs par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par yang dag par mthong nas sangs rgyas thams cad lus byang
201a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i skyed pas chos kyi snang ba yang dag par blang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu snang ba rnam par 'phel bar byed cing khyim bdag
201a5(phal chen): mkhas pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi dbus lab gyi bzhi mdo zhig na rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la rin po che grangs med pa las byas pa'i khri
201a6(phal chen): nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang in+d+ra nI la sna tshogs kyis sbas pa bkye ba gser gyi lcags pod kye dra bas legs par blas pa nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po can
201a7(phal chen): rin po che lnga brgya tsam gyis gzugs lags par brgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs bting ba gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mang po bsgreng ba rin po che
201b1(phal chen): drum drangs gnanas log pa/ rin po che'i zla re chen po zlos pa tha nas gser dang rin po che'i mu tog gi lnga ldi mang po brtse ba zhig la 'dug cing 'dzam bu rgya zung gig ster/
201b2(phal chen): gyi gdugs yu ba dri ma med pa bai DUR+Ya las byas pa ni drung nas bsgreng zhing bzung g.yag rnga dri ma med pa'i rdul yab ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bu sa ni legs par g.yab spos kyi rim gro
201b3(phal chen): yo byad sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs shing bsangs/ rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba lha rdzas kyi dbyangs las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam ni g.yas g.yon nas brdzus shing dkrol
201b4(phal chen): grong khyer 'byung ba chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams shin tu dga' bar bya ba'i don du lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char ni kun nas 'bab par gyur pa g.yog sreg chags stong phrag
201b5(phal chen): bcu tsam sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod pa/ ngag nyan cing ci dga' bar byed pa lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyun gyis shin tu brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'
201b6(phal chen): bsam pa yongs su grub pa lha dang mi'i gzugs las shin tu 'das pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyim bdag mkhas pa gang
201b7(phal chen): na ba der songs phyin nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la skye bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag pa bas pa la lan brgya song du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas
202a1(phal chen): nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag ni/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug
202a2(phal chen): bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad shin tu bde ba la dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas mngon par gdon pa dang / sems can thams/
202a3(phal chen): cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang dag par bskyal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan shin tu bskam pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying rje'i rlan yang dag par bskyed
202a4(phal chen): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'dod po'i dga' ba dang sred pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing bsgrub par bgyi ba dang
202a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mtha' dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang chos la dga' zhing mos pa yang dag par skyed pa dang /
202a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad khams gsum gyi grong rdal nas gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud par sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
202a7(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyis kyang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags
202b1(phal chen): pa 'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bsnan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
202b2(phal chen): pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bslabs na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa
202b3(phal chen): dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
202b4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
202b5(phal chen): spyod pa yongs su tshol ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la blta bas mi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la/
202b6(phal chen): rim gro bya bas skyed lug pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid mi bde ba mi skyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal ba las phyir mi ldog pa drang
202b7(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mos shing dad pa'i yid las rnam par mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta ba lnga phyir mi zlog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
203a1(phal chen): gdams ngag gi tshul la zhum pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya bas mi skyo ba de lta bu ni shin tu dkon no// rigs kyi bu khyod
203a2(phal chen): kyis kho bos 'khor 'di dag mthong mod/ smras pa/ 'phags pa mthong ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag kun kyang kho bos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
203a3(phal chen): tu sems bskyed pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos pha rol tu phyin pas bstud de gasngos pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos
203a4(phal chen): chos dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnam par bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi rigs las gyen du bskyod pa'o// /
203a5(phal chen): 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las bzlog pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la
203a6(phal chen): btsud pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du ltung ba las yongs su bzung ba'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong du chud par bya ba la bkod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub
203a7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams mang po thob pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bo ni zas 'dod pa rnams la
203b1(phal chen): zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / ro'i dam pa 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dam pa dang / bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba
203b2(phal chen): dang thug pa 'dod pa rnams la thug pa dang / mung ba 'dod pa rnams la mur ba dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / 'phreng ba 'dod pa
203b3(phal chen): rnams la 'phreng ba dang spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / bdug pa 'dod pa rnams la bdug pa dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / phye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye ma dang / rgyan
203b4(phal chen): dang lbab lbub 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang lngab lbub dang / rin po che 'dod pa rnams la rin po che dang / gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la dngul dang / mu tig
203b5(phal chen): 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang / rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang / stan 'dod pa rnams la stan dang / mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang yi byad
203b6(phal chen): 'dod pa rnams lan pa'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / dgal ba 'dod pa rnams la dgal ba dang / glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba
203b7(phal chen): glang dang / bong bu dang / ma he dang / ra lug 'dod pa rnams la/ glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba glang dang / bong bu dang / ma he dang / ra lug dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
204a1(phal chen): gdugs dang / bdan dod pa rnams la/ rgyal mtshan dang gzugs dang bdan dang / bran po dang bran mo 'dod pa rnams la thun po dang thun mo dang/
204a2(phal chen): 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor gyi byis pa dang / bud med 'dod pa rnams la bud med dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma 'dod pa rnams la bu mo gzhon nu dang / cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po
204a3(phal chen): tshe 'dod pa rnams la cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che dang / zor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la thor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che dang / ske mthon bzing
204a4(phal chen): dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa rnams la sgra mthon mthing dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la'ang yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin
204a5(phal chen): pabyed do// rigs kyi bu yung tsam zhig sdod dang de'u re mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pa des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la/ sems can grangs med pa
204a6(phal chen): zhig khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ phyogs tha dad pa dang / yul dang gnas tha dad pa dang / grong khyer tha dad pa dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dang / tshong dus tha
204a7(phal chen): dad pa dang / ljongs tha dad pa dang / 'or gyi grong tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rigs tha dad pa dang / sems can rnam pa mi mthun
204b1(phal chen): pa tha dad pa dang / lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang ming du byang ba za dad pa nas/ sems can skye mched rnam par dag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa 'azas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/
204b2(phal chen): kha zas sna tshogs 'dod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba gtsang ba 'dod pa dang / sha 'dod pa dang / kha zas rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshog
204b3(phal chen): gyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lnga ste/ mi'i nang nas 'bras chan dang / sran chan dang / 'khur ba dang / skyo ma dang / nya dang / sha la sogs pa khom gyis bza'
204b4(phal chen): ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dang / mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad na rnam par spyod pa dag las kyang / kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dag de
204b5(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thogs pa med par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par
204b6(phal chen): gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag mkhas pa la spongs mo 'debs so// gdong du lnga'o// sdod do// gsol ba 'debs so// de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas slong ba de dag kun nas
204b7(phal chen): 'dus par shes nas yu tsam du bsams te nam mkha' la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas dang btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/
205a1(phal chen): dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'thon te/ lag mthil du 'ong bar gyur ro// des de dag yongs su blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i slong mo pa mos pa/
205a2(phal chen): sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag ci 'dod pa'i zas dang / btung ba'i rnam pa dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par byas so// ci 'dod pa yongs su byin
205a3(phal chen): no// rab tu dga' bar byas so// shin tu tshim par byas so// dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so// nyams shin tu bde bar byas so// yid rab tu dga' bar byas so// de
205a4(phal chen): ltar de dag shin tu tshim par byas nas des kyang mchog ste/ de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyud yongs su brjod de chos bstan to//
205a5(phal chen): 'phongs pa thams cad 'byung mi srid pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / skyid pa chen po yongs su 'grub pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs
205a6(phal chen): su brjod pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / dga' ba bza' ba'i zas rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
205a7(phal chen): pos shin tu brgyan pa'i lus 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / thub pa med pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bla na med pa'i kha zas yongs su
205b1(phal chen): shes pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs mi zad pa rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa bya ste chos bstam
205b2(phal chen): to// des kha zas don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/ de dag la tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang /
205b3(phal chen): spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// des btung ba don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la btung ba mang po zhim pa kha na ma tho ba med pa/ yid shin tu dga' bar byed pa
205b4(phal chen): de dag gis tshim par byas nas/ de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor ba la dga' ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su
205b5(phal chen): bskyed pa'i phyir chos bstan to// des ro'i mchog don du gnyer zhing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs dngar ba dang / sbyar ba dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang
205b6(phal chen): bsko ba rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su tshim par byas te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// des bzhon pa don du gnyer zhing phyogs
205b7(phal chen): kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la gnon pa sna tshogs kyis sbyin pas yongs su bsnyad de/ de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// des gos don du
206a1(phal chen): gnyer zhing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings las
206a2(phal chen): gos sna tshogs sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po dang / lde brgan dang shel gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa kha dog sna tshogs can kha dog du mar rnam par
206a3(phal chen): dag pa dgra 'thon cing lag pa'i mthil du 'ongs pas des de dag gis slongs mo pa de dag la yongs su bstud nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang //
206a4(phal chen): mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu thog par 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slongs mo pa rnams la bstud pa byas nas
206a5(phal chen): ci rigs su chos bstan to// de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas tshong de pon gyi bu nor
206a6(phal chen): bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yo byad
206a7(phal chen): dbang thob pa rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su khebs par byas shing sangs rgyas kyi brjod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i/
206b1(phal chen): b+hi r+ya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che do na sa kyi sngon gyin rab tu 'bebs pa de bzhin du d+han kha dog snga tshogs kyi sbyin dang / cod par
206b2(phal chen): 'dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / kha pa brtsegs pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi sbyin dang / na bza' 'dog sna tshogs kyi sbyin dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdungs pa dang / dkrol ba dang gru yid/
206b3(phal chen): du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba drang dbyug
206b4(phal chen): pa dang / bye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char dang /
206b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang sems can thams cad yongs
206b6(phal chen): su smin pa dang / gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 'beb pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am yon tan brjod pa 'am rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa nus
206b7(phal chen): re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi chud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug pud ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song
