234b6(phal chen): gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgya mtsho'i g.yo spu'i rnyog pa dang bar byed pas nor bu rin po che chu 'dung dang 'dra ba 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang smon lam yongs su rdzog
234b7(phal chen): par byed pas nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba 'gro ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i khang pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang cher/
235a1(phal chen): por gsog pas rlung dmar chen po dang 'dra ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ bsod nams kyi ri bo gdul ba'am/ yon
235a2(phal chen): tan gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i nam mkha' la blta ba 'am/ smon lam chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la snga mtshams gcad pa 'am chos mjam pa nyid kyi stobs la tshad gzung
235a3(phal chen): ba 'am/ theg pa chen po'i rgyan gyis bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa 'am kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par brjod pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin che ru po
235a4(phal chen): bsgoms pa'i sgo dbye ba 'am/ snying rje chen po'i sprin yongs su smos par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na rgyal po'i gnas brtan pa zhes
235a5(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan
235a6(phal chen): tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.ya
235a7(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas ras/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i drung nas song so// bam po dgu bcu drug pa/ de nas tshong /
235b1(phal chen): dngon gyi bu nor ba ngas zong byer chen po'od bzang po nas byung ste/ yung tsam du lam gyi mgo btsal nas rgyal po 'od chen po'i gdam smra drug d+he la rjes su byas du pa byed cing rlung
235b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul dums pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan de rjes su dran par bya ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i grong gi snang ba chen po de yongs su bsgom pa dang /
235b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyar rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mngon par bsgrub pa dang byang chub sems pa'i spon
235b4(phal chen): lam dang / bsod nams kyi dbang dang / stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag rjes su spel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes kyi tshul
235b5(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de shin tu brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi bag nyid che ba thun mong du gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub
235b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i gnas rnam pa tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag kyang mtshan mar bya ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par drag pa
235b7(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su dag pa de la brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
236a1(phal chen): can gyi dor bsam pa snang ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la yid ches par byed byed pas sems dga' zhing mos pa'i shugs dang / sems kyi nyams 'dre
236a2(phal chen): ba dang / sems shin tu tshim pa dang / sems khong nas dga' ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa dang / sems 'od dang ba dang / sems brtan pa dang sems rgya che
236a3(phal chen): ba dang / sems mi zad pa thob ste/ de de ltar dge ba'i shes gnyen rjes su drang zhing yid la byed pa la brtson pas gdong mchi mas gang nas rjes su sems pa kyi hud kyi
236a4(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba 'di ni yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/
236a5(phal chen): ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o// byang chub sems
236a6(phal chen): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad yongs su skyed pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bsgrubs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char
236a7(phal chen): rab tu 'bebs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi tshul thams cad rab tu brjod pa'o// shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par skyed pa'o//
236b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po brtan pa'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag ngan song gi g.yang sa thams cad nas skyob pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyer rnams ni/
236b2(phal chen): bdag chos mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la gzhog pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde ba dang mi bde ba ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la
236b3(phal chen): theg pa chen po yongs su ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gdams ngag gis 'dems pa'o// dge ba'i bshes
236b4(phal chen): gnyen rnams ni bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi lam ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas su phyin par skyel ba'o// dge ba'i bshes
236b5(phal chen): gan rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyi rdzu ky-i ma cwol 'jug par byed pa'o// dge ba'i bses gnyen rnams ni 'dag la dus gsum gyi shes bya rgya mdza'i tshul rab tu ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes brnyen/
236b6(phal chen): rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i chos thams cad rnams par 'phel bar byed/
236b7(phal chen): pa'o// zhes de de ltar ngu shing sde sngags 'don pa'i tshe/ nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod pa'i lha'i tshogs dang / rtag tu bye bzhin 'brang zhing yang dag par bskul ba dang
237a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bu shes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la zhugs pa'i
237a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems
237a3(phal chen): dpas ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du'ang shin tu bsnyen pa yin dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la the tsom mi za ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams
237a4(phal chen): kyang nye bar bsnyen pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyisarigs kyi bu rgyal
237a5(phal chen): po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song zhig dang / de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
237a6(phal chen): bzangs ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba las langs nas/ mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba grang na ba der song nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba
237a7(phal chen): yongs su tshol zhing rmed rmed pa las/ de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de ni rang gi khyim na pha ma dang 'grogs shing gzhon nur gyur pa ste
237b1(phal chen): rang gi gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor rnying skye bo'i rtogs chen po la chos sbyor to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' ba chen po dang myos shing spro bas
237b2(phal chen): yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gyi sgon spyod pa'i tshe/ des khyim de
237b3(phal chen): thams cad 'od lus dang sems shin tu bde bar byed pa/ gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing gsal bar gyur nas/ 'od des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la phog par
237b4(phal chen): gyur ma thag tu/ tshor ba thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po drang / 'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'i
237b5(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la
237b6(phal chen): sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur te yongs su skyes so// de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon pa ste/ 'di ltar dper na thogs ma mngal du zhugs pa'i/
237b7(phal chen): rnam par shes pa la bu hA/ ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes par gyur to// des dri zhim po zhig tshor ra'ang de ni lnga la'ang med/ lha'i bu mo la'ang med/
238a1(phal chen): klu la'ang med/ klu'i bu mo la'ang med/ gnod sbyin la'ang med/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la'ang med dri za la'ang med/ dri za'i bu mo la'ang med
238a2(phal chen): lha ma yin la'ang med/ lnga ma yin gyi bu mo la'ang med/ nam mkha' lding la'ang med/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo la'ang med/ mi 'am ci la'adra med/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo la'ang
238a3(phal chen): medalto 'phye chen po la'ang med/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo la'ang med/ mi la'ang med/ mi'i bu mo la'ang med cing mi srid pa de lta bu'i dri zhim po tshor bar gyur to// bud
238a4(phal chen): med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / kha dog dang mdog de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang / kha dog dang
238a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i kha dog dang mdog ma gtogs par/ de'i kha dog dang mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong lus kyi chu
238a6(phal chen): zheng dang dbyings de lta'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khrun chu zheng dang / dbyibs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs ma gtogs par//
238a7(phal chen): de'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs su mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / 'od kyi rgyan de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems
238b1(phal chen): dpang dadrang skur 'thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma gtogs par/ de'i 'od kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong/ de'i kha'i ngad kyi dri'im po dang mnyam
238b2(phal chen): pa'i dri de lta bu'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam/ klu dang / gnod byin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
238b3(phal chen): dbye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i gnas na med na lhag po lnga ga las 'ong / khyim gyi rgyan dang longs spyod de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod dang / byang chub
238b4(phal chen): sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i longs spyod ma gtogs par/ de'i khyim gyi rgyan dang longs spyod du mnyam pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta g.yos 'od / g.yog
238b5(phal chen): 'khor phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ma gtogs par/ de'i g.yog 'khor
238b6(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa dang mnyam pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rwa med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong ste/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis blta bar nus pa'i
238b7(phal chen): sems can de lta bu'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med do// dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de mthong ma zag tu/ nyon mongs pa zhi bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can yang
239a1(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na tshangs pa chen po stong brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba la ni 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon
239a2(phal chen): mongs pa rnams mi rgyu'o// de bzhin du dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'ang mthong ma thag tu/ sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa mi rgyu'o// dge bsnyen ma mi ge yo ba de la blta bas ngoms par
239a3(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu'ang / shes rab kyis ngoms pa ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi ris na med do// de nas tshong dpon gyi
239a4(phal chen): bu nor bzangs kyis dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i lus kyi byin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang sa'i
239a5(phal chen): gzhi dang / grong khyer dang / rin po che chen po thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgrub pa
239a6(phal chen): mthong ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim po tshor nas 'khor rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/ khyim dang gzhal med khang gi rgyan phun
239a7(phal chen): sum tshogs pa mi 'phrogs pa mthong nas/ yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa khong du chud de/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod do// khyod kyis rtag
239b1(phal chen): tu tshul khrims dri med yongs bsrung te/ bzod pa shin tu yangs pa'ang yongs su bsgom mdzad cing / brtson 'grus brtun pa rdo rje lta bu bsgrubs pas na ri bo'i rgyal po lta bur 'gro
239b2(phal chen): bi'i phags shing 'drar/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigs su bcad pa des mngon par bskyod de 'di skad ces smras so//
239b3(phal chen): 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
239b4(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'bags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis zos na/ 'phags pa rdzi
239b5(phal chen): lngar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par brtse ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas dge bsnar ma mi
239b6(phal chen): g.yo byas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngagra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong la nyams su bde bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig tu brjod nas 'di skad ces
239b7(phal chen): smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs mo legs so// rigs kyi bu mo ni byang chub sems
240a1(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam brtan pa la slob pa chos thams/
240a2(phal chen): cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo thob pa'o// kho mo ni spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa thob pa'o// kho mo ni chos thams cad yongs
240a3(phal chen): su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob pa'o// smras pa 'i phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po de'i yul
240a4(phal chen): ni ji lta bu zhig mchis yi dum la brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang
240a5(phal chen): bar brjod pa'i spobs pa snang ba'i sgo dang / chos yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis smras pa rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni yid ches
240a6(phal chen): par dka' 'o// smras pa/ 'phags ma bstan du gsol// sangs rgyas kyi byid dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung na yid lta ches par mchi grang / rtogs pa dang
240a7(phal chen): 'tshal ba dang / rnam par rtogs pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa dang / rig pa dang / dmigs su phebs pa dang / goms pa dang / mi 'gal ba dang / rnam par mi rtogs pa dang /
240b1(phal chen): sgro 'dogs pa pa bachis pa dang / mnyam par babyed par yang mchis dang / de nas dge bsnyen pa mi g.yobs/ tshong dpon gyi bu ror bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs/
240b2(phal chen): kye zla sngon 'das pa'i dus shig na dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bsgral pa la de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ kho mo yang de'i tshe rgyal po glog gis byin pa'i bu
240b3(phal chen): gcig ma zhig tu gyur nas/ de'i tshe nub mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/ rgyal po'i sgo'ang bcad/ pha dang ma'ang nyal/ skyes pa dang bud med dag kyang gnyid kyis log/ rol mo brdung ba dang
240b4(phal chen): dkrol ba'i sgra'i nge zhi lhan cig spyod pa'i bud med lnga brgya tsam dag kyang nyal bar gyur pa zhi na/ kho mo mal gyi steng na 'dug cing / nam mkha'i dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i tshogs kyi
240b5(phal chen): 'phreng ba rnam par 'khod pa la lta lta ba las/ steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang ba ri'i dbang po
240b6(phal chen): rab ltar/ lba dang / ku dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zla dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba/ byang chub
240b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/ phyogs thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra ba thogs pa med pas rgyas par khyab pa'i sku bzhugs pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
241a1(phal chen): baspu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang dri zhim po rnam pa 'di lta bu thung ste/ de'i khro mo'i lus dang sems shin tu bde bar gyur/ yid shin tu dbri 'brur gyur te/ mal
241a2(phal chen): gyi steng nas langs nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te sa la brabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba de la phyag 'tshal te/ de'i spyi gtsug la bltas
241a3(phal chen): na'ang mtha' thug par ma rung / g.yas g.yon gyi tshad kyang zin par ma rung / mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa la bsams na'ang ngoms par ma rung ste/ de'i tshe kho mos 'di
241a4(phal chen): snyam du bsams so// las ji lta bu zhig byas na lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni 'thob par 'gyur/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ 'od kyi
241a5(phal chen): rgyan phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'grub par 'gyur/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsod nams
241a6(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag par 'grub/
241a7(phal chen): par 'gyur/ gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
241b1(phal chen): pa dus rab tu btung ba des ma mo'i bsam bzugs su chud nas 'di skad ces bkar stsal to// bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gnon pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems skyed cig bad /
241b2(phal chen): par zhen pa thams cad gsal ba'i phyir 'pham pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ chos zang po'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir ma pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ sems cad bsapa pa mi 'azad pa dang ldan/
241b3(phal chen): pa'i rgya mtsho'i grong du ltung bas mi bskul ba'i sems skyed cig/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i skye mched du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad blta
241b4(phal chen): bar mos pargyun mi gcad pa'i phyir ngoms mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams
241b5(phal chen): cad kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nges par rtogs pa'i sems skyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gzung ba'i phyir yang dag par bzung ba'i sems skyed cig/
241b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba lta la ci spos kyi/ chung ngu na brdar byas pa tsam la'ang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ bu mo khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji
241b7(phal chen): lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam par dbye ba'i phyir/ rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig ces byung ste/ de ltar rigs kyi bu kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
242a1(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang ba las/ chos kyi tshul gyi gdams ngag gi sgo rnam pa de la bu dag thos nas/ thams cad bskyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos/
242a2(phal chen): par gyur/ stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la ni mngon par smon par gyur / sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni mngon par dad par gyur/ sas rgyas kyi 'od kyi can ni yongs su sbyang bar dka'/ sangs rgyas
242a3(phal chen): kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su bsgrub par dga' sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun
242a4(phal chen): sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par smon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur
242a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas/ rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshon cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang
242a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi phyed mi tshugs pa skyed de/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar gzung ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu/
242a7(phal chen): yid kyi dgu las kyang 'dod pa la spyad par mi dran na/ gnyis kyi gnyis 'du ba la ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes la'ang khong khro ba'i sems cig ma
242b1(phal chen): brnyed / de ma yin pa'i sems cad mnyes pa gzhal la'i spros/ de nas nye bar bzung batshur chang du ngab tul ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang bskyed par me dang / deb med/
242b2(phal chen): pa'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gir byeng te mngon par chags pa la ci spos/ shi 'pho dang mngal na gnas pa'i tsherang sems rmongs pa'am// 'du shes sna tshogs sam/ lung du ma bstan
242b3(phal chen): pa'i sems kyang thung ngu mi dran nu/ legs par bsams shing lta ci smos/ bskal pa de snyed cig tu sangs rgyas gcig kyang chung ngu na rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang
242b4(phal chen): rjes su mi dran na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar gzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin kyang /
242b5(phal chen): chung ngu na ming du zla ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ge gcig kyang brjes par mi dran na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba la ci spos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chung du/
242b6(phal chen): chos kyi rgya mtsho de snyed cig 'thung 'thung yang chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la tshig 'ga' yang ma bsams ma brtags par mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de snyed cig gis/
242b7(phal chen): chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las kyang chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang tshul yang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la'ang kho mos ting nge 'dzin mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta du med do//
243a1(phal chen): de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa de skad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung yang ji ltar yongs su bzung ba las/ sems tsanA 'dul ba'i dbang du/
243a2(phal chen): bya ba ma gtogs par chung ngu na rjes su brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang yi ge 'ga' yang bor bar mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig mthong yang
243a3(phal chen): chung ngu na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste/ smon lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do//
243a4(phal chen): de nas nye bar bzung ba'i tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ga' tsam yang / kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yod
243a5(phal chen): su drag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems can glang kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma bskul ba de lta bu
243a6(phal chen): gcig kyang mig lam du 'ongs par mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mngon par bsgrubs su mi dran no// /
243a7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig len yang tshig dang yi ge 'ga' la'ang the tsam bskyed pa 'am/ gnyis kyi 'du shes sam/
243b1(phal chen): rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam/ rab kyi 'du shes sam/ bzung ngan gyi 'du shes sam// sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du mi dran no// rigs kyi bu'o ma/
243b2(phal chen): nide phyin chad du sangs rgyas byung ba dang ma bral lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma thal lo// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mthul lo// yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bu shes garten
243b3(phal chen): rnams dang ma bral lo// sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems drapa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dang ma
243b4(phal chen): bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa'i mdzod dang gter thos pa thob pa dang ma bral
243b5(phal chen): lo/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing / khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo// mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i
243b6(phal chen): rgyu thos pa thob pa dang pa bral lo// 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra bas dkyil 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma thal lo// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
243b7(phal chen): 'thung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thob pa dang ma bral lo// sems can tham cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongs su ston pa dang pa bral lo// sems can thams cad shes par byed pa'i dbyangs
244a1(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dang ba dang ba bral lo// rigs kyi bu lo mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang / chos
244a2(phal chen): thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgro 'di la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam la brtan pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / gzungs
244a3(phal chen): kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / chos 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod na/
244a4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu khyod mngon sum du blta bar 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'phags ma 'tshal lo// de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de na de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ byang chub sems
244a5(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi
244a6(phal chen): sgo don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi/
244a7(phal chen): zad pa'i mdzod la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam par blta ba dang / rnam par spyad pa dang / rjes su 'jug pa dang / nges par rtogs par byas so// de ltar dge bsnyen ma mi
244b1(phal chen): g.yob sgoms par zhugs pa drug tu/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med rnam pa drug tu/
244b2(phal chen): g.yos pa dang / baiDUR+Ya yongs su dag pa'i rgyu las tur par gnas par mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i phreng ga'i pa bye ba phrag brgya brdzun/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya rje
244b3(phal chen): bkrugs par mthong ste 'i/ lA la ni dgra' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas/ la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo // de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Ya'i
244b4(phal chen): rang bzhin de dag yongs su dag cing sgrib pa med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas 'od zer dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab par mnga' ba dang
244b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho'ang mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo
244b6(phal chen): thams cad rjod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du rnam par grag pa'ang thos par gyur to// de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas//
244b7(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces sbas so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ thos sam/ shes sam/ smras pa/ 'phags ma mthong ngo // thos so// rig go
245a1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yi dam bstan pa la slob cing / chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
245a2(phal chen): gzhag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thar pa'i sgo thub pa dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la gangs ras/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyisa'i gsus yong du drud pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes
245a3(phal chen): snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa
245a4(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas med par spyod pa/ nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po chen po ltar yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems
245a5(phal chen): dpa' gdon pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug po/ tshong pa ltar stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'dod cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i gling du rgyu ba
245a6(phal chen): mthu dang ldan pa'i nye ba ltar yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya dang ldan pa'i lag pas sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mngon par gdon pa'i phyir chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam
245a7(phal chen): par rgyu ba lnga'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen po gdul ba bzlog pa'i phyir khams gsum gyi gnas yongs su bkang zhing rnam par rgyu ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
245b1(phal chen): lngar sems can gyi sred pa'i chu dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dang shin tu bsam pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam ma'a'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pa zla ba nya shing rgyas pa kar 'dul ba'i/
245b2(phal chen): yid kyi me tog ku mu da rnam par kha dbye ba'i phyir ye shes kyi nam mkha' la mngon par shar ba sa'i gzhi lar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i myu gu bskrad cing rnam par spel
245b3(phal chen): ba'i phyir byams mi byams dang / mtho dman med par 'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa/ rlung dmar ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lte bo'i shing dang / shing phran rgyu
245b4(phal chen): nags tshal dang kun dga' rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir chags pa med par phyogs thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang rkyen gyis 'gro ba
245b5(phal chen): thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir 'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lce phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul dga' 'dzan
245b6(phal chen): tshad med pa na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa/
245b7(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bye ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
246a1(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i drung nas song ngo //
246a2(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor badrangs dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba mngon du byas te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas bstan pa dang / yang dag
246a3(phal chen): par bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par brjod pa dang / bzhag pa dang / rnam par phye ba dang / smos pa dang / rgya cher bstan pa de dag la tham cad gdon mi za
246a4(phal chen): bar yid ches shing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang rtogs par bya ba/
246a5(phal chen): dang snang bar bya ba dang / mnyam par bya ba byed cing mthar gyis gnas nas gnas dang / yul nas yul du brgyus te rgyu zhing song song nas/ yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa gang na ba der phyin nas/
246a6(phal chen): grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol tshol te/ nyi ma nub tu cha ba zhig na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par phyin nas grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nang du song ste/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo'i
246a7(phal chen): dbus shig tu phyin nas/ srang gi sgo nas srang gi sgo dang lam gyi bzhi mdo nas lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / grong phrag nas grong phrag tu kun tu rgyu tham cad du 'gro ba tshol zhing rmed rmed pa dang mtshan mo minyal
246b1(phal chen): tsam zhig nu/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i byang phyogs log+ha nA ri shin tu mod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i rtse mo rtswa dang / gel ba dang / sman sna tshogs dpa' draga' ltar skyes pas brgyan
246b2(phal chen): pa 'od chen po dang ldan pa nyi ma shar ba la bur gnas pa mthong ngo // des snang ba de mthong nas dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes te/ 'di snyam du bsams so// bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rje
246b3(phal chen): rtse mo 'di la gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/ grong khyer de nas byung ste/ ri shin tu mod pa gang na ba der phyin pa dang / ri shin tu mod pa de la 'dzegs nas ri'i rtse mo snang ba chen
246b4(phal chen): po can gang ra ba der phyin pa dang / rgyang yang ring po nig nas kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshangs pa chen po las kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa dpal gyis shin tu 'bar ba zhig
246b5(phal chen): tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te 'chags na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de'i drung du phyin te/ rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas de la ldan brgya stong du mar
246b6(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces sbas so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
246b7(phal chen): bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'o spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
247a1(phal chen): rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis zos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab/
247a2(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa legs
247a3(phal chen): so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o// sgo thams cad du rnam par spyod pas
247a4(phal chen): snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / chos kyi dbyings kun gyi gzhir thug par thal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
247a5(phal chen): pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo dang ldan pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi sha
247a6(phal chen): 'pho'i sgo thams cad dang / sems can gyi skye ba'i sgo thams cad dang srid pa'i lam gyi rgyu du tha dad pa thams cad dang / skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad
247a7(phal chen): pa dag gi sems can kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa skye ba kun tu 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa
247b1(phal chen): mos pa sna tshogs can 'di lta ste/ lha'i lam kyi rgyung du gtogs pa dang / klu'i lam gyi rgyung du gtogs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi lam gyi drung du gtogs pa dang / dri ba'i lam rje chud/
247b2(phal chen): du gtogs pa dang / lnga pa yin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / nam mkha' ldeng gi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi 'am ci'i lam gyi rgyung du gtogs pa dang / sngo 'phye chen po'i lam
247b3(phal chen): kyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du
247b4(phal chen): gtogs pa dang / mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la mas
247b5(phal chen): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thabs sna tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshul dang / sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis
247b6(phal chen): byed de/ 'di ltar sems can la la la ni bzo'i rgyud za dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzungs snang bas 'jig rten gyi b.ro sna tshogs bslabs shing don byed do// sems can la la
247b7(phal chen): la ni 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstabs pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyis don byed do// sems can la la la ni
248a1(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi so sdang ba yongs su bskyed pas pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par brjod cing dror byed do//
248a2(phal chen): sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sa bon chud mi za bar brtan zhing yongs su bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su brjod cing don byed do// sems
248a3(phal chen): can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i
248a4(phal chen): phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ ngan du spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa dang
248a5(phal chen): 'thun pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pas skyo ba yongs su bskyed cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni/
248a6(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i mthar thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas dga' ba
248a7(phal chen): chen po bskyed cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang sku la mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya
248b1(phal chen): bu'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni// 'di lta skye/ mi zlogs shing zhun
248b2(phal chen): sa bru~M pa dang d+h+yan rlud pa med bur sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin la snya nan tan du mdzad pa'i bathu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi su 'thob par pos pa bskyed pa'i skye pa sa rgyas kyi bdug
248b3(phal chen): nyid che ba brjod pas don byed do// sems can lA lA la ni/ 'di lta ste/ chus zil gyis gnon la phas zil gyis mi nan po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos
248b4(phal chen): pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongs su brjod cing don byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di'i bani mdo'i phongs thams cad dang / srang
248b5(phal chen): thams cad dang / lam gyi sum mdo thams cad dang / grong mtshams thams cad dang / khyim thams cad dang / mthun par 'dus pa'i rdul thams cad dang / grong thams cad dang / grong gi
248b6(phal chen): rgyud thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu jis pa dang /
248b7(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang mthun pa'i lus kyi chu keng dang dbyibs mngon par bsgrubs shing chos ston kyang / sems can de dag gis de sus bstan pa dang / de la las 'ongs pa
249a1(phal chen): mi shes te/ gzhan du na byos nas nor bar nan tan du byed pa ni med pa'ang ma yin no// gzhan yung rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na zhugs pa 'grub pa lta ba rnam pa sa/
249a2(phal chen): tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dgu bcu rtsa drug 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du'ang / sems can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang /
249a3(phal chen): mthun par gnas te/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar kho bo grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di na sems can gyi don byed cing 'dug pa de bzhin du/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang /
249a4(phal chen): yul dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na'ang sems can gyi don byed do// 'dzam bu'i gling na ji lta ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang
249a5(phal chen): de bzhin du stong dang / stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can gyi rten du bya ba thams cad dang /
249a6(phal chen): sems can gyi gnas su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gzhir bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams su bya ba'i ming du gtogs pa thams cad dang / sems can yongs
249a7(phal chen): su rgyu ba thams cad dang / sems can yongs su 'du ba thams cad dang / sems can rgya mtsho gnas pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs
249b1(phal chen): su rtsu ba thams cad dang / sems car gyi phyogs mtshams su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can spyod pa'i gnas thams cad du'ang thabs sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang
249b2(phal chen): sgo sna tshogs dang / rigs pa sna tshogs dang / phrad pa sna tshogs dang / thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed do// gzugs dang kha dog
249b3(phal chen): sna tshigs yongs su bstan cing mos par bya ba dang / tshig gi lam sna tshogs brjod pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams
249b4(phal chen): cid du 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bdag dang sems can gyi lus su tha
249b5(phal chen): mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos srid pa'i lam ji rgyud thams cad du khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi skye ba thams cad rang gi lus la rjes su spyod pa 'gro/
249b6(phal chen): pa thams cad kyis blta na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud dang / tsher skye ba rab tu ston pa bskal po thams cad du
249b7(phal chen): gnas pa la thogs pa med pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa/ mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba'i blang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dor byed kyang gos pa med par gnas
250a1(phal chen): pa la brtson pa dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa ye shes kyi dbyings bdag med pa dang ldan pas snang bar byas pa'i snying rje chen po mtha' yas/
250a2(phal chen): papa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa la mngon par brtson pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs
250a3(phal chen): kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
250a4(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te
250a5(phal chen): kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba la lar brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo // / de nas tshong
250a6(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lus dang srog la mi b+ha/ srid pa'i longs spyod dang / yongs su zin pa dang / nye bar blangs pa mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la ni mi lta/ sems can gyi yul gyi dga'
250a7(phal chen): ba thams cad la ni sis/ gzugs dang / skra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bya thams cad la ni sa g.yog 'khor dang longs spyod dang / nye bar spyad pa thams cad la mi lba ste
250b1(phal chen): rgyal srid dang dbang phyug gi dbang gi bde ba thams cad la ni mi lA la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
250b2(phal chen): gdul ba dang / yongs su dag par bya ba la lta ba/ mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang / rim gror bya bas mi ngoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta ba dang / rang bzhin med
250b3(phal chen): pa yongs su shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad la lta ba/ yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dor du ran tan bya ba las nyams pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
250b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la lta ba dang / bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
250b5(phal chen): kyi smon lam chen po la lta ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par bya ba la lta ba ting nge 'dzin gyi sgro re rer byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/
250b6(phal chen): grangs med pa thams cad gzud pa la rnam par 'phrul par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi
250b7(phal chen): 'khor lo yang dag par gzung bas/ mi ngoms par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la lta ba de/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang
251a1(phal chen): gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri de dag thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin par yang dag par lnga zhing //
251a2(phal chen): mthar gyi yul khams chen po grang nu ba der phyin nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pal yongs su rmed cing tshul tshol ba las/ mthong nas skyos 'tshong gi tshong dpon
251a3(phal chen): longs spyod ut+pa la gang na ba der phyin te/ drung du song nas spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs stong ut+pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod
251a4(phal chen): ut+pa laM la la brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
251a5(phal chen): pa bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas
251a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil
251a7(phal chen): 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil lalo//
251b1(phal chen): mas cad yongs su brtan par yang dgar/ sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor bams cad rnam par gtong bar yang dka' / shing gi dkyil 'khor bams cad du dam par rgyu bar yang 'tshal nas
251b2(phal chen): mas yang gapa rdzogs pa'i rtsang drung tu la dag par sa / desar byang chub sams dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la blas bur ba da sa ra tan du brtse dang /
251b3(phal chen): dz+wal pashA tan du bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mi khyen pa nyid 'byung bar 'gyur bya ma 'tshal te// smras pa// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
251b4(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu 'o bos ni spos thams cad shes te/ spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / 'dug spos thams cad dang / bdug spos sbyar
251b5(phal chen): ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cud dang / byug pa sbyar du thams cad dang / bye ma thams cad dang / phye ma sbyar ba thams cad dang / thos dang / thug pa dang / phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang
251b6(phal chen): shes te/ lha'i spos kyang shes so// klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang
251b7(phal chen): mi ma yin pa'i spos kyang shes so// ned gso ba'i spos dang / yid mi bde ba bsal ba'i spos dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spo dang / nyon mongs
252a1(phal chen): pa 'bar bar bya ba'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i spos dang / 'dus byas kyi dga' ba dang bde ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / 'dus byas
252a2(phal chen): thams cad las skyo ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad yongs su sel ba'i spos dang / sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i spos dang / chos
252a3(phal chen): kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas spyad pa'i spros dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par dgod pa'i spos kyang /
252a4(phal chen): shes te/ kho bos spos de dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu'ang rab tu shes so// 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / 'grub pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs
252a5(phal chen): su spang ba dang / rab tu sbyar ba dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / yul dang / mthu dang / las dang / rgyu'ang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu mi'i 'jig rten na spos glang po'i
252a6(phal chen): snying po'i zhes bya ba klu yongs su 'khrug par byed pa yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gyis kyang yul khams chen po thams cad spos kyi sprin gyi drang shin tu lhag pas kun nas khebs
252a7(phal chen): par gyur te/ zhag bdun du spos chu'i rgyun shin tu phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo// de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam/ gos la spos chu'i rgyun de dag gis bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /
252b1(phal chen): me dog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang lus su 'gyur ro// khang pa dang / gzhal med dang / khang pa brtsegs pa gang du dab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / me tog gser/
252b2(phal chen): gyi kha dog lta bus rnam par brgyan par gnas so// sems can khyim gyi nang na gnas par gang gis/ spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gi ma dad pa'i dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang zhag
252b3(phal chen): bdun du dga' ba dang / mos pa chen pos yongs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ lus dang sems la bde ba dang dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi lus la'ang khams
252b4(phal chen): 'khrugs pa las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa las gyur pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med de/ sems kyi sdug bsngal dang mi bde ba'ang mi 'byung ngo // 'jigs pa 'am/
252b5(phal chen): snang ba 'am/ brag tsha ba 'am/ yid 'khrug pa 'am/ gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/ de dag thams cad nag bdun du dga' ba dang ke bde ba skyes te gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems su 'gyur
252b6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bo na de dag de ltar dga' ba dang nyams bde ba skyes pa rnams la bsdam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngas
252b7(phal chen): par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ri ma la ya las byung ba'i tsan dan sa stengs dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de lus la bskus na/ me'i 'obs su mchongs
253a1(phal chen): kyang tshig pa med do// rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i gros gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de des rdza 'am dung la bskus na de'i sbas gzhan
253a2(phal chen): gyi 'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mtsho ma dros pa'i ngogs nas 'byung ba'i u ka ru nag po pad+mo'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i ri lu tIl gyi 'bru tsam gcig gi dris
253a3(phal chen): kyang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de chos de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa la smod cing sdom pa'i sems rab tu 'thob par 'gyur
253a4(phal chen): ro// rigs kyi bu ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las 'byung ba'i spros kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i dri tshor ra sems can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur
253a5(phal chen): te/ kho bo ni de dag la ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de mchos ston to// rigs kyi bu srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa
253a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i longs spyod kyi don du 'byung ste/ des bdugs ma thag tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'ang ram
253a7(phal chen): ga pa'i dbyings la gnas so// rigs kyi bu lnga'i 'khor chos bzang po nas 'byung ba'i 'chos kyi rnam pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdugs ma thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi rje
253b1(phal chen): zhim po dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i gnas na spos kyi rnam par dag pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yod de/ des bdugs ma thag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad
253b2(phal chen): lha'i rgyal po rab patshe ma'i drung du 'dong ngo // de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i rgyal po rab mtshams chos kyi gtam bya'o// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na spos kyi rnam pas 'du bar zhes
253b3(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na/ spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par gang zhing de
253b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i spos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu bab bo// rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na spos kyi rnam pa
253b5(phal chen): yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su bdugs na/ zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bos
253b6(phal chen): ni spos sbyar ba de shes su zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad nas gyen du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba
253b7(phal chen): srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i
254a1(phal chen): ngang tshul can sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang yul du ldan pa kun gzhi'i gnas
254a2(phal chen): thams cad la mi gnas par srid pa'i kun gzhi dang gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shed pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos
254a3(phal chen): pa 'am kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa brjod pa 'am/ gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi chud bstan par nus re gan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/
254a4(phal chen): grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mnyan pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i drung du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par
254a5(phal chen): bya dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
254a6(phal chen): phyag 'tshal nas/ spros 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas twa/ spos 'tshong gi tshong
254a7(phal chen): dpon longs spyod ut+pa la'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpor gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer khang pa brtsegs par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/ lam gyi gyen zur dang /
254b1(phal chen): lam mnyam pa dang / lam gyi thag thug dang / lam rdul yod pa dang / lam rdul med pa dang / lam bde ba dang lam mi bde ba dang / la mdog pa dang / lam bgegs
254b2(phal chen): med pa dang / lam 'khrug pa dang / lam 'khrug pa med pa la rnam par spyad de bltas nas 'di snyam du bsams so// 'di ltar bdag dge pa'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro ba 'di ni
254b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nar tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi ran tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can la phran gdags pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro//
254b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad byams sdang dang mtho dman du gyur pa'i g.yangs las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan tan las 'askur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi
254b5(phal chen): nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / gyo mo dang / gasreg ma gsal ba dang / chos kyi dbyings
254b6(phal chen): bsgribs pa med pa la gzhol bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i chos
254b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag lus so zhes/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis zong
255a1(phal chen): khyer khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na mnyan pa dpa'
255a2(phal chen): bo de tshong pa brgya phrag stong tsam dang / srog chags brgya stong du ma gtam sna tshogs nyan par 'dod pa sha stag gcig gis kun nas bskor cing rgya mtsho'i gtam yongs su brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon
255a3(phal chen): ta ra rgya mtsho sems can rnams la ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong ras kyang mnyan pa dpa' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
255a4(phal chen): mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du bar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med
255a5(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags
255a6(phal chen): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi
255a7(phal chen): pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
255b1(phal chen): se shes rnyed po spong ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dra ba dang / 'khor ba'i thug bsal sna tshogs kyi chud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / rams cas rtsed pa nyid kyi phreng gi gnas su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyung dang / bye ba da pa'i thes/
255b2(phal chen): brjen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dathos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'jig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam ci ra tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / zhi ba'i nge 'dzin rje zho dang byung lnga tshogs pong nga chung par
255b3(phal chen): ba'i ye shes kyi lam 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyad pa'i smon lam gyi shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs pa med pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam/
255b4(phal chen): par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dpa' rlabs kyi rnam par brgyan pa thams cad kyi rung bzhi dang / tshul gyi lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par
255b5(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / chos kyi phyogs dang sgo thams cad kyi phye ma'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen po'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i lam
255b6(phal chen): 'byung ba dang // rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'dri ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ri rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
255b7(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su sbyong zhing gnas te/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can 'phongs pa rnams mthong nas/ de dag gi don du dka' ba spyod de/ de dag
256a1(phal chen): gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// chos kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongs su tshim par bya'o//
256a2(phal chen): de dag la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag tu bstan par bya'o// ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par spel bar bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongs su spel bar bya'o// byang chub kyi
256a3(phal chen): sems bskyed par bya'o// byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o// snying rje chen po'i stobs nye bar brtan par bya'o// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya'o//
256a4(phal chen): 'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu bstan par bya'o// sems can rgya mtsho bsdu ba la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o// yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par bya'o//
256a5(phal chen): 'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la'ang 'di
256a6(phal chen): dag gzud par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang yid la byed pa la brtson par kho bo rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na gnas so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa
256a7(phal chen): dang bde bar brtson pas rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gleng thams cad kyang shes so// rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang / rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang / rin po che'i
256b1(phal chen): gtos thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// klu'i gnas thams cad dang / klu 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad dang
256b2(phal chen): srin po'i gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po'i gnas thams cad dang / 'byung po'i bar chad rnam par zhi bar bya ba'ang rab tu shesas
256b3(phal chen): glong yod pa thams cad dang / grong thams cad bkol ba dang / dba' rlabs chen po yongs su spangs pa dang / chu'i kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so// nyi zla dang gza' skar gyi
256b4(phal chen): tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang / nyin zhag dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / zang gcig kyang rab tu shes so// phan tshun du 'gro ba'i shol 'dums dang bde mi bde dang /
256b5(phal chen): gru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang / gru bzur ba dang / gru phul ba dang / rlung brdo ba dang / rlung bskyed pa dang / gru bskur zhing bzlog pa dang / gru brtod pa dang / gru btang ba'ang
256b6(phal chen): rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ rtag tu sems can gyi don dang dgos pa byed de/ tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pos lam bde zhing nye zhor
256b7(phal chen): 'gyur la/ mi 'jigs pa nas chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba dang / spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ji lta pa bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas de dag rin po che thams cad
257a1(phal chen): kyis chog ste phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / phyir yang 'dzam bu'i gling du 'byed 'gyed kyang rigs kyi bu kho bo'i gru ni nam yang bub pa 'am/ nye shor gyur pa/
257a2(phal chen): myong ste/ sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang gis kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye nor 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral
257a3(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro// sred pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ dus gsum rgya mtshor
257a4(phal chen): ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog
257a5(phal chen): pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro// zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro// phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par dgang
257a6(phal chen): ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro//
257a7(phal chen): 'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin du'ang gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mthong ba dang / zos pa dang / 'grogs pa dang /
257b1(phal chen): rjes su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs shes bya ba thob par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'khor bya'i rtsa mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos/
257b2(phal chen): pa med pa lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi las rnam par rtsu ba 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams
257b3(phal chen): cad bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su sdud pa'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu srub pa
257b4(phal chen): dus rgya mtsho thams cad tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dmigs shes pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbres las mi 'du
257b5(phal chen): ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tron brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer dga' ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na tshong dpon
257b6(phal chen): rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/
257b7(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te
258a1(phal chen): yang dang yang bltas nas/ gdong mchi mas bkang ste ngu zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas ma ngoms bzhin du/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas song ngo //
258a2(phal chen): bam po dgu bcu bdun pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par dgang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
258a3(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i rlan gyis mngon par brlan pa'i rgyud can/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po'i rkyen shin tu bsags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul can/ mun pa dang / dri ma dang /
258a4(phal chen): 'dam thams cad dang bral ba chos mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur med pa la zhugs pa/ dge ba'i chos tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/
258a5(phal chen): mi dge ba thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa'i mthu sngon du 'dor ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu byung ba/ rgya chen po'i bde
258a6(phal chen): ba thob pa shes rab kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer snang bas ma rig pa'i mun pa ma lus par bsal ba thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bas blags pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas pa
258a7(phal chen): smon lam chen po'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi tshul dang mthun pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa
258b1(phal chen): nyid kyi pho brang du thogs pa med par 'gro ba la mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon par mos pa de grong khyer dga' ba'i 'phreng ba gang na ba der phyin te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam
258b2(phal chen): pa yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer dga' ba'i 'brang ba'i shar phyogs logs kyi 'dab gcig na shing a sho ka'i nags tshal rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba 'dug pa de'i
258b3(phal chen): nang na khyim bdag stong phrag du ma zhig gis bskor te/ grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongs su 'gro zhing de las brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang
258b4(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad shin tu gzhig pa dang / srid pa'i 'ching
258b5(phal chen): ba thams cad gcad par bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo glegs gcag pa dang / the tsam dang / yid gnyid dang / nem nur gyi rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang /
258b6(phal chen): g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa shin tu gdang ba dang / phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma yongs su spyad pa dang / sems kyi mtsho shin tu gsal bar bya ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa la sems can
258b7(phal chen): rab tu dgod pa dang / dad pa rnyog pa med pa'i stobs bskyed de sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bsngags shing sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par
259a1(phal chen): blang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su bskyed pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i/
259a2(phal chen): shes rab kyi stobs yang dag par bstan cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi gtam byed cing 'di lta ste/ byang
259a3(phal chen): chub tu sems bskyed pa la mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis gtam de'i rjes chad chad du bsdad
259a4(phal chen): nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ ring mo zhig tu btud nas chos la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do//
259a5(phal chen): 'phags pa bdag ni nor bzangs nor bzangs shes bgyi ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol na/ ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob par
259a6(phal chen): 'gyur ba dang / bslabs nas kyang ci nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / gdul ba'i don la mngon du mos par 'gyur pa dngasangs rgyas thams cad
259a7(phal chen): kyi zhal blta ba las mi 'phang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba dang
259b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'ams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i smon pa spyad pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du
259b2(phal chen): gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su mi spro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas
259b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag por mnod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags pas bdag la bshad du
259b4(phal chen): gsol/ de nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa med
259b5(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob
259b6(phal chen): pa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su sbyong ste/ de ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba 'di
259b7(phal chen): la gnas shing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad dang
260a1(phal chen): dga' lan gyi lha'i 'jig rten rnams ca dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / gzhan 'phrul dadang byed kyi lnga'i 'jig rten rnams cad da
260a2(phal chen): bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su gtogs pa thams cad dang lha'i gnas thams cad dang klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dang klu
260a3(phal chen): gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad drang /
260a4(phal chen): grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang grul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad dang
260a5(phal chen): za'i 'jig rten thams cad dang dri za'i gnas thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad dang / nam mkha' ldig
260a6(phal chen): gi 'jig rten thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad dang / lto 'phye
260a7(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang / mi'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi'i gnas thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer
260b1(phal chen): dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang khams dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can gyi rgyud thams cad du zo'i stor ro//
260b2(phal chen): chos ma yin pa ni zlog go/ rtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do// 'thab pa ni rnam par zlog go/ 'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed do// g.yul du lpags pa ni rnam par zlog go
260b3(phal chen): ga shags 'byed pa ni zhi bar byed do// mdud par 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel to// bcing ba thams cad ni yongs su gcod do// btson ra thams cad ni mngon par 'dral lo//
260b4(phal chen): 'jigs pa ni rnam par zlog go// mi dge ba'i las kyi 'du byed ni rgyun gcod do// srog gcod pa las ni sems can rnam par zlog go// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod
260b5(phal chen): pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du sba ba dang / za ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig bkyil pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba
260b6(phal chen): las ni sems can rnam par zlog go// mi bye ba thams cad ni byed du mi 'jug go// dge ba'i chos bya ba thams cad ni byed du 'jug go// sems can thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob tu 'dzud
260b7(phal chen): 'jig rten rnams rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / zhags pa 'dzub pa thams cad la gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir
261a1(phal chen): rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod cing bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/
261a2(phal chen): ba'i gtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to// rnam par 'god do// rab tu gsal bar byed do// brjod do// de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams kyi lha thams cad zim
261a3(phal chen): gyis mnan te chos ston to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcur yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med/
261a4(phal chen): pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag tu chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
261a5(phal chen): kyang ston to// sems can dmyal ba'ang ston to// sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi mi bde ba'ang ston to// byol song gi skye gnas kyang
261a6(phal chen): ston to// byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang / byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to// gshin
261a7(phal chen): rje'i 'jig rten yang ston to// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal yang ston to// mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yang ston to// mtho ris kyi
261b1(phal chen): 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi dga' bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyang ston to// mi'i 'jig rten yang ston to// mi'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi chung du 'gro ba
261b2(phal chen): lam dang / me'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal 'ams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang ston to 'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang
261b3(phal chen): 'jig rten na nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba dang / 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'ang ston te/ de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor/
261b4(phal chen): ba'i skyon rnam par bzlog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du mgo 'khor ba dang / sdug bsngal du gyur pa yang dag par
261b5(phal chen): bstan pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rgyu ba'i bya ba yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba dang ldog pa'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad
261b6(phal chen): smos pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas kyi ming du bya ba rnam par bsgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas pa med pa mngon par bstan pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor lo/
261b7(phal chen): thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba shin tu brjod pa'i phyir chos ston to// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
262a1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes par 'dun
262a2(phal chen): kho bos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par shes pa/ shing gi dbyings thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyis rab
262a3(phal chen): tu thob pa tshig gi lam dang sgra thams cad rnam par dmigs pa la shin tu gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa/ dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba la dbang rab tu thob pa
262a4(phal chen): chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes la dbang gis dbang sgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa' bo sems can tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs
262a5(phal chen): par bya ba la ma 'dres pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i lce yangs shing srab la yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho'i yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs
262a6(phal chen): su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus sgyu ma lta bu dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis pa'i spyod lam gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
262a7(phal chen): lus la gzhol ba dus gsum thams cad du rjes su 'grangs pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa de dag
262b1(phal chen): gi stod pa shes pa'am son tan brjod par nus de/ nA/ song dgas kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi sul shum phyi ma'i mtha' na/ grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal zhes
262b2(phal chen): thub sod de/ de dge slong mu yang garnam par babyings pa'is bya bar dug gis/ de'i gan du mo la phyi lar byung chub sems dpas cang chung sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
262b3(phal chen): dzaM sa na tan du bya ba dris shig de nas tshong dpon kyi bu nor bsangs kyis/ tshong dben rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la 'i thos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon num
262b4(phal chen): ba dpya pa lasan bcu stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i drung nas song ngo // / de nas tshong dpon gyi
262b5(phal chen): bu nor bzangs mthar gyis yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa yongs su tshol zhing sems
262b6(phal chen): can kun la rmed pa'i tshe/ gang nas gang du song ba de dang der rogs pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / lam gyi
262b7(phal chen): sum mdo dag nas tshogs te rjes su 'brang ngo // skyes pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bud med brgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'di re/ dge slong ma sems ge rnam par
263a1(phal chen): bsgyings pa ni grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa nyi ma'i mdog na sems can tshad med pa'i don du chos
263a2(phal chen): ston cing 'dug go zhes bstan to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu btsal te bltas na bza' shing gi ra ba de na shing
263a3(phal chen): zla ba shar ba zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'od sna tshogs kyi kha dog can 'od kyi mdog dang ldan pa/ 'khor kun tu dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam du 'od kyis rgyas
263a4(phal chen): par 'gengs pa mang po dang / lo ma'i shing yongs su 'gongs pa zhes bya ba gdugs kyi rnam pa dang / dbyibs su 'dug pa'i 'dab mas kun nas khebs pa bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i kha dog lhur
263a5(phal chen): 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang / me tog gi shing me tog gi mdzod ces bya ba ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi
263a6(phal chen): me tog mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyis kun nas 'du ba dang sus kyang mi shigs pa lta bu mang po dang / shing thog gi shing rtag tu
