263a7(phal chen): smin pa'i ro dpe med pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs shes bya ba gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu shing thog phun sum tshogs par gnas pa mang po dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang
263b1(phal chen): ba'i mdzod ces bya ba rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang / se mo do dang / rgyan rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba/
263b2(phal chen): ltar phur sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che kha dog grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang / gos kyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog snga
263b3(phal chen): tshogs rab tu 'byed cing 'phyang bas shin tu brgyan pa mang po dang / rol mo'i shing dga' ba skyed pa zhes bya ba lnga rdzas las kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa mang po dang /
263b4(phal chen): spos kyi shing kun tu zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba phyogs thams cad du thogs pa med par rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba mang po dag kyang yod par mthong / mdze'u dang /
263b5(phal chen): lu ma dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi pa gus mtha' brtsigs pa phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i zam skas btsugs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang mthun pa'i
263b6(phal chen): tsan dan gyi dri zhim pos bskus pas kun nas bskor ba gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUR+Ya sngon po las legs par blangs pa 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba yan lag
263b7(phal chen): brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu lnga rjes kyi dri yid du 'ong ba can gyis yongs su gang ba rin po che'i pad+mo dang / ut+pal dang / ku mo dang / me tog puN+Da ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lnga rdzas kyi bsung
264a1(phal chen): dang ldan pas kun nas yog pa bya bran sna tshogs kyi ku lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa snga snyan pa 'byin cing brjod pas gang ba
264a2(phal chen): rdzas kyi rin po rje sna tshogs kyi shing gi 'phreng ba legs par bkye bas yongs su bskor cing brgyan pa dang ldan pa/ shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung thams cad du'ang rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs
264a3(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa du mas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan rin po che sna tshogs 'brel bar bting ba lha rdzas kyi spos
264a4(phal chen): dang 'dug spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis bdugs pa/ lnga rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin po che mngon par sbyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bkye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs dang
264a5(phal chen): 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa/ rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa mang pos brgyan pa// 'khor du lha rdzas rin po che'i stan brgya stong phrag
264a6(phal chen): du ma bting zhing bshams pa mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo snying po can bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi
264a7(phal chen): rgyal po'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po bu'i rgyan gyi bad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i rje/
264b1(phal chen): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i bya la'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa
264b2(phal chen): mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs rnam par snang ba'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i
264b3(phal chen): rdo rje'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // rin po che'i
264b4(phal chen): shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rdul po mdog dkar po'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis
264b5(phal chen): yongs su gang zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar rin po che'i gling gis yongs su gang ba mthong ngo // bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i dam pas smras te/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa'i phyogs ka
264b6(phal chen): tsa lin da war reg ra bde zhing 'jam yang gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i tshe mtho dmar med pa rdo rje rin po che'i mchog gi pad+mo dri yid du 'ong bar zhim zhing reg na bde ba'i sil ma kun tu bkram
264b7(phal chen): pa nga dur dang / rma bya dang / zung khrung dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang / ko ki la dang 'dzi ngan 'jib kasgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i dngo byin pa mang pos ga/
265a1(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal shin tu legs par 'grigs pas mdzes pa rabargyan pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i sprin gyi
265a2(phal chen): char dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i char rgyun du 'bab pa/ 'dres pa'i nags tshal las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu brtsegs ma rgyan
265a3(phal chen): par bkod pa'i nang nas/ spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos ring thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing zhim pa/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang po'i rgyan las kyang lhag pas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas
265a4(phal chen): las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis kun tu bres pa/ mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi 'phreng ba dang lnga ldi kun nas bres pas rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu
265a5(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gser gyi dra ba 'bar bas kun nas dkrigs pa/ rol mo'i shing dang rin po che'i ti laM las dril bu'i dra ba rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du
265a6(phal chen): 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe tshul shin tu bzang ba rnams kyis glu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba blang ba/ lha rdzas kyi yid
265a7(phal chen): bzhin gyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog dang mdog sna tshogs su ldan pas blta na gtang mi bra ba/ khang pa brtseg/
265b1(phal chen): pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa brgya srong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang skar bstan bzang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam par bye bas rnam pa mas cad du/
265b2(phal chen): brgyan pa'i gdugs shin tu legs pa rnam par bsgreng zhing bkram pas kun nas blta na mdzes pa/ dbang po chen po'i 'jig rten war shin tu mdzes pa'i de'u sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa
265b3(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po rtag par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang lngar nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyis 'bar ba ste/ bza' shing gri
265b4(phal chen): rab chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba de/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bstings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu skyobs dang / byin gyi rlabs che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 'jig rten gyi
265b5(phal chen): khams grangs med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs shring tshad med de/ rgya chen po dang ldan par mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
265b6(phal chen): kyis de ltar yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshogs pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba'i rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa/ 'jig rten las
265b7(phal chen): 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po las skyes pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror byas pa'i rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
266a1(phal chen): cad na yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas mi 'phrogs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams dri ma med pa rgya chen pos
266a2(phal chen): grub cing byung ba/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis byung ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
266a3(phal chen): thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/ mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa/ byis pa so so'i skye
266a4(phal chen): bo thams cad kyis bltar med par mthong ste shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa lus shin tu mdzes pa/ spyod
266a5(phal chen): lam zhi ba/ dbang po zhi bA/ yid zhi ba shin tu dben pa dbang po thul ba/ glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dngas shing gsal la rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
266a6(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa pad+mo la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang skyi
266a7(phal chen): g.ya' ba med pa/ mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas ri'i dbang po chen po lngar mi bskul ba/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po ltar 'gro ba'i
266b1(phal chen): sems tshim par byed pa/ kha ba'i tsar ngan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa smar gyi rgyal po bltan bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar/
266b2(phal chen): byed pa/ chu'i lha'i zhags pa lar b.lar ngor yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ra lus dang sems kyi brag yangs pa bde ba skyed pa/ tshangs pa chen po lder 'dod chags dang
266b3(phal chen): zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po nor bu chu 'dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dang bar byed pa zhing /
266b4(phal chen): gshen pa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste/ 'khor gyi stan la l-i la ri lnga'i bu
266b5(phal chen): dbang po chen po la sogs pa gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa mi zad pa yang
266b6(phal chen): dgu par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan lnga la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing /
266b7(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gzhi kun nas 'byed pa zhes bye ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi sta la la la di lha'i rgyal po
267a1(phal chen): #dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo byang
267a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnam par brdzun pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs
267a3(phal chen): pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo chos thams cad dge bas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang
267a4(phal chen): dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing
267a5(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rang gi sems kyi mdzod kyi glong zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma la sogs
267a6(phal chen): pa lha'i bu lnga'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rgyan mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo //
267a7(phal chen): 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam
267b1(phal chen): par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo spro ba'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bsan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni kwa'i rgyal po gang chen mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'od brgya pa dang /
267b2(phal chen): dga' bo dang / bsnyer dga' bo dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / shugs ldan dang / ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa
267b3(phal chen): rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / yul gyi 'od kyi rgyun ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi
267b4(phal chen): stan la la la ni rgyal po chen po ngal bso po la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang gnod sbyin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge
267b5(phal chen): rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi skyo dgro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni dri za'i rgyal po granas srung po la
267b6(phal chen): sogs pa dri za mang po dri za'i bu mo dang dri za'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo dga' ba mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bab/
267b7(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang lha ma yin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
268a1(phal chen): 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgra chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor/
268a2(phal chen): gyi stan la la la ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs 'dzin chen po la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po nam mkha' lding gi bu mo dang nam mkha' lding gi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /
268a3(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo srid pa'i rgya mtshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la sogs pa
268a4(phal chen): mi 'am ci'i dbang po mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang mi 'am ci'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang
268a5(phal chen): dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po khro gnyer gdong la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo dang lto 'phye chen po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cig
268a6(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas la dga' ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang /
268a7(phal chen): bu mo brgya stong mang po 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu
268b1(phal chen): mdangs 'phrog sdong po'i rgyal po la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po srin po'i bu mo dang srin po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo
268b2(phal chen): snying rjes byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsnyengs pas
268b3(phal chen): chos kyi sgo ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing /
268b4(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya chen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can theg pa chen
268b5(phal chen): po la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo kun tu spro zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan
268b6(phal chen): la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi phung po zhes
268b7(phal chen): bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge
269a1(phal chen): 'dzin gyi sgo rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa la gnas pa
269a2(phal chen): rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi spyan la la la ni byang chub sems
269a3(phal chen): dpa' sa gzhi pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa
269a4(phal chen): mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bskyis pas ngeng 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya
269a5(phal chen): bayang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing // dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam
269a6(phal chen): par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
269a7(phal chen): bskyengs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi spos kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing //
269b1(phal chen): dan slong ma sa ge rnam par bstings pas 'dzin ste mo chos kyi dbyings su sus shin tu rnam par bye ba'i yus zhes bya bu yang dag par bsan pa mthong ngo // 'khor ci yan la la la ni byung /
269b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'as dgu pa la gnas pa rnams 'a'od cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo mi dmigs pa'i spobs kyi gnas kyis bstan pa zhes bya ba yang dgra par bstan
269b3(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sgrib pa med/
269b4(phal chen): pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings
269b5(phal chen): pas chos kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyun ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang /
269b6(phal chen): sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongs su smin pa rnam par 'dul ba/ snod du gyur pa ji skad cig bza' shing gi ra ba der 'ongs shing 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod/
269b7(phal chen): pa bsam pa tha dad pa/ bos pa mi mtshungs pa/ bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar gyur pa dad pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan pa rnams la dge slong ma
270a1(phal chen): seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ci nas kyang thams cad thar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de la de ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo // de ci'i
270a2(phal chen): phyir zhe na de ni dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa des kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cud shin tu bstan pa la sogs pa dang /
270a3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi gni tha dad pa la sogs pa dang / sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la sogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la
270a4(phal chen): sogs pa dang / khyad par yod pa'i rgyan la sogs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying po la sogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dang
270a5(phal chen): sems kyi mdzod la sogs pa dang / kun tu mos pa mngon par sgrub pa'i snying po la sog pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa non pa'i phyir te/
270a6(phal chen): bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la blta ba dang / chos mnyan/
270a7(phal chen): pa'i phyir 'od de dag thams cad kyang sngon dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la shin tu bkod pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
270b1(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du byas pa sha stag go de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzungs kyis dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i
270b2(phal chen): ba shing gi rabadun sum rtogs pa dang / rigs tshul phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtsug lag khang phur sum tshogs pa dang / 'chags phun sum tshogs tshogs pa dang
270b3(phal chen): longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang
270b4(phal chen): 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa phun sum rdzogs pa dang / dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos nas/ chos kyi sprin
270b5(phal chen): char chen pos sems ma ngon par brlad pa de'i yid la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyis/ da ni g.yas phyogs su
270b6(phal chen): bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma zhig tu bya'o snyam pa dang / de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas bza' shing gi ra ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa de dag
270b7(phal chen): thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o snyam du bsams nas skor ba byed pa'i tshe'akhor thams cad na'ang dge slong /
271a1(phal chen): ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'dug pu mthong nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nus 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med/
271a2(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal
271a3(phal chen): te 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams drug dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
271a4(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i
271a5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes bya ba thob pa'o// smras pa 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams
271a6(phal chen): cad yongs su bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ye shes snang ba ste/ dus gsum du byung ba'i rgyan sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par
271a7(phal chen): dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no// smras pa/ 'phags ma ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni ye shes snang ba 'di
271b1(phal chen): la sgrub pa dang yongs su sgrub pa'i tshe chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis phyogs
271b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thams cad re re la'ang lus sangs rgyas
271b3(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste
271b4(phal chen): 'di ltar lha'i lus dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA mA yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
271b5(phal chen): mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i dpung po lus me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdug spos kyi ljin yongs su 'dzin pa dang
271b6(phal chen): 'phreng ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byug pa'i spri nu yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nu bzla'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang
271b7(phal chen): gdugs kyi sngon mongs su 'dzin pa dang / skyil mtshan gyi smin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bedan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i phreb grub kyi sprin 'ongs su 'dzin
272a1(phal chen): pa dang rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyun gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gran pa yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin yos su 'dzin pa dang rin po che'i rgyan rnam
272a2(phal chen): par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa mang pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir
272a3(phal chen): 'gre'o// dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thog pa rnams la mchod pa bya'i phyir ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du/ yum gyi skur gshegs pa dang /
272a4(phal chen): bltam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
272a5(phal chen): tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang /
272a6(phal chen): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i gnas na bzhug/
272a7(phal chen): pa nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa yongs su tshim par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar de dag thams cad la'ang / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi
272b1(phal chen): lus rnam pa des bu dag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o// sems can gang gis kho mo sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / rim gro byed
272b2(phal chen): pa'i las 'di shes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la'ang kho mo ni//
272b3(phal chen): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid ston te/ rigs kyi bu khro mo ye shes kyi mig gis sems can thams cad la lta'ang sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi
272b4(phal chen): skyed la rlom sems kyang mi byed do// 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho'ang nyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas rlom sems su byed pa med do// de bzhin
272b5(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus yongs su shes pas rlom sems su byed pa'ang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin kyang chos
272b6(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do// sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs kyang chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems//
272b7(phal chen): su byed pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'
273a1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la bzhugs pa/ chos thams cad la rlom sems med par gnas kyang skyil mo krung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas
273a2(phal chen): par 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang / skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/ lus la sangs rgyas
273a3(phal chen): kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'byung zhing rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ba spu'i nyag ma gcig gis sbams shing mngon par 'phen pa rang gi ba spu'i bu gar
273a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa/ skad cig gcig la bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par
273a5(phal chen): gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa/ skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod
273a6(phal chen): par rus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul bgrod dka' ba na/ grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de ni bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma zhes bya
273a7(phal chen): ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig
273b1(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lan brgya/
273b2(phal chen): stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo // / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
273b3(phal chen): shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems sdang drar gyur pa de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba de la ni sems/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rjes su lta
273b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi skad rnam par dmigs pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs
273b5(phal chen): kyitshul de ni shin tu rgya che bar byed/ snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar rton chos thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par byung ba
273b6(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs de la ni rab tu rtog/ chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brang / chos thams
273b7(phal chen): cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'od de ni shin tu gsal bar byed/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i
274a1(phal chen): stobs de ni mngon par smra byang chub sems dpa'i las dang dran pa thams cad nye bar drangs pas brtsams pa mthar dbyung ba'i smon lam de ni yongs su rdzogs
274a2(phal chen): par byed cing / mthar gyi yul brjod dka' ba'i grong sder rin po rtse'i rgyan gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang / de la bcom pa ma lnga'i
274a3(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi tshul la mi mkhas pa'i mi ji snyed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ mi 'di de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po/
274a4(phal chen): dang ldan pa de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te/ de ltar 'khrul ba med cing / de ltar yid 'khrug pa med la/ de ltar gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ste/ de ltar gnod pas mi
274a5(phal chen): tshugs shing de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yeng ba med pa'i mig dang ldan te yid la brel ba med cing / bsam pa zab la mngon par mdzes te/
274a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho ltar 'dug cing sems mi nyam mi 'khrug pa de la/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas ko ci zhig bya/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba med de/
274a7(phal chen): sems phyin ci log dang ldan yang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'khol yang mi srid do//
274b1(phal chen): 'di lta zug ni bud med kyi dang du 'gyur ba med de/ 'dis bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do// 'di la bu dag ni bdud kyi yul la chags pa med de/ 'dis
274b2(phal chen): bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du byeng yong mi sred do// 'di lta bu dgra ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcing par 'gyur ba med de/ mi dgos pa byed kyang mi srid do snyam mo// gang yang bcom pa
274b3(phal chen): ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par shes shing / ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzad to// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bcom pa ma
274b4(phal chen): lnga'i bshes gnyen ma la yongs su dri bar sems pa ni/ khyod kyang thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste legs so legs so// khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas su smon pa'o// khyod ni
274b5(phal chen): bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnas su bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o// khyod ni nges par sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dbyung bar 'dod pa'o// khyod ni nges par sdug
274b6(phal chen): cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtor bar 'dod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di re/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na rang gi khyim na
274b7(phal chen): 'dug go/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshig de thos nas/ dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom pa ma lha'i bshes
275a1(phal chen): gnyen ma'i khyim gang na ba der phyin nas de'i khyim che zhing yangs la rin po che'i rab rim pa bcus bskor ba rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas
275a2(phal chen): bskor ba 'obs spos chus gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo dang ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / me tog pud+d+ha ri kAs chu yongs su khebs pa yan lag brgyad
275a3(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba gzhi gser gyi bye ma 'dal ba spos yid du 'ong ba dang 'dres pa'i chu dri zhim pas gang ba/ rin po che sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa rim pa bcus
275a4(phal chen): kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pas rnam par dkrigs shing ba ga ma dang / rta babs dang
275a5(phal chen): skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla ga ma dang / seng ge'i shing thags dang / snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs
275a6(phal chen): med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan pa rin po che'i dag ra bre rluR+Yas spras pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa lha rdzas kyi spos zhim po thams cad kyis 'khor thams cad nas bdugs shing bsangs
275a7(phal chen): pa a ka ru nag po mchog gi bdug spos kyis dri zhim par bdugs pa/ spos kyi byug pas 'khor kun nas byugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kan gyis rtsig nges kun tu bres pa/
275b1(phal chen): steng 'dzam du chu cung gi gser gyi drab rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu sbas pas kun nas bkab pa/ gser gyi dril gyi dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan par
275b2(phal chen): 'byung ba rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil ma kun tu bkram pas rin po che'i me tog gi rgyun dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mchen bsgreng bas skyo shin/
275b3(phal chen): tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra ba snang ba mu med par brjod du yod pa rin po che byu ru'i sdong po dang / rdo rje dang / man shel la sogs pa'i gter brgya stong
275b4(phal chen): kun gyis shes pa phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang ldan pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste/ de ni bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma gzugs mdzes shing
275b5(phal chen): bzang la bsta na sdug pa/ gya nom pa'i kha dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can/ skra mthong mthing du 'dug pa lus kyi yan lag dang
275b6(phal chen): nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam par grub pa/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/
275b7(phal chen): tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi snga skad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs can//
276a1(phal chen): rnam par ngar pa yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ bzo dang gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par byung ba chos kyi ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas
276a2(phal chen): par bslabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thab dang tshul rnam pa thams cad du thob pa rin po che'i wab lbub sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan
276a3(phal chen): rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa wa rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang lngab lhung grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pas
276a4(phal chen): lus shin tu 'bar ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa/ rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i 'phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rje rin po che sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge
276a5(phal chen): mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba mgul na thogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa la skal ba mthun pa dang smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis mi phyed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsod
276a6(phal chen): nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mi bad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ des khyim de dag thams cad dang / rin po che'i gnas dang gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag
276a7(phal chen): thams cad kyang rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus bde ba dang sim pa skyed pa/ sems long nas dga' bar byed pas gsal zhing sdang bar byas pa mthong ngo //
276b1(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu ror bzangs kyis/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i nang pa gnyis la spyi ngos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so//
276b2(phal chen): 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa gdag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang
276b3(phal chen): khAr nan ngan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na ji ltar byang chub sems
276b4(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar na tan du bgyi ba 'phags mas bdag la bstan du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
276b5(phal chen): kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni lha rnams la lha mo'i gzugs dang / kha dog
276b6(phal chen): dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang / rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod
276b7(phal chen): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mau dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la'i dbud med kyi gzugs dang
277a1(phal chen): kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng lhag par 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pas cil mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do// sems can gang 'dod chags kyis
277a2(phal chen): kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag kho mo'i drung du 'ongs na'ang de dag thams cad la kho mo ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos ston te/ de dag gis chos de thos nas
277a3(phal chen): kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni kho mo mthong ba thag tu 'dod chags dang
277a4(phal chen): bral bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang
277a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni lag nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub
277a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par
277a7(phal chen): 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bral bas snang ba zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang dral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i/
277b1(phal chen): deng 'dzin rab tu'i pa'i rnam pa'i dran ces bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo/ la la ni bral ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i te nge 'dzin pas kyi tshol pa
277b2(phal chen): rnam par 'thong ba zhes bya bar rarab tu 'thab bo// la la ni meg btsums btsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rtag
277b3(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni pang du 'khyud pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad yongs
277b4(phal chen): su sdud cing mi gtong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni 'o byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
277b5(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// de ltar khro mo ni sems can gang ji snyed cig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang /
277b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa chags pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do//
277b7(phal chen): smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de khyod kyis dge pa'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/ 'phrin las ni jil bu zhig bsags/ spras pa rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na/
278a1(phal chen): 'das pa'i dus shig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa
278a2(phal chen): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ blar med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
278a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshes pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa de sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i sku don du/ rgyal po'i gnas sgo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la zhabs
278a4(phal chen): kyis non pa'i tshe/ grong khyer de thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas yangs shing rgya che la/ rin po che du ma las byas par yongs su grub par gyur te/ stang gi bar snang yang rin
278a5(phal chen): po che mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang lha'i lus
278a6(phal chen): kyi sprin tshad med par rgya che bas khebs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe/ tshong dpor gyi chung ma zhig tu gyur te blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o// de nas kho mo cho 'phrul gyis yang dag
278a7(phal chen): par bskul nas khyim thabs dang lhan cig tu dong dong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa grong bar gyi srang du gshegs pa la dad pa rgya chen po skyes te/ kho mos rin po che'i dril bu gcig phul lo//
278b1(phal chen): de'i tshil ma pal gnang du bu pa nga / sdom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tumatho bar gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring na 'dug ste/ des khro mos bla na med pa yang dag par
278b2(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na kho mos byung
278b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thabs dang ye shes mtha' yas pa la gnas pa bsod nams rgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi yul la thub pa med pa de dag gi spyod pa
278b4(phal chen): shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag nan
278b5(phal chen): zhugs shes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
278b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen
278b7(phal chen): ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ma lho'i bshes gnyen ma la lan brgya stong du ma galas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ bcom
279a1(phal chen): ba mA lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin par khyim bdag nan
279a2(phal chen): khugs kyi khyim grang na ba der phyin nas khyim bdag nan zhugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
279a3(phal chen): pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
279a4(phal chen): nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la g.yas pa dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
279a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tran du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang
279a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bo'i sems kyi rgyud las ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang / sems can 'dul ba'i
279a7(phal chen): dbang du mdzad pa ma gtogs par/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang shin tu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do// yongs
279b1(phal chen): su mya ngan las 'du' ba med do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang gi sgo 'byed pa ste//
279b2(phal chen): khri bo mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob bo// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid la sems kyi skad
279b3(phal chen): cig skad cig tu mnyam par gnog ste/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la'ang khyad par ci rnam pa du ma rab tu 'thob bo// spras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/
279b4(phal chen): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa bsod skyabs la sogs pa de bzhin
279b5(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad dang / gser thub dang / log par dad sel dang / thams cad mnga' ba dang / gtsug tor dang / rnam par gzigs dang / rgyal dang
279b6(phal chen): rdzogs mdzad dang / grags mchog dang / pad+mo'i bla la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i mtshams 'brel bas/ sangs rgyas gcig nas
279b7(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum du mthong ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong
280a1(phal chen): yang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong yang mthong ngo // de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu dang /
280a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dung phyur dang / sangs rgyas bye ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas bye ba
280a3(phal chen): khrigs khrigs dang / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems
280a4(phal chen): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
280a5(phal chen): pa'i bar gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug go/ thugs dang po bskyed
280a6(phal chen): pas thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go// smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par bsgrub pa mngon par dag pa la'ang 'jug go// spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go
280a7(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa la'ang 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la'ang 'jug go// bzod pa brnyes pa rnam par dag pa la'ang
280b1(phal chen): 'jug go// bdud ci thugs ma dam par 'thor ba'i gyur chog gis bu byung ba la'ang 'jug go// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang tu ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyunapa'ang 'dug po las/
280b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi shing rnam par dag par mdzad pa rnam pa pa dad pa la'ang 'jug / sems can yongs su sbyin par mdzad pa rnam pa zla dad pa la'ang 'jug go// 'khor kun nas 'dus pa rnam par
280b3(phal chen): dad pa la'ang 'jug go// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jug go// sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
280b4(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul la'ang 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa'ang shin tu rnam par gsal ba dang ma 'dres par dran te yang drag par 'dzin
280b5(phal chen): dran pas yongs su bcangs so// rig pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis shin tu rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed
280b6(phal chen): do// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa byams pa la sogs pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong ngo // de'i
280b7(phal chen): 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag
281a1(phal chen): kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu btsud pa la'ang 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
281a2(phal chen): gis chos bstan pa'ang shin tu gsal ba dang ma 'dres pa rjes su dran te yang dag par 'dzin to// dran pas yongs su bcangs so// rig pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis
281a3(phal chen): rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' rtogs pa'i sangs
281a4(phal chen): rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mthong zhing shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
281a5(phal chen): pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang shes shing mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu
281a6(phal chen): brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go// sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de la'ang rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / mi zad pa dang / dad pas shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems
281a7(phal chen): dpa'i brtson 'grus dang / ne nor pas khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang /
281b1(phal chen): spyod da sas nas 'aslang dang / yul lha ma zhugs pa'i byung chub sems dpa' rnams cad rjes me 'phrogs par shes shi 'dang drud par byed do// rnam par blang mdzu
281b2(phal chen): rna pa sang byung ba'i dag na ga sas pa phyob ba na sa na kye mas na bzhugs pa patsug nas btsu tu byung pa thams bya ma sus kyi mangs
281b3(phal chen): gcigasus sa d+ha pa d+hidang bong ba shes so// de'i 'og pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong de nas de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin ma shegs pa sangs
281b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi ring brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kying du'ang mthong ste/ nam na de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi bal blta bar dga' ba de'i tshe'ang de bzhin du mthong ste
281b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa dang / bstan pa mdzad pa dang / bstan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang zos so// thos nas kyang 'dzin to// dran
281b6(phal chen): pas yongs su bcangs so// reg pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do//
281b7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig
282a1(phal chen): gcig tu shes pa rab tu thob pa/ skad cig gi cha shas la ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba la spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma las byung ba
282a2(phal chen): rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa/ bdag dang / sems can dang
282a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas mi gnyis par spyod pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyis rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'gengs pa
282a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang mi 'gal bar rnam par spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs
282a5(phal chen): pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul can de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par rus re skar/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di/
282a6(phal chen): nyid nA ri gru 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
282a7(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig ces nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis smras so// song zhig nor bzangs dpal gyi chu rgyal
282b1(phal chen): lung gigs/ pa la pa rnams kyi rgyal gru 'dzin mdzod pa yod/ rin ched nus byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang / 'ab shing ra brjid dang tu blan 'bab par ldan/ ri mchod de/
282b2(phal chen): la brtan pa ldan ras gzigs kyi dbang // 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don du rnam par spyod/ de bran song dang nor b.rangs khyod la mgon po yi// yon tan tu cher tshul la 'jug pa ston par byed/
282b3(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ khyim bdag nan lugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs la lan brgya stong du mas g.yas phyogs su
282b4(phal chen): bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi drung nas song ngo // / bam po dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa// de nas tshong
282b5(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyim bdag nar khugs kyi gdams ngag rjes su sems shing / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i mdzod de ni shes par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su dran pa'i
282b6(phal chen): stobs de ni rjes su dran par byed// sangs rgyas kyi tshul gcig nus gcig tu brgyud pa'i stobs ni yang dag par 'dzin sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtshams ni khong du
282b7(phal chen): chud par byed/ rnas thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag gi ni rjes su 'brang sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i tshul de dang ni 'thun par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i
283a1(phal chen): d+hun de ni 'ong du chud par byed/ sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs 'tshang rngu ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la ni yid ches par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las
283a2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ni mngon du byed cing / mthar gyis ri gru 'dzin gang na ba der 'ongs nas ri gru 'dzin gyi steng du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yongs su
283a3(phal chen): rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ nub phyogs logs kyi rwa'i sman ljongs mtsho dang mtshe'u dang / 'bab rgyas mdzes par gyur pa/ bin+d+har+ya sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ltar sngo zhing 'jam la gzhon pa'i
283a4(phal chen): spang nags tshal chen po'i mthongs na 'dug pa zhig na/ rin po che rdo rje'i rdo stegs shig la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rdo stegs la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
283a5(phal chen): dpag tu med pas kun nas bskor cing chos ston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i yul byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba yang
283a6(phal chen): drag par ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas dga' bas rgyas shing mi 'dzums pa'i mig gis thal
283a7(phal chen): mo sbyar nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas sems mi 'khrugs pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa
283b1(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang dran tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes
283b2(phal chen): canadage ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa shin tu dga' bar sems pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che 'byung zhing 'thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge
283b3(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen las ye shes smra ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes cad/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyis bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa// dge
283b4(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par ston pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa yongs su ston par 'du shes pa
283b5(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa yongs su skyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba
283b6(phal chen): der phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas spras pa/ tshur shog/
283b7(phal chen): dpe med pa'i theg pa chen po yangs shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ skye ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses shing skyabs med par gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs
284a1(phal chen): su bsgrub pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'das te dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par/
284a2(phal chen): mothos pa/ snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i blo gros can/ blta na kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la mngon du bltas pa/ smon lam chen po'i dkyil
284a3(phal chen): 'khor yongs su sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung bar mos pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i
284a4(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jam dpal gyi ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thob par bya ba la mngon du bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin/
284a5(phal chen): gyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs
284a6(phal chen): kyis yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa/ legs par spyod pa tshad med cing bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i shugs kyis mngon par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i
284a7(phal chen): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi shugs gzhan la yongs su bstan pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje chen po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i
284b1(phal chen): rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par gzung ba'i blo gros can ljod 'ongs pa legs so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems
284b2(phal chen): dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzings
284b3(phal chen): la larabargya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdud du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
284b4(phal chen): bskyed pa/ ji lar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams
284b5(phal chen): ngage dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gi thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag
284b6(phal chen): la bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ mdog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs tsha
284b7(phal chen): med pa 'gro ba'i rgyan gyi smin rab tu 'byed pa'i lag pa g.yas pa bcung ste/ mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po las byung ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems kyi 'di med
285a1(phal chen): pa rab tu skyed pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la gzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi du de ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa yang
285a2(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba shes te/ rigs kyi bu nga'i byang
285a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo stong rje chen po'i mi logs pa med pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad la dbye ba med par sems can yongs su smir par bya ba dang 'dul ba la zhugs pa/ sgo kur ras thos shing rnam par rig par 'gyur bas/
285a4(phal chen): sems cad yongs su bsdu ba dang gdul ba la nye bar gnas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i skyo thogs pa med pa la gnas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
285a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g.yol/ sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa'ang sta gon du gnas te/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do// ngag snyan pa dang / don bya ba dang /
285a6(phal chen): don 'thun pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do// gzugs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed do// kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs
285a7(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye bas kyang sems cad rab tu sim par byed cing yongs su smin par byed do// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
285b1(phal chen): dbyangs brjod pa dang / ci la dga' ba'i spyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang tshul 'thun par chos bstan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa snga
285b2(phal chen): tshogs dang / dge ba'i chos bsags par bag mi byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskul ba dang / bsam pa dang 'thun par sprul pa sna tshogs tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
285b3(phal chen): rigs sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang skal ba 'thun pa'i gzugs yongs su bstan pa dang / gnas gcig tu 'grogs pas kyang sems can yongs su bsdus shing yongs su smin par byed
285b4(phal chen): do rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di yongs su sbyangs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam bskyed de/ 'di ltar
285b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mgo rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /
285b6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi srog la bab par mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi
285b7(phal chen): yo byad kyis 'phongs pa'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs
286a1(phal chen): su bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems
286a2(phal chen): can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lam mun pas nyam nga ba phyir mi ldog
286a3(phal chen): pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi skal ba mi mnyam pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa shin tu bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa dgag
286a4(phal chen): par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang / sems can
286a5(phal chen): thams cad sems la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams
286a6(phal chen): cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byas so// sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rjes su dran pa'i sgo byin gyis brlabs so//
286a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi ming gi 'khor lo'ang 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas so// dus ji lta bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/
286b1(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa dang mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin gyis brlabs so// rigs kyi bu de ltar dra ri thabs 'dis sems can thams cad 'jigs pa las yongs su bkrol zhing
286b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing phyir mi ldog par byed do// rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo
286b3(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
286b4(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa/ dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud la rtag tu mnyam par
286b5(phal chen): bzhag pa/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rjes su rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
286b6(phal chen): glong yongs su 'khyil ba'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i sems rnam par zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yongs su 'phel ba'i rgyud
286b7(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgyun las phyir ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ de la 'di skad ces
287a1(phal chen): #/ bya'o// g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te gus par bkur bstod nas// nor bzangs shin tu dul ba sgo phyogs rgyud du song // spyan ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnam spyod pa/
287a2(phal chen): rin chen ri yi sul na gnas par des kyang mthong // rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje'i ri yi sman ldongs na// pad+mo'i snying po'i seng ge'i khril btsun par 'dug/ lha dang lha min klu dang srin po mi 'am ci// rgyal ba'i
287a3(phal chen): sras kyis bskor cing de la chos kyang ston// mthong nas nor bzangs dga' ba tshad med skyes par gyur// snyan te yon tan rgya mtsho'i rkang la phyag 'tshal nas// ci nas bzangs po'i spyod pa bdag gis
287a4(phal chen): 'thob 'gyur bar// 'phags pas thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsol// bsod nams brgya pas brgyan pa'i dri med lag brkyang ste// 'od sprin dra ba rgya chen bzang po rab rton pas/
287a5(phal chen): nor bzangs spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam dag pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di smras// sangs rgyas sras po nga ni rnam thar gcig sgo shes// ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi
287a6(phal chen): thugs rjes sdug/ 'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yongs su bsdu phyir byung // kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu// 'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyob// gang rnams
287a7(phal chen): dam du bcings shing dgra lag phyin pa dang // lus la gzer cing de bzhin btson rar btsud pa yang // nga yi ming zos bcings shing bzung ba thar bar 'gyur// rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i g.yon byas gsad spangs pa/
287b1(phal chen): de tse de dgang yi ming yang dran 'gyur na// mdar 'phangs de yi lus la phog par mi 'gyur te// mtshon rnon btab kyang de dag mi 'dzug rgal bar 'gyur// dbang po'i 'khor du phyin dang gang rnams rtsod gyur pa/
287b2(phal chen): dgra rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur// grags dang 'grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur// nga yi ming dran de dag thub pa med par 'gyur// gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes
287b3(phal chen): su dran byas pa// de dag rkun pos 'jigs dog dgras 'jigs nags phyin te// seng ge dom gzigs gcan gzan g.yag rgod sbrul gang yang // dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par
287b4(phal chen): 'gyur// gang rnams la las nga yi ming zhig dran byas nas// sdang ba'i sems kyis ri chen stongs su bor gyur tam// sol mdag lci me rab tu 'bar bar bor gyur kyang // de rnams pad+mos gang ba'i/
287b5(phal chen): chu yi gter du 'gyur// nga yi ming ni skad 'ga' yud tsam rjes dran na// rgya mtsho'i chur bor de yi nang du 'chir mi 'gyur// chu bos mi khyer me yi dbus su 'tshig mi 'gyur// don med kun tu
287b6(phal chen): mi 'gyur don rnams 'grub par 'gyur// shing sgrog dbyig bcings lcags sgrog de bzhin ltung rnams dang // brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin brid cing bslus pa dang // spyod shing bsdigs te//
287b7(phal chen): gshe dang sma phab rnam pa las// nga yi ming tsam dran par byas na thar pa thob// gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags lta ji snyed dang // gang rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan brjod pa'i rnams//
288a1(phal chen): nga yi ming thos drar byas snyan par brjod par 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la byams pa'i sems kyang skye// nga yi ming tsam la la gang gis dran byas na// gnod pa'i don du ro//
288a2(phal chen): yangs sngags dang byad byed pa'i// dgra rnams rtag tu de yi zil gyis non par 'gyur// ma lus dug gis de yi lus la mi tshugs so// la las gang gis nga yi ming tsam dran byas na// klu
288a3(phal chen): dbang srin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang / grul bum srul po 'tshe byed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang // mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong ba'ang zhi bar 'gyur// nga yi ming ni
288a4(phal chen): skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang // pha dang ma dang gnyen bshes mdza' ba kun dang yang // 'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min// nor zad mi 'gyur 'phongs pa'i dngos su mi
288a5(phal chen): 'gyur ro// nga yi ming gi rjes su la la dran byed na// 'di nas shi 'phos mnar med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste// byol song skye gnas yi dgas mi khom gnas su min// sems can dag pa lha dang mi yi/
288a6(phal chen): gnas su skye// nga yi ming ni la la gang gis dran byas na// dmus long zhar ba 'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur te// 'theng po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra ba lta sdug 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por dbang po
288a7(phal chen): kun ldan 'gyur// la la gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes dran na// sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas
288b1(phal chen): mthong 'gyur de dag rdos kyang thos par 'gyur// 'di dang de bzhin gzhan dag thabs mang ji snyed kyis// 'gro ba sems can par dul gzhal dang zad mi nus// sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcin
288b2(phal chen): bsgom ste/ yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba zhes bya ba/ shar phyogs nas nam mkha'i dbyings las 'ongs
288b3(phal chen): teme mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams khor yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis bor ma zag tu/
288b4(phal chen): mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba des nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od thams cad
288b5(phal chen): zil gyis non pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
288b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / me dang / rin po rje dang / glog dang / skar ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las bkye ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang snang bar byas/
288b7(phal chen): byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang snang bar byas te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag tu zhi'o// sems can thams cad kyi
289a1(phal chen): non mongasu pa'ang nyams su mi gnod par gyur to// mU dang gyi zug rngu dang sdug bsngal snga tshogs kyang rtse zil bar gyur to// sas rgyas kyi shing 'di thams cad du'ang rin
289a2(phal chen): blo che'i sprin gyi char pa bste/ me tog dang / s+t+rai sa dang / bdug dang / rdzing ba dang / byug pa dang / bye mra dang / na bzar dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang bad
289a3(phal chen): ci rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa lnga tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang ra ba der song ngo // de'i lus de'i gzugs brnyan ni sems can thams cad kyi
289a4(phal chen): gnas su snang ba ste// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sem par byed pa la mngon par gzhol byas/ dri gru 'dzir de la byang chub sems dpar spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung ngu rang phyin par rdzo
289a5(phal chen): sa su chu gams da smyan ras pajigs kyi nga posamyo pon gyi brnas pa 'di sa smras so// sa ng+ga ts+tsha ts+tshas byu sa
289a6(phal chen): pa na / sgyu du tshong ga du
289a7(phal chen): ngas kyang chu se sa nga tshul la la pa nga/ de ya de pa sa sas da
289b1(phal chen): gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub
289b2(phal chen): sems dpa' smranA ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung nas song ngo // / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa' spun ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ye shes cig tingam/
289b3(phal chen): skyed pa'i sems kyis/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bltas pas kyang ma ngoms bzhin du bsgo ba dang mi 'gal bar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba gang na ba der song ste/ byang chub
289b4(phal chen): sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i nang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par
289b5(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub
289b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis phos nA/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par brdzi ba dang / ji ltar nan
289b7(phal chen): tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gas+ho// des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba thob pa'o// smras pa
290a1(phal chen): 'phags pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba 'di brnyes/ 'jig rten gyi khams
290a2(phal chen): de ni 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis 'jig rten gyi khams de nas bzhud nas ni ji srid cig lags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
290a3(phal chen): rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang shes par dka' ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa dang / byang chub sems
290a4(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa mi 'phrog pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa/ bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa/
290a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ma thob pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi thos pa 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ yid ches pa 'am/ khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so//
290a6(phal chen): smras pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs kyis/ dad pa dang mos par bgyi na 'phags pas bdag la bka' mi stsal tam/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nga ni shar phyogs kyi
290a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par
290b1(phal chen): 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung nas/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba 'di thob bo// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa de nas nga song nas ni/ bskal pa
290b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'das te/ sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang gom pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bor ro//
290b3(phal chen): gom pa re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te/ sangs rgyas
290b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa bla na med pa yid kyis rang bzhin chos nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa// de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba/ byang chub
290b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i dga' ba yongs su bskyed pas mchod pa byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyi sems rgya
290b6(phal chen): mtsho'ang khong du chud do// de dag thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo'ang yongs su shes shing bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan to// chos kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags so//
290b7(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bkye'o// yo byad sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pas kyang nye bar sdud do// rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i sbyor ba rgyun
291a1(phal chen): mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro// shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byung shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtsham
291a2(phal chen): dang lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang snying gi phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dus ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu
291a3(phal chen): 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba/ tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus
291a4(phal chen): rnam par bkod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'thun par spyod pa/ zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ chos thams cad kyi rgyud
291a5(phal chen): kyi rjes su song ba/ dus gsum gyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyud dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba pa'i rgyud thams cad du rnam par snang ba/ de bzhin
291a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan
291a7(phal chen): brjod par yang nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na lha lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar
291b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bas pa par bya ba dang / ji lar nan tan du byu ba dris shig den tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa
291b2(phal chen): gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bas phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ byang chub
291b3(phal chen): sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems
291b4(phal chen): dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can/ mngon par shes pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul la yon tan gyi khyad par du lta ba/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go tshwa rab tu/
291b5(phal chen): dga' ba'i khyad par thob pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su song ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tar gyi sa la ni nan tan du byed/ ting nge 'dzin gyi
291b6(phal chen): sa la ni rnam par spyod/ gzungs kyi sa la ni rab tu gnas par byed/ smon lam gyi sa la ni 'jug par byed/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i sa la ni rjes su slob/ stobs kyi sa la ni yongs su sgrub cing /
