320a3(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin 'thon nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs par gyur pa mthong ngo //
320a4(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa thob pas ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang
320a5(phal chen): mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs su sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin mngon par 'thon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la rgyas par khyab par byas nas/
320a6(phal chen): mngon sum du brtul zhugs thams cad kyi yi dam las mi g.yo bar yongs su ston pa dang / sems can gyi khams dang mnyam pa'i dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs
320a7(phal chen): rab tu ston 'dang / 'jig rten thams cad du gnas pa med pa dang yul thams cad la ltos pa med pa dang / 'khor ba thams cad du gnas pa las phyir phyogs pa dang
320b1(phal chen): bladang pa'i bun su ma rtogs pachud pa'i so gsol ba yongs su ston pa dang / mi thug pa dkyil 'khor rab tu son pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sdug pu'i 'dushes kyi byin ci ljod rnam
320b2(phal chen): bar zlog pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / g.yo ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 'gyur ba'i chos nyid yongs su ston pa dang / 'du byed thams cad kyi chos nyid sdug bsngal zhing bdag
320b3(phal chen): med pa yongs su stor pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gnas pa dang mi 'bral bar mos par byed pa dang / de bzhin shegs pa'i tshul khrims shin tu dge bar bya ba'i phyir
320b4(phal chen): sems cad thams cad la yang dag par skul ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgras tshul khrims kyi spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams
320b5(phal chen): cad yongs su rim par byed pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po yongs su ston par byed cing / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems
320b6(phal chen): can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus kha dog sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ yan lag dang nying la thams cad kyang nyams su bzod pa sems can+da thams cad la yongs su ston pa//
320b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyis lus la gnod par mtho btsams kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i cig gis spyo ba dang
321a1(phal chen): brgyad pa dang / spad pa dang / babyung ba dang brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa nyams su bzod par byed pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad
321a2(phal chen): kyis mi bskul ba yongs su ston pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang rim gror ma byas pa thams cad kyis mtho ba dang dma' bar mi 'gyur ba yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad la/
321a3(phal chen): nga rgyal med pa yongs su ston pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la bzod pa mi zad pas ye shes mi zad pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yod
321a4(phal chen): su spang ba'i phyir/ bzod pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dbyibs mi sdug cing kha dog mi mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par zlog par byed pa dang / sems
321a5(phal chen): can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad
321a6(phal chen): nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kyi lus kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam
321a7(phal chen): paji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas ras// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la brtson 'grus kyis sngon du 'dor ba yang dag par ston pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs pa thams cad
321b1(phal chen): rnam par 'thor ba'i brtsor 'grus dang / byang chub tu brtsams pa myi 'azhugs mi rtogs pa'i brjor 'grus dang / sems can thas sa cang 'khor ba'i rgyab tsho lngas rab tu bskyal ba'i brtson
321b2(phal chen): 'grus dang / mi 'on pa dang / ngan song dang / ngad 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i lam thams cad rnam par zlog pa'i brtsod 'grus dang / mi shes pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba'i
321b3(phal chen): brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par
321b4(phal chen): blang ba dang yongs su gzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rab tu gzhom zhing rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems cad thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba
321b5(phal chen): dang gdul bas mi skyo bo'i brjon 'grus dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su drag par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtsor 'grus rnam par dag pa bla
321b6(phal chen): na med pa yongs su ston cing / sems n+dar yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas lus sna tshogs kha dog dang dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par sprul pa'i sprin mthon/
321b7(phal chen): thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par spod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i chos
322a1(phal chen): nyid 'jig rten du sgrogs pa dang dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par bsngags pa byed pa dang /
322a2(phal chen): 'dod pa'i 'jig rten bdud kyi yul 'jigs pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang dga' ba'i yul thams cad yongs
322a3(phal chen): su ston pa dang / chos la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mthar gyis bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub
322a4(phal chen): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba la nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongs su brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'o/
322a5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su stor pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang gang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston pa byed cing //
322a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / spro ba 'phel bar bya ba dang / nyams bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang / sems skyon
322a7(phal chen): med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang / bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / dbang po gsal bar bya ba dang / lus kyi bde ba yongs su skyed pa da /
322b1(phal chen): chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skye ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus/
322b2(phal chen): kyi sprin sna tshogs 'tho ro te/ zhing thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyer gyi gan du 'gro bas skyo ba med pa
322b3(phal chen): yongs su stor pa dang / slob dpor dang / tha ma dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba dang bsnyer bkur bas skye ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhir gshegs pa thams
322b4(phal chen): cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba yang dag par blang zhing yongs su gzung bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su stor pa dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i
322b5(phal chen): tshul yang dgra bar brjod pa dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang bzhin dang / tshul mngon par brjod pa dang / chos
322b6(phal chen): thams cad ting nge 'dzir byi sgor yongs su stor pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dri ba dang the tshom rgya mtsho rnam par sel bas shes rab kyi yul yongs su stor pa dang sems cad thams
322b7(phal chen): cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin tu 'jom pa'i shes rab rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mur pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi nyi
323a1(phal chen): ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems cad thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su skye bar bya bas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed/
323a2(phal chen): papa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog dang dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ bsam pa dang mos pa jiH
323a3(phal chen): ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la mngon du gnas shing sgra skad sna tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba bstan pas/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang //
323a4(phal chen): 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang / khyams gsum pa 'byung ba thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa dang /
323a5(phal chen): lta ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par bstan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
323a6(phal chen): sa'i lam las yongs su bzla ba yang dag par ston pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang rim gror ma byas pa la byams sdang gis gos pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya dran las
323a7(phal chen): 'das pa'i sgo la gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyu ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / snying po byang chub tu song zhing mngon
323b1(phal chen): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rgyun mi 'chad pa yongasu ston pa byed cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad kwib spu'i
323b2(phal chen): ske re re nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'bon te/ sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum du gnas shing
323b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang /
323b4(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa
323b5(phal chen): yongs su brjod pa dang sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rdul
323b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par gnas shing / thams
323b7(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par dag par bya bar yongs su brjod pa rkyen mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la 'jug pa rgyur
324a1(phal chen): mi 'chad pa yang dag par brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis/
324a2(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su brtan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can thams cad thams cad
324a3(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu dgod pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin mang po 'thon te
324a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi stobs mu med pa yongs su ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs mi zad pa dang
324a5(phal chen): mi 'jigs pa dang / chud mi za ba'i chos can yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i stobs phyir mi ldog cing phyir mi ldog la thug pa med
324a6(phal chen): pa dang / rgyun med pa dang bla na med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems
324a7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri mas nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yongs su ston pa
324b1(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kI ri rnam par 'thor ba yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i stobs
324b2(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su
324b3(phal chen): bskyod cing bskul bas/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bor byed pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad rab tu
324b4(phal chen): 'joms pa yongs su ston pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ye shes kyi stobs chen po 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
324b5(phal chen): su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // baspu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang lus kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho kha dog mtha' yas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i sprin
324b6(phal chen): phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams su rgyas par 'gengs pa 'thon te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi
324b7(phal chen): rnam par gnon pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i
325a1(phal chen): de zhes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgyam po yongs su shes pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang sems can thams cad kyi spyod/
325a2(phal chen): pargya mtshos 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su smon pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bu'i dus las mi 'da' ba'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang /
325a3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags par sgrog pa'i ye shes yongs su skor ba dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtshos rgyas par 'grengs
325a4(phal chen): pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi dang /
325a5(phal chen): dbyibs dang / rgyan rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnam par sprul te spyan sngar phyin nas mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang /
325a6(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa byed cing de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pas sems can rnams kyi dga' ba skyed pa
325a7(phal chen): dang sems dang bar byed pa dang / rab tu dga' ba skyed pa dang / mos pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / sems rnam par sbyong ba dang
325b1(phal chen): sems so med pa skye bar byed pa dang / dbang po gsal bar byed pa dang mos pa'i spobs yongs su sred pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byed pa mthong //
325b2(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bsgyur pas 'jig cer du ji ltar sems can yongs su smir par gyur pa mangs 'de ba'idra du/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i tshul
325b3(phal chen): gyis pa rnon mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i thog ma sems bskyed pa'i tshogs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i thabs dang / de bzhin gshegs par nas/
325b4(phal chen): kyi drung du byin cing mchod pa dang rim gro byas pa'i tshul dang / dge ba'i chos spyad pa'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pas gtang bar dka' ba yongs su btang ba dang //
325b5(phal chen): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i thubs dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'khor mang po dang / longs spyod kyi dbang chen po yongs su btang sku mngon par byung
325b6(phal chen): ba'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dka' ba'i spyod pa brtul zhugs dang dka' thub chen po'i dkyil 'khor la bzod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub
325b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par drang ba'i sbyor ba la mi g.yo bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yid pa brtan pa'i chos rgya mtsho sems car gyi khams
326a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi nyes byas pa dang / ngan du smra ba dang / nyes par spyod pa thabs cad bag la zha bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dang lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyams su
326a2(phal chen): bzod par byed pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i chos nyis la bzod pa dang / chos thams cad la yid ches pa'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad kyi
326a3(phal chen): rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtsom zhing sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
326a4(phal chen): sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
326a5(phal chen): phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas rnam
326a6(phal chen): bar 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / shes rab kyi
326a7(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyang ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang shes rab chen po'i sprin
326b1(phal chen): yongs su 'dra ba'i tshul dri skad cig yod pa dang shes rab kyi gter chen po'i tshogs ji skad cig yod pa dang / shes rab kyi rgya mtsho chen po lnga rnam par dpyang ba'i tshul dang sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams/
326b2(phal chen): cang dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi sbyor ba ji skad cig yod pa dang thabs chen po la mkhas pa yongs su dag par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / byang chub
326b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyir pa'i lus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su grub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod/
326b4(phal chen): ji skad cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya ba'i tshogs chen po ji skad cig yod pa
326b5(phal chen): dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rkyen du gyur pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyir ba shin tu bsku ba ji
326b6(phal chen): snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi tshul tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngor gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
326b7(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i tshul ji skad cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa
327a1(phal chen): dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byamA klas pa ji skad cig yod pa dang ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la ya dag par gzhol bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang //
327a2(phal chen): ye shes kyi pha rol phyin pa'i tshul rnam par dmigs par bya ba ji skad cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji skad cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyis
327a3(phal chen): rol tu phyin pas rgyas par 'gengs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgya cher po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lhun ji skad cig yod pa dang / ye shes
327a4(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su grub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rab tu phye ba la 'jug pa 'byung bar yongs
327a5(phal chen): su bsgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i chos rnams dang / chos yongs su bsdu ba dang kA chos kyi ye shes
327a6(phal chen): kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / las kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / zhing gi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / bskal pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / dus kyi ye shes kyi
327a7(phal chen): rjes su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
327b1(phal chen): byang rtsubs pasnang ba'i sems yongs su 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba drung byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems
327b2(phal chen): dpa'i 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba drung byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes kyi rjes
327b3(phal chen): su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang /
327b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i chos rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang cher mtsho'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi
327b5(phal chen): rgyud kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gter gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lugs kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ji snyed cig
327b6(phal chen): yod pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i dmigs pa can de dag thams/
327b7(phal chen): cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyib spu'i sgo re re nas mngon par 'thon te/ sems can gyi lus kyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs can du mngon par mchod cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
328a1(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ 'og min dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / mi dros pa dang / mi che ba'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du
328a2(phal chen): mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du 'bras bu che ba dang / bsod nams 'phel ba dang / sprin dang bral ba'i sgra lta bu'i lus kyi spyir du mazhi par 'dzin
328a3(phal chen): cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // dge rgyas dang / tshad med dge ba dang dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sbyin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par
328a4(phal chen): byed pa mthong ngo // kun snang dang ba dang / tshad med snang ba dang snang ba chung ngu'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo
328a5(phal chen): tshangs chen dang / tshad lga nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun ris kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po lnga
328a6(phal chen): tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // lnga'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu
328a7(phal chen): dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // rangab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang ka'i bu dang bas kyi/
328b1(phal chen): bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po lnga mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par
328b2(phal chen): 'dzin cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // lha'i rgyal po bcu byin lha mo'i tshogs dang lnga'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems cad yongs su srir/
328b3(phal chen): bar byed pa mthong ngo // dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po dang / dri za'i bu dang / dri zo'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // grul bum
328b4(phal chen): gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / grul bum gyi bu dang / gral bum gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // klu'i rgyal po
328b5(phal chen): mig mi bzang dang / klu'i bu dang / klu'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ngal bso po dang /
328b6(phal chen): gnod sbyin gyi bu dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i sdong po dang / mi 'am
328b7(phal chen): ci'i bu dang me'am ci'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // lto bye chen po'i dbang po blo gros bzang po dang lho /
329a1(phal chen): chen po'i bu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // nam mkha' lding gi
329a2(phal chen): dbang po shugs drag stobs chen dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
329a3(phal chen): lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi bu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // chos kyi
329a4(phal chen): rgyal po gshin rje dang / gshin rje'i bu dang / gshin rje'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thor cing sems cad yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // mi'i dbang po dang / skyes pa
329a5(phal chen): dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'bon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams
329a6(phal chen): cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi smin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
329a7(phal chen): drang srong thams cad sa bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'bon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mdzang ngo // rlung dang / chu dang / me'i phung po 'i wa la bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon
329b1(phal chen): par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / le tog dang / sman dang / shing dang
329b2(phal chen): sa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // bza' shing gi rab dang / grong khyer dang / snying po byang chub dang / nyin par dang
329b3(phal chen): mtshan po dang / nam mkha' dang / phyogs dang rdza/ rkang gis 'gro ba dang / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong
329b4(phal chen): ba nas/ de bzhin du lag na rdo rje lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'byam klas pa thams cad du sems can thams cad la
329b5(phal chen): mngon par gnas shing sems can yongs su sman par byed pa'i bar du mthong ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i sems thog ma bskyed pa'i tshogs la sogs
329b6(phal chen): sngon gyi tshe rabs la yongs su bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyun ma chad pa'i tshul ji snyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsngags pa
329b7(phal chen): gzis nas gcig tu brgyad cing 'dang chags pa dang / shi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu bachud cing 'dang chags pa dang / lus yongs su bzung ba gcig nas
330a1(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / ming gi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / dge ba'i bu shes gnyen gyi gan du lo
330a2(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing rab rnaMms pa dang / sas rgyas byung ste bsnyen bkur ba gcig nas gcig tu btsud rnyi ba chags pa dang / chos kyi tshig dang yi ge blangs phyi gcig/
330a3(phal chen): nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa
330a4(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dad chags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang zhing mthong ba'i mig gis rgyas par
330a5(phal chen): bkang ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo 'dab chags pa dang / chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i ye shes
330a6(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams la rnam par lba pa gcig nas gcig tu bachud cing 'dab chags pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtshor
330a7(phal chen): gtogs pa'i sems can pha rol gyi ni 'pho dang skye ba shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pame da rtsags pa dang / lha'i rdza ba yongs su dag pa rdzogs par byed pa'i shes pa gcig nas gcig tu
330b1(phal chen): rgyu ga rna nga/ sgyu kyi 'grus mas dkyise mas la rnam par sa N+DI rnam la gyu pa'i skyeg sa rjem tu rgya phying bas chags pa dang / phyogs
330b2(phal chen): mig sa nus pa'i sgogacig rnas bcig tu brgyud cing 'a bachags pa dang / thog ma wa'i rnga ba rnam par dmigs pa thi nas gcig tu btud cing 'a bcags pa dang / thog ma sems
330b3(phal chen): can pha rol gyi sems shes pa gcig ras gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chagasra pa dang / thog ma dradag dang sems can pha rol gyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su drar ba zhes pa shi sa ga nis su cing dang chags pa dang /
330b4(phal chen): thog ma dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas te mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i rkyer gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par
330b5(phal chen): gnon pas phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa gcig ras gcig tu brgyud cing 'dang chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags
330b6(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems
330b7(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa gcig ras gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing /
331a1(phal chen): 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gnod pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya bu gcig/
331a2(phal chen): nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'drab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig
331a3(phal chen): 'gro bar rnam par sdang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa'i lus
331a4(phal chen): kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon te/ sems can rnams la chos 'chad pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yongs su ston pa dang / rjes su brjod pa
331a5(phal chen): drang rab tu 'byed pa dang / shin tu rgya cher byed pa dang / bgrang ba dang / nges par ston pa dang / rnam par rig par byed pa dang / nye bar bsgrub pa mthong ste/ la la la
331a6(phal chen): ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo // la la la ni chu'i phung po rab tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis la la la ni me'i lce shin tu rlob pa'i sgra
331a7(phal chen): da kyis la la la ni rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni sa yongs su g.yos pa'i sgra skad kyisal la la ni ri chen po phan tshun thug cing 'thab pa'i sgra
331b1(phal chen): rlu sa sal la ni tha'i thong rjer g.yos pa'i ro sa pa'i tha skad ces lalal mi ma'i gzhal med lang thub zhing 'grol ba'i sgra srang kyis chom por dadu la'ong ngo // lasas
331b2(phal chen): de pa'i mang byas/ la la la ni bu'i dbang po'i gad kyis la la lAni brjod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gang rjel lA la ni dI ba'i dbang po'i mang kyis yul la n+de
331b3(phal chen): wa ma yin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis le la lnga ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i skad kyis la la la ri mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i spyad kyis la la la ri lto 'phye chen po'i
331b4(phal chen): dbang po'i skad kyis lA la la ni me'i dbang po'i skad kyis la la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la lA la ni lha mo'i glu'i dbyangs kyis la la la ni wa rdzas kyi
331b5(phal chen): rol mo legs par blangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni nor bu rin po che'i sgra dbyangs kyis la la la ni sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi skad sna tshogs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha po
331b6(phal chen): rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul sems can rnams la rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin gyis byang chub sems
331b7(phal chen): dpa'i sgra skad sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i sprin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnam pa tha dad pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag gis tshul gyis/ mtshan mo'i lha
332a1(phal chen): mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul thog ma sems bskyed pa dang bcas pa yongs su byung ste/ grub cing yang dag par 'dus
332a2(phal chen): pa dang bcas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i rnam par rtse ba dang bcas pa sems can thams cad la rnam par dmigs par byed pa mthong ngo // de'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sprin re res kyang
332a3(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnams sbyong ba mthong ngo // sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dag
332a4(phal chen): kyang ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par 'grel pa mthong ngo // sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo // sems
332a5(phal chen): cacan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang 'khor ba rgya mtsho las gyen du spyod pa mthong ngo // sems can+dar+g+ha mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dgra kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'a'o//
332a6(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // thos so// rnam
332a7(phal chen): par dpyad do// zhugs so// khong du chud do// nges par rtogs so// rjes su shes so// rjes su 'brangs so// rjes su zhugs so// mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni
332b1(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs pa'i rgyal mtshar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
332b2(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i byin dang sngo thal ba mnyam par spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byir gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa/
332b3(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po'i snod du gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshong dpor gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i
332b4(phal chen): shugs drag po gangs chen mtsho sdang ba chen po rab tu thob pa'i/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa des mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro
332b5(phal chen): bar rnam par snang ba'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//
332b6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i chos rnams shin tu zab// de la khyod kyi bskal pa tshad med bslabs// bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs rnams kyis// 'gro ba kun kyang 'jig rten rim pas bstan// bdag med
332b7(phal chen): mgon med log pa yi// 'du shes rtag tu 'khrul pa mkhyen gyur ras// rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma yis// lus dang dbang phyug stor mdzad 'gro ba 'dul// shin tu rims bral rab tu ni//
333a1(phal chen): oM sU bskyes meng rnam par dag pa mangs/ 'gro ba ba lus gnyis gnas pa// sprul pa'i sbyin sa 'brug gis rnam par 'dul// phung po khams dang me mchen/
333a2(phal chen): la/ khyod dri yu yang mi gnas mi rten te// yan lag kun rgyas gzugs mchog dang // dbang phyug yongs su bsgrags pas 'gro ba 'dul// phyi dang rang lngas rnam par 'grol// gnyi
333a3(phal chen): las byung ba'i mtsho las 'phags zur kyang // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i// gzugs brnyan 'gro ba'i rgyud du rab tu ston// khyod la g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// nam yang rlom
333a4(phal chen): sems g.yo ba'i spros mi mnga'// 'jig rten spros mos byis pa rnams// chos kyi rang bzhin bstan cing 'dul ba mdzad// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho kun spyod pas// bskal pa mang
333a5(phal chen): por rtse gcig thub bzhugs kyang / phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs mchod don du// spu rnams rtse las sprul pa'i sprin kyang 'gyed// sangs rgyas stobs la 'jug pa'i tshul//
333a6(phal chen): skad cig re rer mtha' yas thugs su chud// sems can bsdug ba'i sbyor ba rnams// so so'i rkyen bzhi na go bar bgyi bas bstan// khyod kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag
333a7(phal chen): las kyi rnam bris sna tshogs gzugs gzigs shing / chos kyi sgrib pa med pa'i lam bstan te/ sems cad kun kyang rnam pa skyong ba mdzad// khyod sku mtshan bris rnams
333b1(phal chen): dag kyang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa yis/ sems cad bsam pa'i dbang tshul du// khyed ni lha mo'i sku gzugs sdom de nas tshong dpon gyi du nor
333b2(phal chen): bzangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha po rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de 'di skad ces smras so//
333b3(phal chen): lnga mo khyod bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lags/ lha mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yang /
333b4(phal chen): shing dri ba med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di thob nas ji srid cig lags/ de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpor gyi bu nor pa
333b5(phal chen): lnga tshogs su bcad de smras pa/ drar pa bskal pa mang 'das pa/ zhing ging rdul sbed de yi snga rol na// zhing ni rin chen mdog bde byung // de yi bskal pa zhi ba'i dbyangs shes bya//
333b6(phal chen): gling bzhi bye ba khrag khrig ste// brgya stong phrag bcu rnams kyis yongs su gang // tshad med rin cheru ri bo 'dra// gling bzhi'i bar ma bzang po rnam par bkram// rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba brgya//
333b7(phal chen): stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su tshang ba ste// rgyal po'i pho brang ma dngas dga' ba// dbus ra gnas pa'i spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od/ der ni phyogs kyi dbang po sa yi bdag 'khor los gyur pa/
334a1(phal chen): mngon par gzugs bzang byung // mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan// de yi lus kyang dpe byang bzang pos brgyan// pad+mo'i sbubs nas rdzus te byung /
334a2(phal chen): gser gyi mdog bzang 'od 'byung lus dang ldan// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan thams cad du// mkha' las 'gro zhing 'od kyis de 'gengs so// de yi bu ni stong tshang ste// kun kyang yan
334a3(phal chen): lag dab pa'i gzugs dang ldan// blon po mkhas shing gsal ba dang // mdzangs shing yid gzhungs bye ba shin tu mang // btsun mo bye ba phrag bcu tshang // lha mo ji bzhin dga' ba'i
334a4(phal chen): tshul la mkhas// de dag phar sems byede sems kyis// rgyal po de la nye ba'i yid du gnas// rgyal po de ni sa chen de// ri dang khor yug kun gyi mtha' klas pa'i// gling bzhi phur
334a5(phal chen): sum tshogs pa dag/ kun kyang chos kyi stobs kyi gnas par byed// kho mo 'khor los sgyur ba yi// btsun mo tshangs pa'i sgra skad rin chen lu se// gser gyi mdog 'chang dri med 'od//
334a6(phal chen): dpag tshad stong du 'od kyi rgyas par 'gengs// nyi ma nub par gyur nas kyang // rgyal po sras dang 'khor bcas gzims gyur nas// rol mo'i dbyangs kyang zhir gyur te// kho mo mal na bde
334a7(phal chen): babar nyal nyal na// nam gyi phyed tsam gung zhig la// sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgya mtsho byung bar gyur// de tshe rgyal bas rnam 'phrul pa// phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste bstan pa mdzad/
334b1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho nges// zhing gi rdul snyed 'jig rten khyab par 'gyur// rnam 'phrul sku rnams sna tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad ma lus rgyas par bkang // sa rnams
334b2(phal chen): ri dang bcas par g.yos// rgyal ba byung zhes sgra yangs yongs su brjod// lha dang lha min mi dang klu// kun kyang rgyal ba byung bas rab tu dga'// sangs rgyas pa spu'i sgo kun nas// sprul
334b3(phal chen): pa'i rgya mtsho mang po mngon par byung // des ni phyogs bcu rgyas bkang nas// 'jig rter bsam pa bzhin du chos kyang bstan// rnam 'phrul mtha' yas de dag kyang // rgyal bas thams
334b4(phal chen): cad bdag gi rmi lam bstar// zab mo'i 'drug sgra thos gyur nas// khong du chud pas kho mo dga' yid gyur// mtshan mo'i lha mo song skad kyang // kho mo'i steng gi bar snang ma'a' gnas
334b5(phal chen): shi// rgyal ba'i legs pa brjod byas ras// kho mo sad par smra zhing brjod// lha yi blo gros btsun mo longs// khyod kyi rgyal po'i khams su rgyal ba skyes// bskal pa rgya mtsho brgya drag tu// de
334b6(phal chen): 'dra'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam dag dkon// kho mo dga' 'gyur sad par gyur// 'od gsal dri med rnam dag mthong // 'od bzang de ni ga las blta blta na// byang chub shing rgyal drung gi rgyal ba
334b7(phal chen): mthong // mtshan nyid sum cu gnyis kyis brgyan// ba spu kun nas 'od zer rgya mtsho bkye// ri rab ji bzhin mngon par 'phags// rgyal ba g.yas g.yos kun tu'ang de bzhin no// mthong
335a1(phal chen): nas kho mo rab dag ste// de 'drar 'gyur bar sems kyang yongs su bskyed// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul yangs mthong nas// mos sngon lam shin tu rgya chen bta
335a2(phal chen): khomos rdul po bzhengs su gsol// de yi 'khor dang bud med tshogs kyang bslang // sangs rgyas 'od yangs mthong gyur nas// kun kyang bde ba'i lus su gyur// rgyal po de dang ldan cing N+Da/
335a3(phal chen): bzhon pa bye ba srog chags khrag khrig gis// yongs su bskor te dpung bcas pa// rgyal ba'i spyan sngar kun kyang dong // lo grangs stong phrag nyi shur yang // khyo mos rgyal ba de la mchod
335a4(phal chen): bkur byas// rin rjen bdun yang yon du phul// rgya mtsho yongs dang bcas pa'i sa yang gsol// mdo sde rgya mtsho yon tan sprin// smon lam mtsho las yongs su byung ba'i
335a5(phal chen): rgyan kun kyang de bzhin gshegs las byung // bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar de bzhin bstar// mtshan mo'i lha mo ji snyed cig/ de ro snying brtser kho mos phan bstan pa/
335a6(phal chen): de 'drar gyur te myos bsal zhes// kho mo sa mos pa yongs su skyes par gyur// kho mo'i smon lam de 'dra'i sems// thog ma byang chub mchog tu skyes par gyur// 'khor ba'i/
335a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho gnas po'i tshe// srid pa'i rgya mtsho de ni zhig ma thu re/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rnams// kho mos dad pa bskyed de mchod pa byas// 'khor ba'i lha dang mi dbus su
335b1(phal chen): su 'byung de la mngon par gror// rnal pa'i dang pyod pal gyim tshan sa sam ma'o// balnga pa
335b2(phal chen): me tog parjon/ rgyal ba drug pa chags med zla ba'i blo// rtul ba 'od rgyal chos kyi grwa/ brgyad pa ye shes dkyil 'khor snang ba'o// rin rjen 'od 'phro ri sgron te/
335b3(phal chen): rgyal ba dbu pa de tshe byung bar gyur// bcu pa dus gsum 'od dbyangs tri/ de dag kho mos dad pas mdzad// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi yi dbang po dam pa kun mcho
335b4(phal chen): do/ tshul gyis rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i// mig ni de srid yur gyis thob pa gyur// de 'og zhing gi mtshams sbyor ba// rin cher thams cad 'od ces bya ba byung // bskal ba
335b5(phal chen): lha yi dpal zhes bya// sangs rgyas lnga brgya de lha byung bar gyur// thog ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byung // gnyis pa nyi ma'i sgron ma mngon par skyes// snang ba'i rgyal mtshan
335b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas gsum// de yi 'og tu rin chen ri be'o// me tog 'od 'phro rgya mtsho sgron// me yi dpal dang lha yi dpal gyi mchog/ snang ba'i rgyal po 'od kyi dpal// bcu
335b7(phal chen): pa ye shes kun snang rgyal po'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi yi dbang po de dag kho mo yis// phung po'i gnas la dang dga' zhing // gnas med chos la gnas kyi blo mchod do// de 'og de//
336a1(phal chen): yi mtshams sbyor ba// 'jig rten khams bzangs byung bar gyur pa ni// pad+mo'i sbyor ma sprin gyi dpal// de tshe'i bskal pa tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya// de la rgya
336a2(phal chen): ba tshad med de// de dag 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mchod// rgyal ba de dag thams cad las// rim gro chen pos kho mos chos kyang thos// rgyal ba'i dang po rin chen ri// de yi 'og ma yon
336a3(phal chen): tan d+ha mtsho ste// rgyal ba chos dbyings dbyangs kyi dpal// chos rab rgya mtsho sgrog pa bzhi pa'o// chos kyi rgyal mtshan gzungs kyi 'od// chos spobs 'od dang nam mkha'i blo gros te/
336a4(phal chen): chos 'od ri bo spo mthon dang // de dag tha ma'i mtshan ni sprin dpal lo// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi yi dam pa de dag kun mchod de// rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i//
336a5(phal chen): chos nyid de ni dag ma gyur// de yi 'og tu de bzhin gshegs// nyi ma'i sgron ma dpal gyi dpal zhes bya// zhing ni sangs rgyas yod pa ste// de la bskal pa zla ba'i dpal byung ngo // /
336a6(phal chen): de la stobs bcu byung ba ni/ bye ba brgyad cu yongs su tshang ba ste/ de dag kun la'ang mchod pa'i sgo// rgya che mtha' yas yid 'ong du ma byas// thog mar byung ba dri za'i rgyal/
336a7(phal chen): de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas shing rgyal te/ rgyal ba gsum pa yon tan ri// de yi 'og tu rin chen spyan gshegs so// rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyad// chos kyi rgya mchi sangs rgyas gci
336b1(phal chen): brjid dpal// 'jig rten dbang po 'od bzang dpal// kun gyi tha ma chos 'od rgyal po'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ bde gshegs de dag thams cad chod byas kyang // chos kyi
336b2(phal chen): rgya mtshor 'jug pa yi// ye shes kho mos thob par ma gyur to// de yi 'og tu zhing dag pa// rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi byed gzi brjid brtan// kun tu 'od sprin ming ldan byung // rgyan gcig
336b3(phal chen): kun nas mdzes par gnas pa'o// de la sems can dag pa mang // nyon mongs dri mas nyon mongs shin tu nyung // bskal pa rab zhi blo gros 'od// sangs rgyas stong rnams byung bas rnam par
336b4(phal chen): brgyan// rgyal ba'i dang po rdo rje gtsug/ gnyis pa chags med stobs mnga'i mtshan ldan pa// rgyal ba chos dbyings gzugs brnyan dang // phyogs rnams kun tu sgron ma gsal
336b5(phal chen): ba'i bdag/ rgyal ba lnga pa thugs rje'i 'od// rgyal ba drug pa brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'o// bde gshegs bzod 'khor sgron ma dang // brgyud pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor sna ba ste/
336b6(phal chen): sdang ba rgya mtshos brgyan pa dang // de dag tha ma zhi ba'i rgyal po'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi yi dam pa de kun kho mos mchod// chos nyid nam mkha'i mnyam pa 'di// rang
336b7(phal chen): bzhin yongs su kun nas dag pa ste// de la gnas shing zhing gi rnams// 'byas klas kun tu spyod spyad ma dag go// de yi 'og tu mdangs dga' ba'i// zhing ni spos sgron
337a1(phal chen): sprin gyi dpal zhes bya// kun nas nyon mongs yongs su dag/ de yi bskal pa legs par zung zhes bya// rgyal ba bye ba de tshe byung // de dag kun gyis de tshe
337a2(phal chen): bskal pa brgyan// mgon po de dag chos gsung ba// kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis yongs su bzung // rgyal ba'i dang bro grangs yangs ste// chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs drag dpal gyi rgyal
337a3(phal chen): chos dbang rgyal po yon tan sprin// chos kyi dpal dang lha yi cod pan no// ye shes 'od 'phro gzi brjid dpal// rkang gnyis dam pa bdun pa de yin no// rgyal ba brgyad pa nam mkha'
337a4(phal chen): dbyangs// dgu pa kun tu 'byung ba'i sgror ma ste// de dag tha ma'i sangs rgyas ni// mdzod spu'i dpal gyi 'od kyi blo gros te// rgyal ba mi mchog de dag la// mchod pa byas kyang chags
337a5(phal chen): med de ma sbyangs// de yi 'og ma rgyan rab can// rin chen sna tshogs kun tu gnas paste// 'jig rten rnam sar phye ba'i mtha'// rin cher rgyal man cu gros mcho// de tshe'i bskal
337a6(phal chen): snying po'i tshogs// de la sangs rgyas brgya phran lnga byung ste// rnam thar chags med 'di 'dod cing // rang byung de dag thams cad kho mos mchod// thog ma'i mtshan ni yon tan 'khor//
337a7(phal chen): zhi ba'i dbyangs dang rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs// nyi ma'i gzi brjid dpal gyi bdag/ mtshan gyi sprin sgra dbyangs shes bya ba dang // chos dbang rgyal po yon tan bdag/ bsod
337b1(phal chen): nams ri rab zhi ba 'od kyi rgyal// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ rgyal ba de dag kun kyang kho mos mchod// rgyal ba'i lam ni der sbyangs te// de la rgyal ba kun kyang yang dag
337b2(phal chen): gzhol// 'on kyang da dung rgyal ba yi// tshul 'dir 'jug pa'i bzod pa ma thob bo// de 'og yid 'ong 'od ldan pa/ yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten khams byung ste// zhing dbya //
337b3(phal chen): 'phreng ba'i blo gros can// sems can nyon mongs nyung ba'i gnas yin no// bskal pa bde zhing mngon dga' ste// de la sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu byung // mi mchog de kun kho mos mtsho//
337b4(phal chen): rgyal ba mchog gi lam yang rnam par sbyangs// rgyal ba'i dang po me tog brtsegs// rgya mtsho'i snying po yang dag 'byung ba'i mchog/ lha dbang gtsug pud rin chen gtso// gser gyi ri
337b5(phal chen): bo rin chen brtsegs pa dang // chos kyi rgyal mtshan nor gyi dpal// de dag kun gyi tha ma ye shes zlo// bcu po de la sogs dag/ lha dang mi gcod dgra kho mos mchod/
337b6(phal chen): de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing 'byung ba// sprul pa bzang po'i rgyal mtshan sgron ma s+t+waM// bskal pa stong gi dpal zhes bya// de la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig drug/ zhi ba'i rgyal
337b7(phal chen): mtshan zhi gnas dpal// zhi ba'i sgron ma sprin gyi rgyal po'i dpal// snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang // rnam par smin mched nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang // chos kyi sgron ma dpal gyi ri/
338a1(phal chen): 'od 'phro'i dpal dang lha'i snying po'i dpal/ de dag tha mar byung ba ni/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs mkhas pa sgron ma'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ bde gshegs tha
338a2(phal chen): ba de dag kho mos mchod// 'on kyang tshul mtshe 'dir 'jug pa'i// bzod pa kho mos thob par ma gyur to// de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing byung ba// kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba ste/
338a3(phal chen): bskal pa gnas med rnam par brgyan// de la sangs rgyas bye ba sum cu drug/ dang po yon tan kun tu sprin// de yi 'og ma sangs rgyas nam mkha'i thugs// sangs rgyas legs byung rnam
338a4(phal chen): brgyan dang // rgya mtsho'i chos kyi sprin sgra sgrogs pa'i dbyangs// rgyal ba chos dbyings gsung dbyangs dang / sprul pa'i sprin sgra snyan pa'i dpal mnga' dang // sangs rgyas phyogs kun
338a5(phal chen): gzi brjid dang // chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs byung sgra dbyangs dang // yon tan rgya mtsho dpal gyi ston// rgyal ba'i nyi ma dgu pa byung bar gyur// de dag kun gyi tha ma ste// rin chen dpal sgron
338a6(phal chen): yon tan dpal mchod do// rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal// rkang gnyis dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe// kho mo lha mo zla bzhin te// mi yi dam pa byung tshe mchod pa byas// rgyal
338a7(phal chen): bdes ni kho mo la// mdo sde sngon lam rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i brtsam// gnas med rgyan kyang rab tu bshad// thos nas kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis gzung // kho mos mig yangs der thob ste/
338b1(phal chen): ting 'dzin ni dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang thob/ skad cig re rer zhing brgyud pa'i// rgyal ba rgya mtsho mang po'ang kho mos mthong / byams tshul kun tu sdang ba'i sprin// byang
338b2(phal chen): chub sems rab mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ snying rje'i snying pos brgyan pa yang // sangs rgyas skabs kyi tshad du yangs par skyes// 'thob phyin ci log gyur te/ rtag dang bde dang
338b3(phal chen): gtsang dang bdag zhen pa// gti mug mdongs gyur ma rig bsgribs// nyon mongs 'khrugs shing log par 'du shes pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa stug la spyod// lam gyi 'gro rgyud nyam ngar/
338b4(phal chen): sred dbang gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs bye brag tu// las kyi rnam par bris pas kun byung ba// 'gro rgyud kun gyi shi 'pho'i sgor// skye bar 'gyur bas kun tu skyer gyur cing // skye dang
338b5(phal chen): rga shi gnod pa rnams// lus dang sems kyis nyams su myong gyur pa// mthong nas de dag phan bde'i phyir// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad kyi// stobs bcu gang las byung
338b6(phal chen): ba yi/ bla na med pa'i sems kyang kho mos bskyed// de las smon lam sprin byung ba// 'gro ba kun la bde bar gzhol ba'i mchog/ tshogs rnams 'byung ba mtha' yas dang /
338b7(phal chen): lam tshul rgya mtsho rtogs pa'ang de nas byung // 'jug pa'i sprin yangs thob gyur pa// lam rgyud kun tu sgo gsal shugs ldan te/ pha rol phyin gyi sprin yangs pa'ang // chos dbyings 'byan
339a1(phal chen): klas kun tu rnam par 'gyed// sa gnon shugs drag yangs ldan dang // dus gsum rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi sa rnams la// chags pa med par spyod par
339a2(phal chen): gyur/ skad cig gcig gis rgyal ba kun drung 'gro// gzhan yang rgyal sras kho mos ni// khyod pa kun tu bzang po yongs su gnon// chos dbyings bye brag bcu rnams kyi/
339a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i tshul lnga'ang khe mos rtogs par 'jugarigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bu sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rgyun mi gcod
339a4(phal chen): pa la zhugs pa mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba zung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/ rigs kyi bu de ltar me blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mi'i bdag
339a5(phal chen): po zhes bya ba 'khor lor sgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyud mi gcad pa la zhugs pa'o// kho mo sad par byed pa'i mtshan mo'i lha mo de ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sprul pa'o//
339a6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus ma 'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba zung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems ne ni/ de ltar mi bas
339a7(phal chen): man de'i tshe ri'i dus na 'khor los sbyar ba'i btsu mo bung mi de ri po che bang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba chung // kho mo mtshan mo'i lha mo des med par byas nas/ sangs rgyas /
339b1(phal chen): ba la yang dag par bskul to// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems de srid cig nus bskyed de/ de ltar kho mo sems skyed pa de'i mthus bskal pa
339b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ rtag tu rgyun ma chad par lha dang mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud la rten cing / thams cang du'ang de bzhin gshegs
339b3(phal chen): pa blta ba dang ldan par gyur to// tha mar kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi sgron pa yon tan rgyal mtshan mthong
339b4(phal chen): ba tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di thob ste/ de thob pas kho mo sems
339b5(phal chen): car yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du rnam pa 'di lta bus sta gon du gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga'
339b6(phal chen): ba rgya chen po'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'khod cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la zams
339b7(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i shugs drag po rgya mtsho chen po rab tu thob pa/ 'jug pa'i sgo thams cad la sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam chen po rgya mtshos 'jug pa rab tu thob pa/
340a1(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par spyad pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub la mkhas pa
340a2(phal chen): spyod pa re re la'ang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu zla ba snyed mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ lus re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa
340a3(phal chen): la mkhas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rnam par dmigs pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa
340a4(phal chen): la mkhas pa/ zhing thams cad du'ang zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang
340a5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/ de bzhir gshegs pa re re'i sngon gyi mtha'i bskal pa la
340a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chags yongs su bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/ de bzhir gshegs pa re re'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu yangs pa yang dag par
340a7(phal chen): ba dang yongs su gzung ba la mkhas pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par mkhas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon
340b1(phal chen): tar brjod par nus re skan// song rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid na/ kho mo dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig na mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi
340b2(phal chen): brjid dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su sbyang bar bya ba
340b3(phal chen): dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan
340b4(phal chen): mo'i lha mo 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nAs yang dang yang bltas te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i drung nas song ngo //
340b5(phal chen): 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po ro zhes bya ba theg pa cher po'i mdo bam po brgya thab pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ mtshan mo'i
340b6(phal chen): lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan de la mos par
340b7(phal chen): bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / shes par bya ba dang / yid ches par bya ba dang / rab tu gzhol bar bya ba dang / rgyas par dgang ba dang / rjes su shes par bya ba dang /
341a1(phal chen): rjes su dran par bya ba dang / rjes su gzhol bar bya ba dang / sgom par byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du bya ba dang / gdams ngag
341a2(phal chen): rjes su bstan pa la bar chad med par bya ba'i phyir/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas 'gro kar gtams pa rjes su dran pa byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i
341a3(phal chen): rjes su semam pa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyer mthong ba thob par bya ba la yang dag par spyod pa phyogs kun tu mngon par bltas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcol
341a4(phal chen): bar yid la bya ba rgyal thams cad bral ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyenu bsnyen bkur ba'i mthu tshogs chen po yongs su bsgrub par ni nor pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen pa dang rgyud kyi tshul gcigs
341a5(phal chen): byur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rje thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa mi byed pas zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyer la brtan pa yongs su 'phel bar bya
341a6(phal chen): la brtson 'grus kyi shugs cher po rgya mtsho yongs su skyes pa/ bskal pa thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas gnas par bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo/
341a7(phal chen): sems can kun tu stong ba'i gzi brjid dpal kyi drung du song ngo // de sngar 'gro ba'i tshe/ mtshar mo'i lha mo sems car kun tu myong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
341b1(phal chen): rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yongs su grub pa'i lus bstan te
341b2(phal chen): mdzod spu nas 'od zer ye shes kyi 'od kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan par bkye'o// des 'jig rten thams cad
341b3(phal chen): snang bar byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bor 'dug ste lus thams cad du khyab par gyur to// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'od zer des reg par gyur ma thag tu de nyid kyi mod la
341b4(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin shin tu rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor thob par gyur to// de thob pas mtshar mo'i lha po rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo
341b5(phal chen): sems can kun tu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi dpal gnyis kyi bar gyi lam ra sa'i dkyil 'khor yod pa de la me'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am chu'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ sa'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rdo rje'i
341b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dam pa sna tshogs kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ me tog dang / spos dang / phye ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rgyan thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
341b7(phal chen): 'am/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed cig yod pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba de dag thams cad la rdul phra mo re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba/
342a1(phal chen): snyed chu'i phung po dang bcas/ me'i phung po dang bcas/ rlung gi phung po dang bcas/ sa'i phung po dang bcas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams dang bcas/ gzhi dung
342a2(phal chen): bcas/ rten dang bcas par dbyibs sna tshogs can/ sa gzhi rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ ri'i 'khor sna tshogs can chu klung dang mtsho sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ rgya mtsho snga
342a3(phal chen): tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor ba lha rdzas kyis khyim sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ shing sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rgyan sna tshogs can/ lha'i grong khyer
342a4(phal chen): gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ klu'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ dri za'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ lha ma
342a5(phal chen): yin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ mi 'am ci'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ lto 'phye chen po'i
342a6(phal chen): grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa mi'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad na rnam par gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi grong khyer gyi
342a7(phal chen): khyim gyi gnas dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rter gyi yul dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi 'jig rten gyi yul dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi yul dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i
342b1(phal chen): lab rje rgyud kyi ni 'pho dang lta ba'i yul dang bcas pa/ ste ba sna tshogs kyis ma 'dres pa'i rgyud mthara' yas pa'i bye brag la yongs su gzhol ba rnams 'dra zhing 'jig par gyur pa mthong ngo // 'chi
342b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams la la ni kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo // la la ni yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni shin tu kun nas
342b3(phal chen): nyon mongs par mthong ngo // la la ni lam gyi rgyud yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni kun nus nyon mongs pa la yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni rnam par dag pa kun nas nyin mongs
342b4(phal chen): par mthong ngo // la la ni shin tu yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni gzhi mnyam par mthong ngo // la la ni spyi'u tshugs su gnas par mthong ngo // la la ni snrel zhing 'dug par mthong ngo //
342b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can gyi lam gyi rgyu dang / sems can gyi skye gnas thams cad na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal sems can so
342b6(phal chen): so nus 'dul ba'i rkyen bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la ma 'dres par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur par gnas par mthong ngo // sems
342b7(phal chen): can tshe'i tshad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / mos pa'i spyod yul rnam pa sna tshogs can dang / lus rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / ngag rnam par phye ba dang / nges pa'i
343a1(phal chen): tshig gi 'du byed kyi tha snyad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / dbang gi rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yongs su/
343a2(phal chen): smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du sems car thams cad la ma 'dres par mngon sum du gnas pa mthong ngo // de yang 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtog/
343a3(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams rnams kyi gcig
343a4(phal chen): gcig za ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa rnam par
343a5(phal chen): bzlog pa dang / klu'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi klu'i sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i
343a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / me'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gis rgod pa'i
343a7(phal chen): mun pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcas pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams kyi
343b1(phal chen): smras pas srid pa dang / bdakrus pa yid pa'i 'dregs pa rnas par bzlog pa dang / mabar ci 'jigs pa ltung bar sems can rnams kyi la' du pas tsha ba'i 'jisasu pa rnam par bgyis/
343b2(phal chen): mas 'jigs shing snang ba byesems can rnams kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par thod pa dang / ngan song gi gi sungasas 'dregs shing sdang ba'i sems nan rnams den spong gi g.yong
343b3(phal chen): sngas 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jo ba med pas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jig sna pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa brgyang zos
343b4(phal chen): kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chud zos kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rnams kyis 'jigs shing bag tshwa bu'i sems
343b5(phal chen): can rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems nyams kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sdig to'i grogs po dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi sdig to'i grogs po
343b6(phal chen): dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral gyis dogs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par
343b7(phal chen): bzlog pa dang / nyan pos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung gis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /
344a1(phal chen): 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /
344a2(phal chen): sems can skal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag che ba rnams kyi sems can skal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dus mi bzad par skyes kyis 'jigs
344a3(phal chen): shing bag tshwa ba rnams kyi dus mi bzad par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / rigs ngan par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi rigs ngan par skye ba'i 'jigs po rnam par bzlog pa
344a4(phal chen): dang / sdig to'i las byas kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi sdig to'i las byed pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas 'jigs shing sbyang ba rnams kyi las
344a5(phal chen): dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang 'ching bas 'jigs shing sdang ba rnams kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang /
344a6(phal chen): 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlogs pa dang / sems can thams cad la so sor mngon du gyur par gnas pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ sgo nga las skyes pa'i sems can dang / mngal
344a7(phal chen): nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa'ang ma
344b1(phal chen): yid 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa'i sems cad thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i smon lam gyi stobs mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs drag po dang
344b2(phal chen): rnam par gnod pa shin tu yangs pa'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen po stobs dang / mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang
344b3(phal chen): smod lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho'i shugs drag po shin tu skyes pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i byams pa chen pos rgyas par
344b4(phal chen): dgang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yongasu bsgrubs pa dang / dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phral bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes rab tu
344b5(phal chen): bsgrub pa phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang ldan pas zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la mngon du gyur
344b6(phal chen): par gnas par mthong ngo // chos thams cad kyi rgyus shes par bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
344b7(phal chen): cad kyi bstar pa yongs su gzung ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa la mngon du gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par 'phel
345a1(phal chen): bar bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems la sgrib pa med par mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs
345a2(phal chen): su smin par bya ba la mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par gyung ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i chos
345a3(phal chen): rnam par bzlog pa la mngon du gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par bsal ba la mngon du gyur cing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba yongs su
345a4(phal chen): bskyed pa'i don du gnas pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu ror bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi byang chub sems dpa'i
345a5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par gnas shing / 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba stor pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu
345a6(phal chen): mthong nas rab tu dga' ba skyes te/ spro ba chen po'i shugs drag po rgya mtsho rab tu thob nas/ mtshan mo'i lnga mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas
345a7(phal chen): nas ngor gyen du bltas so// de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu myong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang mtshan rnam par dag pa de mi snang bar byas te
345b1(phal chen): myu na po'i mapo gzugs su bu nas rnam par 'phrul ba thams padu 'dren cing 'dug par gnas so// de nas rkyong dpon gyi na nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i po
345b2(phal chen): sems can kun tu myong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi mdun du 'dug sa thul mo sngar nus/ de'i tshe rigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// khyod kyi sku yangs mtshan rab rgyun gyis brgyan
345b3(phal chen): shin tu bzang zing mdzes pa bdag gis mthong // nam mkhar skur pa'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa bzhin// dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa maring // 'od kyi 'khor can su bzang dang
345b4(phal chen): pa'i mchog/ mtha' yas zhing gi rdul khrims mang po snyed/ kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa'i dpe tshul du// phyogs rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par gang // 'od zer dru ba mang
345b5(phal chen): po 'gro sems mnyam// khyod ni ba spu'i sgo nas 'gyed pa mdzad// 'od zer sgo la pad+mo yid 'ong gnas// khyod kyi spel pa 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel// spos kyi
345b6(phal chen): na bun sprin du chags pa 'gyed// 'gro ba'i gzugs su gnas te kun nas mdzes// me tog sgo rnams kun nas 'gye mdzad pas// chos dbyings zhugs pa'i rkyal ba
345b7(phal chen): kun tu khyab// khyod kyi phrag pa'i lhun yangs 'phags pa ni// rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo ri rab 'dra// dri med de ri 'gro ba kun tu gsal// gti mug mur nab rnam par bzlog
346a1(phal chen): pa mdzad/ khyod kyi dri med zhal mdog bzang po las// dbur sIn dang nyi ma langs pa 'byung // khyod kyi nyi ma'i 'khor 'dra 'ong ba zang ba// rnam par sna
346a2(phal chen): mdzad spyod yul yangs pa 'byin// khyod kyi spyan nas zla bar 'od 'byung ba// rtag tu dri med sprin ltar mang ba skye// de dag phyogs bcur bkang zhing 'gro ba rnams// rab tu snang byed 'dzin
346a3(phal chen): rten rab rab sel// khyod kyi mtshan las 'gro ba'i lus mnyam pa'o// sprul pa rgya mtsho phyogs su khyab par 'phro// de dag chos dbyings yangs par rgyas 'gengs shing // sems can
346a4(phal chen): tshad med tshogs rnams yongs su 'dul// khyod kyi sku ni 'byam klas phyogs su snang // 'gro ba kun la mngon gyur dga' ba skyed// rgyal po me dang rkun po chus bskyed pa'i// 'jigs pa
346a5(phal chen): thams cad rnam sel zhi bar mdzad// gang tshe khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag btang nas// yon tan rnam par sems shing nyer phyin pa// de tshe 'od zer dri mod 'khor bzang ba// khyod kyi zhal gyi rin
346a6(phal chen): mamatshams gseb nas 'thon// phyogs rnams rgya mtsho brgya mang snang mdzad nas// 'jig rten sdang ba rgya che yongs bskyed de// rnam 'phrul rnam pa mang po rnam bstan nas// de tshe bdag gi
346a7(phal chen): lus kyi gse kun// gang tshe 'od kyi 'khor gyis bdag reg pa// de tshe bde barmang byung langs pa myong // gzungs dang ting 'dzin brgya mang yongs su nod// phyogs bcu'i rtsal ba dpag yas
346b1(phal chen): yong sa gyur// gom pa rnab por can du bags pa la dang // rtswa zan mangs skyed tshul ni dag gis / rdum blan thaM rnaza pa sa sa dang // rlung gi rdul med ning
346b2(phal chen): rnams mthong ba gyur/ rdul la gnas kyang rnam pa la sa // rang brgya ni shin tu tsho yang mongasaye khri'i sdug bsngal rnams su myong / rdo dring du zhi ste sngags
346b3(phal chen): mongs su 'don// zhing mang la la kun nas nyon mongs dag/ de na sdug bsngal mang zhing bde ba chung // rgyal bathugs rje can yang der skye ste// rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang rgyal de
346b4(phal chen): bzhin no// zhing tshul la la yongs dag nyon mongs te// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bzang mang pos brgyan// skyes pa bud med yongs brgyan blta na sdug/ skyon med rgyal ba'i
346b5(phal chen): gdung yang rgyun mi 'chad// zhing rnams rgya batsho yangs shing dri med pa// rdul la gnas shing mnyam pa'i gzhi dang ldan// de dag bskal pa brgya ma sngon gyi tshe// rnam par snang
346b6(phal chen): mdzad spyod de mdzad yongs su sbyang // zhing rnams 'byam klas kun na rgyal ba dag/ shing dbang dam pa'i drung du gshegs pa ston// rnam par 'phrul zhing byang chub 'tshang yang rgya// chos
346b7(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo bskor cing 'dul ba sngon// rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul yangs pa la// khyod kyang kun tu rjes su bzhud par mthong // mchod pa stong phrag tshad med khrag khrig gos// rgyal
347a1(phal chen): ba kun la mngon par mchod mdzad parjod / de nas tshong dporan gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can
347a2(phal chen): kun tu sbyong ba'i gzi brji dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de de lta bur zab pa ni ngo mtshar che na/ rnam par thar pa de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi/ de khyod
347a3(phal chen): kyis bzlas nas yun ni ji srid cig lags/ byang chub sems dpas ji ltar ran tan du bgyis na rnam par thar pa de yongs su dag par 'gyur/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
347a4(phal chen): gnas 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pas yid ches par dka' ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
347a5(phal chen): po'i spyod pa dang smon lam khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po lhur len pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la zhugs pa/
347a6(phal chen): mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bla na med par bya/
347a7(phal chen): babal zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcad pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su gzung
347b1(phal chen): ngas su smra pa bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa de spyor pa la gnas pas gnas par bya ba'i smon lam chen po rnam tsho la zhugs pa/ chos du ma tshemams cad la rjem
347b2(phal chen): ba med pa'i ye shes spang ba rnam par snang ba la zhugs pa / gad ci gare re zhing dus gsum kyi rtsub rgyam kyi thams cang du ye shes snang bas rnam par gnas par rab sa thob pa rnams kyi skur te/
347b3(phal chen): rlon kyang de bzhin bshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu zla ba snyed cig gi pa
347b4(phal chen): rol tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya bar bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'a khor ces bya ba byung ste/ bskal pa de la sangs rgyas ri rab kyi rdul shin
347b5(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba de ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi sman gyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa ste/ rdo rje las byas pa'i
347b6(phal chen): gzhal med khang dang gnas kyis yongs su mdzes par byas pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i gni ni rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgya mtsho las blangs pa ste/ lhun dang
347b7(phal chen): lus ni nor bu rin po che'i spos thams cad kyi rgyal po las gyur pa'o// de ni dbyibs kun tu zlum pa ste/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ lhab lhub thams cad kyi sprin gyi
348a1(phal chen): tha res kun nas khyab pa/ rin po rje'i khor lug rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ rin po che stong gis yongs su bskor ba/ gling ba ni pa bye ba khrag khrig
348a2(phal chen): phrag stong gis nas shin tu brgyan par brgyan pa ste/ de la gling bzhi pa la la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/ sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa'i lus dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas so//
348a3(phal chen): la la ni kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa ste/ sems can las 'drir ma dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas so// la la ni rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/ sems can
348a4(phal chen): yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa kha na ma tho ba nyung ba rnams kyi gnas so// la la ni shin tu yongs su dag pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' dag pa rnams kyi
348a5(phal chen): gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs kyi khor yug mtshams na/ gleng ba ni pa rin po che me tog sgror mra'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
348a6(phal chen): rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ ma smos ma skyes pa'i 'bras la yongs su spyod pa/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas dang gzhal
348a7(phal chen): ded khang la yongs su spyod pa/ 'khor kun nas yid bzhin gyi shing gis 'khor ba spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las spos kyi sprin rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba/ 'phreng ba sna tshog
348b1(phal chen): ci shing lus 'byung ba'i sbyin rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba/ me tog sna tshogs kyi shing las me tog kha dog dang dri bsam gyis mi khyang pa'i sprin gyi char rgyun mi 'jud par 'bab pa
348b2(phal chen): bye ma 'dog sna tshogs kyi shing las spos rin po rje'i rgyal po thams cad kyi bye ba'i char rgyun mi 'chad par 'bub pa/ rin po che'i shing sna tshigs las rin po rje'i 'bru mang po 'phrul
348b3(phal chen): baigi ba dog sdang bas shin tu snang bar byas pa/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi shing las sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sprin rlung gis spyod cing / nam mkha'i dbyings las sgra dbyangs
348b4(phal chen): skur pa 'byung ba nyin mtshar gyi bde ba nyi ma dang zla bas dbyung ba nor bu rin po che kun tu snang bas gzhi byas pa'i sa rab tu mnyam par gyur pa ste/ gling bzhi pa der rgyal
